The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Naga_Sirens_Sword: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Naga_Sir: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Shortbow: 尺寸很短，但是击杀威力很强，这把小弓可是杀死过度自信的敌人最为理想的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Shortbow: Short in size, but long on killing power, this little bow is an ideal weapon for dispatching overconfident enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Qaldin_Assassins_Dagger: 接触过卡尔丁刺客的猎人屈指可数。能够委托他们制造刀剑的更是寥寥无几。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Qaldin_Assassins: Few hunters ever make contact with a Qaldin Assassin.  Fewer still are able to commission a blade from them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Qaldin_Assassins_Slicer: 拥有卡尔丁刺客的武器是成功的象征，这样的成就只有极少的猎人已经达到。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Qaldin_Assassins: Owning the weapon of a Qaldin Assassin is a mark of success that few hunters ever achieve.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Qaldin_Assassins_Glaive: 完美匀称，锋利得难以置信，卡尔丁刺客的武器在以暗杀为生的人眼里可是件奢侈品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Qaldin_Assassins: Perfectly balanced and unbelievably sharp, the weapons of a Qaldin Assassin are considered a luxury among those who kill for their living.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Claszureme: 额头的符文给予了时间流动之外的视野。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Claszure: The runes upon the brow give vision beyond the flow of time.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylnashar_the_Winged_Axe: 在遗失的数百年前，双翼战斧希尔那沙曾经是一位古代国王最为钟爱的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylnashar_the_Wi: Lost for centuries, the winged axe known as Sylnashar was once the favored weapon of an ancient king.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the_Slain_Dr: 并不真的是一条龙的护肩，而是一位艺术家的精湛作品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the: Not the actual shoulders of a dragon, but a skilled artist's rendition of it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Slain_Dragon: 骑士头颅太值钱，黄金之盔保安全。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Slai: A cage of gold for your knight's gilded head.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Epoch: 永恒的战棍，相传是千年的工艺被压缩成一瞬间而得到的产物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Epoch: The cudgel of the ageless, said to be the result of a millennia of craftsmanship compressed to the blink of an eye.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Crests: 在变体精灵化身波浪冲进战场时，这些夜魇邪石肩饰也会随之进入。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Crests: As the wave of Morphling crests, surging into battle, these Direstone crests come along for the ride.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vambraces_of_the_Slain_Dr: 这对臂甲采用龙身上最好的金鳞所打造，现在低价出售中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vambraces_of_the: Forged from the finest dragon's gold, these vambraces are a bargain at any price.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Corpsemaker: 尽管刃上由于数百条人命已经出现了裂缝和缺口，它还是能顺利完成任务。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Corpsemaker: While the edge has cracked and chipped on the lives of hundreds, it has never failed to finish the job.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Headhunter: 这柄武器曾经的饰物是一位贵族的壁炉架上大量的灰尘，而这也正是斧王使贵族的头所遭受的命运。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Headhunter: This weapon once adorned a nobleman's mantel collecting dust, which is exactly the fate Axe made for the nobleman's head.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Bracers: 夜魇邪石并不是为了穿着轻便。当变体精灵带上这对护腕，他可是认真的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Bracer: Direstone is not a substance to be worn lightly. When Morphling dons these bracers, he means business.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Skeletal_Claw_of_the_Vand: 由于缺少血肉，克林克兹在他仅剩骨架的手上装饰了破坏者的爪子。这是多年前由恶魔铁匠所锻造，这只铁爪是为许多倒霉的遇难者迎接死亡的掌控所准备的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Skeletal_Claw_of: Lacking flesh, Clinkz adorns his skeletal hand with the claw of the Vandal.  Forged by smeevils in ages long past, this iron claw is for many hapless victims the iron grip of death itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacrificial_Shortblade: 如果它用来撕碎异教徒的心脏恰到好处，那它用来撕碎任何人的心脏都是恰到好处。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacrificial_Shor: If it was good enough to cut the heart from a heretic, then it is good enough to cut the heart from anyone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Saberhorns_Helm: 传奇将领赛伯霍恩的头盔见证了无数的战役和战争。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Saberhorns_Helm: The helm of the legendary general Saberhorn has seen countless battles and wars.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Runic_Bow_of_Corruption: 由骨头和钢铁制成的弓，饰有的纹章是古代的符文，读懂符文的人都将堕落。万幸的是，没人有此能耐。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Runic_Bow_of_Cor: A bow of bone and steel, emblazoned with archaic runes that corrupt all who can read their inscription.  Luckily, no one can.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_the_Crimson_Cutth: 与深红封喉行会的首领制定的契约是刚铎接受的合约中条件最为苛刻的。所以他留下几件纪念品也是理所应当。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_the_Crim: The contract for the head of the Crimson Cut-throat was one of the most difficult that Gondar had ever accepted.  It was only natural that he'd keep a few souvenirs.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_the_Crimson_Cutt: 打造该护体的原料来自深红封喉行会成员尸首上的盾牌和肩带。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_the_Cri: The guard is built from the shield and straps taken from the corpse of the Crimson Cut-throat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Crown: 与变体精灵十分相似，夜魇邪石也是从天而降。将邪石打造成华丽的王冠高高戴起是他的骄傲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Crown: Much like Morphling, the Direstone fell to earth. It is his pride to raise it high once again in this glorious crown.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Edge_of_the_Slain_Dragon: 没有刀剑能像屠龙者宝剑的剑刃一样锋利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Edge_of_the_Slai: There is no edge so keen as the edge of a dragon slayer's sword.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Pauldrons: 什么样的铁匠胆敢熔铸这夜魇邪石肩铠，我们可能无从得知。但是变体精灵自豪地戴上了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Pauldr: What smith dared forge these Direstone pauldrons, we may never know. But Morphling wears them with pride.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ancient_Sisters_Runed_Mantle_s: 远古姐妹会的符文斗篷（套装）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ancient_Sisters_Ghostly_Drape_: 远古姐妹会的鬼魅披风（套装）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ancient_Sisters_Stone_Kunais_s: 远古姐妹会的石质护肩（套装）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ancient_Sisters_Decayed_Visage: 远古姐妹会的腐化面具（套装）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ancient_Sisters_Ceremonial_Rea: 远古姐妹会的仪式镰刀（套装）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Revered_Bracers: 这件遗物老旧又有破损，不过为阿兹瑞斯带来了故乡的气息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Revered_Bracers: This heirloom is old and cracked, yet for Azwraith it smells of home.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crests_of_Polymorphia: 这个华丽箱子里面所包含的并不是变体之力的全部，其中的珍宝需要变换成最让人惊讶的形态才能适应其穿戴者——变体精灵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crests_of_Polymo: The power of Polymorphia is but barely contained between these splendid crests, and takes its most awe-inspiring form in the shape of their devoted wearer, Morphling.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_Shifting_Forms: 变体精灵在无尽的变体中找到了变体术的永恒。他用这顶王冠来表示自己的变体之术已臻化境。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_Shiftin: Morphling emulates the eternal patterns of Polymorphia in all he does. And by this crown, he marks himself a master of the art.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Saberhorns_Pauldron: 赛伯霍恩的印鉴被刻进了这件护肩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Saberhorns_Pauld: The sigil of Saberhorn's army is carved into the shoulder.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Saberhorns_Belt: 这件腰带曾经属于赛伯霍恩，一位来自昔日时代的传奇将领。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Saberhorns_Belt: This belt once belonged to Saberhorn, a legendary general from a bygone era.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Saberhorns_Heavy_Chopper: 相传传奇将军赛伯霍恩可以挥一次斧头就结束任何决斗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Saberhorns_Heavy: The legendary general Saberhorn was said to have been able to end any duel with a single swing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Barrel_Quiver: 这一箭袋是循环利用陈旧葡萄酒桶的碎片所制，是绿色制造的终极产物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Barrel_Quiver: Recycled from scraps of old wine casks, this quiver is the ultimate in green construction.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Revered_Belt: 一条世代相传的腰带；中间那印章的含义已经随着时间而消逝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Revered_Belt: A belt handed down through generations; the meaning of the sigil at its center has been lost to time.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_Polymorphia: 他们说，水是有记忆的——然而变体精灵每次变形都会溶解。这些肩甲能让他记住自己最初的形态，变体之术下唯一不变的存在。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_Pol: Water, they say, has a memory--but Morphling's dissolves with every form he takes. These pauldrons serve as a reminder of his original being, rooted in Polymorphia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Feudal_Mace_of_Chivalry: 将这强大的武器砸在敌人的脸上来证明你的骑士精神。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Feudal_Mace_of_C: Prove your chivalry by smashing enemies in the face with this powerful weapon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hammer_of_Enlightenment: 这柄战锤可能无法拯救敌人的灵魂，但是肯定能给他们应得的奖赏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hammer_of_Enligh: It may not save their souls, but this hammer will surely send your enemies to their just reward.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Runed_Helm_of_Valor: 带有强烈美感和力量的头盔，英勇符文头盔，这是值得全能骑士拥有的护甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Runed_Helm_of_Va: A helm of great beauty and strength, the Runed Helm of Valor is armor worthy of the Omniknight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Crystal_Caves: 在她的隐秘林地之下，卓尔游侠发现了一条点缀着水晶碎片的密径。当她顺着微光走到尽头处的山洞时，她发现了这把弓，嵌于石中，浑然天成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Cryst: Beneath her secret glades, Drow found a passage lit by crystal shards. Following the glittering light to the farthest cavern, she discovered this bow, embedded in the rock as if it had formed there.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Shifting_Forms: 在战争中，当变体精灵凝视这些护腕时，就能想起变体之力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Shift: In battle, these bracers, ever before Morphling's gaze, remind him of the power of Polymorphia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Sun_Vine: 这把漂亮的弓仿照的是纤巧带毒的太阳藤蔓，相比同名的植物甚至更为致命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Sun_V: This beautiful bow, modeled after the delicate and poisonous sun vine, is even more deadly than its namesake.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Shard_Crown: 变体精灵以冰的形态历经永恒穿越时空。变体精灵对寒冰了如指掌。你要知道，如果变体精灵戴上了寒冰之冠，那可是一顶庄重的王冠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Shard_Crow: Morphling spent eternities travelling space in the form of ice. Morphling knows ice. You know that if Morphling wears a crown of ice, it is a serious crown.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Shard_Pauldrons: 闪着寒光的星际冰霜以前就是变体精灵的饰物，现在他以波浪形态在战场穿行时冰霜装饰着他的肩膀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Shard_Paul: The glitter of the interstellar ice that once bedizened Morphling, decks his shoulders now as he surges to and fro across the field of battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Furyblade: 在它破裂前已经夺去一千条性命，而它还需要再夺去一千！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Furyblade: A thousand lives it claimed before it shattered, and a thousand more it shall claim after!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Furyblade__OffHand: 在它破裂前已经夺去一千条性命，而它还需要再夺去一千！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Furyblade__OffHa: A thousand lives it claimed before it shattered, and a thousand more it shall claim after!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Steel_Axe: 为一位残暴的军阀所打造，他企图能在一场战斗中对斧王发起挑战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Steel_Axe: Forged for a brutal warlord who sought to challenge Axe in single combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Shard_Armlets: 来啦来啦！即使是主宰也会跳起来去躲避这夺命护臂上的寒冰之刃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Shard_Arml: Coming through! Even Juggernaut will leap to avoid the icy edges of these lethal armlets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Omniscients_Maul: 对于那些质疑全能之神教徒平和天性的人，只要看一眼这柄武器就知道那些怀疑不无道理。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Omniscients_Maul: For those who doubt the Omniscient One's peaceful nature, one look at this weapon proves that doubt well deserved.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Infectuous_Amalgamate: 某些年代久远的石头和水晶能够永久的储存强大的能量。当这些晶体不再稳定时，一种不为人知的能量流控制了水晶。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Infectuous_Amalg: Beyond time lie stones and crystals forever able to bestow incredible power.  As these crystals leave their stasis, a growth that has never before known the temporal flow begins to take hold.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Revered_Spear: 这柄石质长矛看上去破旧又有缺口，但是这件遗物依然非常结实。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Revered_Spear: This stone spear seems old and chipped, yet this heirloom is still very sturdy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Revered_Shoulder: 这件衣服制造的材料是陈年的羽毛和石块，暗示着当年那淳朴的时光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Revered_Shoulder: Built from old leather and stone, this garment is a reminder of a simpler time.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mancatcher_of_the_Crimson: 深红封喉行会收集了种类繁多的华丽兵器来保证自己工作的顺利进行。在契约结束后，刚铎丝毫没有客气。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mancatcher_of_th: The Crimson Cut-throat kept a wide assortment of ornate blades to do his work.  Once the contract was complete, Gondar helped himself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lyraleis_Breeze: 你的敌人收到的唯一警告将是杀死他们的弓箭找到标靶时吹拂他们脸颊的微风。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lyraleis_Breeze: The only warning your enemies will receive will be the slight breeze that puffs their cheek as the arrow that kills them finds its mark.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Makeshift_Hornwood_Bow: 这把临时弓是体现了创造力的奇迹，证明风行者想要杀死你并不需要华丽的武器。实际上，她所需要的只是将几根木棍绑成弓的形状。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Makeshift_Hornwo: A marvel of inventiveness, this makeshift bow proves that Windranger can kill you without fancy weapons.  In fact, all she needs is a few sticks bound together in the shape of a bow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Drake: 这件轻便多彩的护甲由邪龙下腹的鳞屑所制，戴上出入战场将是无上的荣耀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_D: Made from the scales of a drake's underbelly, this light and colorful armor is an honor to wear into battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Merciless_Spear: 制造的用途是攻破敌人的要害，并在撤出时将其撕碎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Merciless_Spear: Built to strike into the core of an adversary, and tear it apart when withdrawn.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Drake: 一件长长的披风，这样设计是为了纪念所有在战斗中阵亡的邪龙。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Drak: A long cape designed in honor of all drakes who have died in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Drake: 根据已死邪龙的样子制造的护甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Dra: Armor made from the likeness of a fallen drake.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Travelers_Jug: 旅者宝葫的制作材料是将强化龙鳞磨碎进行重组后最为精良的产物，数个世代以来人们认为它都是牢不可破的。现在酒仙来验证了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Travelers_Jug: Made from the finest crushed and reconstituted dragon-hardened shell, the Traveler's Jug has for generations been thought unbreakable.  Now Brewmaster puts it to the test.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pads_of_the_Crimson_Cutth: 在刚铎终结之时，深红封喉护甲上还剩了点别的东西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pads_of_the_Crim: By the time Gondar was finished, little else remained of the Crimson Cut-throat's armor.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Peregrine_Lance: As the peregrine flies, so too shall this blade.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Crimson_Cutt: 深红封喉行会没有要求，也没有计划。支付他契约上金额的是受害人的家属。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Cri: The Crimson Cut-throat made no demands, and had no agenda.  The cost for his contract was paid for by the families of his victims.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helmet_of_the_Drake: 相传铸造头盔所用的是曾经束缚着强大的邪龙一族末裔的铁制枷锁，这是屠龙者最为觊觎的装备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helmet_of_the_Dr: Said to be forged from the iron that once chained the last of the great Drakinds, this helm is most coveted among dragon slayers.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Markswomans_Cap: 今天发型不太好？别担心。这顶漂亮的女射手帽子在任何场合都很时髦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Markswomans_Cap: Having a bad hair day?  No problem.  This snappy little markswoman's cap is stylish for all occasions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Birots_Bracers_of_Dignity: 世界最深的海洋中的甲壳之主，比洛特对陆地上水的完美化身致以自己的敬意。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Birots_Bracers_o: A carapaced lord of the deepest flooded oceans of the world, Birot pays tribute to water's finest representative on land.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Halberd: 地上留下了九根长矛，来纪念在对抗恐怖巫师的最后一战中被杀死的九名皇家卫士。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Halberd: Nine lances were left on the field for the nine royal guardsmen slain in the final battle against the Dread Magus.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Stinger: This one is gonna sting a little.  Oh, yes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_the_Drake: 尽管是纯银打造还镶嵌了深红的玛瑙，这面附魔的邪龙之盾可不是在比赛时供选手举起的俗气玩意儿。这是最深层次的魔法，持盾之人找不到更好的防具了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_the_Dr: Although forged from silver and jeweled with crimsonstone, this enchanted Shield of the Drake is no ornamental bauble to hefted at tourneys.  It is the deepest kind of magic, and its bearer could find no better protection.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ornate_Mantle_of_Renewed_: 全能骑士宽阔的肩膀使这件护肩显得很合身。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ornate_Mantle_of: The massive shoulders of Omniknight bear this armor well.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shuriken_of_the_Crimson_C: 在深红封喉行会的大本营里，众多武器中有小型弯刀的三件套，刚铎将其重新做成了忍者镖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shuriken_of_the_: Among the many weapons in the Crimson Cut-throat's home were a trio of small, curved knives which Gondar repurposed into a new shuriken.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Steel_Shoulder: 那军阀认为他锻造的护甲将使他在战斗中取得胜利。斧王表示，让你明白。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Steel_Shou: The warlord thought his forged armor would win the day.  Axe showed him otherwise.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spade_of_the_Gluttonous: 尽管打造的样子与失落之城的巨大轮书之间的相似性具有象征意义，但是饕餮之铲回荡的歌曲只有死亡之歌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spade_of_the_Glu: Though crafted in symbolic likeness to the great wheel books of the ruined city, the Spade of the Gluttonous whistles no song but the song of death.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spetum_of_the_Disciplined: 锐利的尖端能使武器变得危险，而严守纪律的士兵紧握的手臂能使其致命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spetum_of_the_Di: While a sharp point may make a weapon dangerous, it takes a disciplined arm to make it deadly.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spinal_Slicer__OffHand: 一只红色亚龙的珍贵脊柱很好地抵消了这把沉重战刃的分量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spinal_Slicer__O: The prized spine of a red drake provides this heavy blade with an excellent counter-balance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spinal_Slicer: 一只红色亚龙的珍贵脊柱很好地抵消了这把沉重战刃的分量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spinal_Slicer: The prized spine of a red drake provides this heavy blade with an excellent counter-balance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Steel_Belt: 中间很深的刮痕是原来的拥有者唯一躲开的那次攻击所留下的东西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Steel_Belt: A deep scratch shows at its center, a remnant of the only attack the original owner was able to deflect.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulderpads_of_the_Falco: 只有俯冲的猎鹰才有希望躲开风行者的箭矢。不过这只没有成功。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulderpads_of_: Only a diving falcon can hope to avoid Windranger's arrows.  But this one didn't.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Warhammer_of_Renewed_Fait: 如果你敢质疑全能之神的力量，这把战锤将重新定义你的信仰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Warhammer_of_Ren: If ever you doubt in the power of the Omniscient, this warhammer will renew your faith.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armlet_of_Renewed_Faith: 全能之神的骑士配得上的一对护臂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armlet_of_Renewe: An armlet worthy of of a knight of the Omniscient.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Shifters_Beguiling_Guard_set: 变形者的狡诈守卫（套装）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sword_of_the_Drake: 十二把曾经斩杀的龙在一条以上的现存宝剑中的一把。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sword_of_the_Dra: One of only a dozen swords in existence known to have slain more than one dragon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Verdant_Coif: 一件美丽的头巾，风格仿造的是古时的鹰猎者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Verdant_Coif: A beautiful hood in the style of the falconers of old.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_Thunderwraths_Cal: 只有响应全能之神号召的教徒才能穿上这样的披风。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_Thunderw: Only those who are called in service to the Omniscient can wear a cape such as this.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Thunderwraths_Cal: 时尚又引人注目的头盔，让全能之神的骑士戴上绝对合适。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Thunderw: A stylish and dramatic helm truly fitting a knight of the Omniscient.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Wind_Leaf: 能适应任何天气状况的斗篷，所有饲鹰者梦寐以求的服饰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Wind: A cape for all weather, this is a garment that any falconer would be proud to wear.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_Shield: 这面远古的盾牌上凝视的是猩红飞龙的眼睛吗？我想是的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_S: Is that the eyes of the Crimson Wyvern that peer out from this ancient shield?  I think it is.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hammer_of_Thunderwraths_C: 这把武器能将最不可救药的异教徒重塑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hammer_of_Thunde: A weapon capable of hammering the most unmalleable of unbelievers into shape.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_Thunderwraths_Ca: 把对全能之祖的信念作为护甲...显然是不够的。你还需要真正的护甲。比如这个。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_Thunder: Armored only with your faith in the Omnicient...is not the way to go.  Also, use real armor.  Like this.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_Helm: 一个以古代猩红飞龙的样子铸造的头盔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_H: A helm forged in the likeness of the ancient Crimson Wyvern.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_Skirt: 穿上猩红飞龙之裙来保护你的双腿吧。你绝对够男子汉，肯定能做到的；毕竟你是一名骑士。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_S: Protect your legs with the skirt of the Crimson Wyvern.  You are manly enough to pull it off; you're a knight after all.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ZaruKina_Protector_Cape: 得名于她很久以前被风暴摧毁的村庄，这披肩时刻告诉她风既能保护也能破坏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ZaruKina_Protect: Named after her village that was destroyed in a storm long ago, this cape is a reminder that wind can protect as well as destroy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ZaruKina_Protector_Bow: 得名于她那被摧毁的村庄，这把弓让她无法忘记风的毁灭性力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ZaruKina_Protect: Named in honor of her lost village, this bow is a reminder of the destructive power of the wind.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ZaruKina_Protector_Pads: 扎茹吉娜族人日常穿着的保护性传统肩垫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ZaruKina_Protect: Traditional protective shoulder armor commonly worn by the Zaru'Kina people.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Shifters_Beguiling_Chops_set: 变形者的狡诈之印（套装）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Proof_of_Courage: 在红雾军团中，懦夫将受到头发被剃光的羞辱。斧王不会害怕，也没被羞辱。而且他不认识那个剃头的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Proof_of_Courage: In the Red Mist army, cowards were made to cut their hair in shame.  Axe has known neither fear, nor shame.  Nor a barber.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Little_Blink_Dagger: “不要担心，宝贝斧头。闪烁匕首不是用来砍人的。”
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Little_Blink_Dag: \"Don't worry, precious Axe. Blink Dagger does not come to chop.\"
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Birots_Crests_of_Dignity: 深海水域的比洛特，尊崇之躯无出其右，他将自己一部分高贵气质以威武的肩饰形式赐予他青睐的变体精灵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Birots_Crests_of: Birot of the Deep Waters, than whom no lord is more dignified, grants a portion of his dignity to his favored Morphling, in the form of stately crests.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Birots_Helm_of_Dignity: 变体精灵骄傲地炫耀着锃亮如新，极为高贵的比洛特头盔，比洛特对外面干燥土地的认识全部来自于变体精灵的叙述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Birots_Helm_of_D: Morphling proudly sports the polished and most dignified helm of Birot, who knows nothing of the dry surface world except what Morphling tells him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_the_Falling_Come: 来自黑暗的彗星承载着变体精灵的水之本源。当它坠落并进入大气时，产生了一顶燃烧的皇冠。现在变体精灵正戴着这顶皇冠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_the_Fal: From darkness, the comet came carrying the wotery essence of Morphling. As it fell, a searing crown marked its encounter with the atmosphere. Morphling wears it now.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winged_Paladins_Gauntlet: 如同信仰一般强大的护臂，像全能之神温暖的怀抱一样保护着他人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winged_Paladins_: A Gauntlet as strong as faith itself, and as protective as the loving embrace of the Omniscient.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crests_of_the_Falling_Com: 变体精灵的力量在彗星坠落的时候达到顶峰。当你和敌人擦肩而过时，这肩垫能够完美的将敌人切碎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crests_of_the_Fa: As the comet fell, the power of Morphling crested. Perfect for slicing through enemies as you shoulder them aside.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Golden_Mane: 当腰带上的脸在阳光下发亮时，眼睛那镶嵌的翡翠也随之闪耀。金鬃军团的荣耀实属无价之宝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Gold: As the face upon the belt gleams in the sun, so too do the emeralds in its eyes.  The honors of the Golden Mane are valuable beyond measure.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Zarukina_Protector_Hair: 风行者被摧毁的故乡——扎茹吉娜村里常用的发式。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Zarukina_Protect: A hairstyle common to the Zaru'Kina people of Windrunner's destroyed village.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodwood_Arc: 这把举世无双的武器是由树龄五千年的心材雕刻而成，能将上古的力量带入任何战斗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodwood_Arc: Carved from the corewood of a five-thousand-year-old-tree, this magnificent brings an ancient strength to any battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Shifters_Beguiling_Brawlers_se: 变形者的狡诈护腕（套装）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Shifters_Beguiling_Blade_set: 变形者的狡诈之刃（套装）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Shifters_Beguiling_Wrap_set: 变形者的狡诈之拥（套装）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Skullsplitter_Axe: 斧王从未有心将刃上原来拥有者的鲜血拭去。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Skullsplitter_Ax: Axe never had the heart to wipe the original owner's blood from the edge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winged_Paladins_Armor: 双翼护甲配得上伟大的全能之神麾下的骑士。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winged_Paladins_: Winged armor worthy of a knight in the great Omniscient's army.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodwood_Reserve: 由最精良的锃亮血木制成的美丽箭袋。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodwood_Reserv: A beautiful quiver of the finest polished bloodwood.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_Shoulders: 由死去的飞龙龙鳞所铸，这件肩甲能使任何骑士都显得与众不同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_S: Constructed from the scales of a fallen wyvern, this shoulder armor is a mark of distinction for any knight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Oyoloe: 曾经这是神秘莫测的野兽，后来这头神出鬼没的碧绿野鹿被风行者猎杀，它的鹿茸还被制成了弓。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Oyolo: Once thought to be a mythical beast, the Windranger slew the elusive, green oyoloe, and made a bow from its antlers.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armlets_of_the_Falling_Co: 如同知悉了等待着它的命运，变体精灵曾经搭载的天外彗星将自己的一部分制成了一对护臂，总有一天会与它的乘客完美结合。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armlets_of_the_F: As if knowing the destiny that awaited it, the comet that once carried Morphling from the heavens produced from its own substance a pair of armlets that would one day fit its passenger perfectly.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spear_of_the_Golden_Mane: 想要挥舞如此珍贵长矛的人必须拥有与金鬃军团之荣耀相称的勇气和勇猛的气质。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spear_of_the_Gol: To wield such a prized spear, one must have courage and ferocity befitting the honors of the Golden Mane.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gauntlet_of_the_Golden_Ma: 想要获得金鬃军团赐予的荣誉，每个人都必须作出惊人的牺牲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gauntlet_of_the_: To gain the honors of the Golden Mane, one must endure incredible sacrifice.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulder_of_the_Golden_Ma: 面露凶光，表情坚定，毫无惧色。这是对穿着金鬃军团之荣耀的人所提出的要求。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulder_of_the_: In each ferocious face is set determination without fear.  Such is required from those who would don the honors of the Golden Mane.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Winged_Paladins_Glorious_Cape: 神圣骑士的光辉展翅披风
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winged_Paladins_Glorious_: 由一百名僧侣织就的光辉披风，为的是纪念全能之神。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winged_Paladins_: A glorious cape sewn by a hundred monks in honor of the Omniscient.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winged_Paladins_Helm: 由极为纯正的金银打造的头盔，为了向全能之神致敬而制造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winged_Paladins_: A helm of purest gold and sterling silver, created in honor of the Omniscient.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spear_of_the_Herald: 制造工匠不明的远古武器，相传它是为命运相称的人所打造。每次挥舞都预示着向全新时代又迈进了一步。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spear_of_the_Her: An ancient weapon from an unknown craftsman, it was said to have been forged for he whom destiny calls worthy. Each swing heralds another step toward a new age.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winged_Paladins_Defiance: 藐视全能之神所得的代价就是这把横在脖子上的兵器。这武器十分沉重，需要带着庄重的心才能挥舞。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winged_Paladins_: Defy the Omniscient, and the price will be this blade on your neck.  It is a heavy weapon, wielded with a heavy heart.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shredder_of_the_Vandal: 如果你用光了箭矢，你还能用这把弓捅向敌人。弓上鹿角的数量比拉席克都多。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shredder_of_the_: If you run out of arrows, you can always stab your enemies with this.  It has more points than Leshrac has horns.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Torn_Guard_of_the_Vandal: 对锁骨向外界暴露感到厌烦了？这里有件附魔的护甲，可以在苦战中保护好一身老骨头。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Torn_Guard_of_th: Tired of your clavicle being exposed to the world?  Here is an enchanted armor designed to shield old bones from plight of combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Quiver_of_the_Vandal: 无尽的箭矢将会从你肩上的小袋中取出。敌人一看到就会为之颤抖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Quiver_of_t: Endless arrows shall be pulled from the pouch over your shoulder.  Enemies will quiver at the sight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Great_Grey_Owl_Bow: 她有天在晚上梦见神圣的猫头鹰精灵呼唤着她的名字。当她醒来时，这把弓就放在身旁树叶织就的床上...灰色的羽毛还在上方的树干上飘然而过。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Great_Grey_Owl_B: She dreamed in the night that the divine owl spirit called her name. When she woke, this bow lay beside her in a bed of leaves...grey feathers still drifting from the branch above.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Claszureme: 在装备中央的标记注明了前往时间之外地域的道路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Claszure: Upon the dial at its center lie markings which map the way to the realms beyond time.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Claszureme: 护腕上的突起据说是仿照时间的流动，而符文会向佩戴者报告发现的动向。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Clasz: The spikes on the wrist are said to sample the flow of time, while the runes report the findings to the wearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sparrowhawk_Bow: 孔武有力，不过轻如鸿毛，这把鹰雀之弓能使你的箭矢直奔目标而去。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sparrowhawk_Bow: Strong, but light as a feather, this bow of the sparrowhawk will fly your arrows true to their targets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_Claszureme: 对于来自超维视界的旅者，在时间的流动中所处的地点并不稳定。这些符文将使佩戴者在时间的行进中站稳阵脚。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_Cla: For a traveler from Claszureme, one's place in the flow of time is uncertain.  These runes help ground the wearer within time's march.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Spine_Recurve_Bow: 由死去的恶魔脊椎所制，这把弓就像所有魔鬼的脊柱一样扭曲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Spine_Recu: Made from the vertebrae of the fallen damned, this bow is crooked as the spine of any demon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sparrowhawk_Cape: 除了外观时尚，这件鹰雀披风还能实现伪装自己的把戏，只要你是站在一群鹰雀的旁边。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sparrowhawk_Cape: In addition to being stylish, this cape of the sparrowhawk manages the trick of also being camouflaging, provided that you're standing next to a flock of sparrowhawks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sparrowhawk_Hood: 驯服狂野的头发需要一顶华丽的头巾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sparrowhawk_Hood: It takes a spectacular hood to tame your fiery red hair.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jeweled_Longbow: 简约优雅，由闪耀着特殊光芒的宝石完美地衬托。细看发现，制造工艺属于一个早已被认为灭绝的种族。那么这弓怎么会是栩栩如新的呢？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jeweled_Longbow: Simple and elegant, set off perfectly by gems of uncommon brilliance. On examination, the workmanship is that of a race long thought extinct. How then is this bow brand new?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Guise_of_the_Vandal: 一百年来，一只瞎眼的恶魔铁匠对他的杰作进行锤炼和打磨，直到这件伟大的作品完成。没人能看到这恶魔外观的铁制面具下佩戴者的脸。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Guise_of_t: For a hundred years, a blind smeevil hammered and honed his masterpiece, until the great work was done.  None shall see your face behind the iron mask of the Demon Guise.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sparrowhawk_Wings: 是否对肩膀没有鹰雀的羽毛感到不爽？那么这件物品就是为你量身打造的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sparrowhawk_Wing: Tired of your shoulders being devoid of sparrowhawk feathers?  Then this item is for you.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_Bracers: 由飞龙脊柱上连锁的鳞片打造，这对猩红护腕与龙骑士的前臂就是绝配。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_B: Made from the interlocking scales that sit above the wyvern's spine, this crimson bracer is a perfect fit for knight's forearm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_Sword_: 一把以死去飞龙的利爪铸成的剑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Wyvern_S: A sword made from the talons of a fallen wyvern.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Boots: 丛林小道的卫士行走时极为安静，出卖他们的不可能是他们精巧的长靴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Bo: The guardians of the forest paths walk in perfect silence, betrayed not by their cunning footwear.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mallet_of_Magnificence: 这柄常用的战槌是为你的敌人绝对、肯定必须被折磨的情况准备的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mallet_of_Magnif: The go-to mallet for when your enemies absolutely, positively must be smited.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fishing_Halberd: 极地村庄附近海岸的鱼大得只要一口就能吃下一个人。对抗这样的鱼，仅仅一把长矛是不够的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fishing_Halberd: Off the coast near the village of Pole are fish large enough to eat a man in a single bite.  Against such a beast, a spear simply will not do.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Searing_Soul: 一把从地狱带回来的魔弓。有了这样武器，敌人将感受到你的愤怒燃烧产生的灼热火焰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Seari: A bow brought back from hell itself.   With this weapon, enemies will feel the searing burn of your anger.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sparrowhawk_Quiver: 这支箭袋验证了鹰雀的每个部分都能成为供风行者穿戴的时尚装备，证明了鹰雀这个物种的实用性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sparrowhawk_Quiv: Proving that every part of the sparrowhawk can be turned into a stylish item for Lyralei to wear, this quiver speaks to the utility of sparrowhawks as a species.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hammer_of_Light_Inexorabl: 这柄涂上符文的奇异战锤将保证你所有的敌人都会见到圣光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hammer_of_Light_: This strange, rune-scrawled hammer will ensure that all your enemies see the light.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_the_evildoer: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_the_evildoer: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Bow: 卓尔游侠并没有从林间卫士那学到东西，不过她会不时从他们那夺走长弓，她还会对弓的质量进行检验。即使是以她的标准，这把弓也被判定为非常优秀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Bo: Drow has nothing to learn from the Sylvan Guard, but from time to time she relieves one of them of their bow, that she might test its quality. Even by her standards, this one is adjudged very fine.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Cape: 行事隐秘对林间卫士的成员来说至关重要。就连卓尔游侠也发现，穿上这件披风能让自己在树木繁茂的小路上穿行而不被发现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Ca: Stealth is of utmost importance to those who number themselves among the Sylvan Guard. Even Drow finds this an acceptable cape for moving unseen through the wooded ways.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Hair: 尽管并非林间卫士的一员，卓尔游侠在他们行进的过程中窥探着他们，偶尔还会赞美他们的流行风尚。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Ha: While not a member of the Sylvan Guard, Drow spies upon them in their marches, and occasionally admires their passing fashions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Quiver: 林间卫士的弓箭手射的箭只有专为他们使用所打造的箭矢。当卓尔游侠使用了他们的工具，这样的箭矢必不可少。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Qu: The archers of the Sylvan Guard shoot only arrows crafted specifically for their use. When Drow uses their gear, such arrows are de rigeur.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Cuffs: 在她年轻时，卓尔游侠受到过一两次诱惑，想要抛弃她寂寞的往昔加入林间卫士。当时很大一部分诱惑就是这对护袖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Cu: In her youth, Drow was tempted once or twice to throw over her lonely ways and join the Sylvan Guard. These cuffs were a large part of the attraction.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Dress_Armor: 有一点必须承认：卓尔游侠羡慕林间卫士。在她不时穿上他们的服装，模仿他们的举手投足时，她难以抑制心中的喜悦来为穿上这样时尚的护甲寻找理由。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Guards_Dr: It must be admitted: Drow admires the Sylvan Guard. When from time to time she puts on their gear, and pretends to adopt their ways, she can hardly suppress her joy in having an excuse to don this stylish armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Half_Measure: 另一半斧刃只是为了展示。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Half_Measure: The other blade was just for show.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Holy_Spear_of_Images: 每一面矛刃都倒映了一支军队。每一次刺杀都反映了一个理想。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Holy_Spear_of_Im: In each blade is reflected an army.  In each strike is reflected an ideal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Loners_Vanity: “我为什么不呢？”有人听到卓尔游侠绝对是跟空气这样说道。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Loners_Vanity: \"And why shouldn't I?\" Drow has been heard to say, to absolutely no one.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hair_of_the_Dark: Style and sorcery are said to go hand in hand.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Axe: 这一物品将把默认播音员替换为言语中透露着双关智慧的斧王。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Axe: This item replaces the Default announcer with the double-edged wit of Axe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Axe: 这一物品将把默认的连杀配音播音员替换为声音深沉洪亮的斧王！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Axe: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the resonant booms of Axe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Egg: 坚硬的蛋，长满鳞片，看上去散发着活力，马上就要孵化了。它渴望着夜魇暗潮精华中内含的魔法能量。孵化的贪魔将由蛋吸收的魔力种类和数量决定。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Egg: A hard, scaled egg that seems to be alive and almost ready to hatch. It hungers for the magical energies contained in Diretide essences. What comes out will be determined by the type and amount of magic the egg consumes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Greevil: 一种奇异的野兽，体内魔力充盈。它的颜色，样子和能力早在蛋内就已由吸收的魔法精华种类所决定。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Greevil: A strange beast infused with magic. Its color, appearance, and abilities are determined by the types of magical essences it was exposed to while still an egg.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_RaidCall_Desc: RaidCall Dota 2联赛是奖金达到1万美元的线上Dota 2联赛，参赛的是来自全世界的顶尖Dota 2战队。在八周内每周将有四天会对比赛进行直播，D2L（这是通常叫法）将由Ayesee和受邀嘉宾一同直播解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_League_RaidCall_Desc: The RaidCall Dota 2 League is a $10,000 online Dota 2 tournament series featuring the top Dota 2 teams from around the globe. Broadcast four days a week for over eight weeks, the D2L (as it's commonly called) is commentated live by Ayesee and invited guests.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_StarSeries3_Desc: StarLadder的群星联赛是最具权威的Dota 2联赛之一，由Intel和Asus共同赞助，v1lat和TobiWan主持解说。群星联赛的主要赛事是在乌克兰基辅的CyberSport Arena举办的线下总决赛。观看顶尖Dota 2队伍角逐15 000美元的巨额奖金和“群星联赛之冠”的称号。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_League_StarSeries3_De: StarLadder's Star Series is one of the most prestigious Dota 2 leagues, powered by Intel & Asus and casted by v1lat and TobiWan. The keystone of Star Series is the LAN final, held in Kiev CyberSport Arena, Ukraine. Watch the best Dota 2 teams compete for $15,000 and the title Star Series Champion.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_StarSeries3_Admin: 群星联赛第三赛季管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Portal_2_Soundtrack_Gift_: 您购买了传送门2原声带后获得的礼物！双击该礼物将其打开。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Portal_2_Soundtr: A gift for your purchase of the Portal 2 soundtrack! Double click this gift to unwrap it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_GEST_Desc: 技嘉E-Sports锦标赛由Gigabyte赞助，DotaTalk主办。六支来自东南亚的参赛队伍一决胜负后获胜队伍将会对资深战队发起挑战，赢取1500美元的现金大奖，并有机会与中国的两支顶尖战队，iG和LGD一决高下，再赢取1500美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_League_GEST_Desc: The Gigabyte E-Sports Tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winners of six qualifiers from South-East Asia will face off against veteran teams for a cash prize of $1,500 and the chance to compete against two of the best Chinese teams, IG and LGD, for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_PremierLeague_Desc: 由TwitchTV和SteelSeries联合推动的Dota 2超级联赛已经到了第三赛季。观看来自欧洲和北美的10支顶尖战队争夺6000美元的高额奖金，每周将有5场紧张激烈的比赛，为期9周。TriumphOfMan将担任本赛季的解说员。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_League_PremierLeague_: Fueled by joint forces of TwitchTV and SteelSeries, Season 3 is the newest edition of The Premier League. Watch 10 of the best teams from both Europe and North America contend for $6,000 with 5 intense matches every week for 9 weeks. Commentary by TriumphOfMan.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_GosuLeague_Desc: GosuLeague将在每月推出全新赛季，水平不一的战队将分为多组进行比赛。水平最高的分组每月将赢得5000美元的高额奖金。每周各个参赛队伍均会参加两场比赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_League_GosuLeague_Des: GosuLeague delivers seasons on a monthly basis where teams of all skill levels play in different divisions. The top division is awarded with $5000 each month. Each team play two matches a week.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Faceless: 将这个奇异特效应用于您选定的奇异物品后，该物品可以记录您穿着此物品并使用虚空假面时，您的时间结界困住两名以上英雄的次数。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier: Adding this Strange Modifier to a strange item of your choice will allow it to also count the number of your Chronospheres that hit at least two enemy Heroes while wearing it as Faceless Void.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Faceless: 将这个奇异特效应用于您选定的奇异物品后，该物品可以记录您穿着此物品并使用虚空假面时，您在时间结界内杀死的敌人数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier: Adding this Strange Modifier to a strange item of your choice will allow it to also count the number of enemy Heroes you've killed inside your Chronospheres while wearing it as Faceless Void.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Ursa_Mul: 将这个奇异特效应用于您选定的奇异物品后，该物品可以记录您穿着此物品并使用熊战士时，震撼大地影响到两名以上敌方英雄的次数后。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier: Adding this Strange Modifier to a strange item of your choice will allow it to also count the number of your Earthshocks that hit at least two enemy Heroes while wearing it as Ursa.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_RoshanKi: 将这个奇异特效应用于您选定的奇异物品后，该物品可以记录您穿着此物品时杀死Roshan的次数。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier: Adding this Strange Modifier to a strange item of your choice will allow it to also count the number of times you've killed Roshan while wearing it.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Master_of_Beast_and_B: Master of Beast and Bole Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Swordmaster_of_the_Vigil_Set: 守夜骑士团之剑圣套装
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_Freelancers_Finery_Set: 自由枪骑兵之华服套装
Tokens.DOTA_Bundle_Desc_Ursa_Alpine_Stalker: 包含熊战士的“高山行者”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Bundle_Desc_Ursa_Alpine_St: Includes all of the items in the 'The Alpine Stalker' set for Ursa:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Saberhorn_Se: 包含斧王的“赛伯霍恩的护甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Sab: Includes all of the items in the 'Armor of the Saberhorn' set for Axe:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Demonic_Vandals_Set: 包含克林克兹的“恶魔破坏者”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Demonic_Vandals_: Includes all of the items in the 'Demonic Vandal's' set for Clinkz:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dials_of_Claszureme_Set: 包含虚空假面的“超维视界之具”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dials_of_Claszur: Includes all of the items in the 'Dials of Claszureme' set for Faceless Void:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Kunkkas_But_Im_Not_A_Pirate_Pa: 昆卡的“但我并非海盗！” 饰品包
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Kunkkas_But_Im_Not_A_: Kunkka's 'But I'm Not A Pirate!' Pack
Tokens.DOTA_Bundle_Desc_Talk_Like_A_Pirate_Day: 尽管并非海盗，即便是昆卡也在“海盗腔调日”摆起了海盗的架子。在这一天的节日里加入他吧，这件特价捆绑包包含了所有海盗主题的物品，价格低得离谱，这简直就是白送！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Bundle_Desc_Talk_Like_A_Pi: Although no pirate, even Kunkka still puts on piratical airs on Talk Like a Pirate Day. Join him in the one-day festivities, with this bargain bundle containing every pirate-themed item at a price so low, it's practically plunder!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shards_of_Polymorphia_Set: 包含变体精灵的“多重变体的碎片”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shards_of_Polymo: Includes all of the items in the 'Shards of Polymorphia' set for Morphling:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bindings_of_Frost_Set: 包含变体精灵的“霜寒之缚”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bindings_of_Fros: Includes all of the items in the 'Bindings of Frost' set for Morphling:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Birots_Bindings_Set: 包含变体精灵的“比洛特之缚”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Birots_Bindings_: Includes all of the items in the 'Birot's Bindings' set for Morphling:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Shards_of_the_Falling: Shards of the Falling Comet Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shards_of_the_Falling_Com: 包含变体精灵的“陨落彗星碎片”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shards_of_the_Fa: Includes all of the items in the 'Shards of the Falling Comet' set for Morphling:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Crimson_Cutthroat_Set: 包含赏金猎人的“深红封喉”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Crimson_Cutt: Includes all of the items in the 'The Crimson Cut-throat' set for Bounty Hunter:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bones_of_the_Slain_Dr: Bones of the Slain Dragon Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bones_of_the_Slain_Dragon: 包含龙骑士的“龙之屠戮骸骨”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bones_of_the_Sla: Includes all of the items in the 'Bones of the Slain Dragon' set for Dragon Knight:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_FireBlessed_Mail_of_t: Fire-Blessed Mail of the Drake Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_FireBlessed_Mail_of_the_D: 包含龙骑士的“邪龙炎佑盔甲”内所有物品：

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aspect_Mask_of_Fulminant_: 时刻保持愤怒是一名战士的力量来源。然而，在战斗进入白热化时，还有比控制情绪更为重要的事需要操心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aspect_Mask_of_F: It is ever the warrior's charge to keep anger in check.  In the heat of battle, however, controlling emotions are the least of one's concerns.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Death_Prophets_Corpse_Set_Scar: 死亡先知尸骸套装围巾
Tokens.DOTA_Item_AntiMage_Slasher_Offhand_Weapo: 恐怖武士敌法师副手武器
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Pyrion_Flax: 这一物品将默认播音员替换成风格独树一帜，恣意幽默的Dota 2怪咖Pyrion Flax。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Pyrion: This item replaces the Default announcer with the unique and unruly humor of Dota 2 satirist Pyrion Flax.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Baby_Roshan: 他只是个小家伙！一点也不懂事儿。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Baby_Roshan: He's just a little guy! He doesn't know any better.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Exort_Essence: 内含纯净烈火能量的水晶。水晶非常烫手，并且散发着透出残忍的可怕魔法气息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Exort_Essence: A crystal containing pure Exort energy. The crystal is hot to the touch and exudes a magical aura of gruesome brutality.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wex_Essence: 内含纯净雷霆能量的水晶。碎晶的表面在不断流动，散发出狂热的猛烈魔法气息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wex_Essence: A crystal containing pure Wex energy. The surface of the shard is in constant motion, emitting a magical aura of spirited zeal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quas_Essence: 内含纯净寒冰能量的水晶。寒冷而沉重，辐射出顽强的韧性魔法气息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quas_Essence: A crystal of pure Quas energy. It is cold and heavy, radiating a magical aura of stubborn tenacity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Unusual_Essence: 一团魔法能量涡流，有力量在波动。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Unusual_Essence: A ball of swirling magical energy, pulsing with power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadow_Essence: 一小块黑色水晶。表面打磨得非常完美，吸收了所有的光。一阵可怕的恐惧从它的中心荡涤而出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadow_Essence: A small marble of black crystal. Its perfectly polished surface consumes all light. A sense of terrible fear washes forth from its core.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_G1Championship_Desc: G-1冠军联赛由17173游戏网主办，是中国首个Dota 2职业联赛。激动人心的赛事中iG，LGD和DK等战队将角逐50 000美元的大奖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_League_G1Championship: The G-1 Championship League, hosted by 17173 Games, is the first Dota 2 tournament in China. Exciting matches await with teams like iG, LGD and DK competing for a prize pool of $50,000.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dress_of_the_Corpse_Maide: 克萝贝露丝如此频繁地透过迷雾预知死亡，那些时日已然终结的人都哀求她带着他们归来。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dress_of_the_Cor: So often did Krobelus attempt to pass beyond the veil of death that those whose time had ended begged the chance with return her.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Wicked_Collar_of_the_: Wicked Collar of the Corpse Maiden
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wicked_Collar_of_the_Corp: 远古灵魂的残片已经石化，但是他们依然依附在克萝贝露丝衣服上，为死而复生做着徒劳的努力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wicked_Collar_of: The petrified remnants of ancient souls still cling to Krobelus in a futile attempt to return to life.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Ghastly_Scarf_of_the_: Ghastly Scarf of the Corpse Maiden
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ghastly_Scarf_of_the_Corp: 从死亡中归来时，克萝贝露丝时常发现有绝望灵魂的残片依附在自己双肩上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ghastly_Scarf_of: Returning from death, Krobelus often found wisps and remnants of desperate souls clinging to her shoulders.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Glaive_of_the_Mage_Slayer__Off: 法师克星战刃 - 副手
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Glaive_of_the_Mage_Sl: Glaive of the Mage Slayer - Off-Hand
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaive_of_the_Mage_Slayer: 无情定义了敌法师使用的众多早期武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaive_of_the_Ma: Brutality defined many of the early weapons used by the Anti-Mage.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Mage_Slayer: 由据说能排斥魔法记忆的材料制成的背心，沉重但是经穿。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Mag: A vest made heavy and durable by materials said to repel the sorceric arts.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Dark_Magic: 对于祈求者来说，那些没有魔法天赋的犹如蝼蚁，不值一提。那时候，他的魔法凶猛异常，世人都以迷信和恐惧对待。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Dark: To the Invoker, those without the gifts of magic are insects to be ignored or destroyed.  For at time, his ferocity was such that the magical arts were treated with superstition and fear by all.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Dark_Magic: 练习了魔法技艺的法师都会对自己的力量感到恐惧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_D: Those who practiced the magical arts are often feared for their power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the_Dark_Mag: 在魔法被恐惧所围绕的时代，众多传说都讲述了一名拥有无穷毁灭魔法和压迫力量的法师。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the: In an age when fear surrounded sorcery, tales told of an oppressive wizard capable of limitless destruction.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Collar_of_the_Mage_Slayer: 敌法师追杀的人不仅擅长魔法，而且擅长刀剑，所以这副衣领打造的目的是避开他们的兵器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Collar_of_the_Ma: Those whom the Anti-Mage hunts may be as skilled with a sword as they are with a spell, and so this collar was crafted to turn their blades aside.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracer_of_the_Mage_Slayer: 这对护腕可以防御刀剑和魔法的攻击。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracer_of_the_Ma: These bracers are made to defend against both swords and sorcery.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Skirt_of_the_Mage_Slayer: 随着时间和技艺的日积月累，敌法师对这样一件沉重衣物的抗拒性慢慢减少，不过在战斗中这件裙子的有用性并未削弱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Skirt_of_the_Mag: Time and practice would persuade the Anti-Mage against such a heavy garment, yet its use in combat has not diminished.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaive_of_the_Mage_Slayer: 无情定义了敌法师使用的众多早期武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaive_of_the_Ma: Brutality defined many of the early weapons used by the Anti-Mage.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cult_Mask_of_the_Mage_Sla: 这副面罩的铸造过程中使用的元素可以偏转大多数魔法，就像它的形状可以移开刀剑一样。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cult_Mask_of_the: The elements used in this mask's construction are able to deflect most spells, just as its shape may divert a blade.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Corpse_Maidens_Set: 包含死亡先知的“尸骸室女”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Corpse_Maide: Includes all of the items in 'The Corpse Maiden' set for Death Prophet:

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Mage_Slayers: Includes all of the items in 'The Mage Slayer' set for Anti-Mage:

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaives_of_the_Mage_Slaye: 饰品包内含有法师克星的主手和副手战刃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaives_of_the_M: Pack includes both the main and off-hand Glaive of the Mage Slayer.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cabalist_of_Dark: Includes all of the items in the 'Cabalist of Dark Magic' set for Invoker:

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Trident_of_the_Sea_Stalke: 一把受到众多海神诅咒的三叉戟，在珊瑚之角尘封了上千年。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Trident_of_the_S: A trident cursed by a host of sea gods and sealed within in the depths of the Coral Breach for thousands of years.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sash_of_Deaths_Bride: 当死亡的新娘逝世时，她并没给她年轻的夫君留多少东西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sash_of_Deaths_B: When she departed, Death's Bride left little to her young apprentice.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Brooch_of_Deaths_Bride: 教导克萝贝露丝技艺的女人并没有故事流传，只有传世的宝物和谣言。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Brooch_of_Deaths: No stories remain of the woman who taught Krobelus her skill, only heirlooms and rumor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Soul_Reaper: 染上瘟疫的垂死之人将自己献给罗坦士德利，想让灵魂得到救赎。他非常乐于接受。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Soul_Reaper: The plagued dying threw themselves at Rotund'jere, offering their very souls for deliverance.  He was only too happy to accept.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ghost_Orb_of_the_Planeswalker: 位面穿行者的恐怖宝球
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ghost_Orb_of_the_Planeswa: 迷失在位面之间的混乱精灵和鬼魂很快就变成了用于开采熔炼的矿物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ghost_Orb_of_the: The wayward spirits and wights lost between the planes soon become minerals to be mined and forged.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Heirloom_of_the_Temple_Prieste: 圣堂女祭司的传承之饰
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heirloom_of_the_Temple_Pr: 来自她第一次暗杀的华丽赠物，这件传承之饰曾经点缀着王后华丽的锁饰。现在圣堂刺客将它戴起，告诉世人何人何物都逃不出自己的手心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heirloom_of_the_: A gilded keepsake from her first assassination, this heirloom once graced the flowing locks of Queens.  Now Templar Assassin wears it as reminder that no one is beyond her reach.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lantern_of_Deaths_Last_Li: 有了这盏灯笼，术士可以窥视死亡本身的影子。死亡在灯光前退缩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lantern_of_Death: With this lantern Warlock peers into the shadows of death itself.  Death shrinks from the light.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Twisted_Lightbringer: 术士将魔法和金属扭曲在一起给世界带来光亮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Twisted_Lightbri: Warlock brings light into the world with this twisted confluence of iron and magic.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hellish_Gemstaff: 这个宝石的每一个切面都反射出被困在其中的恶魔的灵魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hellish_Gemstaff: Each facet of the gem reflects the captured soul of a bound demon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Chest_Diretide_2: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>夜魇暗潮宝箱钥匙</font>来打开这个宝箱。您可以前往Dota 2商店购买。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Chest_D: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Diretide Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ZaruKina_Protectors_Garb_: 包含风行者的“扎茹吉娜守护者之服”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ZaruKina_Protect: Includes all of the items in the 'Zaru'Kina Protector's Garb' set for Windranger:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flight_of_the_Sparrowhawk: 包含风行者的“鹰雀的翱翔”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flight_of_the_Sp: Includes all of the items in the 'Flight of the Sparrowhawk' set for Windranger:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Windrunners_Sylvan_Bundle: 本捆绑包内含2012年10月发布的所有风行者物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Windrunners_Sylv: This bundle contains all of the items for Windrunner released in October 2012.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Baby_Roshan: 世间罕有，熠熠生辉的战利品，这是在甜到忧伤阶段最快击杀Roshan的玩家获得的殊荣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Baby_Rosh: A rare and glittering trophy awarded to the fastest slayers of Sugar Rush Roshan.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_troll_warlord_off_hand_base_we: 巨魔战将副手基础武器
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_base_off_hand_ranged_weap: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_base_off_hand_ra: This new item has no description.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Slayers_Glare: Why light a fire if you can't watch it burn?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightmare_Beacon: 战斗之惧中隐藏着众多暗黑之秘。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightmare_Beacon: The terrors of battle hold many dark secrets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lightning_Rod: 当闪电点亮黑暗时，眼睛才能看得更远。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lightning_Rod: Far sees the eye when lightning illuminates the darkness.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_the_Ozkavosh: 原始之治在覆灭前所有人都是尽收眼底。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_the_Ozkav: Until its fall, none could escape the spying gaze of the First Dominion.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_atoD2_Desc: atoD 2联赛的参赛队伍是8支北美和欧洲顶尖战队。联赛采用反队长模式，相信各战队都会开发非常规英雄，并破坏对方的阵容。联赛的部分收益将并入奖金，这将是首个为粉丝提供直接途径提高奖金池的比赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_League_atoD2_Desc: atoD 2 features 8 top North American and European teams. Using Reverse Captain's Mode, teams will surely play unconventional heroes and sabotage each other's lineups.  With some of the proceeds going to the prize it's the first tournament to include a direct way for fans to increase the prizepool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_GosuAsiaMadness_Desc: It's Gosu再次回归了，这次是第三届Asia Madness联赛—由Own3d.tv，Razer，NOS Energy Drink和MAXXintegration联合赞助—十支亚洲顶尖战队将在三重淘汰制下角逐$5000的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_League_GosuAsiaMadnes: It's Gosu returns with its third edition of the Asia Madness where the ten best teams from Asia will be competing for a prize pool of $5,000 in a triple elimination format.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_GosuAsiaMadness_Admin: 第三届It's Gosu Asia Madness联赛管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_troll_warlord_axe_melee_r: 巨魔战将近战右手斧头
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Death_Prophet: 这一物品将把默认播音员替换为声音鬼畜的死亡先知。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Death_: This item replaces the Default announcer with the haunted tones of Death Prophet.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_View_Test__Admin: 联赛观看测试 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_View_Test_5150__Admin: 联赛观看测试5150 - 管理员

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Its_Gosu_Monthly_Madn: It's Gosu Monthly Madness Asia - Admin

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Star_Series_Season_II: Star Series Season II Lan Final - Admin

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ramnaught_of_Underwool: 毛茸茸的野兽，这是带来死亡和毁灭的可怕使者，由暗影滋生的恶魔，万幸的是一名暗黑魔法师下了诅咒，这个物种将永远是毛绒绒的卖萌样子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ramnaught_of_Und: The beasts of Underwool are terrible bringers of death and destruction, demons of shadow afflicted by a black wizard's curse that has ensured they are forever cute and fluffy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_DreamHackWinter2012_Des: 观看今年DreamHack冬季赛的 DreamHack Dota 2 海盗复仇杯，16支队伍将为总数为200,000克朗的奖金一争高下。总决赛将在DreamArena Extreme场馆举行，届时将有1100名现场观众见证这一赛事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_League_DreamHackWinte: Watch the DreamHack Dota 2 Corsair Vengeance Cup at this year's Dreamhack Winter where 16 teams compete for the 200 000 SEK prize purse. The Grand Final is played in the DreamArena Extreme in front of 1100 fans.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_League_DreamHackWinter2012_Adm: DreamHack Dota 2 海盗复仇杯管理员
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_League_DreamHackWinte: DreamHack Dota 2 Corsair Vengeance Cup ADMIN
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_StarSeries_Season_IV: StarLadder的群星联赛是最具权威的Dota 2联赛之一，由Intel和Asus共同赞助， v1lat和TobiWan主持解说。群星联赛的主要赛事是在乌克兰基辅的CyberSport Arena举办的线下总决赛。请观看顶尖Dota 2战队角逐15 000美元的巨额奖金和群星联赛冠军的称号。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_StarSeries_Seaso: StarLadder's Star Series is one of the most prestigious Dota 2 leagues, powered by Intel & Asus and casted by v1lat and TobiWan. The keystone of Star Series is the LAN final, held in Kiev CyberSport Arena, Ukraine. Watch the best Dota 2 teams compete for $15,000 and the title Star Series Champion.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Star_Series_Season_IV_ADMIN: 群星联赛第四赛季管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_StarSeries_Season: StarLadder的群星联赛是最具权威的Dota 2联赛之一，由Intel和Asus共同赞助， v1lat和TobiWan主持解说。群星联赛的主要赛事是在乌克兰基辅的CyberSport Arena举办的线下总决赛。请观看顶尖Dota 2战队角逐15 000美元的巨额奖金和Star Series Champion的称号。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_StarSeri: StarLadder's Star Series is one of the most prestigious Dota 2 leagues, powered by Intel & Asus and casted by v1lat and TobiWan. The keystone of Star Series is the LAN final, held in Kiev CyberSport Arena, Ukraine. Watch the best Dota 2 teams compete for $15,000 and the title Star Series Champion.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Defense_3: The Defense联赛带着新的赞助商ROCCAT和own3D.tv卷土重来了。24支被邀请的职业队伍以及另外8支选拔赛中脱颖而出的队伍将角逐20,000美金的奖金。这张门票将让您拥有观看超过100场由Toby \"Tobi Wan Kenobi\" Dawson解说的比赛，同时还内含一只专属信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Defense_3: The Defense is back with new sponsors ROCCAT and own3D.tv. Watch 24 invited professional teams and 8 teams from an open qualifier battle for a prize pool of $20,000. This ticket will entitle you to over 100 broadcasted matches by Toby \"Tobi Wan Kenobi\" Dawson as well as one exclusive courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Defense_3_ADMIN: The Defense联赛，最大规模的线上赛之一，新的赞助商ROCCAT和own3D.tv赞助的第三季即将开启。赛程持续3个月，24支受邀请的职业队伍以及8支从选拔赛中脱颖而出的队伍将角逐20,000美金的奖金。The Defense 3的门票将让您能够观看超过100场由Toby \"Tobi Wan Kenobi\" Dawson解说的比赛，同时还包含一只独特信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Defense_3_AD: The Defense, one of the biggest online tournaments, is going into its third season with new sponsors ROCCAT and own3D.tv. Over the course of three months, 24 invited professional teams and eight teams from an open qualifier will battle for a prize pool of $20,000. The ticket for The Defense 3 will entitle you to over 100 broadcasted matches by Toby \"Tobi Wan Kenobi\" Dawson as well as one unique courier.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NaVis_Weaselcrow: 黄毛与蓝羽的结合，尖嘴与长牙的协作，黄鼬蓝鸦，你值得拥有！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NaVis_Weaselcrow: Fur and feather, beak and fang, Weaselcrow is just the thing!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prismatic_Drake: 年幼的七彩亚龙可以进行天然的模仿，将自己混入高山一般的宝石矿堆，这也是它部落的历来居住的地方。经过伪装后，这脆弱的小龙就不用怕洞穴里的大蜘蛛，盗取宝石的窃贼和其他天敌了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prismatic_Drake: The young Prismatic Drake displays a natural mimicry by which it blends into the mountainous piles of gems that make up its familial hoard. Thus disguised, the tiny and vulnerable young are safe from cave spiders, hoard-thieves and other predators.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Diretide: 2012年夜魇暗潮活动包含的皮肤
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Knight_Ward: Description of the Dragon Knight Ward
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Knight_Wa: Description of the Dragon Knight Ward
