Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Shadow_Demons_Bel: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Shadow_D: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battlefury: 象征着无尽愤怒的武器。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Riftshadow_Roamers_Pluckin_Fid: 裂影荒墟徜徉者的拾荒小提琴
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roamers_Plucki: 五只米波的确能组成乐队。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roame: With five Meepos you've got quite the band.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Hood: 两边不对称的头发让北辰室女能够抵受最严酷的冰袭，她验证了美貌也能置人于死地的古老格言。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Hood: Able to withstand the toughest onslaughts with nary a hair out of place, the Maiden of the North gives truth to the old adage that looks can kill.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Pack: 他原来的师傅说过：“想干什么事你可要说清楚，这些淳朴的村民在沟通中很容易就会曲解成恐吓和邪术。”因此罗斯塔为自己提供的服务制作了简洁直观的清单，并且背在一目了然的地方。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagab: His old master said, \"Be clear what you are about, for these simple village folk read menace and evil intent into poor communication.\" Therefore Rhasta created a simple visual menu of the services he offers, and wears it in plain sight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Wand: 毒蛇的最后一弯实现了罗斯塔的伪装，这样他就能低调地旅行。有一点必须承认，有时候他挥舞魔杖只是因为他喜欢伙伴的感觉。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagab: A final twist of the serpent completes Rhasta's disguise, in case he is travelling incognito. It must be admitted that sometimes he wields it just because he likes the companionship.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Hat: “萨满必须保养好皮肤！”罗斯塔的师傅曾经教导过他。“因此，一定要永远戴着斗笠别让太阳晒到，也别暴露在月光下。”然后老头就会开始大笑。“如果你同意我所说的，我这有一袋草药可以给你带来无尽的财富和不朽的名声。”
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagab: \"A shaman must take good care of his skin!\" Rhasta's master instructed. \"Therefore, always wear a hat to keep off the sun, and no less the evil influence of the moon.\" And then the old man always broke into laughter. \"And if you believe that, I have a bag of herbs here that will confer infinite wealth and immortality.\"
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagabonds_Conc: 尽管有些萨满旅人被人控诉兜售包治百病的彩色药水，不过罗斯塔从未打过包票，也没有因他人从这瓶子里倒了一大杯而收过一分钱。事实上，除了罗斯塔外没人能喝里面的东西。暗影萨满的酿品除了酿制者外对其他人都是致命的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mysterious_Vagab: Although some travelling shaman have been rightly accused of selling colored water as if it were a certain cure for all ills, Rhasta makes no such claims and has never charged so much as a pence for a swig from this bottle. In fact, no one but Rhasta may drink from it. The Shadow Shaman's brew is certain death to anyone but its maker.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Riftshadow_Roamers_Wearin_Vest: 裂影荒墟徜徉者的小背心
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roamers_Wearin: 一两层额外的衣物大概会让某些獠牙收回。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roame: An extra layer or two ought to be able turn back some teeth.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Riftshadow_Roamers_Fryin_Pan: 裂影荒墟徜徉者的煎饼平底锅
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roamers_Fryin_: 手上一直拿着平底锅能够制造噪音吓走野兽，走运的话还能把他们做成晚饭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roame: Keeping a pan handy will let you make noise and scare off the wildlife, or cook them if you're lucky.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Riftshadow_Roamers_Fine_n_Fanc: 裂影荒墟徜徉者的好又花
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roamers_Fine_n: 裂影荒墟下起雨来就不会停。不想淋湿头发的话最好一直带着顶帽子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roame: It can get rainy up in Riftshadow. Best bring along a hat if you want to keep your head dry.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Riftshadow_Roamers_Grabbin_Wra: 裂影荒墟徜徉者的强取护手
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roamers_Grabbi: 护手并不花哨，但是能使双手保持温暖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riftshadow_Roame: They're not fancy, but they keep the hands warm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Mantle: 冰冷的肩膀也就是冷漠的态度只是那些人宿命的开端。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Mantle: For those times when giving someone the cold shoulder is only the beginning.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Mittens: 水晶室女在冰天雪地里可不需要使双手暖和。我们怀疑这只是时尚的体现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Mittens: Crystal Maiden hardly needs to keep her hands warm in freezing weather. We suspect these are strictly a fashion statement.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Tassels: 制作这些流苏的材料并不是取自冰川残骸那里白狼的尾毛。这完全是柔软蓬松的冰雪。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Tassels: No Wolf of Icewrack tail was harmed in the making of these tassels. They are formed entirely of soft, fluffy ice.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Staff: 这并不是向外展示自己的力量，水晶室女明白示弱的必要性。这根耀眼的法杖仅是她内在力量的象征，而法杖的光泽丝毫没有显示她对魔法的精通。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowdrop_Staff: Not one for outward displays of force, Crystal Maiden understands the necessity of putting on a show. This brilliant staff is but a symbol of her inner power, and for all its luster, barely hints at the depths of her mastery.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders_Sight: 以眼还眼，以风暴制敌。敌人休想逃过风暴骑手那锐利的目光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders: An eye for an eye, and a storm for his enemies; no foe can escape the piercing glare of the storm rider.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders_Bracer: 这件防具来自早已失落的年代，蕴含着风暴骑手的上古力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders: This armor comes from an age long forgotten, and it crackles with the ancient power of the stormrider.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stormthrasher: 打击干扰者敌人的力量中能发现盛夏风暴的踪迹。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stormthrasher: The power of the summer squalls lays a thrashing on the enemies of Disruptor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders_Deflecto: 这件护甲在杜鲁德的一座古庙中发现，具有偏转刀剑和魔法的能力。想躲开风暴可不容易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Storm_Riders: Found in an ancient temple in Druud, this armor turns away blades and spells.  Storms are not so easily deflected.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aegis_of_the_Storm: 风暴在杜鲁德大草原上形成又消散，只有在下一个季节才会再度降临，风暴骑手的教会能永恒存在也是相同道理。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aegis_of_the_Sto: As storms are born and die upon the plains of Druud, only to be born again next season, so too is the Order of the Stormrider eternal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rampant_the_Scaled_Hunter: 骑着最后一只传说中的巨龙兽，技艺精湛的风暴法师得以驾驭风暴本身的愤怒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rampant_the_Scal: Astride the last of the legendary archtyrex, a skilled stormcrafter channels the fury of the storm itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_the_Grand_Inqui: 无论他的敌人如何称呼他，无论他的对手向他施放什么咒语，这面沉默之盾都能将其无声地反弹。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_the_Gr: Whatever his enemies call him, whatever words his foes may cast in his direction, bounce soundlessly off this shield of silence.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Grand_Inqu: 这对护腕预示着大圣裁官不会容忍任何谎言，也不需要任何回答！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_G: These bracers bespeak a Grand Inquisitor who will brook no falsehoods and demand no answers!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_IQ_Helm: 他幽暗的双眼冒出精光，无声地要求只能在绝对沉默中找到的真正答案。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_IQ_Helm: His darksome eyes blaze out, wordlessly demanding the true answers that can only be found in utter silence.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Grand_Inquisi: 除了沉默术士外其他穿上这件长袍的人都不具备与他相当的庄严和权威。不过如果谁穿上了，没人会再听到关于他的消息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Gran: No one wears this robe with quite the grandeur and majesty of Silencer. But if they do, no one will ever hear about it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the_Grand_In: 沉寂降临，大圣裁官需要像这样强力的护肩来承担沉默的重量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the: When a heavy silence falls, the Grand Inquisitor will need mighty shoulders such as these to bear up under its weight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaive_of_the_Grand_Inqui: 大圣裁官在审问结束后，他的战刃就会发出最后的封口之击，保证沉默永远不被打破。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaive_of_the_Gr: Once the Grand Inquisitor has finished his questioning, a final sealing stroke of his glaive ensures that this silence will never be broken.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Slithereen_E: 这对双刀取自克雷战役中阵亡海怪的尸首。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Sli: These blades were taken from the corpses of slain leviathans following the battle of Crey.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Slithereen_Ex: 被剥夺了头衔和地位后，流亡的司里希丝接到命令，身处同类之中时不得露出头鳍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Slit: Stripped of her rank and station, the exile Slithice has been instructed to cover her headfin while among her people.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Slithereen_E: 这件黑曜防具是在海底火山的熔炉中锻造，克雷城的居民为了表达谢意将其赠与司里希丝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Sli: Fashioned in the forge of an undersea volcano, the obsidian plating was a given to Slithice as a gift from the grateful denizens of Crey.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_curses__Tail: 第三重诅咒，盘绕长尾的诅咒，落在了他的尾巴上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_curses__T: The third curse, curse of the prehensile, lain upon his tail.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__Sword: 第一重诅咒，永世焚焰的诅咒，落在了他的剑上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__S: The first curse, the curse of flame, lain upon his sword.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__Head: 第十一重的最后诅咒，智慧的诅咒，落在了他的双角上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__H: The eleventh and final curse, the curse of wisdom, lain upon his horns.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__Bracer: 第六重诅咒，坚毅的诅咒，落在了他的手腕上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__B: The sixth curse, the curse of fortitude, lain upon his wrists.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__Wings: 第二重诅咒，堕落的诅咒，落在了他的翅膀上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__W: The second curse, the curse of the fallen, is lain upon his wings.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__Belt: 腰带上的力量受到过诅咒。世界的中心真的受到了重重保护。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_Curses__B: A belt of cursed power.  Would that the navel of the world were so protected.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_curses__shoulder: 第十重诅咒，力量的诅咒，落在了他的肩上，就跟全世界的重担一样。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eleven_curses__s: The tenth curse, the curse of strength, is lain upon his shoulders, like all the weight of the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Hood: 赤色头巾，赤色兽爪，这件头饰能保护兽王不被元素魔法所伤害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Hood: Red of hood and red of claw, this headpiece shields the Beastmaster from the elements.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Guard: 兽王双肩背负的责任是如此的沉重，而这件斗篷给予了他强大的信心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Guard: Heavy is the burden shouldered by the Beastmaster, and strong is the mantle that supports him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Axes: 上一个嘲笑这对武器简陋的人脑袋吃了一斧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Axes: The last person to call these weapons primitive ended up wearing one in his skull.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Bracers: 兽革，兽骨和兽毛制成的护腕，具有野兽之力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Bracer: A powerful bracer of leather, bone and fur.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Belt: 兽革和兽羽制成的腰带，并束有兽骨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Talon_Belt: A belt of leather and feather, bound in bone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarf_of_the_Deadly_Night: 无论是谁戴上这件围巾，泰瑞恩之魂都会确保他们摆脱任何负担，而他们的身份和目的也不会遭到泄露。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarf_of_the_Dea: Whosoever wears this mantle, the spirit Tyrian ensures they shall shrug off any burden, while their identity and their purpose remain concealed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Garb_of_the_Deadly_Nights: 任何人看到穿着这件服饰的拉娜娅都会被阿特洛波斯之魂找上，随之降临的是恐惧和狂乱。最好一眼都别看，连她的下落都不要过问。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Garb_of_the_Dead: The spirit of Atropos inflicts dread and delirium on any who spy the wearer of this garb. Best not to see Lanaya at all, or even wonder at her whereabouts.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Headpiece_of_the_Deadly_N: 尽管这件头饰下的部位几乎都看不到，但是贝拉多纳让佩戴者的瞳孔放大，适合奥秘真相的搜寻者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Headpiece_of_the: Although barely visible beneath the rim of this headpiece, Belladonna grants the wearer the enormous dilated eyes that so befit a seeker of mysterious truths.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Headdress: 在德尊教团成立初期被一位暗影牧师长老戴过，此后这件骷髅头巾已经传承数代。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Headdr: Worn by an elder shadow priest during the very founding of the Dezun Order, this skull headdress has been handed down for generations.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Cloak: 德尊教团的长老只会将这件披风授予最为出色的暗影牧师。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Cloak: The elders grant this cloak only to the most skilled of the Dezun Order.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Arm_Wrap: 举起裹有这样一件神圣服饰的手臂就是为了引导虚无之境中最古老的学识。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Arm_Wr: To raise an arm wrapped in such a holy garment is to channel the most ancient knowledge of the Nothl Realm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Dress: 这件裙子束着绳子，由简单的布料制成，上面有虚无能量在燃烧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Dress: Bound with rope and made of simple fabrics, this dress burns with Nothl strength.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Medicine_Stick: 相传法棍中央的图案能引导并使虚无的力量凝聚。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Medici: The pattern at its center is said to focus and channel the Nothl's power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Egg_of_the_Stormcrow: 风暴之鸦的神圣巨卵。只要举行过仪式就能成为强大魔力的源泉。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Egg_of_the_Storm: The sacred egg of the stormcrow.  A powerful source of magic, once certain rituals have been performed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Beak_of_the_Stormcrow: 由风暴之鸦巨喙打造的面具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Beak_of_the_Stor: A mask crafted from the beak of the stormcrow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Stormcrow: 由风暴之鸦的羽毛和利爪精制而成的披风。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Sto: A cloak crafted from the feathers and talons of the stormcrow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_the_Stormcrow: 由风暴之鸦尾部的羽毛精制而成的腰带。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_the_Stor: A belt crafted from the tail feathers of the stormcrow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sigil_of_the_Stormcrow: 附有风暴之鸦符印的法杖，由它的神圣骨骼精心制作。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sigil_of_the_Sto: A staff bearing the sigil of the stormcrow, crafted from its sacred bones.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Blade_of_the_Slithereen_Exile_: 鱼人流亡者之刃 - 副手
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Blade_of_the_Slithere: Blade of the Slithereen Exile - Off-Hand
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Slithereen_E: 这对双刀取自克雷战役中阵亡海怪的尸首。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Sli: These blades were taken from the corpses of slain leviathans following the battle of Crey.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Hunters_Helm: 在经历了纷争之国的燃烧沙漠中对抗寇桑骑兵的辉煌胜利后，从战场上拾获的头盔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Hunters_Helm: A helm plucked from the battlefield, after a glorious victory over Cosang riders in the Desert of Misrule.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Great_Safari: 披风简约优雅，取自一具尸首。守夜骑士高举的旗帜布料拿来做基恩人的披风真的不错。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Grea: Simple, elegant, ripped from a corpse.  The scap of banner taken from a Vigil Knight now makes a fine cape for a Keen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Seasoned_H: 作战规则第一条，有备而战！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_S: Rule number one, always come prepared!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sharpeyes_Momentoes: 狙击手是射手中的专家。现在有奖章可以证明！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sharpeyes_Moment: Sniper is an expert marksman.  Now he has the medals to prove it!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rifle_of_the_Great_Safari: 先进的枪法中最新的工具。枪支不会杀人；狙击手会杀人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rifle_of_the_Gre: The latest tool in advanced marksmanship.  Guns don't kill people; Sniper kills people.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Liferipper: 据说夜魇邪石轻盈非常，抵消了镰刀的重量，收割型法师拿着再完美不过了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Direstone_Liferi: Direstone is said to be lightweight and easy to counterbalance, making it perfect for a reaper.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Edge: 永远洋溢着烈火和力量，这是黑暗中的热情之剑，战场上的实力之烽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Edge: Ever it glows with heat and power, a blade of warmth in the darkness, a beacon of strength on the field.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Boneslayer: 当奥斯特利昂大军临近，这把刀作为赠礼上供，希望和平的投降能够谈妥。很可惜没有。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Boneslayer: When Ostarion came to conquer, this blade was presented as a gift in hope of negotiating a peaceful surrender.  It didn't work.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodstained_Briches: “如果不在屠场花点时间就不能在屠杀中取得如此成就。”
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodstained_Bri: \"You don't get this good at butchery without spending a bit of time on a farm.\"
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rotten_Stache: “我想这是时候换个样子了。你觉得怎样？”
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rotten_Stache: 'Thought it was time to try me out a new look.  What you think?'
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_Dark_Ferocity: 在寻猎赏金的事业中，一点点威吓可是大有帮助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_Dark_Fer: In the bounty hunting business, a little intimidation can go a long way.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Scepter: 这根附魔的棍棒一直放在一座活火山里，幸运的是，阿格隆就这么不小心地摔了进来。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Scepter: As luck would have it, this enchanted cudgel was just lying there in an exploding volcano Aggron happened to have stumbled in to.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Bastion: 这一物品将把默认播音员替换为说话委婉，锐利机智的《壁垒》游戏旁白，也就是拉克斯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Bastio: This item replaces the Default announcer with the euphemistic keen-eyed wisdom of Bastion's narrator, also known as Rucks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Bastion: 这一物品将把默认连杀配音替换为语速流利，语带世故的《壁垒》游戏旁白，也就是拉克斯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Bastio: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the smooth worldly tones of Bastion's narrator, also known as Rucks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_2012_Polycount_Ward: 颁发给2012年冬季Polycount竞赛优胜者的守卫
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_2012_Polycount_W: Ward presented to winners of the 2012 Winter Polycount Contest
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Greevil: A reward for slaying a rare loot greevil.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fistful_of_Snowballs: 就在他们最不想要的时候...雪球大战！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fistful_of_Snowb: Just when they least expect it... Snowball fight!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Warming_Campfire:
到了迎霜节可不能感冒了。让温暖的营火融化你和你朋友身上的寒意吧。
只能在迎霜节期间使用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Warming_Campfire:
Frostivus is no time to be caught out in the cold. Let a warming fire melt the chill away from you and your friends.
	Only usable during Frostivus.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_The_Asia: 这个十二月，马来西亚将成为整个亚洲的电竞焦点，亚洲的竞技选手纷纷将视线转移到今年最后一个大型电竞赛事-马来西亚游戏博览会（The Games Expo）。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_The_Asia: This December Malaysia will be the focal point for all things eSports in Asia as gamers from all around the region turn their attention to what will be its last major eSporting event for the year - The Games Expo (TGX) Malaysia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_Dota_2_League_Se: RaidCall Dota 2联赛第二赛季带着10 000美元的奖金回归了。来自西方的12支顶尖队伍将在总共11周内每周进行6天的比赛，比赛由Ayesee和Draskyl直播解说。120余场精彩赛事即将为您呈现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_Dota_2_: The RaidCall Dota 2 League returns for a second $10,000 season. The top twelve teams in the western world battle it out six days a week for eleven total weeks live with commentary by Ayesee and Draskyl. Over 120 matches guaranteed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_Dota_2_League_Season_: RaidCall Dota 2联赛第二赛季管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall_Dota_2_L: RaidCall Dota 2联赛第二赛季带着10 000美元的奖金回归了。来自西方的12支顶尖队伍将在总共11周内每周进行6天的比赛，比赛由Ayesee和Draskyl直播解说。120余场精彩赛事即将为您呈现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall: The RaidCall Dota 2 League returns for a second $10,000 season. The top twelve teams in the western world battle it out six days a week for eleven total weeks live with commentary by Ayesee and Draskyl. Over 120 matches guaranteed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_75_Battle_Bonus_2_Hours: 使用该物品后将使获得<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提高<font color='#9da1a9'>75%</font>，持续2小时。此外，您将使其他玩家额外获得<font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font>的<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>获得速率，该速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_75_Battle_Bonus_: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>75%</font> for 2 hours. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_: 使用该物品，使获得<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提高<font color='#9da1a9'>75%</font>，持续2小时，此外，你将使其他玩家获取<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提高<font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font>，该速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>75%</font> for 2 hours. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Treasure_Key: 使用符印解封<font color='#9da1a9'>珍藏</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Treasu: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Chests</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Frostivus_Gift__Naughty: 迎霜节礼物 - 顽皮版
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Gift__Naughty: 从小贪魔手里拯救了迎霜节获得的礼物！里面有什么呢？这是个秘密。看起来这礼物像是被小贪魔坐扁了，或是咬了一口。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Gift__: A gift for saving Frostivus from the Greevils! What could be inside? It is a mystery. This gift looks like a Greevil sat on it or maybe chewed it up.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Frostivus_Gift: 迎霜节礼物 - 体面版
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Gift__Nice: 从小贪魔手里拯救了迎霜节获得的礼物！里面有什么呢？这是个秘密。这件特殊的礼物看起来保存的很好。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_Gift__: A gift for saving Frostivus from the Greevils! What could be inside? It is a mystery. This particular gift looks to be in excellent condition.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Deadly_Nightshade_Set: 在追寻一个或许能够解释隐之圣堂法典的密码时，拉娜娅在三影的神圣林地中偶然发现了一套隐秘的衣物。这三件衣物隐藏在无尽夜影飘落的花瓣中，每一件衣物上都有以虚灵之影的名义赋予的属性：疯狂，恐怖和死亡。大部分人都会觉得这三件衣服和其他华丽衣物比起来相差太远。然而对圣堂刺客而言，穿着致命夜影能够让她更快的寻找到终极智慧。内含圣堂刺客的“致命夜影”套装中的所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Deadly_Night: On the trail of a curious cipher which might decrypt an ancient codex of the Hidden Temple, Lanaya stumbled upon a cache of hidden garments in an arboretum sacred to the Three Shades. Three garments, wrapped in the petals of an enormous nightshade, on which were inscribed the names of those ethereal Shades that lent their attributes to each piece: madness, terror and death. Most would consider these poor qualities in their attire. But for Templar Assassin, donning the Deadly Nightshade is an accelerant to wisdom. Includes all of the items in 'The Deadly Nightshade' set for Templar Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_Riftshadow_Roamers_Set: 裂影荒墟的徜徉者套装
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Riftshadow_Roamers_Se: 吹牛和卖杂物只是在裂影荒墟谋生的诸多手段之一，不过如果你有一双善于发现的眼睛，你就知道在这片废墟中还有更多的东西。你需要一名导游和一名保镖，这样你才能够更好的熟悉这地方的历史。然而想在这里发财又是另外一回事了。如果你想了解裂影荒墟最黑暗的秘密，你最好多给点小费，并且管好你的嘴。该捆绑包内含米波的“裂影荒墟的徜徉者”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Riftshadow_R: Trinkets and tall tales are just a few of the ways a drifter can make a living out in Riftshadow, but there's a lot more in the waste if you know how to look, and where. You'll want a guide and someone who knows their way in a fight, that should let you scratch the surface and take in some history. Getting rich from the ruins though, that's another matter. If you want to learn Riftshadow's darkest secrets, you better tip well and know how to keep your mouth shut. This here bundle includes all of the items in 'The Riftshadow Roamer' set for Meepo:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Stormcrows_Spirit_Set:
在那些不为人知的谈话中，关于风暴之鸦的传神秘说早已悄悄传开。

巨大，强横，神秘。这些奇特且稀有的猛禽散落分布在普利菲科特山脉的险峰中，躲藏在常年不散的黑云里，与世隔绝。它们的出现是灾难的征兆，意味着暴风雨即将来临。

传说中同样记载了那些敢于试图驾驭这些生物力量为己所用的人们。因为在偷取了它们的鸦卵——强大的力量之源——后唯一返回地面的方法，就是骑着风暴之鸦从几千米高的山顶，飞下来。内含巫医的“风暴之鸦精魂”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Stormcrows_S:
In hushed tones, legends have long been whispered of the near-mythical stormcrows.
	
	Enormous, powerful and reclusive, these strange, scarce birds range across the highest peaks of the Prefect mountains, hidden from the world by a constant bank of dark cloud. Their rare sighting are considered ill omens, said to portend of storms soon to follow.
	
	Legends also tell of those few who have dared face the dangerous trials required to harness the power of these creatures for themselves. 
	
	For the only way to return after stealing the egg of a stormcrow - a potent source of power - is to wrestle control of one of the enormous black birds and ride it down to the ground, miles below.  Includes all of the items in 'The Stormcrow's Spirit' set for Witch Doctor:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Snowdrop_Set: 水晶室女在学习冰霜法术时有着不为人知的故事，她曾经极大的触怒了她的导师，为了能够重新获得导师的恩宠并证明自己值得被教导，她在蓝心冰川与沸腾之海交界处的融雪淤泥里面居住了一年。这里永世无雪，瑞莱进行了数月的深度冥想，以掌握自己的力量。一天下午，在醒来之时她轻启芳唇，念出一个冰冷的词：“雪落！”转瞬之间原本充斥四周的蒸汽结为寒冰，原本温暖的水珠化作飘雪。当她回到她导师处时，她发现导师早已带着微笑在等她，对她的魔法杰作俨然已经知晓，于是他将这套衣服送给了她，以彰显她的价值和技艺。内含水晶室女的“雪落”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Snowdrop_: It is little known of Crystal Maiden, that in her long study of the Frozen Arts, she once greatly displeased her Ice Wizard master and to restore herself to his graces and prove worthy of his instruction, she passed a year dwelling in the climes of slush where the Blueheart Glacier spends itself at the edge of the Boiling Sea. Here, where snow had never fallen, Rylai spent months in deep meditation, mastering her powers, before waking one afternoon with a single frigid word upon her lips: 'Snowdrop!' For a moment, the steam that filled the air turned to ice, and the warm precipitation became a softly falling snow. When she returned to her old teacher, she found him waiting with a smile, fully aware of the magic she had wrought, as he presented her this outfit to show her worth and mastery. Contains all of the items in the 'Snowdrop' set for Crystal Maiden:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Bastion_Pack: 包含播音员和连杀配音。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Bastio: Contains both the Announcer and Mega-Kills Announcer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Announcer_Bastion: 包含播音员和连杀配音。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Announce: Contains both the Announcer and Mega-Kills Announcer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Axe_Announcer_Pac: 包含播音员和连杀配音。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Axe_Anno: Contains both the Announcer and Mega-Kills Announcer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Juggernaut_Announ: 包含播音员和连杀配音。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Juggerna: Contains both the Announcer and Mega-Kills Announcer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Storm_Spirit_Announcer_Pack: 风暴之灵播音员两件套
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Natures_Prophet_A: 包含播音员和连杀配音。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Natures_: Contains both the Announcer and Mega-Kills Announcer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_Pirate_Capn_Announcer_Pack: 海盗船长播音员两件套
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Storm_Spirit_Anno: 包含播音员和连杀配音。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Storm_Sp: Contains both the Announcer and Mega-Kills Announcer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Blades_of_the_Slithereen_Exile: 鱼人流亡者之刃饰品包
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Blades_of_the_Slither: Blades of the Slithereen Exile Pack
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blades_of_the_Slithereen_: 包含鱼人流亡者套装的主手和副手双刃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blades_of_the_Sl: Contains both the main and off-hand Blade of the Slithereen Exile.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Slithereen_Exile_Set: 鱼人不能失败。尽管司里希丝在克雷之役中大获全胜，还是有一只镶嵌了珠宝的圣杯被偷走了。而弄丢这个小玩意的惩罚却是：放逐。从此她就在深海徘徊，痛苦的搜寻着那个圣杯，而她那曾经象征荣誉和谦卑的头冠现在也变成了象征残忍和恶毒的卷须。如果她注定被放逐，那就这样吧。她并没有穿上黑暗的装甲，只是将她祖传的护甲减轻了一些，任何看到她这幅模样的人，都会感受到被放逐的娜迦海妖那不屈不挠的意志。本包裹内含娜迦海妖“鱼人流亡者”套装的所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Slithereen_E: No Slithereen may fail. Though Slithice swam victorious at the battle of Crey, a single jeweled chalice was taken. The punishment for the lost bauble: banishment. So she wandered the deeps, bitterly searching for the chalice, and where once dwelt honor and humility now crept the tendrils of cruelty and malice. If she was to be exiled, then so be it. She shed the lighter tones of her ancestral armor, instead taking up darker armaments, and all who looked upon her felt the indomitable will of the exiled siren. This bundle contains all of the items in 'The Slithereen Exile' set for Naga Siren:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Hunter_of_the_Red_Tal: Hunter of the Red Talon Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hunter_of_the_Red_Talon_S: 在斯洛姆王国摆脱被奴役的命运之后，兽王就一直从他身边的自然世界中吸取力量。其他英雄有的使用武器，有的使用魔法，而兽王则向更加古老的东西寻求帮助：羽毛，皮革，骨头以及毛发。凭借着这些原始的工具，他能对抗那些装备精良的骑士，证明了自己的价值。本包裹包含兽王“赤爪猎人”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hunter_of_the_Re: Since escaping bondage in kingdom of Slom, Beastmaster has always drawn strength from the natural world around him. When other heroes turn to steel or magic, Beastmaster turns to more ancient implements: feathers, leathers, bones and fur.  With these primitive tools, he's proven his worth against even the most well-armed knight. This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Hunter of the Red Talon' set for Beastmaster:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Trappings_Set: 据说德尊教团早期，暗影牧师需要在彻底的黑暗中编制自己的法衣，因为只有在完全的无光环境下他们才能正确的将虚无之境的精华转化为衣物纤维。据说一旦编制完成，衣服上的附魔就会随着时间的推移而愈发强大。因此最古老的印章不仅是授予那些神圣的创造者，更是授予他们为法衣赋予的强大虚无力量。包含暗影牧师“先祖之饰”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Trappi: The early shadow priests of the Dezun Order were said to have woven their vestments in utter darkness, for only in the total absence of light could they properly channel the essence of the Nothl Realm into the fabrics. It was believed that once complete, the enchantment would grow stronger as the garment aged. The oldest regalia are therefore not only prized for their hallowed creators, but for the heightened Nothl power they bestow upon the wearer. Contains all of the items in the 'Ancestral Trappings' set for Dazzle:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_The_Burden_of_Eleven_: The Burden of Eleven Curses Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Burden_of_Eleven_Curs: 他全身包围着烈焰，在战场穿行，但水火不侵。他身披古老的十一诅咒之誓。十一只眼睛，十一个封印，十一次诅咒。这一切都是为了在任何战斗中他都能所向披靡。包含末日使者“十一诅咒”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Burden_of_El: He that burns and is not consumed now walks the battlefield, shielded by the ancient promise of the Eleven Curses. Eleven Eyes, eleven seals, eleven curses. All to insure victory in even the worst of battles. Contains all of the items in 'The Burden of Eleven Curses' set for Doom Bringer:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Mysterious_Vagabond_S: 在肮脏纪元的最后几年中，经历过13个季度的旱灾以后，萨满教的名声日益狼藉，所有的流浪法师都把庄稼的坏收成和瘟疫怪罪到他们头上。为了继续他的旅途，罗斯塔不得不改变装束。虽然他仍然会提供同样的服务，不过他已将原有的萨满教义改为了街头浪子的胡言乱语，并且在街头卖艺（当然是很不专业的）谋生。就这样他终于活到了下一个纪元，并且警告着那些散落各地，已经除去自己伪装的萨满。包含暗影萨满“神秘流民”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Mysterious_V: In the final years of the Sordid Era, after thirteen seasons of drought, shamanic ways fell into disrepute, with all itinerant mages blamed for failing crops and disease. In order to continue his travels, Rhasta was forced to adopt a new appearance. While still offering many of the same services, during the end of this Era he disclaimed all knowledge of shamanism and professed only the knowledge that any vagabond might acquire along the road, and practice (in a strictly nonprofessional sense) for a few coins. Thus he survived into the next era, when many another was separated from their hide and stretched out along the roads as a warning to the next shaman who might happen along. Contains all of the items in the 'Mysterious Vagabond' set for Shadow Shaman:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Gear_of_the_TallyHo_H: Gear of the Tally-Ho Hunter Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gear_of_the_TallyHo_Hunte: 很早以前，狙击手就被诺伦山谷放逐，他周游各地，参与了很多战斗，并且一路学到了很多东西。从这一路的探险中他也收获了不少纪念品，收集了很多装甲和武器，以实现他年轻时族群的语言，从而在未来某一天能够回到他祖先生长的村庄。包含狙击手“寻猎者”套装的所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gear_of_the_Tall: Long ago exiled from the valleys of Knollen, Sniper has travelled to many lands, fought in many battles, and learned much along the way. From these adventures, he has garnered mementos of his travels, collecting armor and weapons as he strives to fulfill the prophecy of his youth, in the hope of one day rejoining the keen folk of his ancestral village. Contains all of the items in the 'Gear of the Tally-Ho Hunter' set for Sniper:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rider_of_the_Storm_Set: 在高地人时代生活着一个技艺精湛的风暴法师，然而他很清楚他从来都不是风暴的掌控者，仅仅只是风暴力量的载体。通过风暴鞭笞者，干扰者实现了对风暴骑手力量的掌握。风暴骑手嘲笑着他所面对的自然法则，使风暴的力量为己所用。他的护甲附有先祖的力量，他的坐骑是一只风暴鳞兽。干扰者是一名名符其实的风暴骑手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rider_of_the_Sto: The scarred and battle-hardened veteran of many conflicts, Disruptor knows that even the best Stormcrafter is never fully in control of a storm, but merely a vector for its power. Astride the last of the legendary Archtyrex stryders, Disruptor rides into battle wielding the ancient power of the upland storms.  Stormriders laugh in the face of order and through force of will bend storms to their bidding.  Clad in the armor of his ancestors, and riding his scaly steed, Disruptor is a true Rider of the Storm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Polycount_Megabundle: 包含了由Polycount建模社区用户所制作的11套套装的巨大捆绑包。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Polycount_Megabu: A massive bundle that contains 11 sets of items created by the Polycount modeling community.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GLeague_2012: Dota 2在著名的G联赛上于12月25日首次亮相。观看包括IG，LDG和DK在内的8支亚洲最强战队为了争夺40 000美元的总奖金同台竞技。G联赛由游戏风云主办
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GLeague_2012: The famous G-League Tournament makes its Dota 2 debut on Dec. 25. Watch the best 8 asian teams, including IG, LGD and DK, compete for a prize pool of $40,000. Hosted by GameFY
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GLeague_2012: Dota 2在著名的G联赛上于12月25日首次亮相。观看包括IG，LDG和DK在内的8支亚洲最强战队为了争夺40 000美元的总奖金同台竞技。G联赛由游戏风云主办
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GLeague_: The famous G-League Tournament makes its Dota 2 debut on Dec. 25. Watch the best 8 asian teams, including IG, LGD and DK, compete for a prize pool of $40,000. Hosted by GameFY

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bastion_Announcer_Pack: 这件播音包将把默认播音员和连杀配音替换为说话委婉，锐利机智的《壁垒》游戏旁白，也就是拉克斯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bastion_Announce: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the euphemistic keen-eyed wisdom of Bastion's narrator, also known as Rucks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Axe_Announcer_Pack: 这件播音包将把比赛的默认播音员和连杀配音替换为言语中透露着双关智慧的斧王。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Axe_Announcer_Pa: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the double-edged wit of Axe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Juggernaut_Announcer_Pack: 这件播音包将把比赛的默认播音员和连杀配音替换为斟字酌句的战士旅人，主宰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Juggernaut_Annou: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the carefully chosen words of the traveling warrior, Juggernaut.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Prophet_Announcer: 这件播音包将把比赛的默认播音员和连杀配音替换为声音坚定的先知。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Prophet_: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the stern voice of Nature's Prophet.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Storm_Spirit_Announcer_Pa: 这件播音包将把默认播音员和连杀配音替换为情绪高昂，言语夸张的风暴之灵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Storm_Spirit_Ann: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the boisterous theatrics of Storm Spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Pirate_Capn_Announcer: 这件播音包将把比赛的默认播音员和连杀配音替换为梅提船长下流的实时播报。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Pirate_Capn_: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with Captain Matey's scurrrrvy play-by-play.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Blade_Bracers: 如此致命的物件在战场外毫无容身之地，所以哈斯卡戴上就不脱下了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Blade_B: Such lethal pieces have no place outside the field of battle, which is why Huskar rarely takes them off.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Blade_Warhelm: 火山爆发般的热量，经过浓缩和冷却后，集中到了一点上，这是哈斯卡身为战士的天性最有力的象征。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Blade_W: The heat of volcanic forces, condensed and cooled, focused into a point, is a powerful symbol of Huskar's warrior nature.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Blade_Pauldron: 人们传言岩浆在冷却时自身会想象出最终形态。看起来这块黑曜石在形成初期就知晓了哈斯卡的来临。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Blade_P: They say that lava, as it cools, dreams its final form. It's as if this obsidian in its infancy knew of Huskar's coming.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Blade_Spear: “万物皆无此利，”如果想在战斗中试试这把兵器这句话可一定要说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Blade_S: \"There is no sharper edge in nature,\" is a good thing to say if you wish to try your blade in a fight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Blade_Dagger: 取自将萨拉石城封闭的乌木黑曜石的碎片。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Blade_D: A shard from the fields of ebon glass that sealed the Petrified City of Saraddel.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bladed_Abdomen_of_the: Bladed Abdomen of the Brood Queen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blessings_of_the_Solar_Di: 炎阳女神的侍从曾经夸赞莉娜的头发“受到了日光的抚摸”，因此赠予她饰物反射太阳的温情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blessings_of_the: The acolytes of the Solar Goddess said Lina's hair was \"touched by the light\", and so gifted her with trinkets made to reflect the warming love of the sun.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sleeves_of_the_Solar_Divi: 在她研习火焰魔法的生涯中，莉娜选择一路东行，与炎阳女神的追随者一同学习。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sleeves_of_the_S: During her training in the flame arts, Lina chose to travel east to study with the followers of the Solar Goddess.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flares_of_the_Solar_Divin: 相传东部荒原的高温非同小可。穿着必须得当。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flares_of_the_So: The heat of the eastern wastes is said to be extraordinary.  One must dress appropriately.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arc_of_the_Solar_Divine: 相传在神明启示的时刻，炎阳女神亲自造访莉娜，赐予她力量并赠予厚礼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arc_of_the_Solar: It is said that in a moment of divine inspiration the Solar Goddess herself visited Lina to bless her with power, and grant her this gift.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Catalyst_Cap: 当莉娜想要“随便玩玩”的时候这可是绝佳的饰品。所以她基本就不拿下来了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Catalyst_Cap: The perfect accoutrement for when Lina wishes to \"Mix things up a bit.\" Which is almost always.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Molten_Genesis: 燃着火焰的手指拉开的弓绝对是非比寻常的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Molten_Genesis: It takes a truly special bow to be wielded by fingers of flame.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Tenderizer: 经过帕吉的捣肉槌一阵快速的鼓捣，即使是最强硬的敌人也将变成一坨肉泥。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Tenderizer: A few quick turns under Pudge's Tenderizer, and even the toughest foe goes down like butter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Cleaving_Swiftne: 剑走轻灵，声未至，人已亡，喋血无痕！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Cleavin: Cleave fast, die young, and leave an imperishable corpse!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claive_of_Unyielding_Ston: 斯温顶天立地之时，此剑伴随身旁。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claive_of_Unyiel: When Sven stands his ground, this blade stands with him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Grull_the_Grim_Walker: 当干扰者在坐骑市场的角落看到格鲁兽时他就一直盯着她了。“那只叫什么名字？”“格鲁兽。没人能骑得了。她的干扰性太强。”“太好了！我要把她骑回家！”
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Grull_the_Grim_W: Disruptor had his eye on Grull from the moment he spotted the beast standing in the corner of the breeder's yard. \"Who's that one then?\" \"Grull. None can ride her. She's too disruptive.\" \"Perfect! I'll ride her home!\"
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Dark_Implemen: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含单件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Dark: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Killing_Spree_North_Ameri: Killing Spree是长期的战队争霸活动，参赛队伍是四支来自北美的顶尖战队。每支队伍想要获胜必须一路奋战，连赢三场，达到“大杀特杀（killing spree）”。比赛由NEO Dota主办。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Killing_Spree_No: Killing Spree is a perpetual King of the Hill event featuring four premier teams from North America. Each team will battle their way to the top and attempt to win three matches in a row for a \"killing spree\". Hosted by NEO Dota.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Killing_Spree_North_America_AD: Killing Spree：北美系列赛 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Killing_Spree_Nor: Killing Spree是长期的战队争霸活动，参赛队伍是四支来自北美的顶尖战队。每支队伍想要获胜必须一路奋战，连赢三场，达到“大杀特杀（killing spree）”。比赛由NEO Dota主办。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Killing_: Killing Spree is a perpetual King of the Hill event featuring four premier teams from North America. Each team will battle their way to the top and attempt to win three matches in a row for a \"killing spree\". Hosted by NEO Dota.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Treasure_Key: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含完整的物品套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Treasure_Ke: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Light_of_the_Solar_Di: Light of the Solar Divine Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Light_of_the_Solar_Divine: 包含莉娜的“炎阳圣女之辉”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Light_of_the_Sol: Contains all of the items for the 'Light of the Solar Divine' set for Lina:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Brood_Queen_Set: 包含育母蜘蛛的“育母蛛皇”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Brood_Queen_: Many are the knights and noble youths who have intruded on the hunting grounds of the Broodmother, disturbing her peace with the clatter of armor, their boots setting atwitch her silken web. The intruders are like succulent shelled insects upon whose innards she's gorged, all the while growing curious of the adornments that drape their bodies, until that day when a blacksmith found his way into her web.  Armor he promised her, the finest in the land, if only she would set him free. And so a deal was struck, and the blacksmith measured, and toiled, taking as his materials the finest steel to be found among the husked corpses of silk-wrapped knights.  When the new armor was finished, the spider kept her promise and set the blacksmith free.  Then she watched her brood devour him. Contains all of the items in the 'Brood Queen' set for Broodmother:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Obsidian_Blade_Set: 包含哈斯卡的“黑曜刀锋”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Obsidian_Bla: Contains all of the items in the 'Obsidian Blade' set for Huskar:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Legs_of_the_Brood_Queen: 八条装有护甲的腿，用阵亡骑士的护胸甲所打造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Legs_of_the_Broo: Eight legs of armor, each hammered from the breastplate of a fallen knight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_the_Brood_Queen: 在劫难逃的铁匠用颤抖的双手将王冠放到蜘蛛的头上，高呼：“蛛皇才能配上的王冠。”
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_the_Bro: With shaking hands, the doomed blacksmith laid a crown upon the spider's head, saying, \"A crown fit for a queen.\"
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladed_Abdomen_of_the_Bro: 尽管她天然的腹部也很健壮，但她喜欢钢铁与自己的外壳相接触，这为育母蛛皇提供了特殊的安全感。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladed_Abdomen_o: Strong though her natural chitinous armor may be, there is something about the caress of steel against her carapice that privides a special sense of security for the Brood Queen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Troll_Warlords_Default_OffHand: 巨魔战将的默认副手武器
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Troll_Warlords_Default_Of: 巨魔战将的默认副手武器
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Troll_Warlords_Default_Melee_W: 巨魔战将的默认近战武器
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Troll_Warlords_Default_Me: 巨魔战将的默认近战武器
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Troll_Warlords_Default_Melee_O: 巨魔战将的默认近战副手武器
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Troll_Warlords_Defaul: Troll Warlord's Default Melee Off-Hand Weapon
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Troll_Warlords_Default_Me: 巨魔战将的默认近战副手武器
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Troll_Warlords_D: Troll Warlord's Default Melee Off-Hand Weapon
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Wyrm_Bracers_of_Uldorak: 乌尔多拉克的飞龙护腕
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Wyrm_Pauldrons_of_Uldorak: 乌尔多拉克的飞龙护肩
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claw_of_the_Haruspex: 巨蟒部落长期以来秉持着肠卜师的传统，并预见当战火波及到这远古部落后将生灵涂炭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claw_of_the_Haru: Serpent Clan long held to the traditions of the haruspex, and so foresaw the ruin and war that would visit the ancient clans.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Haruspex: 当巨蟒部落将即将发生在自己身上的噩耗告诉世人时，他们将贵重的服饰赠与悉拉，希望他能会牢记这个预言，向后世流传。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Har: As Serpent Clan spread word of their coming doom, they granted their honored vestments to Sylla that he may remember their words.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Mark_of_the_Harusp: 护肩上盘旋着一头做工精细的金蛇。巨蟒部落的贤者通常从卑微族人的内脏中解读未来。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Mark_of_t: Upon the shoulder sits a coiled snake, wrought in gold. The seers of Serpent Clan often read the future in the entrails of their lowly kin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacrificial_Blade_of_the_: 这柄刀刃已经为许多野兽开膛破肚，所以装备在身未来的景象将不断映入脑海，将陷入危难的人们也将得到警告。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacrificial_Blad: The blade has seen the belly of many a beast so that knowledge may pour forth and forewarn those in need.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scythe_of_Twin_Deaths: 身染瘟疫的贵族们需要不时向罗坦士德利上供大礼，因为他手上握着一把极其可怕的武器，武器的样子仿佛提醒着他们随时都有被人继位的可能性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scythe_of_Twin_D: Heavy with the gifts granted by the plagued nobility, Rotund'jere had this frightening tool fashioned to remind those in his care of the ever-present likelihood of their demise.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Reliquary_of_Rotting_Doom: 这位黑衣主教身上庄严的服饰下只有腐烂和堕落。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Reliquary_of_Rot: Behind the sacred vestments of this dark cardinal lies little else but rot and ruin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pretiosa_of_Putrescense: 在罗坦士德利腐坏的影响达到巅峰时，他也收集了纷杂多样的时尚法帽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pretiosa_of_Putr: At the height of his corrupted influence, Rotund'jere had quite an assortment of fashionable hats.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Beard_of_Weeping_Scorn: 用丝织品和黄金制成的带子将这堕落的毛发捆在一起。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Beard_of_Weeping: Bands made from woven silk and gold tie this tainted hair together.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spirit_of_Calm: 尽管见识了劫数和毁灭，在肠卜师的愿景中悉拉还是感受到了一丝注定的沉寂。在冥想中，他发现他灵魂的投射物少了一份骇意，多了一分萌态。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spirit_of_Calm: Though doom and ruin they saw, the visions of the haruspex brought to Sylla a sense of destined calm. During mediations, he found his spiritual projections altered to appear less intimidating.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Lichs_Black_Pool_Watcher: 巫妖的暗黑之湖观察者
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lichs_Black_Pool_Watcher: 静静地审视着，密谋偷取你的魔法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lichs_Black_Pool: Silently surveying and plotting the theft of your mana.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cluckles_the_Brave: 多种动物都可以训练成在战场上运送工具的信使。但是背着喷气背包的仅此一只！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cluckles_the_Bra: Many critters can be trained to ferry tools into battle.  Few will do so while wearing a jetpack!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Cards_West: 观看8支Dota 2顶尖战队争夺1个国际邀请赛参赛名额
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Cards_West: Watch eight of the best Dota 2 teams compete for a spot in The International
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Cards_East: 观看8支Dota 2顶尖战队争夺1个国际邀请赛参赛名额
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Cards_East: Watch eight of the best Dota 2 teams compete for a spot in The International
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Monthly_Madness_: “It's Gosu Monthly Madness”联赛是由“It's Gosu eSports”主办，Own3D.Tv、Razer和NOS Energy Drink赞助的Dota 2联赛。在整个7月，16支亚洲顶尖队伍将激烈碰撞，而只有进入决赛才能从1000美元的奖金池中分一杯羹哦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Monthly: It's Gosu Monthly Madness is a Dota 2 tournament hosted by It's Gosu eSports and generously sponsored by Own3D.Tv, Razer and NOS Energy Drinks. Throughout the month of July, 16 of the best teams in Asia will clash and only the finalists will share a part of the prizepool of $1,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Monthly_Madness_: “It's Gosu Monthly Madness”联赛是由“It's Gosu eSports”主办，Own3D.Tv、Razer和NOS Energy Drink赞助的Dota 2联赛。在整个7月，16支亚洲顶尖队伍将激烈碰撞，而只有进入决赛才能从1000美元的奖金池中分一杯羹哦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Monthly: It's Gosu Monthly Madness is a Dota 2 tournament hosted by It's Gosu eSports and generously sponsored by Own3D.Tv, Razer and NOS Energy Drinks. Throughout the month of July, 16 of the best teams in Asia will clash and only the finalists will share a part of the prizepool of $1,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GosuLeague: GosuLeague将在每月推出全新赛季，水平不一的战队将分为多组进行比赛。水平最高的分组每月将赢得5000美元的高额奖金。每周各个参赛队伍均会参加两场比赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GosuLeague: GosuLeague delivers seasons on a monthly basis where teams of all skill levels play in different divisions. The top division is awarded with $5000 each month. Each team play two matches a week.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GosuLeague__Admin: GosuLeague将在每月推出全新赛季，水平不一的战队将分为多组进行比赛。水平最高的分组每月将赢得5000美元的高额奖金。每周各个参赛队伍均会参加两场比赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GosuLeague__Admi: GosuLeague delivers seasons on a monthly basis where teams of all skill levels play in different divisions. The top division is awarded with $5000 each month. Each team play two matches a week.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Championship_League: G-1冠军联赛由17173游戏网主办，是中国首个Dota 2职业联赛。激动人心的赛事中iG，LGD和DK等战队将角逐50 000美元的大奖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Championship_: The G-1 Championship League, hosted by 17173 Games, is the first Dota 2 tournament in China. Exciting matches await with teams like iG, LGD and DK competing for a prize pool of $50,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Championship_League__A: G-1冠军联赛由17173游戏网主办，是中国首个Dota 2职业联赛。激动人心的赛事中iG，LGD和DK等战队将角逐50 000美元的大奖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Championship_: The G-1 Championship League, hosted by 17173 Games, is the first Dota 2 tournament in China. Exciting matches await with teams like iG, LGD and DK competing for a prize pool of $50,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_atoD_2: atoD 2联赛的参赛队伍是8支北美和欧洲顶尖战队。联赛采用反队长模式，相信各战队都会开发非常规英雄，并破坏对方的阵容。联赛的部分收益将并入奖金，这将是首个为粉丝提供直接途径提高奖金池的比赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_atoD_2: atoD 2 features 8 top North American and European teams. Using Reverse Captain's Mode, teams will surely play unconventional heroes and sabotage each other's lineups.  With some of the proceeds going to the prize it's the first tournament to include a direct way for fans to increase the prizepool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_atoD_2__Admin: atoD 2联赛的参赛队伍是8支北美和欧洲顶尖战队。联赛采用反队长模式，相信各战队都会开发非常规英雄，并破坏对方的阵容。联赛的部分收益将并入奖金，这将是首个为粉丝提供直接途径提高奖金池的比赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_atoD_2__Admin: atoD 2 features 8 top North American and European teams. Using Reverse Captain's Mode, teams will surely play unconventional heroes and sabotage each other's lineups.  With some of the proceeds going to the prize it's the first tournament to include a direct way for fans to increase the prizepool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Asia_Madness: It's Gosu再次回归了，这次是第三届Asia Madness联赛，十支亚洲顶尖战队将在三重淘汰制下角逐$5000的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Asia_Ma: It's Gosu returns with its third edition of the Asia Madness where the ten best teams from Asia will be competing for a prize pool of $5,000 in a triple elimination format.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Asia_Madness_3__: It's Gosu再次回归了，这次是第三届Asia Madness联赛，十支亚洲顶尖战队将在三重淘汰制下角逐$5000的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Its_Gosu_Asia_Ma: It's Gosu returns with its third edition of the Asia Madness where the ten best teams from Asia will be competing for a prize pool of $5,000 in a triple elimination format.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota_2_Corsair_: 观看今年DreamHack冬季赛的 DreamHack Dota 2 海盗复仇杯，16支队伍将为总数为200 000克朗的奖金一争高下。总决赛将在DreamArena Extreme场馆举行，届时将有1100名现场观众见证这一赛事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota_2: Watch the DreamHack Dota 2 Corsair Vengeance Cup at this year's Dreamhack Winter where 16 teams compete for the 200 000 SEK prize purse. The Grand Final is played in the DreamArena Extreme in front of 1100 fans.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota_2_Corsair_: 观看今年DreamHack冬季赛的 DreamHack Dota 2 海盗复仇杯，16支队伍将为总数为200 000克朗的奖金一争高下。总决赛将在DreamArena Extreme场馆举行，届时将有1100名现场观众见证这一赛事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota_2: Watch the DreamHack Dota 2 Corsair Vengeance Cup at this year's Dreamhack Winter where 16 teams compete for the 200 000 SEK prize purse. The Grand Final is played in the DreamArena Extreme in front of 1100 fans.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SEA_League: SEA League由东南亚的顶尖队伍参加，比赛将分为若干阶段进行。为期两周的紧张赛事将由BeyondthesummitTV的GoDz和LD共同解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SEA_League: The SEA League features SEA's finest teams as they compete in several stages of the tournament. Two weeks of intense action will be commentated by GoDz and LD of BeyondthesummitTV.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SEA_League: SEA League由东南亚的顶尖队伍参加，比赛将分为若干阶段进行。为期两周的紧张赛事将由BeyondthesummitTV的GoDz和LD共同解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SEA_Leag: The SEA League features SEA's finest teams as they compete in several stages of the tournament. Two weeks of intense action will be commentated by GoDz and LD of BeyondthesummitTV.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Relics_of_the_Putrid_: Relics of the Putrid Pontiff Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Relics_of_the_Putrid_Pont: 包含“堕落教皇圣物”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Relics_of_the_Pu: Contains all of the items in the 'Relics of the Putrid Pontiff' set:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tools_of_the_Haruspex_Set: 包含德鲁伊的“肠卜师之具”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tools_of_the_Har: Contains all of the items in the 'Tools of the Haruspex' for Lone Druid:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Demonic_Archivist_Set: 这件捆绑包包含了术士的“魔化馆长”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Demonic_Arch: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Demonic Archivist' set for Warlock:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Archivist: 这根法杖具有韵律感的砰响一直回荡在秘湮学院的禁断圣所里迷宫般的走廊中，如同那句不详的话：”这次我又把书放哪儿了？“
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Arc: The measured thud of this staff may be heard in the labyrinthine corridors of the Ultimyr Archives as often as these ominous words: \"Now where did I put that book?\"
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroud_of_the_Archivist: 头巾能阻止一种潜伏在秘湮学院的魔典飞龙对天灵盖的致命袭击。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroud_of_the_Ar: Prevents cranial intrusions by a particularly pernicious form of bookwyrm that skulks in the Ultimyr Archives.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Demonbag_of_the_Archivist: ”有借必有还“是首席馆长的座右铭。如果借了没有归还，住在这背包里的恶魔就会去找他们。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Demonbag_of_the_: \"All Who Borrow Must Return\" is the Archivist's slogan. Those who do not return what they borrow are soon visited by that which resides in this bag.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Archivist: 这件长袍能抵抗霉菌，魔咒以及其他对经验丰富的秘湮学院巡查人员产生威胁的东西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Arch: Resistant to mold, mildew, cobwebs, curses and other things which make perusing the Ultimyr Archives dangerous to even experienced browsers.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lantern_of_the_Archivist: 秘湮学院的禁断圣所里有大量的典籍从未见过日光，永远都不会。但是典籍里的书页多次见过这灯光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lantern_of_the_A: Certain tomes in the Ultimyr Archives have never seen the light of day, and never will. But their pages have seen this light many times.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Archivist: 对于那些不愿被翻过的书页，首席馆长给自己的护腕注入了说服的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_A: For turning pages that wish not to be turned, the Archivist's bracers have been imbued with persuasive powers.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Grand_Mantle_of_the_Archi: 要看管一间储藏室，里面放满了奇异非凡，价值连城，绝无仅有，象征着智慧与疯狂的典籍。这是个重担，就像这件斗篷一样，只能由具有相似力量的首席馆长肩负。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Grand_Mantle_of_: Caring for a repository of singular, priceless, unreproducible volumes of wisdom and madness is a burden that, like this mantle, may be shouldered by only an Archivist of similarly singular power.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Bow: 这把弓年代久远，由橡木和钢铁制成，上面饰有神鹰的金色羽毛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Bo: An ancient bow of oak and iron, gilded with the golden feathers of a sacred falcon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Quiver: 正如俯冲猎物的飞鸟长有利爪，射手拥有神箭。而这副金辉猎鹰箭袋中都是这样的神箭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Qu: As the diving bird of prey has talons, so the archer has arrows.  And many are the arrows that can be held in the quiver of the gilded falcon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Cloak: 这件漂亮的翡翠色斗篷上绣有金辉猎鹰的上古图案。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Cl: This beautiful emrald cloak is embroidered with the ancient sidgel of the gilded falcon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Helm: 象征着强大力量和美貌的头盔，这件金辉猎鹰装甲提供的安全感无可比拟，保护着佩戴者的头部和地位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_He: A helm of great strength and beauty, this armor of the gilden falcon offers a special kind of security, protecting both the wearer's head and identity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Wings: 就像古老传说里的神鹰，这对金辉猎鹰的翅膀帮助风行者空降战场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Falcon_Wi: Like the angvols of old legends, these golden falcon wings speed Windranger's flight into battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_IshulShog_the_Watcher: 戴蒙克研习多年，想为守望者构造一个真正的名字，希望束缚住这强大的生物，从而了解并掌握恶魔语。不幸的是，守望者没有舌头。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_IshulShog_the_Wa: Demnok studied for years to construct the true name of the Watcher, hoping to bind a creature powerful enough to know and reveal the Ozkavosh tongue.  Unfortunately, the Watcher lacks a tongue.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bangles_of_the_Wildwings_: 枭兽非常珍惜他们落下的羽毛，他们会将羽毛保存用于筑巢，抚养幼鸟。因此他们将羽毛赠予魅惑魔女作为手镯的饰物说明了他们对她最深层的敬意。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bangles_of_the_W: The Wildwings treasure their lost feathers, saving them to line the nests where they raise their young. It speaks of their deep respect for Enchantress that they gifted her these feathers for her bangles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Necklace_of_the_Wildwings: 枭兽性格暴躁，划地为疆，但是他们不仅不讨厌魅惑魔女进入他们的领地；反而欢迎之至。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Necklace_of_the_: The Wildwing are fierce and territorial, but they more than tolerate Enchantress in their realms: They welcome her.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fashion_of_Yoskreth: 殇月国的时尚与世界上其他地方没多少共同之处。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fashion_of_Yoskr: The fashions of Yoskreth are not common in much of the rest of the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spellbreaker_of_Yoskreth: 殇月国的君王执意要他们的勇士接受他们铸造的无上护体。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spellbreaker_of_: The sovereign of Yoskreth insisted that their champion be given the finest guard they could forge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armguards_of_the_Penitent: 为了忏悔过去犯下的罪行，陈被迫穿上了代表全新信仰的盔甲，在过去的沙漠故乡游荡，寻找能够皈依的人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armguards_of_the: In penance for his transgressions Chen was made to don the arms of his new faith, and wander his former desert home seeking conversions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulderguards_of_the_Pen: 肩甲能够反射来自天上的圣光，如同救赎的灯塔，千里之外就能看见。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulderguards_o: The shoulderguards reflect the heavenly light above as a beacon of salvation visible from leagues away.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Turban_of_the_Penitent_No: 哈扎达尔废墟的人们知道如果在沙漠荒原戴错了头饰会遇到什么危险。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Turban_of_the_Pe: Those of the Hazhadal Barrens know the dangers of wearing improper headgear in the desert wastes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Locuthi_Barding_of_the_Peniten: 皈依游民的掘地蜥盔甲
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Locuthi_Barding_of_th: Locuthi Barding of the Penitent Nomad
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Locuthi_Barding_of_the_Pe: 这件坐骑盔甲在重量和色彩上都少了一分，这都是在干燥荒原上存活必需的因素。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Locuthi_Barding_: The barding is lighter both in weight and in coloring, both necessary elements for survival in the dry wastes.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Commanding_Rod_of_the: Commanding Rod of the Penitent Nomad
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Commanding_Rod_of_the_Pen: 尽管它没有传统法杖的重量，但它的魔力并无短缺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Commanding_Rod_o: Though it does not have the heft of the traditional rod, it lacks none of its potency.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sash_of_Yoskreth: 为了表示谢意，殇月国的君王命令手下为打败萨斯克邪咒的勇士制作精美的长袍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sash_of_Yoskreth: In his gratitude, the sovereign of Yoskreth bid that fine robes be made for the warrior who had bested Sahsk's vile enchantments.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Etched_Crescent_of_Yoskreth__O: 殇月国镌纹弯刀 - 副手
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Etched_Crescent_of_Yoskre: 随着萨斯克被击败，殇月国的君王赐予敌法师与他的力量和技艺相称的兵器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Etched_Crescent_: With the defeat of Sahsk, the sovereign of Yoskreth granted the Anti-Mage tools befitting one of such power and skill.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Etched_Crescent_of_Yoskre: 随着萨斯克被击败，殇月国的君王赐予敌法师与他的力量和技艺相称的兵器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Etched_Crescent_: With the defeat of Sahsk, the sovereign of Yoskreth granted the Anti-Mage tools befitting one of such power and skill.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Yoskreth: 精美的布料与银白的金属相结合，上面是殇月国的皇室标志。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Yoskreth: Fine cloth is combined with the silvered metals that make up the royal patterns of Yoskreth.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Yoskreth: 随着敌法师在力量和名望上与日俱增，殇月国君主寻求他的帮助去打败可怕的巫师萨斯克。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Yoskr: As the Anti-Mage grew in power and prestige, the sovereign of Yoskreth sought his services to topple the fearsome sorcerer Sahsk.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spear_of_the_Wildwings_Bl: 当枭兽中出了几个惹是生非的为这个高傲的种族蒙羞，这是非常不幸的。而到了把那几个暴乱枭兽抓获的时候，魅惑魔女会带上枭兽贤者赠与她的长矛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spear_of_the_Wil: It is unfortunate that a few rogue Wildkin must spoil the proud race's reputation, but when it is time to hunt those few rascals down, Enchantress bears a spear granted her by the wisest of the Wildwing race.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Headdress_of_the_Wildwing: 当魅惑魔女戴着这件头巾穿过枭兽的领土时，她畅行无阻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Headdress_of_the: Enchantress passes unchallenged through Wildwing territories when she wears this headdress.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wingbelt_of_the_Wildwings: 不要怕，这根腰带在由枭兽工匠打造时，那上千羽毛是采自活着的枭兽，毫无痛楚；而不是像有些人想的那样，是从枭兽的尸体上拔下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wingbelt_of_the_: Fear not, this belt was crafted by Wildwing artisans from thousands of feathers plucked painlessly from living individuals; and not, as some have suggested, hacked from a dead Wildwing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Diretide_HUD_Skin: 夜魇暗潮主题游戏界面皮肤
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Diretide_HUD_Skin: 随着潮汐轮转，气温骤降，大陆上的生命能量在衰退。夜魇暗潮已然降临。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Diretide_HUD_Ski: As tide and temperature turn, life ebbs from the land.  The Diretide has arrived.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Radiant_HUD_Skin: 天辉主题游戏界面皮肤
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Radiant_HUD_Skin: 光明在大陆上倾泻，盛开的鲜花在战火洗礼后的废墟上缤纷灿烂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Radiant_HUD_Skin: Light pours into the land, blooming resplendent on war-scarred ruins.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dire_HUD_Skin: 夜魇主题游戏界面皮肤
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dire_HUD_Skin: 随着毁灭之种发芽生根，土地开始四处崩裂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dire_HUD_Skin: The earth cracks in turmoil as the seeds of destruction take root.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Frostivus_HUD_Skin: 迎霜节主题游戏界面皮肤
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_HUD_Skin: 白雪覆盖了冰冷的大地，寒意在空气中弥漫。迎霜节就这样来了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostivus_HUD_Sk: A chill fills the air as the snows blanket the cold ground.  The time of Frostivus comes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Restless_: 您需要一个<font color='#9da1a9'>符印</font>才能将珍藏解封。您可以前往刀塔商城购买。每个珍藏系列可能掉落的物品均不相同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Tidal_Power: 您需要一个<font color='#9da1a9'>符印</font>才能将珍藏解封。您可以前往刀塔商城购买。每个珍藏系列可能掉落的物品均不相同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Tida: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Forbidden: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含单件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Bundle_Desc_Faceless_Void_Chronite: 包含虚空假面的“时空之守护”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Bundle_Desc_Faceless_Void_: Includes all of the items in the 'Chronite Defense' set for Faceless Void:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Arms_of_the_Penitent_: Arms of the Penitent Nomad Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Penitent_Noma: 这件捆绑包内含陈的“皈依游民的盔甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Peni: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Arms of the Penitent Nomad Set' set for Chen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Etched_Crescents_of_Yoskreth_P: 殇月国镌纹弯刀饰品包
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Etched_Crescents_of_Yoskr: 这件捆绑包内含殇月国镌纹弯刀的主手和副手武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Etched_Crescents: This bundle contains both the main and off-hand Etched Crescent of Yoskreth.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gifts_of_Yoskreth: 这件捆绑包内含敌法师的“殇月国的馈赠”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gifts_of_Yos: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Gifts of Yoskreth' set for Anti-Mage:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Wings_of_the_Gilded_F: Wings of the Gilded Falcon Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Gilded_Falco: 这件捆绑包内含风行者的“金辉猎鹰的展翅”套装内所有物品：迅捷如展翅，轻盈似羽毛，璀璨胜骄阳；金辉猎鹰的展翅套装是不世出的致命猎手绝佳的礼物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Gil: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Wings of the Gilded Falcon' set for Windranger:  Quick as wings, light as feathers, golden as the sun; the wings of the guilded Falcon set is a tribute to a rare and deadly predator.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blessings_of_the_Wildwing: 包含魅惑魔女的“枭兽的福佑”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blessings_of_the: Contains all of the items in the 'Blessings of the Wildwing' set for Enchantress:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Crystalline_: 在冰川中封冻了上千年，这把伟大的法杖在制作之初是为了纪念北方的双子星辰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Cry: Locked frozen in a glacier for a thousand years, this great staff was carved long ago in honor of the twin northern stars.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Crystalline_Q: 在兵家必争之地，夜晚非常寒冷，但是其中也有些地方寒气不足。这件以冰霜附魔的斗篷会让太阳照耀的东西保持冰冷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Crys: Nights are cold in the contested lands, but for some, not cold enough.  This frost-charmed cape keeps cold what the sun would warm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Owlion: 说起移动的不动声色，打击感的厚重，万兽之中以这头全身披羽的银夜森林徘徊者为首！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Owli: Nothing moves more quietly, nothing strikes harder, than this feathered prowler of the Nightsilver Woods!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Crystallin: 如寒冰般冷酷，但是像钢铁般硬实，这对护腕将给胆敢与北方室女作对的狂徒心中带去寒意。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_C: Hard as ice, but strong as steel, these bracers bring a chill to the heart of those who would oppose the maiden of the north.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Gazing_Eye_of_the_Dem: Gazing Eye of the Demon Witch
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gazing_Eye_of_the_Demon_W: 想要回首现实，观察超然的邪恶力量需要超越大多数凡间手段的视野和纯净心智。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gazing_Eye_of_th: To look past reality and view the vile powers beyond requires vision and clarity surpassing most mortal means.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scepter_of_the_Sable_Void: 想要驾驭炼狱的力量需要一个对自身邪念抱有忧患意识的象征。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scepter_of_the_S: To harness the powers of the burning nether requires a symbol feared for its malice.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ruby_Ring_of_Raknoth_Raknul: 魑魅魍魉的红宝石戒指
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ruby_Ring_of_Raknoth_Rakn: 如果戒指的佩戴者并非绝望之徒，那他的灵魂将受到戒指的烧灼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ruby_Ring_of_Rak: The ring would scorch the very soul of the wearer were it not placed on a finger already beyond hope.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Skins_of_the_Incubus: 十足的恶魔如果未受派遣很少会来到人间。占有这样的皮肤就是宣称自己高于地狱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Skins_of_the_Inc: Few facets of the utter foul wander the land unbidden. To claim such a skin is to declare primacy over the inferno.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroud_of_the_Shattered_S: 想要手握恶魔巫师的力量就是意味着要与明处和暗处的强敌作对。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroud_of_the_Sh: To possess the power of a Demon Witch is to stand in defiance of powers seen and unseen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heart_of_the_Inauspicious: 在虚空裂隙巡逻必须要装备能抵挡恶魔洞穿光束的护甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heart_of_the_Ina: Those who patrol the edge of the void must gird themselves in armor impregnable to evil's piercing rays.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Inauspicious: 随着异界黑暗的威胁与日俱增，先兆者凭借拥有奇特力量的双翼震慑这些无法消灭的势力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Ina: As the threat from the outer dark mounts, the Harbinger intimidates these implacable forces with wings of strange power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Auspex_of_the_Inauspiciou: 极具对称性的头盔，预示着先兆者召唤了黑暗力量来保护造物最深成的躯壳抵抗超乎了解的毁灭寒冰力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Auspex_of_the_In: A helm whose very symmetry foreshadows the dark power that Harbinger may summon to protect the inmost shells of creation from cold destructive forces beyond knowing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Thyrsus_of_the_Inauspicio: 在创世深渊长有一种水晶树，树枝上缠结着未来的景象。殁境神蚀者从这样的树上取材打造了这根法杖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Thyrsus_of_the_I: On the world at the rim grow a species of crystalline tree in whose branches visions of the future are tangled. From such a tree, Outworld Devourer fashioned this staff.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Bracers: 月亮的光泽遍布着这对护腕，也使米拉娜体内的午夜力量充盈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Brac: The moon's lustre fills these bracers, and fills Mirana with midnight power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Quiver: 即使身处无月夜晚的黑暗中，只要米拉娜背着银夜箭袋就不用摸索寻找箭矢。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Quiv: Even in the dark of a moonless night, Mirana shall not fumble for an arrow when she carries the Nightsilver Quiver.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Raiments: 身着如同新月的微光般透明的暗夜魔法之服，米拉娜无声穿梭在黑夜中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Raim: Draped in the dark magic of a fabric as sheer as the new moon's faintest rays, Mirana glides silently through the dark.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Regalia: 带着能够反射月牙之间魔星光辉的宝石，米拉娜无所畏惧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Rega: Bearing a gem that reflects the brightness of the Demon Star between the moon's horns, Mirana knows no fear.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Locks: 就像月亮是夜空一片漆黑时最大的有利条件，米拉娜的头发在银夜森林发出柔和的亮光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Lock: Just as the moon appears to greatest advantage in the darkest skies, Mirana's tresses shine most softly in the Nightsilver Woods.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Bow: 守卫银夜森林需要的不仅是箭无虚发的射手，还有她携带的神佑之弓。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightsilver_Bow: The defense of the Nightsilver Woods relies not only on the most skilled archer, but on the blessed bow she carries.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Tuskar: 这一物品将把比赛的默认播音员替换为铿锵有力的巨牙海民。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Tuskar: This item replaces the default announcer with punchy lines from Tusk.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Premier_League_Season: 观战10支来自欧洲和美国的顶尖战队争夺10 000美元的赛事奖金。购买门票后可以享受100余场比赛的视觉盛筵，赛事由Blaze和Rainmaker担当英文解说，Versuta担当俄文解说。此外门票内含赛事专属信使“变色飞龙”。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Premier_Leag: Watch 10 of the best teams from Europe and America contend for a prize of $10,000. This ticket will entitle you to over 100 matches commentated by Blaze & Rainmaker and Russian commentary by Versuta. Also included is the exclusive courier 'Wynchell the Wyrmeleon'.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_EMS_One_Spring_2: RaidCall EMS One 2013春季联赛是全新的Dota 2竞技赛事。在数周的赛程内，知名战队将陆续面对挑战者，一同争夺季后赛以及最终的总决赛席位，角逐39,000的巨额奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_EMS_One: The RaidCall EMS One Spring 2013 is the new premier Dota2 competition. Over the course of several weeks, established teams will face up-and-coming challengers in the fight for a spot in the playoffs and eventually at the live event finals, competing for $39,000 in prize money.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_EMS_One_Spring_2013_A: RaidCall EMS One 2013年春季联赛管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall_EMS_One_: RaidCall EMS One 2013春季联赛是全新的Dota 2竞技赛事。在数周的赛程内，知名战队将陆续面对挑战者，一同争夺季后赛以及最终的总决赛席位，角逐39,000的巨额奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall: The RaidCall EMS One Spring 2013 is the new premier Dota2 competition. Over the course of several weeks, established teams will face up-and-coming challengers in the fight for a spot in the playoffs and eventually at the live event finals, competing for $39,000 in prize money.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Series_Season_V: StarLadder主办的群星联赛第5赛季已经强势回归！赛事将以四种语言进行直播，v1lat和TobiWan担任招牌解说，赛事奖金更是达到空前的15 000美元，这次将是最好的群星联赛！群星联赛的主要赛事是在乌克兰基辅的CyberSport Arena举办的线下总决赛。门票内含游戏内专属信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Series_Seas: StarLadder's StarSeries Season 5 is back! Broadcast in 4 different languages with v1lat and TobiWan as headliners and a grand prize of $15,000 this should be the best StarSeries yet! The keystone of StarSeries is its LAN finals, held in Kiev Cybersport Arena. Includes an exclusive in-game Courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Star_Series_Season_V_ADMIN: 群星联赛第五赛季管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Series_Season_V_ADMI: StarLadder主办的群星联赛第5赛季已经强势回归！赛事将以四种语言进行直播，v1lat和TobiWan担任招牌解说，赛事奖金更是达到空前的15 000美元，这次将是最好的群星联赛！群星联赛的主要赛事是在乌克兰基辅的CyberSport Arena举办的线下总决赛。门票内含游戏内专属信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Series_Seas: StarLadder's StarSeries Season 5 is back! Broadcast in 4 different languages with v1lat and TobiWan as headliners and a grand prize of $15,000 this should be the best StarSeries yet! The keystone of StarSeries is its LAN finals, held in Kiev Cybersport Arena. Includes an exclusive in-game Courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_OLD__The_Premier_League_S: 观战10支来自欧洲和美国的顶尖战队争夺10 000美元的赛事奖金。购买门票后可以享受100余场比赛的视觉盛筵，赛事由Blaze和Rainmaker担当英文解说，Versuta担当俄文解说。此外门票内含赛事专属信使“变色飞龙”。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_OLD__The_Premier: Watch 10 of the best teams from Europe and America contend for a prize of $10,000. This ticket will entitle you to over 100 matches commentated by Blaze & Rainmaker and Russian commentary by Versuta. Also included is the exclusive courier 'Wynchell the Wyrmeleon'.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Harbinger_of_the_Inauspicious_: 灾厄深渊的先兆者套装
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Harbinger_of_the_Inau: Harbinger of the Inauspicious Abyss Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Harbinger_of_the_Inauspic: 包含殁境神蚀者的“灾厄深渊的先兆者”套装内全部物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Harbinger_of_the: Contains all of the items in the 'Harbinger of the Inauspicious Abyss' set for Outworld Devourer:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Regalia_of_the_Crysta: Regalia of the Crystalline Queen Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_Crystallin: 包含水晶室女的“冰晶女王的华服”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_C: Contains all of the items in the 'Regalia of the Crystalline Queen' set for Crystal Maiden:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Tools_of_the_Demon_Wi: Tools of the Demon Witch Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tools_of_the_Demon_Witch_: 这件捆绑包内含莱恩的“恶魔巫师之具”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tools_of_the_Dem: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Tools of the Demon Witch' set for Lion:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Garments_of_the_Nightsilver_Se: 银夜近卫军的戎装套装
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Garments_of_the_Night: Garments of the Nightsilver Sentinel Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Garments_of_the_Nightsilv: 包含米拉娜的“银夜近卫军的戎装”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Garments_of_the_: Contains all of the items in the 'Garments of the Nightsilver Sentinel' set for Mirana:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_the_Bone_Scryer: “我占卜，用的是小眼珠...一件极具华丽的头饰！”
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_the_Bon: \"I scry with my little eye...a fabulous piece of headgear!\"
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Funereal_Dress_of_the: Funereal Dress of the Bone Scryer
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Funereal_Dress_of_the_Bon: 远见的先知如果连死亡都看不到那只是自欺欺人。死亡先知洞察每个盛事是如何结束，因此她的着装总是得体的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Funereal_Dress_o: Far-seeing prophets who see anything other than Death are merely fooling themselves. Death Prophet knows how every occasion ends, and thus her attire is always appropriate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarf_of_the_Bone_Scryer: 预见死亡时会带来一丝寒意，这件围巾能够为死亡先知驱寒。然后呢，她对这样的寒意心怀眷恋。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarf_of_the_Bon: When visions of Death bring a chill, this scarf keeps Death Prophet warm. Then again, she enjoys a little chill.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Salvaged_Sword_and_Board: 有时候无论是找到了什么都只能硬着头皮上场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Salvaged_Sword_a: Sometimes you have to go with what you can find.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lash_of_the_Summoned_Lord: Izhai icha ensh safras!（恶魔语：汝将领略痛苦！）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sigil_of_the_Summoned_Lor: Hollom tak vo'Ozh hedoq！（恶魔语：吾之执念无可匹敌！）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Plate_of_the_Summoned_Lor: Ozh icha gluth ahm'sol！（恶魔语：吾将吞噬汝之灵魂！）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Thorax_of_Qald: 看好了！这件祭祀饰物赞美的是最初将守卫之沙倾注到魔法壳甲里的灯神所拥有的无瑕力量。无瑕而又强大，就如灯神一般，这件胸甲只有在神圣的场合中才会祭出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Thora: Behold! This ritual adornment celebrates the flawless power of the Djinn who first poured the Sentient Sand into a suit of magical armor. Flawless and mighty, like the Djinn itself, a thorax for only the most sacred of occasions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Crawlers_of_Qa: 卡尔丁所有的祭祀都是以舞蹈为形式，每个舞步的制定都是按照精准的细节进行。一步出错可能意味着一个不幸的时代。但是沙王从来没有弄错护爪。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Crawl: All the rites of Qaldin are done as dance, with each step prescribed and enacted in precise detail. A misstep can mean an age of misfortune. But Sand King has never put one crawler wrong.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bindings_of_the_Summoned_: Ozh acha domosh ahm'omoz！（恶魔语：吾乃黑暗之主！）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Decorative_Armor_of_the_Bone_S: 骸骨占卜师的华丽护服
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Decorative_Armor_of_t: Decorative Armor of the Bone Scryer
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Decorative_Armor_of_the_B: 死亡先知的脑海里显然只有一件事：死亡。这件护服让她的形体冰冷瘦削，宛如遗体。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Decorative_Armor: Death Prophet clearly has only one thing on her mind: Death. This armor holds her like a cold, bony embrace.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Maw_of_the_Devourer: 来自创世深渊的沉重法杖，提醒世人那漫无边际的虚空。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Maw_of_the_Devou: From the World at the Rim, this staff is a weighty reminder of the howling void that waits for us all.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Slithereen_Basher: 波涛下的战争后幸存的武器屈指可数。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Slithere: Few are the weapons that have outlasted the wars beneath the waves.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Snatcher: 别让午饭得到被耽误成晚饭的机会。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Snatcher: Never give a meal the chance to be late for dinner.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Chopper: 挂在帕吉锁链的链结上，提醒着我们维系生命的桎梏——还有帕吉打破他们是何等轻松。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Chopper: Tangled in the links of Pudge's chains, a reminder of the shackles that bind us to life--and how easily Pudge may break them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Riptide: 让这把刀痛饮敌人的鲜血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crimson_Riptide: Let this blade drink deep of your foe.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Riptide: Let this blade guard you from harm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Finblade: 海翼神刀奋勇杀敌就跟昆卡的战舰乘风破浪一样轻而易举。昆卡就这样沉醉在华丽的血雾和被解放的灵魂交织形成的虹彩篇章中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Finblade: Kunkka's ship cleaves the waves as easily as Finblade cleaves his enemies. Kunkka revels in the iridescent play of light given off by dashing spray and liberated souls alike.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Staff: 法杖只要注入了一定的魔力就可以为大多数魔法师所用。然而，作为一位有抱负的长老，法杖外观上需要彰显出特权。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Staff: Any suitably imbued staff will serve for most sorcerers.  However, being an aspiring councilor requires that certain concessions be made to form.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Shawl: 很少有巫师能放话称自己拥有一件因防火而驰名的披巾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Shawl: Few sorcerers can claim to own a shawl that appears as prestigious as it is fire resistant.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Robe: 想要同时成为魔导师，决斗家和有抱负的政治家，需要一件庄严肃穆，兼具防冲击波功能的长袍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Robe: To be at once a Magus, a duelist, and an aspiring politician requires a robe that is both stately and blast proof.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Claws_of_Qaldi: 利爪上雕刻了发光的符文，闪烁荒原的恳求者举高双爪吸引灯神卡尔丁的注意。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Claws: Incised with the luminous runes of Qezh, the upraised claws of the Scintillant Supplicant summon the full attention of the Djinn of Qaldin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Stinger_of_Qal: 在卡兹哈拉祭祀的高潮部分，七名纯洁的侍祭将被这可怕的毒刺一击毙命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Sting: At the height of the ceremony of Qaz'hallaq, seven virtuous acolytes are stung to death with one swipe of this malevolent armored appendage.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Bramble_Lord: 现在藤棘领主的统治已被人淡忘，那个黑暗时代的遗物寥寥无几。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Bram: None now remember the reign of the Bramble Lord, and fewer still are the relics of that dark era.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Buckler_of_the_Bramble_Lo: 打偏的武器上倒映着藤棘领主冷酷的容貌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Buckler_of_the_B: The grim visage of the Bramble Lord adorns the deflector.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lance_of_the_Bramble_Lord: 藤棘领主主张所有以他的名义制造的武器在精于撕裂敌人的同时也要方便刺杀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lance_of_the_Bra: The Bramble Lord insisted that all arms made in his honor be just as adept at piercing as they were at tearing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spiked_Guard_of_the_Ancie: 胆敢与藤棘领主作对的人都很明白，凭他的力量能轻松抓住他们并将他们的生命洞彻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spiked_Guard_of_: All who dared stand against the Bramble Lord well knew how easily his powers could catch and pierce their lives.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Steel_Wings_of_Apocalypti: 他的双翼受过六十六次烙印之刑，不过现在外面套上了精良铠甲的雏形。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Steel_Wings_of_A: Six and sixty times his wings were branded, but now they are seated within a chrysalis of finest armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Runed_Bracers_of_Apocalyp: 焦火之魔现在佩戴的护腕是在地狱最深处的熔锅里锻造的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Runed_Bracers_of: He that burns now wears bracers is forged in the cauldron of deepest hell.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Demonhide_Girdle_of_Apoca: 末日使者的腰部束上了厚实的魔皮和钢铁。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Demonhide_Girdle: Doom's loins are girded in thickest demonhide and steel.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Steel_Horns_of_Apocalypti: 佩戴了灭世之角的头部，万般沉重。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Steel_Horns_of_A: Heavy is the head that wears the horns of the Apocalypse.
