Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Pshent_of_Qald: 闪烁荒原的守卫之沙只有在最为神圣庄严的祭祀中才会戴上这光彩夺目的头饰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Pshen: The sentient sands of the Scintillant Waste don this glorious headpiece for only their most sacred rites.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Infernal_Pauldrons_of_Apo: 焦火之魔那强健的双肩上承载了灭世的重任。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Infernal_Pauldro: He that burns carries all the weight of the Apocalypse upon his mighty shoulders.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Blade_of_Apocalypti: 受过诅咒的魔剑，为了刺穿隔开七层地狱的屏障所铸造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Blade_of_A: A cursed blade forged to slice through the membrane that separates the seven hells.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_Plates_of_Apocalypti: 地狱之尾属于无与伦比的恶魔铠甲，在七层地狱中的第五层铸造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_Plates_of_A: A stygian tail of finest demon armor, forged in the fifth of the seven hells.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Corrupted_Shard: 只有末日已近之人，或末日的主人才能拿起这一片完全纯净，没有掺入任何杂质的无瑕碎片。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Corrupted_Sh: Only the doomed, or doom's master, can carry this single fragment of absolutely pure, unalloyed, unsullied corruption.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowering_Elements: 挥舞起来感觉轻如鸿毛。承受起来感觉重如泰山。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowering_Eleme: As light as a feather to the weilder.  The weight of a boulder to its target.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Pool_Watcher: 静静地审视着，密谋偷取你的魔法，还有你的性命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Pool_Watch: Silently surveying and plotting the theft of your mana, and your life.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hellgazer: 正当术士醉心研习时，他的哨兵在留意地狱的扰动——还有凡人的擅闯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hellgazer: While Warlock is deep in study, his sentry keeps an eye out for Infernal interruptions--as well as more mundane intrusions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bottom_Watcher: 自大海深处，一个深海住民被挤到海面上开始服役！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bottom_Watcher: From far below, a dweller of the deeps has been pressed into service at the surface!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Double_Vision: 灼霜龙族的吉祥物能侦查麻烦的头有两个！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Double_Vision: This mascot of the powerful Pyrexae has two heads with which to scout for trouble!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wynchell_the_Wyrmeleon: 这是伪装成强大飞龙的聪明变色龙，还是冒充无名飞龙的著名飞龙？的确，究竟事实如何已经不能分清，也不能自己想当然。尤其是这头温切尔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wynchell_the_Wyr: Is it a clever chameleon pretending to be a powerful Wyrm, or a celebrated Wyrm trying to pass itself off as an anonymous chameleon? Truly, the dimensions have begun to spill into each other, and nothing may be taken for granted. Especially not Wynchell.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Ladder_Grillhound: 炙火烈犬的驯服过程是个充斥着磨练和突破的故事，外加很多烧焦的眉毛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Ladder_Gril: The taming of a grillhound is a tale filled with trials and breakthroughs, and more than a few singed eyebrows.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_Premier_League_Season_4_AD: The Premier League联赛第4赛季管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Premier_Leagu: 观战10支来自欧洲和美国的顶尖战队争夺10 000美元的赛事奖金。购买门票后可以观看由Blaze和Rainmaker解说的100余场比赛，还将获得赛事专属信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Prem: Watch 10 of the best teams from Europe and America contend for a prize of $10,000. This ticket will entitle you to over 100 matches commentated by Blaze & Rainmaker and an exclusive Courier!
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Treasure_Key_of_the_F: Treasure Key of the Forbidden Lotus
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_the_Forbi: 用于解封<font color='#9da1a9'>禁忌红莲的珍藏</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of the Forbidden Lotus</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Bone_Scryer_Set: 这件捆绑包内含死亡先知的“骸骨占卜师”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Bone_Scryer_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Bone Scryer' set for Death Prophet:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Raiment_Set: 包含拉比克的“议员华服”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Raime: Contains all of the items in the 'Councilor's Raiment' set for Rubick:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Arms_of_the_Bramble_L: Arms of the Bramble Lord Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Bramble_Lord: 这件捆绑包内含幻影长矛手的“藤棘领主之铠”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Bram: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Arms of the Bramble Lord' set for Phantom Lancer:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Apocalyptic_Fire_Set: 未被吞噬的焦火之魔带着所有灭世所需的武器。这件捆绑包内含末日使者的”灭世之火“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Apocalyptic_: He that burns and is not consumed carries with him all the armaments of the Apocalypse. This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Apocalyptic Fire' set for Doom:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ceremonial_Carapace_of_Qaldin_: 卡尔丁的祭典壳甲套装
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Carapace_of_Qa: 这件捆绑包内含沙王的“卡尔丁的祭典壳甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ceremonial_Carap: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Ceremonial Carapace of Qaldin' set for Sand King:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Chains_of_the_Summone: Chains of the Summoned Lord Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chains_of_the_Summoned_Lo: 包含“天降魔王链甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chains_of_the_Su: Contains all of the items in the 'Chains of the Summoned Lord' set:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sash_of_the_Third_Insight: 在超然的眼睛中，发现的一切必须再进行估价。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sash_of_the_Thir: In the eyes beyond, all that is found must then be appraised.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Brooch_of_the_Third_Insig: 只要装备得当，所有的思想基本都能解读。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Brooch_of_the_Th: There is little a mind cannot assess provided it is properly equipped.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_the_ThiefScholar: 就像知识都是先经过学习，说话都是先经过思考。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_the_Thie: Just as what is known must be learned, what is spoken must be thought.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Sharpshooters_Stache: 基恩一族中绝大多数都是长着一脸大髭须的人，狙击手也不例外。长出这么一脸胡子他花了将近三天。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Sharpshooter: The Keen Folk are, for the most part, a finely mustachioed people, and Sniper is no exception.  It took him nearly three days to grow out this stache.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Killstealer: 在基恩一族中，武器都是父子相传，KS神枪原来是在狙击手祖父那时铸成的。只是现在他们不那么喜欢铸造武器了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Killstealer: Among the Keen Folk, weapons are passed down from father to son, and the Killstealer was originally cast in Sniper's grandfather's day.  They just don't make 'em like they used to.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Sharpshooters_Pauldro: 这对肩垫能够抵挡敌人的攻击，还有神枪手偶尔长途跋涉后肩膀的酸痛感。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Sharpshooter: These shoulder pads provide protection against both the enemy, and the occasional bruised shoulder of the long-distance shootist.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Sharpshooters_Cloak: 斗篷是旅人们的好朋友。能够抵抗寒意的衣服，同时使人的轮廓有所混淆，这样穿戴者难以成为远距离目标。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Sharpshooter: A cloak is every traveler's friend.  A warm covering for the cold, and it confuses the silhouette, making the wearer a more difficult target at long range.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Slim_Blade_of_the_Tah: Slim Blade of the Tahlin Watch
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Slim_Blade_of_the_Tahlin_: 如果给出的报价是格杀勿论，那多砍几刀也无妨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Slim_Blade_of_th: When death is the price, one can never swing too many blades.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_the_Tahlin_Watch: 塔林守卫军身上最突出的地方是眉毛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_the_Tahl: The crest of the Tahlin Watch sits upon the brow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sigil_of_the_Tahlin_Watch: 加入塔林守卫军必需的才能很少有人具备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sigil_of_the_Tah: Very few display the talent necessary to join the Tahlin Watch.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracer_of_the_Tahlin_Watc: 力丸在逃离家族遭到屠杀的当晚，为了不被人发现，他用皇家守卫军的护甲进行乔装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracer_of_the_Ta: As he fled his family's slaughter, Riki disguised himself with the armor of his royal watch in order to escape undetected.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Royal_Dagger_of_the_T: Royal Dagger of the Tahlin Watch
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Dagger_of_the_Tahli: 这把匕首的年头跟塔林王朝一样，无论是战争还是和平时期都放了不少血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Dagger_of_: As old as the Tahlin Dynasty itself, this dagger has loosed blood in both war and peacetime.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Royal_Dagger_of_the_Tahlin_Wat: 塔林守卫军皇匕 - 副手
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Royal_Dagger_of_the_T: Royal Dagger of the Tahlin Watch - Off-Hand
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Dagger_of_the_Tahli: 这把匕首的年头跟塔林王朝一样，无论是战争还是和平时期都放了不少血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Dagger_of_: As old as the Tahlin Dynasty itself, this dagger has loosed blood in both war and peacetime.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_Kraken_Sla: 这可不只是拿来切蛤肉的。昆卡拿着这把好刀可以劈开海妖外壳。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_K: No mere clam-splitter, this.  Kunkk wields a fine blade of strongest steel, able to pierce Kraken hide.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_Bicorne: 不论是大雨，狂浪还是烈风，只要他戴着这顶贵族双角帽他的头就不会受凉。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_B: Rain, nor waves, nor driving wind can chill Kunkka's head while he's wearing this noble cowl.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_Curtains: 这对宽阔的肩膀已经经过暴风雨的多次洗刷，现在这件衣服能适应各种气候，定能在波涛汹涌的海面上保护好双肩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_C: Many a storm has sluiced down upon these broad shoulders, now protected from the stormy seas by this stylish all-weather gear.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_Puffy_Cuff: 不要误会，昆卡可是以海为生的老水手，绝对不能低估。如果他戴上的护袖很蓬松，这是因为他袖子里藏了东西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_P: Make no mistake, Kunkka is a salty old sailor not to be underestimated.  If he wears puffy cuffs, it's because he has something up his sleeve.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_Facings: 选用针织最为严实的布料织就，这件沉重的胸衬能够抵挡元素魔法和狠毒的剑招。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_F: Woven from the finest, tight-knitted fabrics, this heavy chest-piece protects from both the elements and errant blades.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_Gaiters: 这对采用海盐进行强化的坚固长靴能让人在颠簸的甲板上，或是血流成河的战场上都如履平地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_G: These hardy, salt-toughened boots provide firm footing whether striding a heaving deck, or a blood-soaked battlefield.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_Sash: 用极其稀有的蜘蛛丝制成的腰带，很久以前高歌群岛公主的临终赠物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commodores_S: A Sash of rarest spider silk, the parting gift of a long ago princess from the isle of Songs.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Sharpshooters_Bullet_: 想要快速装填弹药的话，如果能把子弹塞进护腕里那还干嘛还要再带一个放子弹的袋子呢？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Sharpshooter: Why carry your bullets in a bag when you can slot them into your bracers for quick reloading?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Crystalline_C: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含单件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Crys: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_4Players_League: 4Players League（简称4PL）是一项欧洲线上竞技赛事，与其他联赛不同，令人兴奋的著名Play4Dota2联赛将招徕世界各地的队伍参赛。赶快组建你自己的队伍，与其他Dota 2顶尖玩家一较高下，赢得奖金和外设吧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_4Players_League: The 4PL is an European online gaming league that provides, besides many other events, the exciting and well known Play4Dota2 tournaments with teams participating from all over the world. Form your team, win money or hardware prizes and meet or encounter some of the best Dota 2 players.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_4Players_League: 4Players League（简称4PL）是一项欧洲线上竞技赛事，与其他联赛不同，令人兴奋的著名Play4Dota2联赛将招徕世界各地的队伍参赛。赶快组建你自己的队伍，与其他Dota 2顶尖玩家一较高下，赢得奖金和外设吧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_4Players: The 4PL is an European online gaming league and provides, besides many other events, the exciting and well known Play4Dota2 tournaments with teams participating from all over the world. Form your team, win money or hardware prizes and meet or encounter some of the best Dota 2 players.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Royal_Daggers_of_the_: Royal Daggers of the Tahlin Watch
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Daggers_of_the_Tahl: 这把匕首的年头跟塔林王朝一样，无论是战争还是和平时期都放了不少血。这件捆绑包内含力丸的塔林守卫军皇匕主手和副手：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Daggers_of:
As old as the Tahlin Dynasty itself, these daggers have loosed blood in both war and peacetime. 
	
	This bundle contains both the main and off-hand Royal Daggers of the Tahlin Watch for Riki:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Implements_of_the_Tah: Implements of the Tahlin Watch Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Implements_of_the_Tahlin_: 这件捆绑包内含力丸的“塔林守卫军之服”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Implements_of_th: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Implements of the Tahlin Watch' set for Riki:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commendable_Commodore: 昆卡靠着老水手的名言处世：世上没有破天气，只有破衣服。身着这套尊贵华服，昆卡已经准备好面对任何暴风雨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Commendable_: Kunkka lives by the old seaman's yarn: There is no bad weather, only poor clothes.  In this regal finery, Kunkka is ready to face any storm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Third_Insight_Set: 包含圣堂刺客的“第三视界”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Third_Insigh: Contains all of the items in the 'Third Insight' set for Templar Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Sharpshooter_Set: 正如巧妇难为无米之炊，旅人可不能少了他背着的工具。有了这套衣服，狙击手能跋涉过危险的领地，怀着完成任务的信心。包含狙击手的“鹰目枪手”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Sharpshooter: As a craftsman is no better than his tools, a traveler is no better than the kit he carries on his back.  With this gear, Sniper treks through dangerous territory, confident in his ability to get the job done.  Contains all of the items in the 'Sharpshooter' set for Sniper:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horn_Mask: 漂白过的萨特角装在了面具的上面，据说这样允许佩戴者可以引导先祖的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horn_Mask: The bleached satyr horn mounted atop this mask is said to allow the wearer to channel an ancestor's power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Headdress_of_the_Slithere: 自从这件头饰在鱼人族的王宫中亮相已经过去多年，但是没人会将其淡忘。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Headdress_of_the: It has been long since this apparel has been seen in the great halls of the Slithereen, but few have forgotten it.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Tail_Fins_of_the_Slit: Tail Fins of the Slithereen Nobility
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_Fins_of_the_Slithere: 娜迦穿上这高贵的鱼鳍，回忆自己蜿蜒地行进在沉没宫殿巨大台阶时的峥嵘岁月。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_Fins_of_the: Naga dons these noble fins, and recalls the glory days in which they slithered up the grand stairs of the sunken palace.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Feathered_Naginata: 轻盈的长矛，重量匀称，适合快砍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Feathered_Nagina: A light spear, balanced for quick slashes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dress_of_the_Slithereen_N: 设计在宫廷穿着的服饰，娜迦穿着前往战场，表现出自己无畏的勇猛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dress_of_the_Sli: Garb designed for courtly wear, Naga shows her fearless ferocity by wearing it to war.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Maiden_of_the_Slithereen_: “你将死于谁手，少女，还是少妇？”可惜听到这句歌词的人已经是临死前了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Maiden_of_the_Sl: \"Will you die to the Maiden, or to the Mistress?\" Pity whoever hears this final lyric.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mistress_of_the_Slitheree: “少妇在我手，汝命在我手”，随着娜迦的吟唱，她的敌人低下了头，永远抬不起来。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mistress_of_the_: \"My Mistress, your Master,\" sings Naga as her enemies bow, never to rise.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Respirator: 这面具不是为了让毒气进不来，是为了让它们出不去！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Respi: This mask is not meant to keep toxic gasses out, it's meant to keep them in!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_the_Hidden_Tale: 无论他的敌人如何称呼他，无论他的对手向他施放什么咒语，这面沉默之盾都能将其无声地反弹。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_the_Hi: Whatever magic his enemies use, whatever spells his foes may cast in his direction, bounce soundlessly off this shield of silence.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Hidden_Tal: 这对护腕预示着有人不能容忍任何魔法操控！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_H: These bracers bespeak a man who will brook no magical manipulations!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Hidden_Talent: 沉默是金，如同这顶强力头盔的顶点。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Hidd: Silence is golden, as is the point on this mighty helm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the_Hidden_T: 沉寂降临，诺崇需要像这样强力的护肩来承担沉默的重量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the: When a heavy silence falls, Nortrom will need mighty shoulders such as these to bear up under its weight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaive_of_the_Hidden_Tale: 有了这柄三叶的战刃，诺崇能保证沉默永远不被打破。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaive_of_the_Hi: With this three-bladed glaive, Nortrom ensures a silence that will never be broken.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Demon_Hair_of_the_Sec: Demon Hair of the Secret Queen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Cutter: 大多数炼金术的观测者都没能意识到对自己进行防护的重要性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Cutte: Most observers of Alchemy fail to realize the importance of personal defense against most observers of Alchemy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horn_of_the_Hidden_Hive: 每个司夜刺客完成了第三个刺杀任务后就会被授予这大角——这个祭祀之物必须要不断饮血才能保留下来。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horn_of_the_Hidd: Each Nyx Assassin's third kill is marked with the bestowing of this great horn--a ceremonial piece that must be blooded repeatedly if it is to be retained.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claws_of_the_Hidden_Hive: 当新的司夜刺客被定下后，他将被送到隐匿虫巢去确认。这对利爪意味着刺客第一个任务的完成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claws_of_the_Hid: When the new Nyx Assassin is chosen, he is sent to the Hidden Hive for confirmation. These claws connote completion of the Assassin's first assignment.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shell_of_the_Hidden_Hive: 这件祭祀护甲的真正重要之处只有掌管隐匿虫巢，知晓司夜女神计划的才知道。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shell_of_the_Hid: Only those who preside in the Hidden Hive and share in the schemes of the goddess Nyx know the true significance of this ceremonial armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Blades_of_Scie: 当炼金术需要你从一群暴怒的村民中杀出一条血路时，这是最起码的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Blade: When the science of Alchemy requires hacking your way through a mob of angry villagers, accept nothing less.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Experimentalists_Laboratory_Es: 实验家的实验室必备服
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Experimentalists_Laborato: 就因为你身在战场可不能作为不遵守实验室安全守则的借口！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Experimentalists: Just because you're in a battle is no reason not to practice proper lab safety!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Experimentalists_Goggles: 对于平常实验中的腐蚀性试剂，护目镜基本无效。但是有助心神宁静。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Experimentalists: Against the caustic chems involved in the average experiment, they do nothing.  But they're good for peace of mind.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Experimentalists_Unstable: 采用天辉矿石雕刻制成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Experimentalists: Carved and formed from Radiant ore.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Muscle_Pump: 泵外是三重强化外壳，理论上来说管内的东西比在固若金汤的城堡还要安全。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Assistants_Muscl: With its triple reinforced outer shell, it's technically safer inside this pipe than in most castles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arcane_Staff_of_the_Ancie: 在光明本身的睡梦中心打造的法杖，已经托付给光之守卫作为掌握遗迹力量的体现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arcane_Staff_of_: A staff forged in the heart of Light's own dream of itself, it has been entrusted to Light's Keeper as a manifestation of the ancient power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Silent_Ripper: 用来穿过牢房的铁栏，在黑暗中安静地打开闸门再合适不过了。不过可别问他是藏哪的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Silent_Rippe: Perfect for sliding through the bars of a cell, for a silent shiv in the dark. Just don't ask where he hides it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Shattered_Blade_of_Le: 莱文托公爵，微光之城的选侯，在多日抵抗奥斯塔里昂的攻城亡灵军团后他突出重围与不朽之王进行正面对决。这把断剑是那次不幸的挑衅行为唯一剩下的东西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Shattered_Bl: The Duke of Levinthal, Elector of the Gleaming City, withstood Ostarion's besieging undead legions for many days before sallying forth to face the Immortal King in personal combat. This broken blade is the sole legacy of that ill-fated act of defiance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Grampa_Sharpies_Shin_Shoo: 布莱格·夏皮，人称“呼啸面庞”，曾经是诺伦山谷最好的枪手，能够在千米之外把巨魔的脚趾打掉。他把他心爱的长枪留给孙子，希望有朝一日年轻的卡德尔能继续书写钢炮的传奇。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Grampa_Sharpies_: Brag 'Whistlecheeks' Sharpeye was once the finest gun in all the Knollen, able to knock the toes off a troll at one thousand feet. He left his favorite gun to his grandson in the hopes that one day young Kardel would continue to build its legend.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gramma_Sharpies_Smokin_Ru: 夏皮奶奶一生从未碰过来复枪，但她卷得一手好雪茄，整得一手好弹匣。每过五天，晚上做完家务的夏皮奶奶会坐在炉火旁，吸着雪茄，晃着椅子，为全家的打猎活动准备足够的弹药。狙击手披上她最爱的烟熏毯，作为那些开心往事的纪念。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gramma_Sharpies_: Gramma Sharpeye never touched a rifle in her life, but she rolled a fine cigar and packed a solid cartridge. Every fifth eve, after chores were done gramma would sit by the fire and puff her cigar and rock her chair and pack enough cartridges to serve the entire family's shooting. Wear her favorite smokin' rug on your back as a memento of those happy days.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ragestone_Axe: 对于怒石的纹理，从事石料和采矿的基恩族和人类了如指掌。众所周知，石材的奇特魔法效果能使人类和野兽陷入血红外表的疯狂状态，作出不受控制的可怕举动。斧王不明白这有什么问题。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ragestone_Axe: Veins of ragestone are well known to the keen and humans who have taken up masonry or mining. The material's strange magical influence has been known to drive men and beasts into bloody fits of madness and horrible acts of uncontrolled violence. Axe doesn't see what the problem is.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gloried_Horn_of_Druud: 在部落成立大会上灰蹄长老施下咒语，只要一吹巨角就能召唤杜鲁德的强大族群。战行者布拉德瓦登，也是杜鲁德部落的先锋，由他守护巨角，在约定之日，他将召唤他的兄弟姐妹进行毁天灭地的终极大战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gloried_Horn_of_: Encorselled by Elder Greyhoofs at the Clanfounding, a single note from this horn can call forth the great hordes of Druud to do battle at the end of all times. Bradwarden the Warrunner and vanguard of the Druud clans protects the horn and will, at the appointed hour, summon his brothers and sisters to make a final apocalyptic war.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Big_Bad_Bandana: 狂风只能让部分头发迎风飘扬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Big_Bad_Bandana: The wind can only keep so much hair back.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Headdress_of_the_Father_S: 制作头巾采用的羽毛来自于紫罗兰尖枭，它在飞行时翅膀能划入虚无之境，而身子还在这个世界的光耀下翱翔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Headdress_of_the: Fashioned from the feathers of the violet shryll, a bird that flies with its wingtips trailing through the Nothl realm, while the rest of its body sails in the light of this world.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Great_Pipe_of_the_Fat: Great Pipe of the Father Spirits
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Great_Pipe_of_the_Father_: 达到虚无之境有很多方法，其中包括受到大烟斗的击打。有些人经过击打可能存活率会较低。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Great_Pipe_of_th: There are many ways to reach the Nothl realm, several of which involve hits from the Great Pipe. Some hits are less survivable than others.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fetish_of_the_Father_Spir: 说到耀眼的神物时，要数先父的英魂最清楚了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fetish_of_the_Fa: When it comes to dazzling fetishes, the Father Spirit knows best.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Ritual_Skirt_of_the_F: Ritual Skirt of the Father Spirits
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ritual_Skirt_of_the_Fathe: 戴泽在他的祭祀之裙下面会穿什么？那要看是什么祭祀了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ritual_Skirt_of_: What does Dazzle wear under his ritual skirt? That depends upon the ritual.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rough_Riders_Tools: 驯服荒狱丛林的野兽需要的可不止一条绳子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rough_Riders_Too: It'll take more than a rope to tame the wilds of Yama Raskav.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rough_Riders_Slipshod_Sli: 如果雨季到来你会很高兴有这个。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rough_Riders_Sli: You'll be glad you have this when the rainy season comes around.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rough_Riders_Muggin_Mask: 只要在荒狱丛林短暂停留就会把匪徒招来。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rough_Riders_Mug: A few dips into the wilds of Yama Raskav will bring out the brigand in anyone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bertha_the_Mordebat: 对待人类她要么异常亲切，要么异常凶恶。如果你想保住自己的脑袋最好别跟这个美人作对。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bertha_the_Morde: A little sweeter to some, a little meaner to the rest, you'd best be on this beauty's good side if you aim to keep your head.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Carapace: 如果造物的能量变得热烈又柔韧的话，斯吉茨格尔的壳甲会有相同的反应，提醒他是时候开始编织了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Car: When the energies of creation are hot and malleable, Skitskurr's carapace responds in kind, alerting him that it is time to start weaving.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Striders: 沿着时间线仔细爬行，两对后足打造得十分精准。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Str: Creep carefully along the threads of time, with these precision crafted striders.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Manipulators: 每当到了重新编织现实之纱时，斯吉茨格尔就会戴上他那精巧的前足。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Man: When it is time to reweave the stuff of reality, Skitskurr dons his finest manipulators.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Antennae: 斯吉茨格尔经过协调能够感觉到创世之纱的微小缺口。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Ant: Skitskurr senses are finely tuned to the slightest disruption of the fabric of creation.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_Crystalli: 用于解封<font color='#9da1a9'>晶化混沌的珍藏</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Chests of Crystalline Chaos</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Tortures_of_the_Secre: Tortures of the Secret Queen Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tortures_of_the_Secret_Qu: 这件捆绑包内含痛苦女王的“隐秘女王的酷刑”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tortures_of_the_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Tortures of the Secret Queen' set for Queen of Pain:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Hidden_Talent_Set: 沉默术士证明了魔法的缺陷正好成为了世上最强大的魔法。这件捆绑包内含沉默术士的“无形天才”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Hidden_Talen: Silencer proves that a lack of magic can be the greatest magic of all.  This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Grand Inquisitor' set for Silencer:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Carapace_of_the_Hidde: Carapace of the Hidden Hive Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Carapace_of_the_Hidden_Hi: 这件捆绑包内含司夜刺客的“隐匿虫巢壳甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Carapace_of_the_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Carapace of the Hidden Hive' set for Nyx Assassin:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Designs_of_the_Slithe: Designs of the Slithereen Nobility Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Designs_of_the_Slithereen: 这件捆绑包内含娜迦海妖的“高贵鱼人之服”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Designs_of_the_S: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Designs of the Slithereen Nobility' set for Naga Siren:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Alchemy_Essentials_Set: 包含炼金术士的“炼金术必备”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Alchemy_Essentia: Contains all of the items in the 'Alchemy Essentials' set for Alchemist:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Carapace_Set: 这件捆绑包内含编织者的“焊烬壳甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ember_Tipped_Car: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Ember Tipped Carapace' set for Weaver:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_Rough_Rider_of_Yama_Raskav: 荒狱丛林的不羁骑士套装
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_The_Rough_Rider_of_Ya: The Rough Rider of Yama Raskav Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Rough_Rider_of_Yama_R: 这件捆绑包内含蝙蝠骑士的“荒狱丛林的不羁骑士”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Rough_Rider_: This bundle includes all of the items in the 'Rough Rider of Yama Raskav' set for Batrider:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Ritual_Garb_of_the_Fa: Ritual Garb of the Father Spirits Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ritual_Garb_of_the_Father: 这件捆绑包内含戴泽的“先父英魂的祭祀之服”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ritual_Garb_of_t: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Ritual Garb of the Father Spirits' set for Dazzle:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Set_Ritual_Garb_of_the_Fat: Ritual Garb of the Father Spirits
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Set_The_Rough_Rider_of_Yam: The Rough Rider of Yama Raskav
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Set_Designs_of_the_Slither: Designs of the Slithereen Nobility Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fiery_Soul_of_the_Slayer: 常言道，莉娜红发，燎火之煞。但是真相如何鲜为人知。在莉娜正值妙龄时，她的天赋开始崭露头角，炽烈的燃发显示了体内的火力即将迸发。随着时间的流逝和刻苦的训练，她对火焰的掌控足以压制这焦灼的景象。不过当她有时火气飙升，瞋目动怒时，莉娜体内燃烧的灵魂可能会全面释放它的怒火。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fiery_Soul_of_th: It has often been said that Lina's hair was touched by fire, though few know the truth of this claim.  In Lina's youth, as her natural talents first began to smoke and smolder it was her fiery hair that told the tale of the storm to come.  With time and training, her skill and control of the flame was enough to suppress the searing display.  Yet on occasion, when her ire grows and tempers flare, the full measure of Lina's burning spirit threatens to unleash its wrath.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Yasha_the_Quickblade: 夜叉，传奇的血月双刃之一，据说能根据拥有者选择的武艺变换形态。在力丸的手中这把武器变成了短小匀称的匕首。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Yasha_the_Quickb: Yasha, one of two legendary moonblades, is said to take on a form that best matches its owner's chosen martial art. In the hands of Riki this weapon takes the blade of a small, well balanced dagger.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sange_the_Backseeker: 散华，传奇的血月双刃之一，相传拥有不寻常的准确度，可以迎合拥有者的作战方式改变自己的形态。在力丸的手中，武器变成了短小的匕首。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sange_the_Backse: Sange, one of the two legendary moonblades, is said to be unnaturally accurate and able to change to a form that best fits the fighting style of its owner. In the hands of Riki the weapon becomes a small dagger.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Mask: 有了附魔的第三只眼，拉比克在闪电介入魔法师之间混乱的纷争时获益良多。至少他是这么声称的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Mask: Rubick's foray into the often confused politics of magicians is greatly aided by this enchanted third eye. At least, that's what he claims.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_Distant_Sands: 据说东部荒原的热度非同小可。每个人都必须遮得严严实实。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_Distant_: The heat of the eastern wastes is said to be extraordinary.  One must cover themselves appropriately.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_Distant_Sands: 隐藏在火辣辣的艳阳下绝非易事。这需要计划，运气以及合适颜色的护甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_Distant: To hide in the burning bright sun is no easy task.  It requires planning, luck, and the right color armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shuriken_of_Distant_Sands: 那些崇拜东部荒原炎阳女神的人以打造金器闻名。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shuriken_of_Dist: Those who worship the Solar Goddess of the eastern wastes are known for the skill forging gold.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Long_Blade_of_Distant_San: 东部荒原的工匠凭借将黄金的美感融入打磨锋利的实用武器闻名于世。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Long_Blade_of_Di: The artisans of the eastern wastes are known for their ability to wrap golden beauty within sharpened practicality.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Short_Blade_of_Distant_Sa: 很少有刺客胆敢在战斗中使用锻造如此精良的兵器，不过对于技艺精湛之辈，这把刀除了胜任所有任务外还能提供平衡和疾速。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Short_Blade_of_D: Few assassins would dare use with such a finely wrought implement in combat, yet to the skilled this blade offers balance and sharpness more than equal to any task.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Quiver: 由最好的岚隐兽兽皮制成，这个插满羽箭的平挂箭袋已经严阵以待！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Quiv: Made of finest rumble-hide, this low-hanging quiver of feathery arrows is ready for action!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Spaulders: 设计的目的是伪装她的轮廓，迷惑攻击的敌人，这对由鹰身女妖的坚硬羽毛制成的护肩提供对旋刃的防护。这肯定能提高回头率。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Spau: Designed to camouflage her outline and confuse attackers, these shoulders of tough harpy feathers offer protection against whirling blades.  This is sure to turn some heads.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Locks: 用羽毛做的头巾把头发扎起来，不会挡住视线，还能摆出一副活泼自在的样子，仿佛在说“我就是要射到你的脸上”。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Lock: Hair tied up and out of the way, she tops it off with a feathery headscarf for a breezy, carefree, I-just-shot-you-in-the-face look.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Cloak: 踏上打猎的旅程只需要穿上活泼的斗篷就会很漂亮。尤其是猎物可能反过来追你的时候。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Cloa: A breezy, flowing cloak is just what one needs to look good on a hunting trip.  Particularly if your prey might be hunting you right back.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Bow: 一把多彩的弓，上面饰有鹰身女妖的坚硬羽毛，正是像莱瑞蕾这样的活泼少女达到杀人如麻所需要的！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Bow: A colorful bow adorned with tough harpy feathers is just what a feisty girl like Lyralei needs for fabulous mega-kills!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_Inscrutable_Zeal: 在调查被黑暗笼罩的荒野时，为了不被发现，需要一件适合隐秘行事的服饰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_Inscrut: To have a hope of examining the darkened wilds undetected requires clothing fit for subtlety.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_Inscrutable_Zeal: 虽然不像决斗面具应有的那般坚固，但这个面具经过调整，更利于吟唱咒语。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_Inscruta: While not as sturdy as a proper dueling mask, this covering is better tuned to project words of power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Oculus_Ephemeral: 无论是引导神秘古怪的魔力，还是可怕奇异的魔力，一般都需要不可思议的笨重工具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Oculus_Ephem: Channeling the arcane and odd, the fearsome and strange, often requires implements both unexpected and unwieldy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_Inscrutable_Zeal: 法杖上的螺旋能使施法者对法杖施放能量的过程进行渲染。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_Inscrut: The coil along the staff allows the caster to embellish the course of whatever energies it may release.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_Twisted_Wisdom: 这对扭曲的双角下孕育的是扭曲的神智。神智流露出的是被扭曲的意图。遇上拉席克的则将是被扭曲的命运。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_Twisted: Twisted is the mind that broods beneath these twisted horns. Twisted are the intentions that issue from that mind. Twisted is the fate of those who encounter Leshrac.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_Twisted_Wisdom: 谣传拉席克曾经失去了他的尾巴，他经过多番搜寻，绝望万分，后来装上了人造的尾巴。也许这是他的智慧打上冷酷烙印的源头。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_Twisted_: Rumors have it that Leshrac once lost his tail, and after much searching and despair, an artificial appendage was attached. Perhaps this was the source of his bleak brand of wisdom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_Twisted_Wisdom: 有时顿悟也非常痛苦，会从体内向外迸发，穿过血肉，痛彻心扉的顿悟就这样充斥了身心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_Twisted: Some insights are so painful that they burst out from within, piercing flesh, filling body and mind alike with agonizing insight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vines_of_Twisted_Wisdom: 人们说，智慧的增长离不开耀眼的阳光，新鲜的空气和纯净的用水。但是有种扭曲的智慧，就像这些藤蔓一样，滋生于极度的痛苦，邪恶的念头和不光彩的举动。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vines_of_Twisted: They say that wisdom grows not without bright light, fresh air, clean water. But a twisted sort of wisdom, like these vines, may feed and thrive on anguish, black thoughts, and foul deeds.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_Dota_2__2013: 技嘉E-Sports锦标赛由Gigabyte赞助，DotaTalk主办。八支来自东南亚的参赛队伍一决胜负后获胜队伍将赢取1500美元的现金大奖。获胜战队将与中国的顶尖战队同台竞技，再赢取1500美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_Dota_2__201: The Gigabyte E-Sports Tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winners of 8 GMPGL qualifiers from South-East Asia will compete against one another for another cash prize of $1500. The winners will compete against the Top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_GEST_Dota_2__FebMarch_ADMIN: GEST Dota 2 - 二三双月赛管理员
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_GEST_Dota_2__FebMarch: GEST Dota 2 - Feb and March ADMIN
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_Dota_2__2013: 技嘉E-Sports锦标赛由Gigabyte赞助，DotaTalk主办。八支来自东南亚的参赛队伍一决胜负后获胜队伍将赢取1500美元的现金大奖。获胜战队将与中国的顶尖战队同台竞技，再赢取1500美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_Dot: The Gigabyte E-Sports Tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winners of 8 GMPGL qualifiers from South-East Asia will compete against one another for another cash prize of $1500. The winners will have the privilege to compete against the Top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armaggeddon_Dota_2_Grand_: 亚洲顶尖Dota 2战队之间的对决已经上演！观看战队精彩激烈的比赛，且看最后是谁赢得大企业的赞助机会。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armaggeddon_Dota: The battle between the best Dota 2 teams in Asia is on! Watch as they game fiercely to win a chance to be sponsored by the big names in corporate alliance!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Armageddon_Dota_2_Grand_Slam__: Armageddon Dota 2 Grand Slam! - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Armageddon_Dota_2: 亚洲顶尖Dota 2战队之间的对决已经上演！观看战队精彩激烈的比赛，且看最后是谁赢得大企业的赞助机会。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Armagedd: The battle between the best Dota 2 teams in Asia is on! Watch as they game fiercely to win a chance to be sponsored by the big names in corporate alliance!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WePlay_Dota_2: WePlay.TV隆重推出WePlay Dota 2联赛，比赛由罗技，西部数据和Inno3D联合赞助。自3月起，32支西方顶尖队伍将在线上争夺价值总计20,000美元的奖金和外设奖励，比赛由Beyond the Summit和WePlay.TV进行专业解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WePlay_Dota_2: WePlay.TV proudly presents the WePlay Dota 2 League, brought to you by Logitech, Western Digital, and Inno3D! Beginning this March, thirty-two of Western Dota's best will duke it out online for $20,000 in cash & gear prizes with professional commentary from Beyond the Summit and WePlay.TV.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WePlay_Dota_2: WePlay.TV隆重推出WePlay Dota 2联赛，比赛由罗技，西部数据和Inno3D联合赞助。自3月起，32支西方顶尖队伍将在线上争夺价值总计20,000美元的奖金和外设奖励，比赛由Beyond the Summit和WePlay.TV进行专业解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WePlay_D: WePlay.TV proudly presents the WePlay Dota 2 League, brought to you by Logitech, Western Digital, and Inno3D! Beginning this March, thirty-two of Western Dota's best will duke it out online for $20,000 in cash & gear prizes with professional commentary from Beyond the Summit and WePlay.TV.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota2_Invitatio: Dreamhack Dota2邀请赛将有8支欧洲一流战队参赛，在线上争夺6,000美元的奖金和参加DreamHack夏季Dota 2大赛的机会。每周将有5场赛事，比赛由GD Studio制作，Draskyl，2GD，Wagamama，Weppas和Bruno担当解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Dota2_: DreamHack Dota2 Invitational Features 8 of the top European teams, battling online for $6000 and the opportunity to qualify to DreamHack Summer Dota 2 Cup. 5 action packed weeks of content, produced by The GD Studio, with commentary by Draskyl, 2GD, Wagamama, Weppas and Bruno.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_DreamHack_Dota2_Invitational__: DreamHack Dota2邀请赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_DreamHack_Dota2_I: Dreamhack Dota2邀请赛将有8支欧洲一流战队参赛，在线上争夺6,000美元的奖金和参加DreamHack夏季Dota 2大赛的机会。每周将有5场赛事，比赛由GD Studio制作，Draskyl，2GD，Wagamama，Weppas和Bruno担当解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_DreamHac: DreamHack Dota2 Invitational Features 8 of the top European teams, battling online for $6000 and the opportunity to qualify to DreamHack Summer Dota 2 Cup. 5 action packed weeks of content, produced by The GD Studio, with commentary by Draskyl, 2GD, Wagamama, Weppas and Bruno.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rikis_Sange_and_Yasha: 这件捆绑包内含血月双刃，散华和夜叉，使用英雄是隐形刺客力丸。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rikis_Sange_and_: This bundle contains the two moonblades, Sange and Yasha, for the stealth assassin Riki.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Complete_Raime: 这件捆绑包内含拉比克的“议员华服”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Councilors_Compl: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Councilor's Raiment' set for Rubick:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Twisted_Wisdom_Set: 这件捆绑包内含拉席克的“扭曲睿智”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Twisted_Wisdom_S: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Twisted Wisdom' set for Leshrac:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Inscrutable_Zeal_Set: 这件捆绑包内含拉比克的“莫测热忱”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Inscrutable_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Inscrutable Zeal' set for Rubick:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hunter_in_Distant_Sands_S: 这件捆绑包内含赏金猎人的”悠远金沙猎人“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hunter_in_Distan: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Hunter in Distant Sands' set for Bounty Hunter:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Set: 箭以羽聚。选取坚硬富有弹性的鹰身女妖羽毛打造，这套羽落游侠能将风行者的外形提升一个档次。这件捆绑包内含风行者的“羽落游侠”套装内所有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherfall_Set: Arrows of a feather flock together. Constructed from strong and resilient harpy feathers, this set of Featherfall is a fine upgrade to Windranger's look.  This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Featherfall' set for Windranger.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Pride_Set: 这件捆绑包内含幻影长矛手的“先祖英魂之傲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Pride_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Ancestors' Pride' set for Phantom Lancer:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dead_Winter_Set: 包含巫妖的“寒冬死神”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dead_Winter_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Dead Winter' set for Lich:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Set: 内含狼人的“血红圆月”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Se: Includes all of the items in the 'Sanguine Moon' set for Lycanthrope:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Weight_of_Omexe_Set: 只有一个半人马有胆量承担这套强力套装的重量。内含半人马战行者的“欧梅克斯重甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Weight_of_Omexe_: Only a centaur could dare shoulder the weight of this mighty item set.  Includes all of the items in the 'Weight of Omexe' set for Centaur Warrunner:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_GEST_Dota_2__Feb_and_March_ADM: GEST Dota 2 - 二三双月赛管理员
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_GEST_Dota_2__Feb_and_: GEST Dota 2 - Feb and March ADMIN
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_Omexe: 这件铠甲比你还要重。看好了，布拉德瓦登的力量会让你惊呼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_Omexe: This armor weighs more than you do.  Behold, and marvel at the strength of Bradwarden.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Omexe: 有人问，为什么半人马需要腰带？提问的基本都死了。真是不幸。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Omexe: Some ask, why does a centaur need a belt?  Those people usually die.  Badly.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_Sleek: 有了这对欧梅克斯坚固护腕的保护，强壮的半人马不需要盾牌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_Sleek: The mighty centaur needs no shield when protected by these durable bracers of Omexe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flail_Sleek: 众多性命在这把强大的连枷上完结。众多头颅在这把强大的连枷上迸裂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flail_Sleek: Many lives has this mighty flail ended.  Many skulls has this mighty flail pulped.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helmet_of_Omexe: 什么时候头盔能兼具武器和护甲的功能？当它位于布拉德瓦登有力的头上。另外，当它上面有尖刺的时候。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helmet_of_Omexe: When is a helmet both weapon and armor?  When it rests on the mighty head of Bradwarden.  Also, when it has spikes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spine_of_Omexe: 由十多个倒下的格斗士身上的盾牌熔铸而来，这件盔甲是他坚实的后盾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spine_of_Omexe: Forged from the melted shields of a dozen fallen gladiators, this armor has the centaur's back.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_Sleek: 半人马用他有力的尾巴嬉戏般的拂动，表示同意。用他的连枷则表示反对。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_Sleek: With a playful flick of his mighty tail, a centaur registers approval.  With his flail, disapproval.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deadwinter_Arms: 经年激荡于体内深处的寒霜终于氤氲而出，仿佛有自主生命一般要夺取这副躯体。为了对抗体内危险异世能量向其伸出的寒冰之爪，艾斯瑞恩给双臂之上的布料设下魔咒，作为最后一道防线。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deadwinter_Arms: After years of the frost stirring deep inside him it began to creep out, seeking to claim him as if it had a life of its own. Enchanted cloth on his arms are a last line of defense against the icy claws reaching towards Ethreain by the dangerous, otherworldly power within.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deadwinter_Neck: 登上新的王位开始对冰霜的统治意味着需要得体的衣着——艾斯瑞恩复原了生前破烂的披风，并向其注入了附着冰霜的暗黑亡灵之息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deadwinter_Neck: His ascension to a new throne and reign of ice deserved fitting attire - Ethreain reclaimed his tattered cloak from the previous life and imbued it with a darkened frost-bound undead aura.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deadwinter_Belt: 想要掌控魔法就要付出应有的代价。艾斯瑞恩用寒冰裹住双脚，积聚碎冰作为护盾来磨砺他的技艺，增长自己的力量。他的腰带有助于抵消内心的寒气，使他不会遭到反噬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deadwinter_Belt: Mastery of certain magics come with a price. As Ethreain honed his skill and grew stronger he encased his legs in ice and gathered shards to shield him. His sash helps to balance the frost within so that it does not consume him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deadwinter_Back: 随着时间的推移，冰霜的魔力在艾斯瑞恩体内孕育了强大的力量。那股力量开始滋长孽生，最终成长完全，以浓厚冰晶的形态在他背部显露。现在成长还在继续，看样子是要将他包围。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deadwinter_Back: Over time, the frost magic had birthed a powerful force within Ethreain. It began to florish and bloom, eventually maturing enough to manifest physically in the form of a dense crystal in his back. It continues to grow steadily and appears to reach, seeking to embrace the mage himself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Armor: 以眼还眼的风格最后会让所有英雄都是瞎子。但是狼人除外，因为他确实很肯定不会让另一只眼也瞎掉。这点你可以确定。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Ar: An eye for an eye makes leaves all the heroes blind.  Except for Lycan, because he's darn sure not going to lose his second eye.  You can be sure of that.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Belt: 有人对使用头颅做皮带扣这种时尚观念表示质疑。上一个提出质疑的人变成了第二个皮带扣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Be: Some have questioned the fashion sense of using a skull for a belt buckle.  The last guy who questioned it became a second belt buckle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Head: 这不是眼罩。这是保护视力用的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_He: That's not an eye-patch.  That's armor for his vision.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Shoulder: 对于某些英雄来说，护肩不是用来给敌人开膛破肚的武器。狼人不是他们中的一员。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Sh: For some heroes, a shoulder isn't a deadly weapon capable of eviscerating enemies.  Lycan isn't one of those heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sanguine_Moon_Weapons: 即使是双臂也是全副武装。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Belt: 极地村庄的人们见到这样的祭祀服装意味着庆典和纪念。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Belt: Among the people of the village of Pole, seeing such ceremonial garb is cause for both celebration and remembrance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Edge: 极地村庄刚成立的时候，这柄长矛就被淳朴的定居者拿来抵抗想要吞噬他们的夜行怪物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Edge: In the founding days of the village of Pole, little but this lance stood between the simple settlers and the nightly terrors that sought to usurp them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Pauldron: 对于所有极地村庄的村民来说，所有人都必须对贡献生命让他们维持生计的生物报以崇敬之意。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Pauldr: To the villagers of Pole, all must honor the creatures that surrender their lives as sustenance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Vambrace: 护腕上的饰物是枭兽的羽毛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Vambra: The cuff is adorned with Wildwing feathers.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Armor_of_the_Sanguine: Armor of the Sanguine Moon Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Sanguine_Moo: 凭借血红圆月夺目的光芒，这些物品将狼人变成终极杀戮野兽。包含狼人的“血红圆月”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_San: By the blinding light of the blood moon, these items transform Lycan into the ultimate killing beast.  Includes all of the items in the 'Sanguine Moon' set for Lycan:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bindings_of_Enduring_Torm: 这件捆绑包内含痛苦女王的“永久酷刑之缚”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bindings_of_Endu: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Bindings of Enduring Torment' set for Queen of Pain:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Empowered_Vestments_o: Empowered Vestments of the Gods Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered_Vestments_of_th: 穿着这身套装，光之守卫策马离开原初协律。此套装包含光之守卫的“神赋法袍”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered_Vestme: With these vestments, Keeper of the Light rides forth from the Primordial harmony.  This set contains all of the items in the 'Empowered Vestments of the Gods' set for Keeper of the Light:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Heavy_Armor_of_the_Wo: Heavy Armor of the World Runner Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Armor_of_the_World_: 这件捆绑包内含“世行者的重型铠甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Armor_of_t: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Heavy Armor of the World Runner' set:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowl_Servant_of_Selemene: 出生后惨遭遗弃，雪枭在一个寒冷漆黑的夜晚被米拉娜从饿死的边缘救了回来。在她的照料下小命回来了，这个勇敢的小东西克服了自己短小的翅膀学会了飞翔。米拉娜也为她这毛茸茸的朋友感到骄傲，她还教会他如何隐秘行事，授予他小小的箭袋。雪枭在林间悄无声息地穿行，跟随米拉娜进入最残酷的战场，让她的箭矢不会短缺。对于这种近乎玩命的生活，他非常享受。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowl_Servant_of: Rejected at birth, Snowl was rescued by Mirana at the brink of starvation on a dark, cold night. After defying death and surviving under her care, this brave little creature learned to fly in spite of his stubby wings. Proud of her fluffy friend, Mirana offered lessons in stealth and bestowed upon him a tiny quiver. Travelling unnoticed between the trees, Snowl follows Mirana into the fiercest of battles, refreshing her supply of arrows and enjoying life as only those who have nearly lost it are capable.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_bristelback_weapo: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_bristelb: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_bristelback_back: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_bristelb: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_bristelback_brace: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_bristelb: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_bristelback_head: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_bristelb: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Champions_League_Seaso: 第5届G-1冠军联赛将举办线上资格赛，决出顶尖的西方队伍并提供往返机票参加在中国举办的线下赛，与iG，LGD，DK，Orange等战队一决高下。亚洲队伍也将通过预赛争夺线下赛的一席之地。比赛的总奖金将超过53 000美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Champions_Lea: The 5th G-1 Championship will feature an online qualifier to select the top Western team for a paid flight to the LAN finals in China to face teams like iG, LGD, DK and Orange. The Asia qualifiers will also use a prelim system to compete for spots at the LAN finals. The prize pool exceeds $53,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_G1_Champions_Leag: 第5届G-1冠军联赛将举办线上资格赛，决出顶尖的西方队伍并提供往返机票参加在中国举办的线下赛，与iG，LGD，DK，Orange等战队一决高下。亚洲队伍也将通过预赛争夺线下赛的一席之地。比赛的总奖金将超过53 000美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_G1_Champ: The Fifth Season of the G-1 Championship league will feature an online qualifier to select the top Western team for a paid flight to the LAN finals in China to face teams like iG, LGD, DK and Orange. The Asia qualifiers will also use a prelim system to compete for spots at the LAN finals. The prize pool will exceed last season $53,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bonus_Gift: 你碉堡了，有礼品相赠！快打开接收奖品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bonus_Gift: A gift for being awesome! Open it up to receive a prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Rarities: 您需要一个<font color='#9da1a9'>符印</font>才能将珍藏解封。您可以前往刀塔商城购买。每个珍藏系列的掉落物品均不相同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Rari: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Cursed_Wo: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含单件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Vindicator: 诽谤斧王处境将非常危险。他的辩护会要了你的命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Vindicator: To wrong Axe is dangerous.  To suffer his vindication is deadly.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered_Barding_of_the_: 战马怎能缺少壮丽的铠甲？这璀璨的盔甲在任何战场上都代表着无与伦比。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered_Bardin: What is a warhorse without a little pomp and barding?  These golden coverings are a mark of distinction on any field of battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered_Hood_of_the_God: 戴在干瘪头颅上的头巾，能防范阴暗的想法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered_Hood_o: A hood to cover a wizened head and keep dark thoughts away.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered_Skirt_of_the_Go: 如同最热的超新星散发的光芒一般洁白无瑕，像皇家金币一样璀璨，这是真正能与基本法则相称的服饰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered_Skirt_: White as the light of the hottest supernova, and gold as any royal coin, this is a vestment truly worthy of a Fundamental.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered_Staff_of_the_Go: 手持这把天辉法杖，光之守卫闪耀着无穷恒星的光热。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered_Staff_: With this radiant staff Keeper of the Light has sparked the heat of endless suns.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Roehrin_the_Pale_Stallion: 他座下是一骑白马，他是无尽千阳之辉，他就是光之守卫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Roehrin_the_Pale: On a pale horse he rides, this spark of endless suns, this Keeper of the Light.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chain_of_Enduring_Torment: 可能她被铁链系住了，但是控制权还是在她手里。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chain_of_Endurin: She may be chained, but she is still in control.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tiara_of_Enduring_Torment: 施舍伤财很痛苦，劫富济己才是福
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tiara_of_Endurin: To give riches is torture.  To take riches is bliss.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Torment_Unbound: 她的秀发如瀑，说明你的女王在工作中十分放松。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Torment_Unbound: Her hair down, your queen is relaxed in her work.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Heavy_Belt_of_the_Wor: Heavy Belt of the World Runner
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Belt_of_the_World_R: 如果我们的世界只是巴拉森真正世界的影子，那么这腰带可能只是裂魂人真正腰带的影子。但是这影子实在是！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Belt_of_th: If our world is but a shadow of Barathrum's real world, then this belt may be but a shadow of Spirit Breaker's real belt. But oh what a shadow!
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Heavy_Gauntlets_of_th: Heavy Gauntlets of the World Runner
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Gauntlets_of_the_Wo: 当窥视位面之间的裂隙时，裂魂人从这对强大的手套上汲取能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Gauntlets_: When prying wide the rifts between the planes, Spirit Breaker draws power from these mighty gauntlets.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Heavy_Helm_of_the_Wor: Heavy Helm of the World Runner
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Helm_of_the_World_R: 巴拉森头上的大角将给予敌人重创。可要用这顶重型头盔保护好了！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Helm_of_th: Barathrum's mighty head is his battering ram. Protect it well with this heavy helm!
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Heavy_Pauldrons_of_th: Heavy Pauldrons of the World Runner
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Pauldrons_of_the_Wo: 在位面间穿行时肉体形态上会产生很奇特的摩擦，将留下深深的伤痕。这对肩铠将保护裂魂人不受到严重的伤害。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Pauldrons_: A strange friction is generated on the physical forms of those who slide between the worlds, deeply scarring and cutting into their form. These pauldrons guard Spirit Breaker from the worst of the damage.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Set_Heavy_Armor_of_the_Wor: Heavy Armor of the World Runner
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Custom_of_Karroch_Set: 这件捆绑包内含兽王的“卡洛克风俗”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Custom_of_Karroc: This bundle includes all of the items in the 'Custom of Karroch' set for Beastmaster:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eldritch_Ice_Set: 这件捆绑包内含巫妖的“寒冰巫邪”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eldritch_Ice_Set: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Eldritch Ice' set for Lich:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Drunken_Warlord_Set: 这件物品套装由古老的奥尤社所认可。包含酒仙的“醉酒战将”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Drunken_Warl: This item set was sanctioned by the Ancient Order of the Oyo.  Contains all of the items in the 'Drunken Warlord' set for Brewmaster:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ephemeral_Haunt_Set: 这件捆绑包内含幽鬼的“瞬息鬼影”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ephemeral_Ha: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Ephemeral Haunt' set for Spectre:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Subtle_Demons_Blades: 这件捆绑白内含力丸的隐秘恶魔双刃
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Subtle_Demons_Bl: This bundle contains both of the Subtle Demon's Blades for Riki
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Subtle_Demon_Set: 包含力丸的“隐秘恶魔”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Subtle_Demon_Set: Includes all of the items in the \"Subtle Demon\" set for Riki:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Thousand_Faces_Set: 包含主宰的“千面战神”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Thousand_Faces_S: Includes all of the items in the \"Thousand Faces\" set for Juggernaut:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Captain_Bamboo: 不只是头熊猫，他还是队长！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Captain_Bamboo: Not just a Panda, He's a Captain!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Inky_the_Hexapus: 基王海盗是在绝望角一带的海域捕获，被劫掠的海盗舰队征用，往返船只之间传递信息。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Inky_the_Hexapus: Inky the hexapus was fished from the waters of the Horn of Despair and pressed into service by a fleet of marauding pirates, carrying messages to and fro between ships.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snelfret_the_Snail: 史无前例的叛逆蜗牛，蜗如风拒绝遵循懒散的社会风气，成天叫他行事一定要慢。所以他背上蜗壳，往更加活跃的地方前进，他决心要重新定义蜗牛的步伐。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snelfret_the_Sna: The original rebel snail, Snelfret refused to conform to a social order that enforced lethargy, a world that told him he must not move too fast. So he loaded up his shell and headed for more dynamic climes, determined to redefine the meaning of snail's pace.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowl: 在月之女神的恩泽下，多种森林动物投身为她服务。这只小小的雪枭总是很机灵，身手十分矫健，他将奉献一切去帮助银夜森林的卫士们。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Snowl: The Goddess of the Moon presses many forest creatures into her service.  Always crafty, ever vigilant, little Snowl would give his all to aid the guardians of the Nightsilver.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful_Wings: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful_Skirt: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful_Bracers: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful_Shoulder: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful_Hair: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful_Weapon: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Vengeful: This new item has no description.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Treasure_Key_of_the_C: Treasure Key of the Cursed Wood
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_the_Curse: 用于解封<font color='#9da1a9'>天谴之木的珍藏</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Chests of the Cursed Wood</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Treasure_Key_of_the_Shaper_Div: 圣物塑造者的宝箱钥匙
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Treasure_Key_of_the_S: Treasure Key of the Shaper Divine
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_the_Shape: 用于解封<font color='#9da1a9'>圣物塑造者的珍藏</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Chests of the Shaper Divine</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Pro_League_2nd_ed: 16支参赛战队，其中8支来自直接邀请，8支来自资格赛，将激烈争夺4 000美元的赛事奖金。 参赛的战队有Orange，Zenith，Vici Gaming和MUFC。比赛将进行英语、西班牙语和葡萄牙语三语解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Pro_Leag: 16 teams, 8 from direct invitation and 8 from qualifiers, will compete for $4000. The tournament will feature teams like Orange, Zenith, Vici Gaming and MUFC. Commentary will be provided in English, Spanish and Portuguese.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Netolic_Pro_League_2nd_edition: 第二届Netolic职业联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_Pro_Leagu: 16支参赛战队，其中8支来自直接邀请，8支来自资格赛，将激烈争夺4 000美元的赛事奖金。 参赛的战队有Orange，Zenith，Vici Gaming和MUFC。比赛将进行英语、西班牙语和葡萄牙语三语解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_: 16 teams, 8 from direct invitation and 8 from qualifiers, will compete for $4000. The tournament will feature teams like Orange, Zenith, Vici Gaming and MUFC. Commentary will be provided in English, Spanish and Portuguese.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Shaper_Di: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含单件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Crasher: 这对锈迹斑斑的古老战刃再次派上了用场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Crasher: These dusty old blades find use once more.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Crescent: 这对锈迹斑斑的古老战刃再次派上了用场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Crescent: These dusty old blades find use once more.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bessy_the_Batmeleon: 蝙蝠骑士发现这只外来生物企图混入食人蝠的领地后将其驯为己有。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bessy_the_Batmel: The Rider found this exotic creature trying to blend in with a colony of morde-bats before he tamed it for his own.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Axes_of_Karroch: 即便是他的斧头也经过了训练。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Belt_of_Karroch: 取自死去花豹的毛皮，这束腰带是兽王力量的象征。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Belt_o: Woven from the pelt of a fallen pantheran, this belt is s symbol of the Beastmaster's strength.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Bracers_of_Karr: 用他在兽栏时的纪念物织就。这对护腕既是他奴役身份的象征，也是他再也不会向权贵低头的承诺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Bracer: Worn in remembrance of his time in the stocks.  These bracers are both a symbol of his bondage, and a promise that he will never again serve nobility.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_hair_of_Karroch: 剃掉头发后兽王将更好地与他的野兽兄弟交流思想，为任何战斗做好准备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_hair_o: With his head shaved to better commune with the minds of his animal brothers, Beastmaster is prepared for any battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Vest_of_Karroch: 用最好的花豹皮制成的厚实防护背心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Vest_o: A thick, protective vest of finest pantheran hide.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Battlejug_of_the_the_: Battlejug of the the Drunken Warlord
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battlejug_of_the_the_Drun: 拿起这酒葫喝上一口将会领悟到神的启示。或忘却自己努力想得到这酒葫的初衷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battlejug_of_the: Drink from this jug and you will experience enlightenment.  Or forget why you were striving for it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_the_Drunken_Warl: 设计的灵感来自于被人遗忘的古代酿酒木桶，这有着不少年头的木材已经融入了古老奥尤社的精华。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_the_Dru: Designed from the cast-off remnants of ancient brew casks, these bits of aged wood have been infused with the essence of the ancient order of the Oyo.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Mailed_Skirt_of_the_D: Mailed Skirt of the Drunken Warlord
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mailed_Skirt_of_the_Drunk: 在你喝醉的时候，这件锁子甲之裙能让你没有后顾之忧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mailed_Skirt_of_: When you're in your cups, this mailed skirt has your back.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Words_of_the_Drunken_Warl: 我说的是箴言？我的意思是真剑。醉酒战将之剑。上面刻有箴言。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Words_of_the_Dru: Did I say word?  I meant sword.  Sword of the Drunken Warlord.  There are words on it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Drunken_Warl: 古老的奥尤社要求每个年轻学徒拿剑的手臂都要绑上袖带，作为对先祖进行承诺的象征。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Dru: The ancient order of the Oyo binds the sword arm of each young apprentice as a symbol of commitment to their forebears.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Horned_Mother: 挥舞着这柄巨大的武器，布拉德瓦登将他身后的敌人砍杀殆尽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Horned_Mothe: Wielding this immense weapon, Bradwarden slashes and crushes all those in his wake.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Buttercup: 战场的尸体上会滋生多种奇怪的真菌。这正对毛毛兽的胃口。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Buttercup: The dead of battle can breed many an odd fungus.  That suits Buttercup just fine.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Buttercups_Barding: 其实把毛毛兽这样平静和蔼的野兽弄成凶恶的样子非常违和。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Buttercups_Bardi: It is a strange thing that such a calm and gentle creature as Buttercup be made to seem so fierce.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Molten_Fracture: 末日的力量已经使这把剑断裂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Molten_Fracture: Doom's power has shattered this blade.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Akakiryu_of_a_Thousand_Fa: 以一头传奇神龙的名字命名，这把剑是在主宰成为剑圣的那天授予他的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Akakiryu_of_a_Th: Named after a legendary dragon, this sword was given to the Juggernaut on the day he became a swordmaster.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hakama_of_a_Thousand_Face: 这件袴是遮面群岛的传统服饰。在他遭到放逐的多年之前由主宰的剑术师傅所赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hakama_of_a_Thou: A traditional hakama from Isle of Masks. It was given to Yurnero by his late swordmaster, long before his exile.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kataginu_of_a_Thousand_Fa: 一件传统无袖外套，由遮面群岛最伟大的战士所穿着。外套上还挂着尤涅若的旗号。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kataginu_of_a_Th: A traditional sleeveless jacket worn by the great warriors of Isle of Masks. It carries the banner of Yurnero.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_a_Thousand_Faces: 只在特殊场合佩戴的祭祀面具。这一定是个特殊场合。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_a_Thousa: A ceremonial mask worn on special occasions. This must be a special occasion.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_a_Thousand_Faces: 双手是武士最大的财富。必须保护周全。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_a_Thous: Hands are a warrior's greatest treasure. He must guard them well.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystalline_Sickles: 一对镰刀状的鹿角，是为拉席克精心雕琢的双角。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystalline_Sick: A rack of sickle curved horns for Leshrac.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bindings_of_Eldritch_Ice: 他们将艾斯瑞恩绑上沉重的腰带沉入暗黑之湖；但是巫妖复活时重力却没能拉住他。现在他出于嘲弄戴上了腰带。原先他心脏的热量进入了搏动的瓶子，现在他能冷眼看待。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bindings_of_Eldr: They sank Ethreain into the Black Pool with a weighted belt; but gravity has no pull on the Lich in his resurrected form. He wears the belt now as a mockery. And they say that all the warmth of his former heart resides in that pulsing flask, where he can keep a cold eye on it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Eldritch_Ice: 这施过魔咒的绳子曾经捆住了他，现在本应腐烂殆尽，但是巫妖将其保留，用来提醒世人，万物都不具有束缚他的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Eldri: The charmed ropes that once bound him should have rotted away, but Lich has preserved them as reminder to all that no power in creation can hope to hold him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glacier_of_Eldritch_Ice: 在暗黑之湖深处溺而不亡，巫妖他心中冰冷的仇恨冻结了身边的湖水。这些碎冰由邪恶力量形成，带着永不消融的仇恨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glacier_of_Eldri: Drowned but not dead, deep in the Black Pool, the cold hatred in Lich's heart froze the water around him. These ice-shards, formed of evil, hold a hatred that will never melt.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_Eldritch_Ice: 寒冰法师的长袍成为了巫妖残破的寿衣。迷信的村民用神圣的金属打造了尖刺，作为亡灵法师头颅的警示，没人会猜到他复活后会将其戴在头上作为象征着支配的诅咒王冠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_Eldrit: The ice mage's robes became the Lich's tattered shroud. Superstitious subjects hammered spikes of sacred metal as a warning into the dead mage's skull, none suspecting that upon his resurrection he would wear the device as a cursed crown of domination.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ring_Spear_of_Soul_Diffus: 用魔力合金铸造的长矛，可以锤磨心神，散尽生魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ring_Spear_of_So: A spear forged from magical alloys that hone the mind and diffuse the soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Ruby_Web: 选用深渊玛瑙蜘蛛的蛛丝织成的双翼。翅膀尖端的饰物是从蜘蛛的身体上凿出来的宝石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Rub: Wings woven with the silk of the Deep Ruby Spider. Adorned at the tips with the gems hewn from the spider's body.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Subtle_Demon: 手上握着这样一把匕首可要十分小心，因为除了对手还有可能伤到自己。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Sub: One must use care in the handling of such a blade, for it will cut the wielder as well as surely as the rival.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Blade_of_the_Subtle_Demon__Off: 隐秘恶魔之刃 - 副手
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Blade_of_the_Subtle_D: Blade of the Subtle Demon - Off-Hand
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Subtle_Demon: 手上握着这样一把匕首可要十分小心，因为除了对手还有可能伤到自己。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Sub: One must use care in the handling of such a blade, for it will cut the wielder as well as surely as the rival.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mark_of_the_Subtle_Demon: 凡事不能因为怕死而犹豫。必须学会面对一切试炼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mark_of_the_Subt: One must not balk at death.  One must learn to face all trials.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Veil_of_the_Subtle_Demon: 千万不要让敌人看到脸。让他们永远对你的身份捉摸不定。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Veil_of_the_Subt: Never reveal one's face to a foe.  Keep them ever in doubt of one's identity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Whip_of_the_Subtle_Demon: 为了保证自己的优势，必须具备从任何角度进行战斗的能力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Whip_of_the_Subt: To ensure an advantage, one must be capable of fighting from any angle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Subtle_Demon: 永远遁入阴影中，将自己包裹在沉默里。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Sub: Be ever in the shadows, and wrap one's self in silence.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cercus_of_Whirling_Death: 在沙王的掌控下，这对螯钳如同另一双手，在猎物逃到他埋沙的上方时将其抓住。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cercus_of_Whirli: Sandking uses these pincers as another set of hands, grappling onto prey as they scuttle above his sandy hideaway.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Whirling_Mind_Slicer: 刀刃如此锋利，可能会切到神智的组织。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Whirling_Mind_Sl: Blades so sharp, they might cut the very fabric of one's mind.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ambinderaths_Jaw: 不死巨龙安博德瑞斯被砍下的颌骨。巨龙曾在冥魂大帝向东扩张时出面反抗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ambinderaths_Jaw: The severed jaw of the undead dragon Ambinderath. The dragon once opposed the Wraith King's eastern expansion.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Encore_the_: 他只是想再听她唱一次歌。这把匕首是她送的礼物，他一直带在身边，谁敢不让她唱，那人就别想活。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Encore_the_: He only wanted to hear her song one more time. The dagger was gifed to him, and he keeps it with him to silence those who wish to silence her song.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Instagib_OSP: 快速消灭机铳，又名“最佳射击炮台”，是一款完美调配，高度平衡的大脑溶解装置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Instagib_OSP: The Instagib 'Optimal Shooting Platform' is a highly tuned, perfectly balanced brain liquification device.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Ephemeral_Ha: 这柄武器闪耀着来自幽鬼故乡位面的猛烈能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Eph: A weapon shimmering with the violent energy from Spectre's home plane of existence.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dress_of_the_Ephemeral_Ha: 一件裙子，因为幽鬼的能量不断波动而变得有所破旧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dress_of_the_Eph: A dress, slightly tattered by the constant flux of spectral energy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_the_Ephemeral_Ha: 通过这对聚焦的双角，充满猛烈能量的位面得以引导，进行无序的发散，向幽鬼体内注入能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_the_Eph: Chaotic emanations from a plane of violent power are conducted through these focal-horns and imbue Spectre with energy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sleeves_of_the_Ephemeral_: 幽鬼的汹涌之袖，充满了幽鬼当前形态下溢出的能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sleeves_of_the_E: A billowing sleeve for Spectre, charged with the excess energy that overflows from Spectre's present form.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Ephemeral_Ha: 来自幽鬼故乡位面的能量经由她的双翼进行波动，几乎超脱了她的肉体形态。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Eph: Energy from Spectre's home plane of existence pulses through her wings, nearly overtaking her physical form.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ring_of_the_Storm: 已经褪色的合金环，能吸引静电。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ring_of_the_Stor: A faded alloy ring attracts static electricity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premier_League: AMD携手DotaTalk为您隆重推出AMD超级联赛。参赛战队是来自东南亚的顶尖队伍，将争夺5 000美元的赛事奖金。 为期两个月的精彩赛事将由GoDz，LD，Luminous和Blaze在BeyondthesummitTV上为您解说呈现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premie: AMD, in partnership with DotaTalk, proudly brings you the AMD Premier League. The tournament features SEA's finest teams as they compete for a total prize pool of $5,000. Two months of intense action will be commentated by GoDz, LD, Luminous and Blaze on BeyondthesummitTV.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_AMD_Dota2_Premier_League_ADMIN: AMD Dota2超级联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premier_League_: AMD携手DotaTalk为您隆重推出AMD超级联赛。参赛战队是来自东南亚的顶尖队伍，将争夺5 000美元的赛事奖金。 为期两个月的精彩赛事将由GoDz，LD，Luminous和Blaze在BeyondthesummitTV上为您解说呈现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premie: AMD, in partnership with DotaTalk, proudly brings you the AMD Premier League. The tournament features SEA's finest teams as they compete for a total prize pool of $5,000. Two months of intense action will be commentated by GoDz, LD, Luminous and Blaze on BeyondthesummitTV.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AtoD3: ATOD3是第三届赛制独特，人气极高的Dota 2联赛，比赛采用反队长模式，由Peter \"HamSandwich\" Congdon担任解说。12支来自欧洲和美洲的战队争夺1 500美元的赛事奖金。平常不上场的英雄，非常规的战术，在战队的角逐中你一定能大饱眼福。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AtoD3: ATOD3 is the third edition of the uniquely popular Reverse-Captain's Mode tournament presented by Peter \"HamSandwich\" Congdon. 12 teams from Europe and the Americas battle for a part of the $1,500 prizepool. Watch unconventional strategies as teams battle with less frequently played heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_AtoD3: ATOD3是第三届赛制独特，人气极高的Dota 2联赛，比赛采用反队长模式，由Peter \"HamSandwich\" Congdon担任解说。12支来自欧洲和美洲的战队争夺1 500美元的赛事奖金。平常不上场的英雄，非常规的战术，在战队的角逐中你一定能大饱眼福。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_AtoD3: ATOD3 is the third edition of the uniquely popular Reverse-Captain's Mode tournament presented by Peter \"HamSandwich\" Congdon. 12 teams from Europe and the Americas battle for a part of the $1,500 prizepool. Watch unconventional strategies as teams battle with less frequently played heroes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_E2Max_L33T_Championship: 首届E2Max L33T冠军联赛（ELC）的赛事奖金将高达13 000新加坡元现金。五月到七月将通过线上和线下资格赛进行选拔，总决赛将于七月七日在新加坡Cineleisure的E2Max中心进行。ELC由Cathay推出，Rapture Gaming Network主办，e-Club和CM Storm赞助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_E2Max_L33T_Champ: The inaugural E2Max L33T Championship (ELC) will feature a prize pool of SGD13,000 cash. online and LAN qualifiers from May to July, with the Grand Finals on 7th July at E2Max, Cineleisure, Singapore! ELC is presented by Cathay, hosted by Rapture Gaming Network, supported by e-Club and CM Storm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_E2Max_L33T_Championship_ADMIN: E2Max L33T 冠军联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_E2Max_L33T_Champi: 首届E2Max L33T冠军联赛（ELC）的赛事奖金将高达13 000新加坡元现金。五月到七月将通过线上和线下资格赛进行选拔，总决赛将于七月七日在新加坡Cineleisure的E2Max中心进行。ELC由Cathay推出，Rapture Gaming Network主办，e-Club和CM Storm赞助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_E2Max_L3: The inaugural E2Max L33T Championship (ELC) will feature a prize pool of SGD13,000 cash. online and LAN qualifiers from May to July, with the Grand Finals on 7th July at E2Max, Cineleisure, Singapore! ELC is presented by Cathay, hosted by Rapture Gaming Network, supported by e-Club and CM Storm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_Dota_2__April_and_Ma: 技嘉E-Sports锦标赛由Gigabyte赞助，DotaTalk主办。八支来自东南亚的参赛队伍一决胜负后获胜队伍将赢取1500美元的现金大奖。获胜战队将与中国的顶尖战队同台竞技，再赢取1500美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_Dota_2__Apr: The Gigabyte E-sports tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winners of 8 GMPGL Qualifiers from South-East Asia will compete against one another for another cash prize of $1500. The winners will then compete against the Top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_GEST_Dota_2__April_and_May_ADM: GEST Dota 2 - 四五双月赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_Dota_2__Apri: 技嘉E-Sports锦标赛由Gigabyte赞助，DotaTalk主办。八支来自东南亚的参赛队伍一决胜负后获胜队伍将赢取1500美元的现金大奖。获胜战队将与中国的顶尖战队同台竞技，再赢取1500美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_Dot: The Gigabyte E-sports tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winneres of 8 GMPGL Qualifiers from South-East Asia will compete against one another for another cash prize of $1500. The winners will then compete against the Top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Seasoned_Vet: 花了时间跟踪就注定迟早会拿到人头。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Sea: Spending time on the trail is bound to take its toll sooner or later.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_Banner_of_the_Mask: 如果没有庆功的旗帜，战斗还有什么意义？完全没有，反正主宰是这么说的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_Banner_of: What good is a battle without a banner to celebrate it?  No good at all, or so says the Juggernaut.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Radiant_Crystal_Haul: 想要收获丰，必须挖得深！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Radiant_Crystal_: Gotta dig deep if you want to find the best!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ormr_the_Lunar_Dragon: 出身于一般在月亮的阴面巡逻的龙族，奥穆尔想要见识整个世界。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ormr_the_Lunar_D: From a race of dragons that normally patrols the dark side of the moon, Ormr wanted to see the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scepter_of_the_Grand_Magu: 几乎没人知道拉比克的天赋已经从四处模仿扩展到秘法装束。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scepter_of_the_G: Few know that Rubick's talents for mimicry extend to arcane assembly.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fishy_Frillhawk: 在暗黑之礁监狱中，斯拉克低调得开始引领低调的潮流。他发现没人注意到他原本的样貌。但是他越狱一成功，剩下的犯人都开始模仿他的头鳍范儿。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fishy_Frillhawk: In Dark Reef Prison, Slark kept too low a profile to ever be called a trendsetter. He figured nobody noticed his radical look. But as soon as he had broken out, the remaining inmates began to imitate this finny style.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spottin_Goggles: 能够在老鼠抖动背部时看清每次抽动，狙击手的定位护目镜绝对是件神器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spottin_Goggles: Able to see a tic on a mouse's back at a thousand paces, Sniper's Spottin' Goggles are a marvel to behold.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Set: 包含哈斯卡的”神灵骸骨“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Set: Includes all of the items in the \"Sacred Bones\" set for Huskar.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Spoils_of_the_Bone_Ru: Spoils of the Bone Ruins Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spoils_of_the_Bone_Ruins_: 包含米波的“白骨荒墟战利品\"套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spoils_of_the_Bo: Contains all of the items in the 'Spoils of the Bone Ruins' for Meepo:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Set: 这件捆绑包内含斯拉达的”深海巨龙之魂“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Set: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Sea Dragon' set for Slardar:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kupu_the_Metamorpher: 骚蝶库普前来觐见！诚实而又果敢，库普运送物品及时可靠。风骚走起！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kupu_the_Metamor: All hail Kupu the Metamorpher!  Honest and forthright, Kupu with delivery your items in a most timely fashion.  Steadfast!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_livery_llama_courier: 草泥马拉马信使...有一个这样好的信使，你呼唤他两次！“健步如飞”并且“微笑服务！”...你还有什么可以要求的呢？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_livery_llama_cou: The Llama Llama courier... with a courier THIS good, you name him TWICE!   \"Fleet of Foots\" and \"Service with a Smile!\" ... What more can you ask for?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nimble_Ben: 机灵本在此！在此！无处不在！只要一声令下，我立马就到！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nimble_Ben: Nimble Ben here! And there! And everywhere! Send me where you want me and I'm already there!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Princess_Penelope_the_Por: 粉嫩魁梧的公主殿下，看这里，您忠实的仆人已经来了！好好对待他，他非常爱慕您。说实话，他下盘稳如泰山，没法撼动。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Princess_Penelop: Attention, Your Pink and Portly Highness, your loyal bearer has arrived! Treat him well, for he is very attached to you. In fact, there's really no way to shake him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Bracers: 护腕上的符文会给予佩戴者力量和勇气。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Bra: The runes upon the cuffs confer strength and courage upon the wearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Helmet: 德尊教团的武士紧紧地握住先烈们的骸骨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Hel: The warriors of the Dezun Order hold dear the bones of those whose sacrifice has come before.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Offhand_Weap: 有了大地的骸骨，这把匕首的刀刃就跟曾经握住匕首的武士一样神圣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Off: The bones of the earth that make the blade of this dagger are no less sacred than the warrior who once held it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Shoulder: 先烈的遗骨再次来到了战场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Sho: The bones of those who came before are brought to the field of battle once more.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Spear: 武士之矛让人想起乱世纷争中的混沌，还有矛下亡魂的滋味。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Bones_Spe: The spear of a warrior remembers the chaos of many battles, and the taste of many lives.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bandanna_of_the_Bone_: Bandanna of the Bone Ruin Bandits
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Skeleton_Key_Bandana: 有一天你会发现荒墟里住着劫匪。有一天你会发现他们被赶走的时候有东西落下了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Skeleton_Key: Once in a while you find bandits living in the ruins.  Once in a while they forget things while they're being evicted.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lucky_Skull: 一个背包，也是一件斗篷，这是你的赃物里最好的毯子，上面还为眼疾手快的流氓准备了点纪念品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lucky_Skull: A backpack, a cloak, the finest blanket you can steal, and a little souvenir for a discerning ruffian.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Skeleton_Key: 早前可以开启上古的凯旋门，但是古迹后来在发掘中遭到破坏。很可能是因为使用了炸药所以适得其反。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Skeleton_Key: It used to open some ancient triumphal arch, but the structure was damaged during excavation.  Using explosives probably didn't help.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Souvinir_of_the_Bone_Ru: 就算是骷髅也会在荒墟感到寂寞。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Souvinir_of_the_: Even skulls get lonely up in the ruins.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Armlet: 深海神龙长满鳞片的外皮是少数比斯拉达的鱼皮更加坚韧的物质之一。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Arml: The scaly hide of the Sea Dragon is one of the few substances tougher than Slardar's own integument.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Basher: 鱼人追猎海洋深渊里巨大的深海魔龙作为自己的日常娱乐。这把重锤就是用一次狩猎的战利品打造的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Bash: For sport, the Slithereen hunt the great Sea Dragons of the ocean abyss. This basher is fashioned from the spoils of one such hunt.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Crown: 只有在追猎巨大的深海魔龙时证明了自己力量的人才敢戴上这样的王冠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Crow: Only those who prove themselves in hunt against the great Sea Dragon dare wear such a crown.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Fins: 放在斯拉达身上是鳍的样子，其实是巨大的深海魔龙头部不起眼的护鳃边沿。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sea_Dragons_Fins: What appear as fins on Slardar are but the edge of the mighty Sea Dragon's tiniest gill-guards.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Attributes_of_the_Foretol: 你购买这件套装绝对是预兆之事。这件捆绑包内含光之守卫的“预兆象征”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Attributes_of_th: It is a foregone conclusion that you buy this set.  This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Attributes of the Foretold' set for Keeper of the Light:
