Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Caustic_Steel_Set: 这件捆绑包内含炼金术士的“腐蚀之钢”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Caustic_Steel_Se: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Caustic Steel' set for Alchemist:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Vesture_Set: 这件捆绑包内含幻影刺客的“魅影霓裳”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Vestur: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Penumbral Vesture' set for Phantom Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ancient_Sovereign_Set: 这件套装包含沙王的“远古君王”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ancient_Sove: This set contains all of the items in the 'Ancient Sovereign' set for Sand King:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Battle_Caster_Set: 这件捆绑包内含莉娜的“战炎法师”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Battle_Caste: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Battle Caster' set for Lina:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Conquering_Tyrant_Set: 与征战者相称的战争装备。这件捆绑包内含半人马战行者的“征战暴君”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Conquering_T: War kit truly worthy of a conquerer.  This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Conquering Tyrant' set for Centaur Warrunner:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Moon_Rider_Set: 这件捆绑包内含米拉娜的“银月骑士”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Moon_Rider_S: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Moon Rider' set for Mirana:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_East_Qualifi: 国际邀请赛东方资格赛
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_East_Qu: 观看8支Dota 2顶尖战队争夺国际邀请赛的一席之地
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Watch eight of the best Dota 2 teams compete for a spot in The International
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_West_Qualifi: 国际邀请赛西方资格赛
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_International: 观看8支Dota 2顶尖战队争夺国际邀请赛的一席之地
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Inte: Watch eight of the best Dota 2 teams compete for a spot in The International
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Malignant: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含单件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ogres_Caustic_Steel_Blinders: 食人魔的腐蚀之钢眼罩
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ogres_Caustic_Steel_Blind: 视线的减少通过增加防护性来弥补。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ogres_Caustic_St: What it may lack for vision it makes up for in protection.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ogres_Caustic_Steel_Bracers: 食人魔的腐蚀之钢护腕
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ogres_Caustic_Steel_Brace: 如果你要与不稳定材料打交道，那就要确保自己犯错了也不会挂！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ogres_Caustic_St: If you're gonna work with unstable materials, make sure you can survive a mistake!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ogres_Caustic_Steel_Choppers: 食人魔的腐蚀之钢砍刀
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ogres_Caustic_Steel_Chopp: 混合材料的不二选择，剁碎晚饭的绝佳工具！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ogres_Caustic_St: Good for stirring mixtures, great for chopping dinner!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Young_Alchemists_Knot: 啊，想年轻个十岁。这个发型很有用！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Young_Alchemists: Ah, to be young again.  This haircut should help!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Young_Alchemists_Protecti: 初出茅庐的时候药品的配方精准不足，冒进有余。风险更是大大的有。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Young_Alchemists: When you're just starting out, your formulas are a little braver, a little less precise.  And a lot more dangerous.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Spider_Shuffle: 跳起蜘蛛的舞蹈，庆祝成功的推进，或敌人的团灭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Spider_Shu: Celebrate a critical push or an enemy team wipe with this spidery dance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Barding_of_the_Conquering: 能让这个东征西讨的英雄后背增色的不是鞍袋，而是与他的强大相称的铠甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Barding_of_the_C: No saddle has ever graced the back of this conquering hero, but instead a barding worthy of his greatness.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Conquering_Ty: 皮革和黄铜制成的祭祀腰带，意在彰显佩戴者的崇高地位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Conq: A ceremonial belt of leather and brass meant to signify the high status of the wearer.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Braided_Tail_of_the_C: Braided Tail of the Conquering Tyrant
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Braided_Tail_of_the_Conqu: 半人马的尾巴上编好了辫子，意味着战斗的迫近。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Braided_Tail_of_: A braid woven into the tail of a centaur signifies that battle is soon at hand.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Brutal_Crescent_of_th: Brutal Crescent of the Conquering Tyrant
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Brutal_Crescent_of_the_Co: 有了这柄银白的弯斧，半人马能砍断众生的筋腱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Brutal_Crescent_: With this silver crescent, the centaur has cut the strings of many lives.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Death_Mask_of_the_Con: Death Mask of the Conquering Tyrant
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Death_Mask_of_the_Conquer: 戴上这副面具后这将是敌人临终所见之颜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Death_Mask_of_th: Wear this mask, and it will be the last face your enemies ever see.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Spiked_Pauldrons_of_t: Spiked Pauldrons of the Conquering Tyrant
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spiked_Pauldrons_of_the_C: 采用成年雷隐兽的皮制成，这件铠甲不惧任何刀剑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spiked_Pauldrons: Made from the leather of a full grown thunderhide, this armor is a match for any blade.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Shredding_the_Lute_: 来些即兴表演，庆祝成功的推进或敌人的团灭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Shredding_: Celebrate a critical push or an enemy team wipe by shredding some hot licks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_Futures_Foretold: 眉头上有了这颗宝石，未来将是伟大的胜利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_Futures: With this jewel upon your brow, the future will be one of great victory.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_Wind_and_Sand: 就像风沙可以摧毁一座大山，这根魔法神杖也可以摧毁最强大的敌人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_Wind_an: As wind and sand can wear down a mountain, so too this magical staff can wear down even the greatest foe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_22_Keys_of_AnzarAnzulii: 安扎尔-安祖利的22把钥匙
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_22_Keys_of_AnzarAnzul: 在这22把钥匙中，有一把是通往最终存在之位面的关键。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_22_Keys_of_A: Of these 22 keys, one is the key to the final plane of existence.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tinek_the_Unmastered: 永不低头，无法驯服，提捏克将会找到通向胜利的道路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tinek_the_Unmast: Never bowed, never broken, Tinek will find the path to victory.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cut_of_the_Battle_Caster: 常言道战争是一项伟大的发明和创新运动。对于时尚亦然。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cut_of_the_Battl: War is said to be a cause for great innovation and invention.  No less so for fashion.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the_Battle_C: 有一次在刀光剑影、电闪雷鸣的战场上，莉娜留下了一个冒烟的弹坑和一群感激的友军。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the: Once a field filled with swords and storms, Lina left little but a smoking crater and handful of grateful allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Plates_of_the_Battle_Cast: 需要许多的实验并克服各种挑战，才能制造出足以抵挡莉娜的火焰的材料。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Plates_of_the_Ba: Many experiments were required, and challenges overcome, to craft material able weather Lina's flame.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vambraces_of_the_Battle_C: 随着地平线上传来战鼓的轰隆声，莉娜做好了上阵的准备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vambraces_of_the: As the drums of war boomed on the horizon, Lina prepared to join the fray.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bandana_of_the_Bone_R: Bandana of the Bone Ruin Bandits
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Moon_Rider: 这把弓附有月之力的弓弦发出母狮般的低吼声。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Moon_: The power of the lunar lioness purrs  in this bow's enchanted string.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Moon_Rider: 米拉娜的手臂上闪耀着月亮的神秘光芒...抑或是这对锃亮的护腕所在发光？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_M: The moon shines with mystic lustre on Mirana's forearms...or is it the glow of these polished bracers?
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Fluted_Guard_of_the_M: Fluted Guard of the Moon Rider
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fluted_Guard_of_the_Moon_: 荣誉的象征，穿上尽显优雅，不过毫不轻盈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fluted_Guard_of_: An emblem of honor, worn with grace but never lightly.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Lion_Drape_of_the_Moo: Lion Drape of the Moon Rider
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lion_Drape_of_the_Moon_Ri: 银月雄狮用魔法和力量掩护它的骑手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lion_Drape_of_th: The Lion of the Moon cloaks its riders in magic and might.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Lion_Quiver_of_the_Mo: Lion Quiver of the Moon Rider
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lion_Quiver_of_the_Moon_R: 这个箭袋借用了银月雄狮的鬃毛和风采。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lion_Quiver_of_t: The Lion of the Moon lends is mane and its mein to this quiver.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_the_Moon_Rider: 一款融入神秘风格的辫子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_the_Moon: A braid with mystic stylings woven into it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Cloak: 隐藏能力与夜晚长影不相上下的斗篷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Cloak: A cloak no less concealing than the night's long shadows.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Crest: 装饰有黄昏魔印，这件护腰将黑暗笼罩在其穿戴者上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Crest: Emblazoned with the Crepuscular Sigil, this crest draws darkness over its wearer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Hood: 刺客隐藏起她的脸部，但你仍然能感受到她那穿过阴影的凝视之力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Hood: The assassin's face is hidden, yet you can still feel through the shadows the power of her gaze.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Shawl: 即使是暮色中的生物都很难看清穿着这件披肩的人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Shawl: Even creatures of the twilight can scarcely see the wearer of this shawl.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Warblade: 在黑暗的边缘，她战刃上的光芒如同一片割断的黄昏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Penumbral_Warbla: At the edge of darkness, her warblade shimmers like a piece of dusk cut loose.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claw_of_the_Ancient_Sover: 在远古君王零碎的传说中，死于这样的利爪是众人极其渴求之事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claw_of_the_Anci: In the fragmentary legends of the Ancient Sovereign, death by such claws was something greatly to be desired.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crawlers_of_the_Ancient_S: 沙王向远古君王的每一只脚献上贡品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crawlers_of_the_: Sandking pays tribute to the Ancient Sovereign with every step.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Sandworn_Visage_of_th: Sandworn Visage of the Ancient Sovereign
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sandworn_Visage_of_the_An: 出土于受到风沙侵蚀的埃哈拉斯遗址，这个面具让远古君王的整个文明复活了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sandworn_Visage_: Unearthed from the sand-scoured ruins of El'Harath, from this Visage the entire culture of the Sovereign has been resurrected.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stinger_of_the_Ancient_So: 相比远古君王的完美手法，其他死法的痛苦不值一提。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stinger_of_the_A: No death has ever been more painful than that perfected by the Ancient Sovereign.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Vestigial_Wings_of_th: Vestigial Wings of the Ancient Sovereign
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestigial_Wings_of_the_An: 在这双翅膀尚未退化的多年以前，先祖们在沙子上无声地滑行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestigial_Wings_: The ancients glided stealthily above the sands in ages when these wings were not yet vestigial.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_redmoon__assassinators_secret_: 红月暗杀者的隐秘护服
红月暗杀者的隐秘之袖
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Celebration_of_Deat: 吸引先祖的目光来关注你的胜利！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Celebratio: Draw the eye of the ancestors upon your victory!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deepest_Depths: 在最寒冷的深渊，必须要做到脑子放机灵，来者不拒，否则就会成为做到之人的点心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deepest_Depths: Within the coldest depths one must be clever and adaptable, or become food for one that is.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tempest_Wing: 如果不能在天空翱翔，那只能面对漫长的坠落。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tempest_Wing: Those who fail the skies face nothing but a very long fall.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Curse_Dota_2_Invitational: Curse Dota 2邀请赛，由Alienware赞助，是邀请赛性质的Dota 2联赛，赛程跨越3个周末。邀请的战队共有8支，赛制为双淘汰赛，赛事奖金高达10 000美元。（冠军5 000美元，亚军3 000美元，季军2 000美元）
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Curse_Dota_2_Inv: The Curse Dota 2 Invitational, sponsored by Alienware, is an invitational bracket tournament that spans 3 weekends. 8 Teams were invited to compete in a double elimination format with a $10,000 prize pool. (1st $5,000 2nd $3,000 3rd $2,000)
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Curse_Dota_2_Invitational__ADM: Curse Dota 2邀请赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Curse_Dota_2_Invi: Curse Dota 2邀请赛，由Alienware赞助，是邀请赛性质的Dota 2联赛，赛程跨越3个周末。邀请的战队共有8支，赛制为双淘汰赛，赛事奖金高达10 000美元。（冠军5 000美元，亚军3 000美元，季军2 000美元）
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Curse_Do: The Curse Dota 2 Invitational, sponsored by Alienware, is an invitational bracket tournament that spans 3 weekends. 8 Teams were invited to compete in a double elimination format with a $10,000 prize pool. (1st $5,000 2nd $3,000 3rd $2,000)
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Smeevil: 相传在工匠和战士之中论仆人有多可靠，打铁小恶魔无出其右。然而，当一个英雄选择了打铁小恶魔作为他们的信使后，他会发现这些聪明的小家伙会自我进化形态。因为被它们所亲眼见证的伟大战斗所激励，打铁小恶魔可能将会进化成为从未有过的异兽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Smeevil: Tis said among artisan and warrior alike that there is no finer servant than a trusty smeevil.  However, a hero who chooses a smeevil as their courier may soon find these clever critters taking new forms in order to gain assistants of their own. Inspired by the great battles they bear witness to, a smeevil may become emboldened to press ever more exotic beasts to their cause.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered:
战鼓轰鸣，
铁蹄入侵，
血染疆土，
铁旅行军。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empowered:
The thrum of war,
the stomp of hooves,
the bloodstained earth,
grim forces move.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_International_2013_Ticket:
这一物品是邀请玩家于2013年8月7日 - 8月11日期间前往华盛顿州西雅图市观看Dota 2国际邀请赛的邀请函。前去观看的玩家将获得现场预定座位。

该门票必须从您的游戏内背包中激活。一旦激活，门票就会被消耗，并从背包中移除，同时通过Steam账号注册。门票信息将在2013年6月30日之前以电子邮件的形式发送到您Steam账号关联的电子邮箱中。

另外本次购买还包括一份2013年国际邀请赛互动指南和一只打铁小恶魔信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_International_20:
This item is an invitation to personally attend the Dota 2 International Tournament, August 7 - 11 2013, at Benaroya Hall in Seattle, WA. Attendees will receive preferential seating on the show floor.

This ticket must be activated from your in-game backpack. Once activated, the ticket will be consumed and removed from your backpack and registered on your Steam account. Ticket information will be emailed no later than June 30th, 2013 to the email address associated with your Steam account.

This purchase also includes a International 2013 Interactive Compendium and Smeevil Courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_International_2013_Battle: 使用该物品后将使获得<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提高<font color='#9da1a9'>125%</font>，直到国际邀请赛结束。此外，您将使其他玩家额外获得<font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font>的<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>获得速率，该速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_International_20: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>125%</font> until the end of the International. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_International_2013_Intera: 赶快使用2013年国际邀请赛互动指南，把握今年的赛事动态。附赠一只打铁小恶魔信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_International_20: Use the International 2013 Interactive Compendium to keep up to date on this year's tournament action. Includes a free Smeevil courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_2013_Interac: 2013年国际邀请赛互动指南大包
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2013_In: 使用2013年国际邀请赛赛事指南来跟进今年的大赛进展。内含一只免费的铁匠小精灵信使，并增加2013年国际邀请赛的总奖金金额！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Use the International 2013 Interactive Compendium to keep up to date on this year's tournament action. Includes a free Smeevil courier and International 2013 Battle Bonus stretch goal reward!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunter_Set: 包含巨牙海民的“北极猎手”套装的全部物品
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunter_Se: Includes all of the items in the 'Arctic Hunter' set for Tusk
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Treasure_Key_of_the_M: Treasure Key of the Malignant Amanita
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_the_Malig: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含完整的物品套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Super_League: 十支来自国内外的顶尖战队将齐聚中国上海，进行两个月的激烈比赛，赛事总奖金高达105万元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Super_Lea: Ten top teams from home and abroad compete for two months in Shanghai, China for a total prize pool of 1.05 million yuan.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Super_League__ADMI: 十支来自国内外的顶尖战队将齐聚中国上海，进行两个月的激烈比赛，赛事总奖金高达105万元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Super_Lea: Ten top teams from home and abroad compete for two months in Shanghai, China for a total prize pool of 1.05 million yuan.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2013_In: 赶快使用2013年国际邀请赛互动指南，把握今年的赛事动态。附赠一只打铁小恶魔信使和战斗加成的挑战奖励。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Use the International 2013 Interactive Compendium to keep up to date on this year's tournament action. Includes a free Smeevil courier and Battle Bonus stretch reward!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Omoz: 在地狱荒原的焚焰深渊，这把剑注视着一切。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Omoz: In the burning pits of the stygian waste, the sword sees all.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Glove: 它在重量上的不足使它获得了精密的触觉。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_G: What it lacks in heft it more than makes up for in tactile precision.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Hood: 在冰冷寒冬最黑暗的夜晚，冰川残骸的狼群在哀嚎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_H: In the darkest nights of icy winter, the wolves of Icewrack howl their dirge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Ice_Axe: 想要直面冰川残骸的峭壁，需要一件称手的工具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_I: To brave the peaks beyond Icewrack requires tools specific to the job.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Parka: 要抵御北极的严寒，没有比冰川残骸之狼的毛皮更棒的了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_P: There is no better guard against the arctic cold than the pelt of an Icewrack wolf.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Snack: 没有点心怎能直面白原！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_S: Never brave the white without a snack!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_Tusks: 当他的冰镐刚找到坚固的立足点时，冰壁开始碎裂，巨牙海民被送回了底下那冰冷的冻土。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Hunters_T: As his pick found its purchase the ice began to crack and shatter, and Tusk was sent back to the icy tundra below.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_East_Qualifi: 国际邀请赛东方资格赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_International_West_Qualifi: 国际邀请赛西方资格赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_International: 观看8支Dota 2顶尖战队争夺国际邀请赛的一席之地
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Inte: Watch eight of the best Dota 2 teams compete for a spot in The International
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gear_Tooth: 精巧让战争机器更具威力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gear_Tooth: Ingenuity powers the machinery of war.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pinoy_Gaming_Festival_Sum: 观看5支菲律宾战队在2013年Pinoy游戏节夏季展会上保卫他们的家园，对抗Neolution.Orange.International和PMS|Asterisk*，赢取$1,750的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pinoy_Gaming_Fes: Watch 5 Filipino teams defend their home turf against Neolution.Orange, Neolution.International and PMS|Asterisk* at the Pinoy Gaming Festival Summer Assembly 2013 for a prize pool of $1,750.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Pinoy_Gaming_Festival_Summer_A: Pinoy游戏节夏季展会 - 管理员
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Pinoy_Gaming_Festival: Pinoy Gaming Festival Summer Assembly - ADMIN
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pinoy_Gaming_Fest: 观看5支菲律宾战队在2013年Pinoy游戏节夏季展会上保卫他们的家园，对抗Neolution.Orange.International和PMS|Asterisk*，赢取$1,750的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pinoy_Ga: Watch 5 Filipino teams defend their home turf against Neolution.Orange, Neolution.International and PMS|Asterisk* at the Pinoy Gaming Festival Summer Assembly 2013 for a prize pool of $1,750.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapture_Gaming_Network_Le: Rapture游戏网络联赛2013/2014年门票将使您观看亚洲10支精英战队在9个多月的时间内进行的198场精彩比赛，他们将争夺高达19 000新加坡元的现金大奖。这是亚洲最大的DOTA 2联赛盛事之一！比赛解说将由RGN提供英语、菲律宾语、泰语和越南语的解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapture_Gaming_N: Rapture Gaming Network League 2013/2014 ticket gives you access to 198 matches over 9 months of the 10 premier teams in Asia vying for a prize pool of SGD19,000 cash, this is one of the biggest DOTA 2 leagues in Asia! Commentary in English, Filipino, Thai, and Vietnamese will be provided by RGN.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Rapture_Gaming_Network_League_: Rapture游戏网络联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Rapture_Gaming_Ne: Rapture游戏网络联赛2013/2014年门票将使您观看亚洲10支精英战队在9个多月的时间内进行的198场精彩比赛，他们将争夺高达19 000新加坡元的现金大奖。这是亚洲最大的DOTA 2联赛盛事之一！比赛解说将由RGN提供英语、菲律宾语、泰语和越南语的解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Rapture_: Rapture Gaming Network League 2013/2014 ticket gives you access to 198 matches over 9 months of the 10 premier teams in Asia vying for a prize pool of SGD19,000 cash, this is one of the biggest DOTA 2 leagues in Asia! Commentary in English, Filipino, Thai, and Vietnamese will be provided by RGN.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2_Super_League__ADMIN: 完美世界和游戏风云联合主办。来自国内外十支顶级战队将在中国上海进行为期两个月的线下赛，以争取总计高达105万元的赛事总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2_Super_Leag: Hosted by Perfect World and Gamefy, 10 top teams from Asia will be playing in this huge LAN event for 5 weeks in Shanghai, China, competing for a $171,000 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Pyrion_Flax: 这一物品将把连杀配音替换成风格独树一帜，恣意幽默的Dota 2怪咖Pyrion Flax。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Pyrion: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the unique and unruly humor of Dota 2 satirist Pyrion Flax.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pyrion_Flax_Announcer_Pac: 这件播音包将默认播音员和连杀配音替换成风格独树一帜，恣意幽默的Dota 2怪咖Pyrion Flax。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pyrion_Flax_Anno: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the unique and unruly humor of Dota 2 satirist Pyrion Flax.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Driftwood: 在那沙滨上平放着胜利的工具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Driftwood: Upon a sandy shore lie the tools of victory.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frozen_Touch: 严冬之核蕴藏着寒冷之智。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frozen_Touch: There is cold wisdom in the core of winter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Malice: 不善之力才能给予人勇气。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Malice: Few things confer courage like the power of malice.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nature: 根深蒂固的力量成长于翠绿之春。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nature: In the verdant spring grows deep-rooted strength.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Powered_Star:
力量带来胜利。
包含群星联赛第六赛季门票。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Powered_Star:
With power comes victory.
	
	Included with Star Series Season VI pass..
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stone_Ruin: 谨防历经久远时代的混沌。Premier League第五赛季门票赠品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stone_Ruin:
Beware the chaos of ages past.
	
	Included with Premier League Season 5 pass.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Premier_League_Season_5: 与Norton携手后，Premier League崭新归来！来自欧洲的8支顶尖战队争夺奖金高达15，000美元的超级杯参赛资格。该门票将赋予您观看8轮淘汰赛的权利，还有炎石之遗游戏界面和具备进化能力的邪恶魅魔套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Premier_League_S: In cooperation with Norton, TPL returns with a new format. 8 best teams from Europe fight for entry to the $15,000 SuperCup by contesting each other in smaller cups. This ticket grants you entry to a total of 8 knockout tournaments, Stone Ruin HUD and the Wicked Succubus evolving set.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Premier_League_Season_5__ADMIN: Premier League第五赛季 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Premier_League_Season_5__: 与Norton携手后，Premier League崭新归来！来自欧洲的8支顶尖战队争夺奖金高达15，000美元的超级杯参赛资格。该门票将赋予您观看8轮淘汰赛的权利，还有炎石之遗游戏界面和具备进化能力的邪恶魅魔套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Premier_League_S: In cooperation with Norton, TPL returns with a new format. 8 best teams from Europe fight for entry to the $15,000 SuperCup by contesting each other in smaller cups. This ticket grants you entry to a total of 8 knockout tournaments, Stone Ruin HUD and the Wicked Succubus evolving set.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_EMS_One_Summer_2: The RaidCall EMS One 2013年夏季联赛的参赛队伍来自世界各地，争夺的奖金高达39 000美金。知名战队和挑战者将经过四轮比赛，接着是分组进行复赛，然后是现场直播的总决赛 - 众多精彩比赛将由TobinWan等解说为您呈现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_EMS_One: The RaidCall EMS One Summer 2013 features teams from all over the world in a battle for 39,000 US dollars in prize money. Established teams and challengers meet in four cups, followed by group stage playoffs and live event finals - giving you dozens of great matches casted by TobiWan and others.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_EMS_One_Summer_2013__: RaidCall EMS One 2013年夏季联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall_EMS_One_: The RaidCall EMS One 2013年夏季联赛的参赛队伍来自世界各地，争夺的奖金高达39 000美金。知名战队和挑战者将经过四轮比赛，接着是分组进行复赛，然后是现场直播的总决赛 - 众多精彩比赛将由TobinWan等解说为您呈现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall: The RaidCall EMS One Summer 2013 features teams from all over the world in a battle for 39,000 US dollars in prize money. Established teams and challengers meet in four cups, followed by group stage playoffs and live event finals - giving you dozens of great matches casted by TobiWan and others.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_StarSeries_Season_VI: 由v1lat和TobiWan作为招牌解说，此次比赛以四种不同语言进行解说，总奖金高达$22 500，绝对是史上最强的StarSeries联赛！StarSeries的主要事项是在基辅Cybersport Arena举行的线下总决赛。门票附赠专属的游戏内Starladder游戏界面皮肤。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_StarSeries_Seaso: Broadcast in 4 different languages with v1lat and TobiWan as headliners and a grand prize of $22,500 this should be the best StarSeries yet! The keystone of StarSeries is its LAN finals, held in Kiev Cybersport Arena. Includes an exclusive in-game Starladder HUD Skin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_StarSeries_Season_VI__ADMIN: StarSeries联赛第六赛季 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_StarSeries_Season: 由v1lat和TobiWan作为招牌解说，此次比赛以四种不同语言进行解说，总奖金高达$22 500，绝对是史上最强的StarSeries联赛！StarSeries的主要事项是在基辅Cybersport Arena举行的线下总决赛。门票附赠专属的游戏内Starladder游戏界面皮肤。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_StarSeri: Broadcast in 4 different languages with v1lat and TobiWan as headliners and a grand prize of $22,500 this should be the best StarSeries yet! The keystone of StarSeries is its LAN finals, held in Kiev Cybersport Arena. Includes an exclusive in-game Starladder HUD Skin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hammer_of_the_Skygods: 风暴之术加上稳健的手臂，上天的意愿就是这样形成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hammer_of_the_Sk: By stormcraft and steady arm is wrought the will of the skies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Cursed_Crescent: 盛怒挥此刃，毒咒永缠身。冷眼临此刃，毒咒永缠身。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Cursed_Cresc: Cursed is the one who wields this blade in anger.  Cursed is the one who faces this blade with cruelty.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gloomblade: 切记留心朦胧之光，这可是刺客永恒的盟友。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gloomblade: Beware the gloom, for it is ever the friend an assassin's ally.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dagger_of_Enduring_Tormen: 匕首弯一弯，鲜血溅当场。匕首弯两弯，欢愉涌心房。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dagger_of_Enduri: Twist once and the blood starts to spill.  Twist again and see the pleasure flow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dirk_of_the_Wicked_Succub: 短匕刺胸膛，匕刃逼心房。鲜血似汪洋，欢愉欲断肠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dirk_of_the_Wick: To poke, to prod, to bleed, to destroy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_the_Wicked_Succu: 在日月交辉的最深处是黑暗骇人的诱惑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_the_Wic: From deepest twilight come temptations dark and terrifying.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Tear_of_Agony: 尖叫在耳边，女王露欢颜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Tear_of_Agon: Let your queen hear their screams and she will smile upon you.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Wicked_Succu: 美中自有痛，苦中自有甜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Wic: In beauty there is pain.  In pain there is beauty.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Wicked_Succu: 上战场穿着必须得当。想大杀四方就要...
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Wic: One must bring the appropriate attire to a battle.  To a massacre, however...
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stalwart_Sentinel: 这把剑的重量和形状将同时给目标和剑客招来危险。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stalwart_Sentine: The heft and shape of the blade spells danger for both the target and the wielder.
Tokens.DOTA_WearableType_International_HUD_Skin: 国际邀请赛游戏界面皮肤
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Exoskeleton: 普通外骼不够时将会派上用场。包含编织者的装甲外骼套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Exoskeleton: For when a normal exoskeleton just isnt' enough.  Includes all of the items in the Stalkers Exoskeleton set.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Valor: 勇气带来荣誉。荣誉带来不朽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Valor: With courage comes glory. With glory comes immortality.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Exoskeleton_Arms: 编织者已经武装就绪。为了取你小命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Exoskeleton_Arms: Weaver is armed and ready.  To kill you.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Exoskeleton_Back: 装甲虫壳上厚厚的铠甲能够抵挡住敌人的攻击。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Exoskeleton_Back: Thick plates of armored chitin protect you from the attack of your enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Exoskeleton_Wings: 长出这对翅膀，发育算是终于完成了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Exoskeleton_Wing: With these wings, your final transformation is complete.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_D2L_Steambear: 众所周知，在杜鲁德大草原的高山上，风暴法师会去驯服野兽做临时的负重工作。不过在凶暴的蒸汽熊面前，胆敢尝试去控制的可谓是凤毛麟角。这只幼小的蒸汽熊麦斯米兰现在并无同伴证明驯养活动并不顺利。对那位风暴法师来说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_D2L_Steambear: High on the steppes of Druud, stormcrafters are known to press beasts of burden into their service.  Rare though is the stormcrafter who dares try and control the pugnacious steambear.  That the young bear Maximilian now travels unaccompanied is proof that the domestication process did not go well.  For the stormcrafter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wicked_Succubus_Set: 这件捆绑包内含痛苦女王的“邪恶魅魔”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wicked_Succubus_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Wicked Succubus' set for Queen of Pain:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_Dota_2_League_Se: RaidCall Dota 2联赛（简称D2L）是为期7周的线上Dota 2赛事，参赛队伍是西方八支顶尖Dota 2战队，他们争夺的是10 000美金的单季赛事奖金和前往巴伦西亚的Dreamhack线下对决的资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_Dota_2_: The RaidCall Dota 2 League (D2L) is a 7-week online Dota 2 league featuring the top eight Dota 2 teams in the West battling it out for a portion of the $10,000 seasonal cash prize and the opportunity of competing live at DreamHack Valencia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_RaidCall_Dota_2_League_Season_: RaidCall Dota 2联赛第3赛季 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall_Dota_2_L: RaidCall Dota 2联赛（简称D2L）是为期7周的线上Dota 2赛事，参赛队伍是西方八支顶尖Dota 2战队，他们争夺的是10 000美金的单季赛事奖金和前往巴伦西亚的Dreamhack线下对决的资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall: The RaidCall Dota 2 League (D2L) is a 7-week online Dota 2 league featuring the top eight Dota 2 teams in the West battling it out for a portion of the $10,000 seasonal cash prize and the opportunity of competing live at DreamHack Valencia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cup: Dota 2加拿大杯回来了，这次卫冕冠军WAND和亚军AWT Happen又会有怎样激烈的碰撞？解说可不只是Kawa，NYJohn哦！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cu: The Dota 2 Canada Cup is back featuring defending champions WAND and runners up AWT Happen? Casters include Kawa, NYJohn and more!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dota_2_Canada_Cup__ADMIN: Dota 2加拿大联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_Canada_Cup: Dota 2加拿大杯回来了，这次卫冕冠军WAND和亚军AWT Happen又会有怎样激烈的碰撞？解说可不只是Kawa，NYJohn哦！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_C: The Dota 2 Canada Cup is back featuring defending champions WAND and runners up AWT Happen? Casters include Kawa, NYJohn and more!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_American_Dota_League: DOTA美洲联赛云集了北美和南美的顶尖队伍，在一个半月的赛事里争夺一万美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_American_Dota_Le: AMERICAN DOTA LEAGUE features the best teams in North and South America competing for $10,000 in a month and a half long league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_American_Dota_Lea: DOTA美洲联赛云集了北美和南美的顶尖队伍，在一个半月的赛事里争夺一万美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_American: AMERICAN DOTA LEAGUE features the best teams in North and South America competing for $10,000 in a month and a half long league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Beautiful_Snowangel: 水晶室女变成了白雪天使！你可不能不买账！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Beautiful_: Crystal Maiden makes a snowangel!  You better believe it!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Get_Burned: 莉娜的公益服务宣言 ... \"火热！火辣！热辣！\"。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Get_Burned: Lina's Public Service Announcement ... \"Hot Hot Hot!\".  You have been warned!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Encore: 他只是想再听她唱一次歌。这把匕首是她送的礼物，他一直带在身边，谁敢不让她唱，那人就别想活。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Encore: He only wanted to hear her song one more time. The dagger was gifted to him, and he keeps it with him to silence those who wish to silence her song.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scythe_of_Vyse: 维斯教会守卫最为森严的圣物，由于其神奇的性能为人觊觎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scythe_of_Vyse: The most guarded relic of the cult of Vyse, it is a weapon coveted for its magical properties.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Sharp_Blade: 瞧好主宰磨剑的方法，就是斩杀敌人的过程！看好了！剑已磨好！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Sharp_Blad: Watch as Juggernaut sharpens his blade by cutting down his foes!  Watch out!  That's a Sharp Blade!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt__Shake_Your_Money_M: 看帕吉甩起他的打钱神器，他的敌人将无法直视！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt__Shake_You: Watch as Pudge \"Shakes his Money Maker\" while his foes cannot look away!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_El_Gato:
极度坚决，异常勇敢，聪颖如一，就连强大的Roshan也不能吓退神猫侠分毫。

只要您观看有Beyond The Summit团队参与解说的比赛神猫侠就能升级。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_El_Gato:
Fiercely determined, ever courageous, and always clever, not even the mighty Roshan may frighten El Gato from his mission.

El Gato will level up as you watch games that include casters from the Beyond The Summit team.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Itsy: 您说没那么萌？她巨大的兄长张开他们的上颚，对着妹妹微小的身体转动着眼珠。为了证明她的价值，这只走路飞快的小蜘蛛会急忙跑去为您服务，在您的心周围编织她的蛛网！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Itsy: Not so itsy, say you? Her enormous elder siblings click their mandibles and roll their many eyes at their sister's puny proportions. To prove her worth, this fleet-footed spiderling will eagerly scuttle to your service and weave her web around your heart!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cyril_the_Syrmeleon: 南方群岛的变色龙非常害羞，基本不会去其他地方，也不会在战斗中出现，也不会搭一只年长龙蝶的便车。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cyril_the_Syrmel: The shy syrmeleon of the southern isles are rarely ones to travel abroad, or find themselves in a battle, or hitch a ride on an elder drakefly.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Champions_League_Seaso: 第5届G-1冠军联赛将举办线上资格赛，决出顶尖的西方队伍并提供往返机票参加在中国举办的线下赛，与iG，LGD，DK，Orange等战队一决高下。亚洲队伍也将通过预赛争夺线下赛的一席之地。比赛的总奖金将超过53 000美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_G1_Champions_Lea: The Fifth Season of the G-1 Championship league will feature an online qualifier to select the top Western team for a paid flight to the LAN finals in China to face teams like iG, LGD, DK and Orange. The Asia qualifiers will also use a prelim system to compete for spots at the LAN finals. The prize pool will exceed last season's $53,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Steel_Armor_Set: 包含斧王的“重钢盔甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavy_Steel_Armo: Includes all of the items in the 'Heavy Steel Armor' set for Axe:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_100_Battle_Bonus_2_Hours: 使用该物品后将使获得<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提高<font color='#9da1a9'>100%</font>，持续2小时。此外，您将使其他玩家额外获得<font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font>的<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>获得速率，该速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_100_Battle_Bonus: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>100%</font> for 2 hours. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_200_Battle_Bonus_2_Hours: 使用该物品后将使获得<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提高<font color='#9da1a9'>200%</font>，持续2小时。此外，您将使其他玩家额外获得<font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font>的<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>获得速率，该速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_200_Battle_Bonus: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>200%</font> for 2 hours. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Andalmere_the_Litigon: 身受赛莉蒙妮的福佑，还有银夜森林居民的敬仰，神圣的狮头虎身兽安德麦尔驾临战场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Andalmere_the_Li: Blessed by Selemene, honored among the denizens of the Nightsilver Woods, the sacred litigon Andalmere now rides to war.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aspects_of_Summer_Set: 这件捆绑包内含魅惑魔女的“盛夏娇容”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aspects_of_Summe: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Aspects of Summer' set for Enchantress:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blouse_of_Forsaken_Beauty: 一件柔软的罩衫，来自她抛诸脑后的风光岁月。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blouse_of_Forsak: A soft blouse from the days of her abandoned vanity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_Forsaken_Beauty: 双生的毒蛇缠绕在木石制成的弓上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_Forsaken_: Twin snakes coil around a bow of wood and stone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Forsaken_Beaut: 玛瑙点缀在这对护腕上。如今美杜莎对她曾经珍视的美貌嗤之以鼻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Forsa: Rubies stud these bracers. Medusa now mocks the beauty which she once held dear.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Circlet_of_Forsaken_Beaut: 金桂制成的头环下是精致的面纱，遮住美杜莎曾经倾城的脸庞。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Circlet_of_Forsa: A circlet of golden laurels holds the delicate veil that hid Medusa's once-beautiful face.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lunas_Helmet: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lunas_He: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lunas_Mount: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lunas_Mo: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lunas_Shield: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lunas_Sh: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lunas_Weapon: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lunas_We: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Critter_Egg: 具有魔力的蛋，可以解锁全新的打铁小贪魔款式。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Critter_Egg: A magical egg used to unlock new Smeevil styles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Forsaken_Beauty_Set: 这件捆绑包内含美杜莎的“祸水红颜”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Forsaken_Beauty_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Forsaken Beauty' set for Medusa:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Axe: 寒铁部落超凡的锻造技艺让许多敌人陷入苦境。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: The blacksmithing skill of the Frostiron Tribe has kept many a foe at bay.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Cape: 尤弥尔在广袤的北部荒原游荡时，他曾在寒铁部落驻足。在他离开时接受了馈赠作为纪念。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: As Ymir wandered the great northern wilderness, he spent time among the Frostiron Tribe.  Upon his departure, he was given gifts to remember them by.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Fist: 轻盈的外表下是无与伦比的耐用，这个拳套赠与巨牙海民是希望他能平安归来。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: Deceptively light yet incredibly durable, this glove was gifted to Tusk with the hope that it might ensure Ymir's safe return.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Helm: 身为北海的住民，寒铁部族生性高傲，历史源远流长。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: Denizens of the northern sea, the Frostiron Tribe are a proud people with a rich history.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Set: 这件捆绑包内含巨牙海民的”寒铁雄风“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Frostiron Raider' set for Tusk:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Shield: 在尤弥尔停留于寒铁部落之时，他也去练习打造盔甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: During his stay with the Frostiron Tribe, Ymir tried his hand at crafting armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider_Tusks: 寒铁部落的工匠都是冶炼金属的大师，他们为尤弥尔打造了钢铁的巨牙，作为他勇猛的象征。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Raider: Masters of metals, the artisans of the Frostiron Tribe crafted steel tusks for Ymir as a symbol of his bravery.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorceress_Brooc: 镶在这件头饰上是寒铁部落的工匠雕刻的冰川蓝宝石。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorcer: The brooch is made of glacial sapphire carved by the artisans of the Frostiron tribe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorceress_Cape: 寒铁部落，极少为世人所知晓，可以织就耐用性和保暖性都无与伦比的布料。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorcer: A tribe unknown to much of the world, the Frostiron are able to weave fabrics of incredible durability and warmth.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorceress_Cuffs: 短暂的春天降临冰冷的北方时，尤弥尔动身前往荒原。暖季逝去，寒冬归来，这时他也一同归来，带来了礼物还有在北海岸附近的隐秘部落生活的故事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorcer: As fleeting spring came to the icy north, Ymir set off into the wilderness.  The warm seasons passed, and when winter returned so did he, bringing with him gifts and tales of a hidden tribe living near the coast.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorceress_Pads: 护肩几乎轻如鸿毛，但能偏转甚至是最为强劲的招式。这是寒铁部落世代相传的技艺，制作出轻似雪花的饰物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorcer: The pads are deceptively durable, able to deflect even the strongest blow.  Such is the skill of the Frostiron Tribe that they remain as light as a snowflake.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorceress_Set: 这件捆绑包内含水晶室女的”寒铁巫女“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorcer: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Frostiron Sorceress' set for Crystal Maiden:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorceress_Staff: 天然雕琢的冰川蓝宝石闪耀着一丝寒意，象征着寒铁部落冰冷的决心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostiron_Sorcer: The cool glow of an uncut glacial sapphire symbolizes the icy resolve of the Frostiron Tribe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gemmed_Armor_of_the_Pries: 教义靠信仰，战斗靠铠甲。这件捆绑包内含陈的“诸王教父的珠宝铠甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gemmed_Armor_of_: Trust in faith, but wear good armor.  This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Gemmed Armor of the Priest Kings' set for Chen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gemmed_Bracers_of_the_Pri: 你是信仰最坚实的武器。当然也是左右手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gemmed_Bracers_o: You are the strong right arm of the faith.  Also, the left arm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gemmed_Mitre_of_the_Pries: 只许最为高贵之人佩戴，这件头饰象征着信仰最高的成就。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gemmed_Mitre_of_: Worn only by the most revered, this headpiece symbolizes the highest attainment of the faith.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gemmed_Pauldrons_of_the_P: 沉重的铠甲戴在双肩上，象征着信仰带来的责任无法摆脱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gemmed_Pauldrons: Worn heavy on the shoulders as a symbol that none may shrug off the responsibilities of faith.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ruling_Staff_of_the_Pries: 他宅心仁厚。赐死就是他的善举，这根神圣的法杖就是他善施的手段。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ruling_Staff_of_: He is merciful.  Death is the mercy he offers, and this sacred staff the means by which it is granted.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarab_Pendant_of_the_Pri: 这可不是虚假的偶像，绝对是货真价实，这只神圣的圣甲虫某天将会展开金色的翅膀飞翔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarab_Pendant_o: This is no false idol, but an idol true, from which the sacred scarab of the faith may one day spread its golden wings and fly.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Smeevil_Treat: 好吃的糖果，可以解锁新的打铁小恶魔款式。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Smeevil_Treat: A tasty snack used to unlock new Smeevil styles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Summers_Bounty: 看到这么漂亮的长矛谁忍心逃走呢？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Summers_Bounty: Who would want to run away from such a beautiful spear?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Summers_Charm: 穿着橡树树枝，魅惑魔女能轻松遁入遍地的夏天树荫中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Summers_Charm: Bedizened with oaken branches, Enchantress easily blends into the rich summer shade.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Summers_Light: 戴着这对闪亮的护肩，魅惑魔女向盛夏蓝天的日晕表示敬意。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Summers_Light: Wearing these luminous pauldrons, Enchantress honors the glory of the summer sky.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Summers_Mirth: 欢乐和笑语是魅惑魔女讨人喜的点缀。既然夏天有了清凉的常青藤谁还管冬天呢？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Summers_Mirth: Mirth and merriment bedeck the lovely Enchantress. Ivy is cool in summer and who cares about winter anyway?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Summers_Warmth: 每一个火热的夏日最后必然会让给夜晚凉爽的清风。这件轻盈的衣饰抵挡丝丝的凉意可是绰绰有余。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Summers_Warmth: Every warm summer day must eventually give way to the cool breezes of evening. This light covering is more than enough to ward off goosebumps.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sweep_of_Forsaken_Beauty: 丝制的尾梢轻轻扫过美杜莎的徘徊之路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sweep_of_Forsake: Silken cloths sweep the ground where Medusa wanders.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ThriceGemmed_Barding_of_S: 坐骑临危救命已达三次。盔甲上的宝石因而镶上三颗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ThriceGemmed_Bar: Three times your steed has saved your life.  Three times you have graced its barding with a gem.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Incandescent_: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含单件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Inca: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Gemmed_Armor_of_the_Priest_Kin: 诸王教父的珠宝铠甲套装
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Gemmed_Armor_of_the_P: Gemmed Armor of the Priest Kings Set
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Gemmed_Bracers_of_the: Gemmed Bracers of the Priest Kings
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Gemmed_Mitre_of_the_P: Gemmed Mitre of the Priest Kings
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Gemmed_Pauldrons_of_t: Gemmed Pauldrons of the Priest Kings
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Ruling_Staff_of_the_P: Ruling Staff of the Priest Kings
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Scarab_Pendant_of_the_Priest_K: 诸王教父的圣甲虫坠饰
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Scarab_Pendant_of_the: Scarab Pendant of the Priest Kings
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Set_Gemmed_Armor_of_the_Pr: Gemmed Armor of the Priest Kings
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Alienware_Cup__2013_Season_1__: Alienware杯 - 2013年第1赛季 - 管理员
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Arms_of_the_Deep_Vaul: Arms of the Deep Vault Guardian Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Acolyte_of_Clasz_Set: 这件捆绑包内含虚空假面的“超维侍祭”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Acolyte_of_Clasz: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Acolyte of Clasz' set for Faceless Void:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Alienware_Cup__2013_Seaso: Na`Vi倾情加入，与9支TI3的东方队伍一同争夺6万美元的赛事奖金。总计58-78场的巅峰对决将由BTS和特邀嘉宾共同解说。比赛由DPM Interactive主办，Alienware和Mastercard共同赞助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Alienware_Cup__2: Na`Vi joins all nine TI3 East teams to compete for a share of the USD 60,000 prize pool. The 58-78 premium games will be casted by Beyond The Summit and special guests. Sponsored by Alienware and Mastercard. Organized by DPM Interactive.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Deep_Vault_Gu: 包含斯拉达的“深穴守卫”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Deep: Includes all of the items in the 'Arms of the Deep Vault Guardian' set for Slardar:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Augurys_Guardian: 预兆的帷幔下是片神秘的树林，树林深处的守卫在尽职看守，保护着它的盟友。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Augurys_Guardian: From deep within the mystic woods behind the veil of augury, the guardian watches over and protects its allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Axe_of_the_Red_Conqueror: 红色统治一切！斧王可没功夫管其他颜色！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Axe_of_the_Red_C: Red rules! Axe does not have time for other colors!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Chaos_Incarnate: 混沌降临大地。混沌践踏世人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Chaos_I: Chaos comes to earth. Chaos rides you down.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Black_Rider: 手上的战刃高高扬起，混沌骑士就像一片无尽阴郁的天空降临到敌人的头上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Bla: With blade aloft, Chaos Knight falls upon his foe like a sky of endless gloom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Brawlers_Hard_Helm: 他一直都能称得上铜头铁臂。现在他更耐打了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Brawlers_Hard_He: He always was a hard-head. Now he's even harder.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CDEC_Season_24: CDEC是由顶尖中国玩家组成的内战联盟。每天将直播水平最高的三场比赛。每周积分最高的10名选手还将进行大乱斗。这将是难得的机会看到不同战队的职业选手协力取得比赛的胜利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CDEC_Season_24: CDEC is an in house league consisting if the best Chinese players. Each day the top three games will be broadcasted. There will also be a top 10 players match each week. This is a unique format that allows you to see different pro players working together.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CDEC_Season_24__ADMIN: CDEC是由顶尖中国玩家组成的内战联盟。每天将直播水平最高的三场比赛。每周积分最高的10名选手还将进行大乱斗。这将是难得的机会看到不同战队的职业选手协力取得比赛的胜利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CDEC_Season_24__: CDEC is an in house league consisting if the best Chinese players. Each day the top three games will be broadcasted. There will also be a top 10 players match each week. This is a unique format that allows you to see different pro players working together.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chopper_of_the_Mad_Harves: 切肉的本事提升的余地可是很大的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chopper_of_the_M: Ain't nothing a bit of cutting can't improve.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Alienware_Cup__20: Na`Vi倾情加入，与9支TI3的东方队伍一同争夺6万美元的赛事奖金。总计58-78场的巅峰对决将由BTS和特邀嘉宾共同解说。比赛由DPM Interactive主办，Alienware和Mastercard共同赞助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Alienwar: Na`Vi joins all nine TI3 East teams to compete for a lionâs share of the USD 60,000 prize pool. The 58-78 premium games will be casted by Beyond The Summit and special guests. Sponsored by Alienware and Mastercard. Organized by DPM Interactive.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guardian_Armpl: 深穴守卫的印记刻在这对护腕上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guard: The sigil of the Deep Vault Guardians is engraved upon the cuff.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guardian_Headf: 头鳍向外展开的情况下，敢挑战冲锋在前的深穴守卫那真是自不量力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guard: With fins flared, few would dare challenge a guardian of the Deep Vault for his charge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guardian_Spine: 守卫背鳍的样子对他的同伴来说就是识别的依据，对他的敌人来说就是严重的警告。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guard: A guardian's spinal display serves as an identifier to his peers, and a warning to his foes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guardian_Tride: 深海的生物中能够举起这样沉重武器的就屈指可数，更别说要挥舞了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Vault_Guard: Few creatures of the deep are able to heft such a heavy weapon, let alone weild it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreadknight_Blade: 恐怖爵士的剑身和剑脊融为一体，给那些胆敢挑战奥斯塔里昂的人树立了榜样。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreadknight_Blad: The sword and spine of the Dreadknight were fused and displayed in order to set an example for those that would dare challenge Ostarion.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreadknight_Cloak: 斗篷上的衬线里有纹印，据说能让恐怖爵士所向披靡。奥斯塔里昂证明事实恰恰相反。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreadknight_Cloa: The sigils lining this cloak were said to render the Dreadknight invincible.  Ostarion proved otherwise.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreadknight_Crown: 从恐怖爵士残破的遗骸中仅剩的饰物中进行提取，制成了这顶王冠，象征着奥斯塔里昂惨绝人寰的统治。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreadknight_Crow: From what little remained of the Dreadknight's shattered form was made this crown, a fearsome symbol of Ostarion's reign.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreadknight_Gauntlet: 黑曜石经过雕刻，描上金线，再把恐怖爵士他自己的头骨作为饰物放上；奥斯塔里昂最爱的莫过于显摆他过去的对手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreadknight_Gaun: Carved from obsidian, lined in gold, and adorned with the skull of the Deadknight himself; Ostarion loves nothing more than to display his former rivals.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreadknight_Pauldron: 在一只凶猛的半人犀牛挑唆下，恐怖爵士挑起了奥斯塔里昂征服他们的意愿。现在他们的骸骨除了给不死之敌做装饰外一无是处。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreadknight_Paul: Aided by a fierce magnosceros, the Dreadknight set upon Ostarion's kingdom intent on conquest.  Now their bones do little more than decorate his unliving foe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_ASUS_ROG_Dota_2: DreamHack ASUS ROG Dota 2联赛将于2013年6月15-17日，全球最大的游戏节，Dreamhack夏季大赛中举行。16支战队将争夺30万瑞典克朗的奖金。联赛由ASUS ROG和Plantronics GameCom赞助，Draskyl和Ayesee担任解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_ASUS_R: DreamHack ASUS ROG Dota 2 Tournament is run on the 15-17th of June at DreamHack Summer 2013, the world's largest Digitial Festival. 16 teams will fight for 300 000 SEK. The tournament is supported by ASUS ROG and Plantronics GameCom. Casted by Draskyl and Ayesee.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_ASUS_ROG_Dota_2: DreamHack ASUS ROG Dota 2联赛将于2013年6月15-17日，全球最大的游戏节，Dreamhack夏季大赛中举行。16支战队将争夺30万瑞典克朗的奖金。联赛由ASUS ROG和Plantronics GameCom赞助，Draskyl和Ayesee担任解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_ASUS_R: DreamHack ASUS ROG Dota 2 Tournament is run on the 15-17th of June at DreamHack Summer 2013, the world's largest Digitial Festival. 16 teams will fight for 300 000 SEK. The tournament is supported by ASUS ROG and Plantronics GameCom. Casted by Draskyl and Ayesee.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_the_Eyrie: 一根奇异的法杖，上面是天怒一族的神眼象征。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_the_Eyrie: A wizardly staff bearing the Skywrath symbol of clairvoyance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Falcons_Rise: 天怒一族尊崇所有鸟类生物，对于猎鹰更是尤为敬畏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Falcons_Rise: The Skywrath revere all avian species, and hold the falcon in particularly high esteem.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gauntlets_of_the_Acolyte_: 听到这对护臂在祈祷人面前咣当相碰后，超维视界的高阶精华以幸运和守护作为回应。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gauntlets_of_the: Hearing these gauntlets clanged together sharply in an aspect of prayer, the high essence of Claszureme responds with gifts of luck and protection.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Girdpiece_of_the_Acolyte_: 想要进入超维视界必须了解超维活动...这样就需要把自己的腰保护得好好的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Girdpiece_of_the: To enter Claszureme, one must study the workings of Clasz...and such endeavors require one gird oneself well.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gown_of_the_Phoenix_Blood: 设计长袍采用的古老款式曾经在纷争之国西部的贵族中一度流行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gown_of_the_Phoe: The dress was made in an old style once popular among the nobles of western Misrule.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Graveheart_Staff: 在死亡的边缘，生命的火花还是能重燃衰弱的心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Graveheart_Staff: At the edge of death, a spark of life remains to restart a faltering heart.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gunslingers_Bracers: 身上穿的衣服上任何物件都应该具备携带弹药的功能。即使是时尚的护腕。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gunslingers_Brac: Any article of clothing worn upon the body should be capable to carrying ammunition.  Even stylish bracers.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gunslingers_Cape: 通过使身体轮廓变得模糊，这件斗篷经过验证，在应对长距离狙击时非常有用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gunslingers_Cape: By obscuring the profile, this cape has proven a useful countermeasure against long distance sniping.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gunslingers_Hat: 想要说这神枪手脑袋上有子弹，这顶帽子实在是太合适了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gunslingers_Hat: The perfect hat for a shootest accused of having bullets on the brain.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gunslingers_Rifle: 对于高原基恩人来说，神枪手制造自己的武器属于一种荣耀。所以一记漂亮的狙击是犀利的目光与天生的枪支设计头脑结合的产物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gunslingers_Rifl: For the highland Keens, it is a matter of honor that each shootist construct his own weapon.  Thus a good shot is the product of both a sharp eye, and a keen mind for gun design.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Headwraps_of_the_Acolyte_: 超维侍祭都无需肉眼就能看到祭祀。即使眼睛还在，用不了多久也会分离的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Headwraps_of_the: No acolyte of Clasz needs eyes of flesh to observe the rites. Those who have them to begin with must soon part ways.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heirloom_of_the_Charred_B: 这件头饰原来的主人来自一个高贵的家族，现在已经是灰烬的历史。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heirloom_of_the_: An heirloom of a once-noble house, now one with the ashes of history.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Red_Conqueror: 斧王戴上这副头盔，他眼里尽是红色。这跟斧王简直是天生一对。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Red_: When Axe wears this helm, Axe sees red. Which is perfectly fine with Axe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hook_of_the_Mad_Harvester: 想要肉再嫩点吗？只要再拉近点剁。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hook_of_the_Mad_: You want your meat tender, right?  Gotta bring it in close for that.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Insanity_Mask: 如果鲜肉看不到屠手的真容就有趣多了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Insanity_Mask: It's a lot funnier when the meat can't see what killed it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_the_Acolyte_of_: 超维信徒在跨维度穿梭时需要抵挡住维度间隙的寒冷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_the_Ac: Travelling between dimensions, followers of Clasz require protection from the chill interstitial spaces.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nails_in_the_Mad_Harveste: 如果不想让肩膀掉下来，我是不知道更好的办法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nails_in_the_Mad: If there's a better way to keep a shoulder together, I ain't heard it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldron_of_the_Red_Conqu: 斧王强壮的肌肉被肩铠所遮盖看似一种持续，不过至少红色非常符合。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldron_of_the_: It seems a shame to cover Axe's mighty thews with pauldrons, but at least these are suitably red.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pyre: 快放弃希望，撞到闪耀的焚焰上！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pyre: Give up hope and cast yourself upon the blazing Pyre!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_Bonelord_C: 一个以纺织见长的小国家，幸存的国民为冥魂大帝赶制了这件斗篷，期望他能宽恕他们的性命。他做到了。（不过就一次。）
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_B: The surviving subjects of a small kingdom known for its textile specialists fashioned this cape for Wraith King in hopes that he would spare their lives. Which he did. (Just this once.)
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_Bonelord_C: 冥魂大帝将王冠作为贡品，将其戴上不仅是为了给他们的敌人恐惧，也是一种把玩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_B: Wraith King takes crowns in tribute, and wears them both to strike terror into his enemies, and for a lark.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_Bonelord_G: 一个出奇耐用的物件，从一个完全是由不知骨头为何物的无脊椎动物栖息的大陆引进。（千万别告诉冥魂大帝！）
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_B: An item of extreme durability, imported from a land populated entirely by invertebrates who have never even heard of bone. (Do not mention this to Wraith King!)
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_Bonelord_S: 这件捆绑包内含冥魂大帝的“冥魂领主盛装”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_B: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Regalia of the Bonelord' set for Wraith King:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_Bonelord_S: 邪恶的尖刺提醒着如果乱拍冥魂大帝的肩膀不仅是不得体，也是不要命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_B: Evil spikes serve as a reminder that slapping Wraith King on the shoulder is both unseemly and dangerous.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_Bonelord_S: 一把为白骨领主量身打造的宝剑，由他在铸剑业最忠诚的追随者奉上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_B: A sword fashioned for the Bonelord by some of his biggest fans in the smithing trade.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Remains_of_the_Dreadknigh: 包含冥魂大帝的“恐怖爵士的遗物”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Remains_of_the_D: Includes all of the items in the 'Remains of the Dreadknight' set for Wraith King:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Restraint_of_the_Mad_Harv: 如果你想要把人捆得动弹不得，那就要确保用上了结实的桌子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Restraint_of_the: If you're gonna strap a man down, make sure to use a sturdy table.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rope_of_the_Mad_Harvester: 如果这些肠子也想亮相，还是派上实际用途为好！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rope_of_the_Mad_: If them intestines wanna be out, may as well put em to use!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scythe_of_Pestilence: 瘟情和疫症是死神实现灵魂大丰收的可靠工具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scythe_of_Pestil: Plague and pestilence are the Reaper's trusty tools for harvesting souls.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scythe_of_Sacrifice: 死于幻影刺客的巨镰是一种荣耀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scythe_of_Sacrif: It is an honor to be sacrificed on Phantom Assassin's scythe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Skywrath_Sentinel: 尽管她再也不能出现在巍峨的苍白之巢上，仙德尔莎还是有盟友在她需要的时候给予她援助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Skywrath_Sentine: Although she may never reach the lofty hights of the Ghastly Eyrie again, Shendelzare still has allies that will grant her assistance when she requires it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sleeves_of_the_Charred_Bl: 长袖上缝入的玛瑙是由纷争之国的贵族赏赐。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sleeves_of_the_C: The rubies sewn into the sleeves are prized among the Misrule nobility.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Smashing_Brawlers_Shirt: 喂，在这件衬衫满是洞眼前最好穿上！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Smashing_Brawler: Oy, better wear this shirt before it's full of holes!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tassets_of_the_Red_Conque: 斧王腰上是像他的愤怒一样火红的腿甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tassets_of_the_R: Axe girds his loins with tassets as red as his rage.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Azure_Shroud: 天怒法师将自己笼罩在苍白之巢上方的蓝天下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Azure_Shroud: Skywrath Mage cowls himself in the blue of the sky above the Ghastly Eyrie
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Blood_Shard: 在非常罕见的情况下，冥魂大帝发现自己会欣赏不是用骨头制成的装备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Blood_Shard: On rare occasions, Wraith King finds himself able to appreciate items that are not made of bone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Garments_of_the_Charr: 这件捆绑包内含莉娜的“焦热血统之服”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Garments_of_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Garments of the Charred Bloodline' set for Lina:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International: 观看全世界16支顶尖战队在国际邀请赛中一分高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Watch the top 16 teams from around the world compete in The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Peacebringer: 他带来了和平，并将其守护。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Peacebringer: He brings the peace, and then he keeps it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Red_Conqueror_Set: 这件捆绑包内含斧王的“赤色战神”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Red_Conquero: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Red Conqueror' set for Axe:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Shell_Slicer: 即使是紧闭着贝壳，在里面蜷成一团也别以为斯拉克就无可奈何。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Shell_Slicer: Even those who huddle inside their tight-shut shells cannot consider themselves safe from Slark.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TimeMace_of_the_Acolyte_o: 即使是小小的侍祭也对无穷超维了若指掌。想要完全了解超维视界就需要对维度的守护付出更多努力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TimeMace_of_the_: One may be merely an acolyte, and yet have mastery of all the infinities of Clasz. For full knowledge of Claszureme, more dedication to dimensional defense is required.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tools_of_the_Mad_Harveste: 包含帕吉的“肉钩狂魔之具”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tools_of_the_Mad: Includes all of the items in the 'Tools of the Mad Harvester' set for Pudge:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_Incandesc: 使用符印解封<font color='#9da1a9'>炽热白蜡的珍藏</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of Incandescent Wax</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_steppe_arm: 在欧梅克斯竞技场的巡回游行中，没有斗士胆敢靠近战行者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_s: In parade to and from the arena of Omexe, no other fighter dares ride close to the Warrunner.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_steppe_bac: 没有半人马曾戴过马鞍，但是这样的一件马衣受到了很高的尊重——因为这是众望所归。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_s: No centaur shall ever wear a saddle, but a caparison such as this one is looked upon with high regard--provided one has earned it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_steppe_bel: 并不是欧梅克斯神话中的板甲，不过也仅次于此。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_s: Not the fabled plate of Omexe, but the next best thing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_steppe_hel: 在竞技场排位的晋级过程中，布莱德瓦登在即将登顶时戴上了这顶头盔，当头盔的尖端第一次在竞技场门口出现时欢呼的人群一眼就将他认出。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_s: Near the height of his climb through the ranks of the arena, Bradwarden donned this helm, and could be recognized by cheering crowds when the first tip of horn appeared from the arena gates.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_steppe_sho: 许多半人马都是被这件全是尖刺的肩铠顶死。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_s: Many a centaur was gored with this spiny shoulderpiece.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_steppe_tai: 在欧梅克斯竞技场里，这并不会让对手轻易抓住。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_s: In the arenas of Omexe, it would not do to offer an opponent much of a grip.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_steppe_wea: 开幕式用的长矛，一般是在欧梅克斯的开幕战中沾染鲜血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_warrior_of_the_s: A ceremonial spear, blooded often in the ceremonial battles of Omexe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_DreamHack_ASUS_ROG_Dota_2_Tour: DreamHack ASUS ROG Dota 2联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_DreamHack_ASUS_ROG_Do: DreamHack ASUS ROG Dota 2 Tournament - ADMIN
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Gauntlets_of_the_Acol: Gauntlets of the Acolyte of Clasz
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Girdpiece_of_the_Acol: Girdpiece of the Acolyte of Clasz
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Headwraps_of_the_Acol: Headwraps of the Acolyte of Clasz
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Mantle_of_the_Acolyte: Mantle of the Acolyte of Clasz
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_The_Garments_of_the_C: The Garments of the Charred Bloodline Set
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_TimeMace_of_the_Acoly: Time-Mace of the Acolyte of Clasz
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Tools_of_the_Mad_Harv: Tools of the Mad Harvester Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_AMD_Dota2_Premier_League_Seaso: AMD Dota2超级联赛第2赛季 - 管理员
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_AMD_Dota2_Premier_Lea: AMD Dota2 Premier League Season 2 - ADMIN
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Corsair_Summer_2013__ADMIN: Corsair 2013年夏季联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premier_League_: 万众期待的AMD超级联赛第二赛季已经回归。观看东南亚的精英队伍与Orange、Zenith、Mufc和Vici Gaming等战队争夺总计5 000美元的奖金。持续一个月的激烈赛事将由DotaTalk为您呈现，比赛由AMD全程赞助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premie: The highly anticipated AMD Premier League Season Two is back. Watch as SEA's finest teams; Orange, Zenith, Mufc, Vici Gaming and more compete for a total prize pool of $5000. This one month of intense action will be brought to you by DotaTalk and powered by AMD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_AMD_Dota2_Premier: 万众期待的AMD超级联赛第二赛季已经回归。观看东南亚的精英队伍与Tongfu、Zenith和Orange等战队争夺总计5 000美元的奖金。持续一个月的激烈赛事将由DotaTalk为您呈现，比赛由AMD全程赞助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_AMD_Dota: The highly anticipated AMD Premier League Season Two is back. Watch as SEAÃÂ¢ÃÂÃÂs finest teams; Tongfu, Zenith, Orange and more compete for a total prize pool of $5000. This one month of intense action will be brought to you by DotaTalk and powered by AMD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Corsair_Summer_20: Corsair与GosuGamers联手举办2013年夏季联赛，16支战队将争夺总计10 000美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Corsair_: Corsair hosts Summer Tournament 2013 together with GosuGamers, where sixteen teams will compete for the total of $10,000 USD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_June_and_Jul: 技嘉E-Sports锦标赛由Gigabyte赞助，DotaTalk主办。八支来自东南亚的参赛队伍一决胜负后获胜队伍将赢取1500美元的现金大奖。获胜战队将与中国的顶尖战队同台竞技，再赢取1500美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_Jun: The Gigabyte E-Sports Tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winners of 8 GMPGL qualifiers from South-East Asia will compete against one another for another cash prize of $1500. The winners will compete against the Top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_Starter_Lea: Nexon Korea为您呈现首次举办的Nexon先驱联赛（Nexon Starter League，NSL），比赛将由GOM TV进行直播。NSL的8支参赛队伍已经经过公开资格赛的激烈角逐选拨产生，他们将争夺2300万韩元的现金大奖。获胜队伍另外还将获得无须承担任何费用前往TI3的机会。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_St: Nexon Korea presents its inaugural Nexon Starter League (NSL), brought to you live by GOM TV. NSL will feature the top 8 teams advanced from Open Qualifier as they compete for a prize pool of KRW 23 million cash. The winning team will also be rewarded with an all-expenses-paid trip to TI3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Corsair_Summer_2013: Corsair与GosuGamers联手举办2013年夏季联赛，16支战队将争夺总计10 000美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Corsair_Summer_2: Corsair hosts Summer Tournament 2013 together with GosuGamers, where sixteen teams will compete for the total of $10,000 USD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_June_and_July_2013: 技嘉E-Sports锦标赛由Gigabyte赞助，DotaTalk主办。八支来自东南亚的参赛队伍一决胜负后获胜队伍将赢取1500美元的现金大奖。获胜战队将与中国的顶尖战队同台竞技，再赢取1500美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_June_and_Ju: The Gigabyte E-Sports Tournament is sponsored by Gigabyte and hosted by DotaTalk. The winners of 8 GMPGL qualifiers from South-East Asia will compete against one another for another cash prize of $1500. The winners will compete against the Top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Halberd_of_the_Steppe: 开幕式用的战戟，一般是在欧梅克斯的开幕战中沾染鲜血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Halberd_of_the_S: A ceremonial halberd, blooded often in the ceremonial battles of Omexe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Starter_League: Nexon Korea为您呈现首次举办的Nexon先驱联赛（Nexon Starter League，NSL），比赛将由GOM TV进行直播。NSL的8支参赛队伍已经经过公开资格赛的激烈角逐选拨产生，他们将争夺2300万韩元的现金大奖。获胜队伍另外还将获得无须承担任何费用前往TI3的机会。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Starter_Le: Nexon Korea presents its inaugural Nexon Starter League (NSL), brought to you live by GOM TV. NSL will feature the top 8 teams advanced from Open Qualifier as they compete for a prize pool of KRW 23 million cash. The winning team will also be rewarded with an all-expenses-paid trip to TI3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spaulder_of_the_Steppe: 许多半人马都是被这件全是尖刺的肩铠顶死。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spaulder_of_the_: Many a centaur was gored with this spiny spaulder.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Warrior_of_the_Steppe_Set: 包含半人马战行者的“草原战士”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Warrior_of_the_S: Includes all of the items in the 'Warrior of the Steppe' set for Centaur Warrunner:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_GEST_June_and_July_2013__ADMIN: GEST 2013年六七双月赛 - 管理员
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Set_Arms_of_the_Deep_Vault: Arms of the Deep Vault Guardian
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Set_Tools_of_the_Mad_Harve: Tools of the Mad Harvester Set
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Battle_Claws_of_the_G: Battle Claws of the Great Grey
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Demon_Quiver_of_the_C: Demon Quiver of the Crypt Guardian
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_Claws_of_the_Great: 这对利爪象征着月亮的颜色，被敌人的鲜血染红时除外。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_Claws_of_: These claws are the color of the moon, except when they are painted with the blood of enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Retribution: 行使正义的天怒一族所用的衣着布料来自于参天大树的高枝上找到的纤维，采集的时候已经脱离了大气。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Retribut: The Skywrath, on errands of justice, gird themselves in cloth made of fibers found in the upper branches of trees so tall, there is no atmosphere there.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Crypt_Guardian: 锯齿形长弓，适合一个燃烧的灵魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Crypt: A jagged bow for a burning soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Nimble_Edge: 提防未见之物和未知之数。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Nim: To guard against things unseen and unknown.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Taunt_Pack: 双击这件捆绑包，打开后将获得6件不同的嘲讽物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Taunt: Double click this bundle to unpack it and receive 6 different taunts.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Defense_Seaso: The Defense联赛已经迈入第四赛季，比赛由EIZO赞助，提供的奖金高达25 000美元。观看20支来自全球各地的战队在长达两个月的拉锯战中为大家呈现高水平的比赛。激活门票还将获得变色龙蝶，根据玩家阵营会变色的大胆信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Defe: The Defense is going into its fourth season, powered by EIZO and offering USD 25,000 prize money. Watch 20 of the best international teams compete in a two-month long spree of action packed high-class games. Ticket holders will also recieve Munk the Melyon, a fearless courier that adapts to the players current faction.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crypt_Guardians_Set: 刀剑和石头是我遗骨的护卫。这件捆绑包内含克林克兹的“陵寝护卫”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crypt_Guardians_: By blade and stone, guard my bones.  This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Crypt Guardian' set for Clinkz:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Crusher: 从凡间的秩序到毁灭的混沌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Crushe: From mortal order to ruined chaos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Gaze: 相传在毁灭要塞里，失明的铸造大师脑海里经常萦绕着天外妖域的景象。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Gaze: It is said the blind forgemasters of the Ruined Keep are haunted by visions of realms beyond mortal knowledge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Helm: 在毁灭要塞的炽热熔炉里，失明的铸造大师精心打造着他们的神器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Helm: In the molten furnace of the Ruined Keep, the blind forgemasters craft their wares.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Mantle: 暗黑的双肩上是混沌的重担。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Mantle: Upon the shoulders of darkness sit the burdens of chaos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Mount: 骑士所到之处，只会留下混沌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Mount: Where rides the knight, only chaos remains.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Set: 包含混沌骑士的“暗黑毁灭”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Ruin_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Dark Ruin' set for Chaos Knight:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Quiver_of_the_Crypt: 他背部的后面长了眼睛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Quiver_of_: He's got eyes in the back of his back.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dominator_of_the_Undersca: 狭窄迷宫里林立着锋利的刀刃，但是轻轻的刮擦在这件强化的铠甲上留不下一丝痕迹。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dominator_of_the: The Narrow Maze is lined with sharpened blades, but not the slightest scratch mars the surface of this hardened armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dominator_of_the_Undersca: 电能在剃刀的护甲中流转不息，随时可以使他的电鞭充满致命的能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dominator_of_the: Energy seethes through Razor's garb, ready to feed his whip with lethal power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dominator_of_the_Undersca: 在电鞭偶然出现反弹的情况时就能保护好剃刀的前臂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dominator_of_the: Protects Razor's forearms from inadvertent backlash.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dominator_of_the_Undersca: 狭窄迷宫里蜿蜒的小径都画在这个面具的里面，只有剃刀才能了如指掌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dominator_of_the: The twisted paths of the Narrow Maze are written on the inside of this mask, where Razor alone can study them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dominator_of_the_Undersca: 说起永劫之墟众多关押的魂魄，他们畏惧最甚的武器非此莫属。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dominator_of_the: No weapon is more feared by the involuntary inhabitants of the Underscape.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Elder_Bark: 纵使四季更替，力量永不磨灭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Elder_Bark: The seasons pass, and strength holds true.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Familiar_of_the_Great_Gre: 狠毒但也忠诚，灰狼的灵兽在任何战斗中都是有力的战友。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Familiar_of_the_: As vicious as it is loyal, the familiar of the great grey is a powerful ally in any battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Form_of_the_Great_Grey: 脱胎于你可怕噩梦的形态。灰狼就在你房间门口。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Form_of_the_Grea: A form out of your worst nightmares.  The wolf is at your door.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Form_of_the_Great_Grey_Se: 披着战士皮的狼。这件捆绑包内含狼人的“灰毛巨狼形态”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Form_of_the_Grea: A wolf in warrior's clothing.  This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Form of the Great Grey' set for Lycan:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gauntlets_of_the_Crypt_Gu: 骨头般硬的手套正适合骨头般硬的拳头。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Girdle_of_the_Nimble_Edge: 一名刺客必须具备速度和诡计，没错，但是万事没按计划进行时备用之刃就派上用场了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Girdle_of_the_Ni: An assassin must have speed and cunning, yes, but also a backup blade for when things do not go to plan.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gloves_of_Retribution: 反抗天怒一族之人落入了扎贡纳斯的手里可别指望会有好下场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gloves_of_Retrib: Those who stand against the Skywrath can expect no mercy when Dragonus has them in his grip.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Retribution: 天怒法师的眼神将刺穿他的敌人，就比用利爪刺穿他们早了一点。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Retribut: The Skywrath Mage pierces his enemies with his gaze, shortly before he pierces them with his talons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Nimble_Edge: 训练有素的头脑快过任何刀剑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Nimb: A well-trained mind is sharper than any blade.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_the_Crypt_Guardi: 有了这对保护颅骨的双角，没人能将克林克兹的灵魂之火淬灭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_the_Cry: With these horns to protect his skull, none shall quench the soul-fire of Clinkz.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Housemark_of_the_Great_Gr: 狼人在很久以前就弃用了他祖传王国的纹章。他重生为狼的那天就是纹章消失的日子，现在新的族室徽记就戴在他的肩上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Housemark_of_the: Lycan long ago gave up the crest of his acestral lands.  That crest died the day he was reborn a wolf, and now a new housemark is worn upon his shoulder.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jungle_Ruin: 在黑暗的密林深处藏着不少故事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jungle_Ruin: There are tales hidden deep in the jungle dark.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Leaf_of_the_Nimble_Edge: 目标的死亡是为了达到何种目的或信仰并不重要，只要他们中招倒下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Leaf_of_the_Nimb: It matters not what purpose or faith a target's death is meant to serve, only that they fall when struck.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nimble_Edge_Set: 包含幻影刺客的“敏捷之锋”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nimble_Edge_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Nimble Edge' set for Phantom Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldron_of_the_Nimble_Ed: 别让你的敌人找到出击的角度。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldron_of_the_: Give your foe no angle from which to strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_Retribution: 有着高高在上的双肩，扎贡纳斯的目光穿过了大半个世界，搜寻激怒天怒一族的可怜之人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_Ret: With shoulders high, Dragonus gazes far across the world to search those who have incurred the anger of the Skywrath.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the_Crypt_Gu: 这对如剃刀般锋利的肩铠赋予了肩刃新的含义。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the: These razor-sharp pauldrons bring new meaning to the term shoulder blade.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Plates_of_Sundering: 毒蕈的非自然生长，化成了与石头一样坚硬的结构。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Plates_of_Sunder: Unnatural growth of fungus, formed into structures hard as stone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_REDBULL_Esports_Champion_: 本届比赛邀请了24支亚洲战队，包括Orange、TongFu, Rattlesnakes、Vici Gaming、Rising Stars和For.Love。其中8支队伍将参加线下决赛，争夺21 187美元的总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_REDBULL_Esports_: 24 Asian teams invited, including Orange, TongFu, Rattlesnakes, Vici Gaming, Rising Stars and For.Love. 8 teams go to the offline final for a total prize pool of $21,187.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_REDBULL_Esports_Champion_: 本届比赛邀请了24支亚洲战队，包括Orange、TongFu, Rattlesnakes、Vici Gaming、Rising Stars和For.Love。其中8支队伍将参加线下决赛，争夺21 187美元的总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_REDBULL_Esports_: 24 Asian teams invited, including Orange, TongFu, Rattlesnakes, Vici Gaming, Rising Stars and For.Love. 8 teams go to the offline final for a total prize pool of $21,187.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Roots_of_Sundering: 只要喝上一口不干净的水就能使一个生物完全改变，拉席克能够通过这些枝干导出这样的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Roots_of_Sunderi: A drink of the the tainted waters can change a being forever, Leshrac is capable of channeling great power through these branches.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Cape_of_the_Great_G: 围在狼人脖子上的斗篷殷红非常，这象征着流经他血脉的狼血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Cape_of_th: Red is the cape that drapes Lycan's neck, a symbol of the tainted blood that courses through his veins.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shagbark: 胡小桃是森林里可靠的灵兽，靠运送物品获得的兴奋感为生。他的爱好是秘密和宝物，最大的愿望是你在线上永远别回家。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shagbark: Shagbark is a trusty forest familiar who lives for the thrill of delivery. Fond of secrets and artifacts, he hopes you'll never finish farming.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sigil_Belt_of_the_Great_G: 一条防护性铁腰带，锤打的形状与狼相似。他族室的最后一人将在安布里森林长久潜行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sigil_Belt_of_th: A protective iron belt hammered into the likeness of a wolf.  Long may the last of his house stalk the woods of Ambry.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spellbinders_Catalytic_Ma: 拉比克穿上这件有催化作用的斗篷时好戏才刚刚开始。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spellbinders_Cat: When Rubick dons his catalytic mantle, things really start happening.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spellbinders_Forgotten_Gr: 拉比克完全不记得这根抢眼的法杖，直到刚才他醍醐灌顶！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spellbinders_For: Rubick completely forgot about this greatstaff until just this moment!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spellbinders_Mask_of_Shap: 感觉有必要去做，或者只是为了欢乐，拉比克喜欢拿出这个老古董并时不时地显摆一下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spellbinders_Mas: Feeling ferocious, or simply for a lark, Rubick likes to take this old thing out and show it off from time to time.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spellbinders_Tattered_Clo: 大法师的法力再过高强也难免在战斗中踩到自己的斗篷。最终还是出现了磨损。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spellbinders_Tat: It is difficult in battle for even a great mage to entirely avoid treading on his cloak. Eventually it begins to show wear.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_Retribution: 天怒法师在每个场合都会带上特制的法杖。这根拥有天罚的记号。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_Retribu: Skywrath Mage carries a special staff for every occasion. This one marks an occasion of retribution.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_Sundering: 一根标准尾巴的变化形态，变成了能够放出孤寂脉冲的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_Sunderin: A transformation of a standard tail, into a weapon which pulses desolation.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_The_Magic_Ends_Here: 告诉他们邪法应得的下场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_The_Magic_: Show their foul sorcery the regard it deserves.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_What_did_you_say: 你的敌人发出声音了吗？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_What_did_y: Did your enemy make a sound?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Liquid: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Liquid: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Arms_of_Retribution_S: 这件捆绑包内含天怒法师的“天罚之甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Arms_of_Retr: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Arms of Retribution' set for Skywrath Mage:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Defense_Season_4: The Defense联赛已经迈入第四赛季，比赛由EIZO赞助，提供的奖金高达25 000美元。观看20支来自全球各地的战队在长达两个月的拉锯战中为大家呈现高水平的比赛。激活门票还将获得变色龙蝶，根据玩家阵营会变色的大胆信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Defense_Seas: The Defense is going into its fourth season, powered by EIZO and offering USD 25,000 prize money.
