Watch 20 of the best international teams compete in a two-month long spree of action packed high-class games. Ticket holders will also recieve Munk the Melyon, a fearless courier that adapts to the players current faction.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Spellbinders_Shape_Se: 这件捆绑包内含拉比克的“奥法宗师的行头”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Spellbinders: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Spellbinder's Shape' set for Rubick:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Thorns_of_Sundering_S: 这件捆绑包内含拉席克的“崩裂之棘”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Thorns_of_Su: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Thorns of Sundering' set for Leshrac:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Twisted_Arc_Set: 这套骇人电能的套装将让迷路的灵魂永远跨不出狭窄迷宫的边界。包含剃刀的“邪恶电弧”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Twisted_Arc_:
Keep those lost souls in the confines of the Narrow Maze with this set of fearful power.
	
	Contains all of the items in the 'Twisted Arc' set for Razor:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Stone_Edge: 巨石的重量让每次挥舞都能力压群雄。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Stone_Edg: The weight of stone drives every swing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Stone_Horns: 对于巨石山上古老的部落来说，经过开凿的岩石和精心雕刻的刀锋就是组成万物的材料。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Stone_Hor: To the elder tribes of the stone hills, all is of hewn rock and carved edge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Stone_Pauldron: 巨石山上的部落把飞行的天赋认定为上天的恩赐，这对铠甲正是向上天翱翔的族人致敬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Stone_Pau: Those of the stone hills view the gift of flight as a gift from the heavens, and so arms are made to honor those that soar above.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Stone_Set: 这件捆绑包内含兽王的“部落之石”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Stone_Set: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Tribal Stone' set for Beastmaster:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Stone_Vambrace: 在巨石山上，历史悠久的部落生命力绝非世人能够想象。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Stone_Vam: In the stone hills, the elder tribes endure unknown to the rest of the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Retribution: 在苍白之巢的上方，数片羽毛的飘落意味着扎贡纳斯将他地面上的敌人带到了高空中...再让他们自由落体。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Retribu: From high above the Ghastly Eyrie, a flutter of feathers drifts when Dragonus carries his earthbound foe to the heights...and lets them fall.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Yonexs_Rage: 在激烈战斗的血雾中，赤龙听见了真正的呼唤... Invictus Gaming的呼唤。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Yonexs_Rage: In the blood-mists of the fiercest of battles, the dragon finds its true calling... the call of Invictus Gaming.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_horns_thornsofsundering: 轻轻的碰下这对角就能让灵魂腐化得无药可救。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_horns_thornsofsu: Simply touching these horns can corrupt the soul beyond repair.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Form_of_the_Great_Gre: Form of the Great Grey Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_REDBULL_Esports_Champion_Leagu: 红牛电竞冠军联赛2013 - 管理员
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Royal_Cape_of_the_Gre: Royal Cape of the Great Grey
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Sigil_Belt_of_the_Gre: Sigil Belt of the Great Grey
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_Defense_Season_4__ADMIN: The Defense联赛第4赛季 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premier_League_: 万众期待的AMD超级联赛第二赛季已经回归。观看东南亚的精英队伍与Orange、Zenith、Mufc和Vici Gaming等战队争夺总计5 000美元的奖金。持续一个月的激烈赛事将由DotaTalk为您呈现，比赛由AMD全程赞助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota2_Premie: The highly anticipated AMD Premier League Season Two is back. Watch as SEAs finest teams; Orange, Zenith, Mufc, Vici Gaming and more compete for a total prize pool of $5000. This one month of intense action will be brought to you by DotaTalk and powered by AMD.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Earthsha: This new item has no description.
This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Alliance: 购买该战队锦旗来表现您对Alliance战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。升级锦旗代表着您是认真的！另外，装备锦旗后，在Valve所支持的赛事中观看您支持的队伍的比赛直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。Alliance锦旗能和其他粉丝的Alliance锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总价值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Alliance: Show your support for Team Alliance by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Team Alliance pennants can be combined with other Team Alliance pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Dignitas: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Dignitas: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_LGDInt: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_LGDInt: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2013_Ti:
这一物品是邀请玩家于2013年8月7日 - 8月11日期间前往华盛顿州西雅图市观看Dota 2国际邀请赛的邀请函。前去观看的玩家将获得现场预定座位。

该门票必须从您的游戏内背包中激活。一旦激活，门票就会被消耗，并从背包中移除，同时通过Steam账号注册。门票信息将在2013年6月30日之前以电子邮件的形式发送到您Steam账号关联的电子邮箱中。

另外本次购买还包括一份2013年国际邀请赛互动指南和一只打铁小恶魔信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa:
This item is an invitation to personally attend the Dota 2 International Tournament, August 7 - 11 2013, at Benaroya Hall in Seattle, WA. Attendees will receive preferential seating on the show floor.

This ticket must be activated from your in-game backpack. Once activated, the ticket will be consumed and removed from your backpack and registered on your Steam account. Ticket information will be emailed to the email address associated with your Steam account.

This purchase also includes a International 2013 Interactive Compendium and Smeevil Courier.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Barbed_Edges_of_the_N: Barbed Edges of the Nomad Protector
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Blade_of_the_Blood_Co: Blade of the Blood Covenant - Off-Hand
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_A_Dire_Gaze: 岩浆和坚石下藏着许多东西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_A_Dire_Gaze: Many things may lie hidden among the rocks and magma.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Defense_Grid: 这一物品将把默认播音员替换为《Defense Grid》中乐观睿智的弗莱彻将军。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Defens: This item replaces the Default announcer with the upbeat wisdom of Defense Grid's very own General Fletcher.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Bracers: 海洋漫步者必须穿行于世界之间，对怪异的种族进行评估，必要时开始谋划他们的毁灭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Brace: The Aqwanderer must travel the worlds, assess their strange peoples, and when necessary plot their destruction.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Carapace: 流转的离子注入这个外壳，为实战提供全方位的防护。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Carap: The swirling ions imbued within this shell offer all manner of practical protections.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Crown: 王冠给海洋漫步者的颅骨带来了新的高度，这样就更容易感觉到周围的事物，对自己的策略进行调整。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Crown: Special growths are conferred to the Aquanderer, so that they might better sense their surroundings and tune their thoughts toward strategy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Legs: 陌生的土壤上通常需要加大牵引力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Legs: Additional traction is often necessary on strange soils.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Neckbrace: 想要成为海洋漫游者就要承担沉重的责任。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Neckb: To become the Aqwanderer is to bear a heavy responsibility.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Set: 包含黑暗贤者的“海洋漫步者”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aqwanderer_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'The Aqwanderer' set for Dark Seer:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Barbed_Edges_of_the_Nomad: 高沙游民的武器对有些人来说略显野蛮，不过每面刀锋和弯钩都是为了小心行事而打造。这件捆绑包内含游民守卫的倒刺之锋主手和副手两把武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Barbed_Edges_of_:
The weapons of the Highsand nomads may appear barbaric to some, yet each edge and curve is forged with careful purpose.
	
	This bundle contains both the main and off-hand Nomad's Barbed Edge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battleseeker_Arms: 他钢铁般的意志会将你摧毁。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battleseeker_Arm: His Iron will shall break you.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battleseeker_Belt: 全位面野兽已经做好任何战斗的准备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battleseeker_Bel: The Beast of All Worlds is prepared for any battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battleseeker_Helmet: 看到他的双角你就该知道，这头非自然的野兽来自于现实位面以外的地方。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battleseeker_Hel: By his horns shall you know him, this unnatural beast from beyond the planes of reality.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battleseeker_Set: 包含裂魂人的“战魔”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battleseeker_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Battleseeker' set for Spirit Breaker:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battleseeker_Shoulders: 进攻就是最好的防守。肩铠也能起到点作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battleseeker_Sho: Attack is the best defense.  Pauldrons also help.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Blood_Covenan: 制作这条神圣腰带的布料沾上了剥皮双子的鲜血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Bloo: The fabric of the sacred belt was stained with the blood of the Flayed ones.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Blood_Covena: 采用最好的钢铁打造的远古战刃，在剥皮双子的鲜血中淬火。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Blo: An ancient weapon of finest steel, quenched in the blood of the Flayed ones.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blood_Covenant_Pack: 两件包内含血契之刃的主手和副手武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blood_Covenant_P: Pack includes both the main and off-hand Blood Covenant Blades.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodstone_of_the_Ancesto: 先于公测进入游戏，呼朋唤友开始游戏征程的玩家们，感激之光在此神石内流转。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodstone_of_th: For those who came before and sang the word, gathering friends as they began their crusade, the light of gratitude swirls within the stone.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Impen: The better to kill and cauterize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Fantasy_Team: 使用后此物品将会在您的互动指南挑战中再创建一支战队。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Fanta: When used, this item creates an additional team in your Compendium Fantasy Challenge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Bloodstone_of_the: 先于公测进入游戏，呼朋唤友开始游戏征程的玩家们，感激之光在此神石内流转。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Bloodsto: For those who came before and sang the word and gathering friends began their crusade, the light of gratitude swirls within the stone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Bloodstone_of_the: 先于公测进入游戏，呼朋唤友开始游戏征程的玩家们，感激之光在此神石内流转。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Bloodsto: For those who came before and sang the word and gathering friends began their crusade, the light of gratitude swirls within the stone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_the_Blood_Covenan: 他并不需要双眼，全凭剥皮双子的视线来指引。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_the_Bloo: He needs not eyes, who is guided by the sight of the Flayed ones.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Defense_Grid_Announcer_Pa: 这件播音包将把比赛的默认播音员和连杀配音替换为《Defense Grid》中乐观睿智的弗莱彻将军。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Defense_Grid_Ann: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the upbeat wisdom of Defense Grid's very own General Fletcher.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Edge_Crab_Dye: 变化多端的混合染料，配料包括但不限于水草根，黯酵酒，朗姆酒药水，深灰粉，食人魔酒酿和黄油。溶解岩石和贝壳的绝佳溶剂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Edge_Crab_Dye: A varying mixture including (but not limited to) sourvine root, dimwine, rummix droppings, powdered deepash, ogrog brew, and butter.  Good for dissolving stone, and dying shells.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Edge_Crab_Lure: 达尔山峭壁的漆黑海边是体形巨大的螃蟹聚集地。只要有合适的饵料，就能从藏的地方抓到一只。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Edge_Crab_Lure: The dim shores in Dalr's Edge are home to crabs of incredible size.  With the proper lure, one can brought out of hiding.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flamestitched_Suitings_Ba: 你知道要找到防火的头巾有多难吗？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flamestitched_Su: Do you know how hard it is to find a fireproof bandanna?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flamestitched_Suitings_Wr: 弄对配方，世界就能燃烧。弄错配方，烧得还会更旺！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flamestitched_Su: You mix it right, the world burns.  You mix it wrong, it burns a bit brighter!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Impending_Transgressions_: 包含末日使者的“迫近罪孽”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Impending_Transg: Contains all of the items in the 'Impending Transgressions' set for Doom:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Initiates_Cut: 刚加入高沙的游民部落的人就会理这种简单的发型。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Initiates_Cut: The simple hairstyle worn by an initiate of the Highsand nomad tribe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_LGDs_Golden_Skipper: 金色的秋刀鱼长久以来谣传存在但是几乎没有在野外见过。在出航公海的水手中，几百年来流传着关于一种生物的故事，它已经萌成了传奇，惹人喜爱的程度已经上升到常人无法想象的高度。看到眼前的生物，大家一致认为这就是那世间罕有的萌神。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_LGDs_Golden_Skip: The Golden Skipper is a species long-rumored to exist, but rarely seen in the wild.  Among sailors of the high seas, there have been tales passed down through the centuries of a creature whose cuteness is legend, and whose adorableness rises to a level that defies mortal understanding.  It can only be assumed that this is one such rare beast.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Bow: With this bow, the fire of war is set.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Gauntlets: 钢铁之拳与你的燃烧之心相称。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Gaunt: Fists of steel to go with your heart of fire.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Helm: 由于热量散发最多的是在头部。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Helm: Because most heat is lost from the head.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Set: 包含克林克兹的“失落群山”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Lost Hills' set for Clinkz:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Shield: 从千团森林中最古老的树木雕刻而来，这面盾牌能让老骨头免受攻击。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Shiel: Carved from the oldest trees of the thousand-league wood, this shield will protect old bones from attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Shoulder: 一块小板，能让你的骨头保暖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lost_Hills_Shoul: A little padding to keep your bones warm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Luminary_of_the_Dreadful_: 包含变体精灵的“恐惧深渊的光体精灵”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Luminary_of_the_: Includes all of the items in the 'Luminary of the Dreadful Abyss' set for Morphling:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_the_Blood_Coven: 身穿剥皮双子的斗篷你的敌人自然会认识你。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_the_Bl: By the mantle of the Flayed Ones shall your enemies know you.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Defense_Grid: 这一物品将把连杀配音替换为《Defense Grid》中乐观睿智的弗莱彻将军。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Defens: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the upbeat wisdom of Defense Grid's very own General Fletcher.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mok: 在斯洛姆王国分崩离析时兽园中逃逸的狂乱野兽之一，这只狡猾的山魈用莫克作为自己的名字，认为国民警戒的呼喊声是报告他的到来。现在他将他淘气的天性用于正道，跋涉进入任何混乱的战场，带给你急需的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mok: One of the wildest beasts of the escaped menagerie that ran amok during the fall of Slom, this wily mandrill took Mok for his name, thinking the citizenry's cries of warning were a herald of his arrival.  Now he puts his mischievous nature to good use, wading into any chaotic situation in order to bring you what you need.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nomads_Barbed_Edge: 高沙游民的武器对有些人来说略显野蛮，不过每面刀锋和弯钩都是为了小心行事而打造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nomads_Barbed_Ed: The weapons of the Highsand nomads may appear barbaric to some, yet each edge and curve is forged with careful purpose.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nomads_Edge__OffHand: 高沙游民的武器对有些人来说略显野蛮，不过每面刀锋和弯钩都是为了小心行事而打造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nomads_Edge__Off: The weapons of the Highsand nomads may appear barbaric to some, yet each edge and curve is forged with careful purpose.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nomads_Guards: 表面的搭扣提供了防护，不过相比传统的护体要轻盈不少。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nomads_Guards: The links upon the surface offer protection yet remain lighter than a conventional guard.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nomads_Shelter: 高沙游民很早就领略到高领的价值。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nomads_Shelter: The Highsand nomads learned long ago the value of a high collar.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pads_of_the_Blood_Covenan: 抵御发下血誓之敌的护甲。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_Impending_Tr: 在魔渊的火焰中，这对肩铠是由腐臭的钢铁和魔皮铸造而成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_Imp: In the fires of the pit, these Pauldrons were forged of rancid steel and demon hide.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quirts_Summer_Key: 用于开启上锁的<font color='#9da1a9'>宝箱</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quirts_Summer_Ke: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Chests</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quirts_Summer_Stash: 臭名昭著的恶棍Quirt丢失了一箱掠夺来的财宝！您将需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>Quirt的酷暑钥匙</font>来打开宝箱。您可以前往Dota 2商店购买。注意！在<font color='#9da1a9'>2013年9月16日</font>后宝箱就会破裂成无用的尘土。宝箱里是一件全新的神秘物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quirts_Summer_St: That disreputable scoundrel Quirt has lost a chest of plundered loot! You will need <font color='#9da1a9'>Quirt's Summer Key</font> to open the chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Beware! At the end of <font color='#9da1a9'>September 16, 2013</font> this chest will crumble into useless dust. This chest contains one of several mysterious new items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rachel_the_Mordebat: 瑞切尔可不是能沉得住气的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rachel_the_Morde: Rachel ain't one for taking things easy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reaper_Set: 包含斧王的“红雾死神”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reaper_: Includes all of the items in the 'Red Mist Reaper' set for Axe:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reapers_Armor: 红雾死神的印记与围巾相结合。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reapers: The sigil of the Red Mist Reaper binds the shawl.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reapers_Belt: 在红雾军团中，懦夫可是罪无可恕。逃离战斗之人将由死神的镰刀处决。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reapers: In the Red Mist Army, cowardice was not tolerated.  Those who fled from battle were executed by the Reaper's scythe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reapers_Mask: 尽管面具隐藏了死神的脸庞，但是事实上所有人都知道凶手的真容。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reapers: Though the mask hid the face of the Reaper, in truth all knew the identity of the executioner.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reapers_Scythe: 红雾军团中刽子手的残忍工具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reapers: The grim tool of an executioner in the Red Mist Army.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reapers_Tattoos: 死神的地位伴随着责任和旁人的敬意，都体现在了印记上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Mist_Reapers: The position of Reaper carried responsiblity and conferred respect, expressed in these markings.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spines_of_the_Dreadful_Ab: 奇特的海水中内含奇特的属性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spines_of_the_Dr: From strange waters come stranger properties.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Summer_2013_Bundle: 包含大量全新物品，共有46件物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Summer_2013_Bund: Includes a massive pile of 46 new items:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sword_of_Impending_Transg: 一把曾经铸造时热的通红，闪耀着七层地狱热力的魔剑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sword_of_Impendi: A sword ever being forged, red hot, glowing with the heat of all the seven hells.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_Impending_Transgr: 下地狱的时候这条尾巴就会发出声响。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_Impendin: This tail will swish till damnation come.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tassets_of_Impending_Tran: 怪物的肚子上围着恶魔的盔甲和腰带，由最好的钢铁铸造，在第六层地狱最深处的魔渊加固。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tassets_of_Impen: Around the belly of the beast is draped a belt demon armor, cast of finest steel, and hardened in the deepest pits of sixth hell.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tendrils_of_the_Dreadful_: 海洋深处底部的可怕生物还藏有神秘的美感。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tendrils_of_the_: The terrors of the deepest depths of the oceans are hide aspects of subtle beauty.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Nomad_Protector_Set: 包含敌法师的“游民守卫”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Nomad_Protec: Includes all of the items in 'The Nomad Protector' set for Anti-Mage:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Thrashers_of_the_Abyss: 在黑暗的深海中海水奇特又不失纯粹。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Thrashers_of_the: In the darkened deeps are waters strange and pure.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Impending_Transg: 他受到烙印的双翼已经包扎好，虽然今后都不可能将他带入空中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Impendi: His branded wings are bound and bandaged, though they remain forever unable to lift him into the light.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Blood_Covena: 深入骨髓的血之狂暴使你的手臂充满力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Blo: A deep bloodrage fuels the strength in your arms.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wrath_of_the_Blood_Covena: 包含血魔的“血契狂怒”套装内所有物品：流血时间到了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wrath_of_the_Blo: Includes all of the items in the 'Wrath of the Blood Covenant' set for Bloodseeker:  It is time for blood.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_acacia_bow: 满是棘刺的弓。尽显风力的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_acacia_bow: A bow of thorns.  A weapon of the wind.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_aghanims_basher: 什么东西能超越阿哈利姆神杖？这个。这个更屌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_aghanims_basher: What could be better than an Aghanims scepter?  This.  This is better.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_dragon_scale: Live by the sword, die by the dragon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_evildoer: 做的好事随我们死去，而做的坏事回响了很久。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_evildoer: The good we do dies with us, while our evils echo long after.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_flying_desolation: 死亡在眼前飞舞，顿觉妙趣横生。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_flying_desolatio: Death flies when you're having fun.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_raven_scythe: 白鸟种下的将由渡鸦收割。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_raven_scythe: What the white bird sows, the raven shall reap.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_reverent_headdress_ofthe_: 只有戴上了这件尊贵头巾才能将金框内深层次的想法进行思考整合。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_reverent_headdre: One can only speculate on the deep thoughts housed within golden confines of this reverent headdress.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_spine_splitter: 这把剑甚至不需要很锋利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_spine_splitter: This sword doesn't even need to be sharp.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_twin_serpent_bow: 当心毒蛇之弓的撕咬。胸部中箭可就无药可解了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_twin_serpent_bow: Beware the bite of the serpent bow.  There is no anitdote to an arrow in the chest.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_wavecutter: 这鱼鳍切开水面就跟它主人拿刀切开你喉咙一样。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_wavecutter: This fin will slice the water like its owner's blade will slice your throat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Flamestitched_Suitings_Wrap_an: 炎纫面料护手和燃烧弹
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Luminary_of_the_Dreadful_Abyss: 恐惧深渊的光体精灵套装
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Luminary_of_the_Dread: Luminary of the Dreadful Abyss Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Nomads_Edge__OffHand: 游民的倒刺之锋 - 副手
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Wrath_of_the_Blood_Co: Wrath of the Blood Covenant Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Batalha_Gamer__ADMIN: 巴塔哈大赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Bite_of_the_Slithereen_Knight_: 鱼人骑士之噬 - 副手
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bite_of_the_Slitheree: Bite of the Slithereen Knight - Off-Hand
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Blue_Stone_Shoulder_o: Blue Stone Shoulder of the Voyager
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Chaos_Knights_Armlet_of_Mordig: 莫尔迪基安的混沌骑士臂章
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_A_Bit_of_Boat: 一名昆卡手下的逃兵差点就坐着这艘宿命的小船上岸了。潮汐猎人选它做武器就是为了提醒那可怕的一天，丝毫不知昆卡是打心眼儿里赞同这船预示的叛徒下场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_A_Bit_of_Boat: A mutinous member of Kunkka's crew nearly made it to shore in this fateful craft. Tidehunter wields it as a reminder of that dread day, little knowing that Kunkka heartily approves of the message it sends to would-be deserters.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Admirals_Prow: 在战栗群岛的首次战役中从一名被击败的船长头上取走作为上贡之物，上将舰首是昆卡最为自豪的战利品，也是能配得上水手主人的帽子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Admirals_Prow: Taken as tribute from the head of a defeated captain after the first battle of Trembling isles, the Admiral's Prow is one of Kunkka's proudest war trophies, and a hat worthy of a master sailor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AetherWings: 帕克的双翼存在的领域相比身体其余的地方略有偏移，这是由于受到两部分的蜕皮期不同步以及不可预测的形态波动所影响。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AetherWings: Puck's wings exist in a realm slightly offset from the rest of it, and are subject to unsynchronized molts and unpredictable fluctuations of form.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Alphid_of_Lecaciida: 雷克希达的绿蝇领地几百年来繁衍生息，居住在树人的枝干上，靠不老巨人的树浆为生。在巢穴中有一只叫做小绿蚜的绿蝇，他的敏捷快速和好奇的天性让他脱颖而出。一天晚上，他离开了领地启程去寻找自己的命运，他深信自己超常的速度和奉献精神将会在战场上发挥强大的作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Alphid_of_Lecaci: The greenfly colony of Lecaciida had lived and thrived for centuries, inhabiting the trunks of Treants and nourishing themselves on the sap of those ageless giants. Among the hive was a young greenfly named Alphid who had distinguished himself through his agility, swiftness, and curious nature. One night, he left the colony and set out to find his own destiny, convinced that his exceptional speed and dedication could be put to good use on the battlefield.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arc_of_the_Northern_Wind: 来自一个灵魂的谢礼，这把弓纪念的是莱瑞蕾路过一片被厄运笼罩的森林时挺身前去拯救的侠义。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arc_of_the_North: The gift of a grateful spirit, this bow honors Lyralei's intervention in the rescue of a doomed forest to which she owed nothing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Bracers_of_the_Nor: 准备好迎接这对美丽的极地护腕内含的寒冷和冰雪。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arctic_Bracers_o: Brace yourself for cold and snow in these beautiful arctic bracers.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ataxia: 大步流星的坐骑下是燃烧的马蹄，魔兽永远在渴望混沌之火。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ataxia: On burning hooves it strides, a beast ever eager for the fires of chaos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Autograph_Rune: 神圣的印记，来自大神的双手。将符文镶入物品中完成签名。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Autograph_Rune: A sacred mark from hallowed hands. Socket this into an item to autograph it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bardings_of_the_First_Lig: 采用最好的丝绸织成，所嵌的是最为精细的黄金，这件铠甲的价值连格莱蒂斯的一根鬃毛都比不上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bardings_of_the_: Woven with the finest silk and plaited with the most exquisite gold, these garments are worth not even a single hair from Gladys' great mane.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Batalha_Gamer: 巴塔哈大赛（简称BG）由16支巴西顶尖队伍参加，争夺2 800.00雷亚尔的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Batalha_Gamer: The Battle Gamer (BG) is a tournament that features 16 of the best Brazilian teams fighting for a prize of R $ 2,800.00.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Eternal_Light: 幽鬼对于光的理解不是其他生物能企及的。她对永恒的理解也是。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Eter: Spectre's notion of light is not like that of other beings. Nor is her understanding of eternity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bite_of_the_Slithereen_Kn: 凭借着刀法和歌声，潮湿环境作业专家赢得了她在鱼人卫士团的地位。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bite_of_the_Slit: By blade and song, the wet-work specialist earns her place in the Slithereen Guard.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Boots_of_the_Voyage: 留心收在左边靴子上的短剑，可以用来雕刻木头，砍断绳索，还能把潮汐猎人的名字刻在甲板上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Boots_of_t: Note the blade stowed away in the left boot, suitable for carving wood, cutting ropes, and whittling Tidehunter's name in the deck.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_BladeBiter: 如鲨鱼牙齿一般锋利，如铁帆之钢一般坚固，强大的噬剑之刃对于所有面临战斗的水手来说都是件法宝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_BladeBiter: Sharp as shark's teeth, and strong as Claddish steel, the great sword Bladebiter is an asset to any sailor facing battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Endless_Havoc: 刀锋永远渴望着战斗，渴望着战争，渴望着混沌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Endless: Ever its edge thirsts for battle, for war, for chaos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blades_of_the_Predator: 有了这对利刃，夜神的敌人进入了众生之路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blades_of_the_Pr: By these blades, Nyx's enemies go the way of all flesh.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blotto_and_Stick: 他原来是一名赌徒，也是个骗子，布洛陀的滑稽姿势曾经出现在从这里到斯洛姆王国沿途大大小小的水坑、赌窝和陷阱中。现在他慢慢地开始洗心革面，承担起信使的责任，趁机骗走几个金币。他还带上了忠心耿耿的棍子来凑热闹！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blotto_and_Stick: A former gambler and shyster, the antics of Blotto were once known in every watering hole, gambling den and sleaze pit from here to Slom.  Now on the slow path to reform, he's taken up courier duties to con a bit of extra coin and brought his trusty Stick along for the ride!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blue_Stone_Shoulder_of_th: 昆卡并非海盗。而且，宝石就丢在那儿，如果不捡走就是白白浪费了。严格意义上来说这将构成盗窃罪。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blue_Stone_Shoul: Kunkka is no pirate. Still, the stones were just lying there and would have gone to waste had he not seized them. Technically, that might well constitute plundering.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bonds_of_Vincere_Set: 这件捆绑包内含痛苦女王的“王者之冠”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bonds_of_Vincere: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Bonds of Vincere' set for Queen of Pain:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Braces_of_the_Atniw: 意志的投射。力量的彰显。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Braces_of_the_At: A projection of will.  A show of might.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Breastplate_of_the_Slithe: 做工精美，好穿耐用，这件胸甲还能防范来自深海的危险。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Breastplate_of_t: As strong as it is beautifully crafted, this breastplace armor provides protection against the hazards of the deep.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Broken_Shackles: 低估食人魔的力量非常不明智，往往会送掉小命！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Broken_Shackles: It is unwise, and often quite fatal, to underestimate an ogre's strength!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Button_Down_of_the_Voyage: 一排十二个黄铜纽扣，还被修帆大师再三地缝紧，只有对方异常地坚定才有可能攻破这排结实的...贞操扣？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Button_Down_of_t: A dozen brass buttons, and triple-stitched by a master sailmaker, it would take an unusually determined prospective mate to surmount this formidable fortress of...chastity?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cauldron_of_Xahryx: 在悉拉的利爪使邪恶的鬼怪崩散前，锅釜一直容纳着最为狂野的力量。出于对邪恶势力会寻找这力量的考虑，锅釜被人带走，派上英勇的用场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cauldron_of_Xahr: Until at Sylla's paw the vile Xahryx fell asunder, the wildest power known was held within the cauldron's depths. In fear of what evil may seek such strength was the vessel taken, and put to heroic purpose.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chaos_Knights_Armlet_of_M: 力量来自牺牲。混沌源于力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chaos_Knights_Ar: From sacrifice comes power.  From power flows chaos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chestpiece_of_the_Eternal: 幽鬼心中的困惑里存在着一个受到保护的秘密，这正是暗示着那个秘密的可怕物件。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chestpiece_of_th: A nightmarish reminder of the mystery that lies shielded in bewilderment at Spectre's heart.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Circlet_of_the_Northern_W: 无论前往何方，莱瑞蕾戴上都是非常自豪，提醒着世人是她力挽狂澜，打破他人的必败魔咒取得胜利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Circlet_of_the_N: Worn proudly wherever she goes, Lyralei reminds the world that it is her business to turn back the inevitable, and discover victory where others have foretold defeat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Voyagers_Chestpl: 不要让板甲混淆了你的视线；他只是想让夹克别在打斗时弄坏了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Voyager: Don't let the plate fool you; he'd much rather the jacket survived the battle unharmed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Voyagers_Elegant: 如果你要去旅行，穿得有型点。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Voyager: If you're going to travel, do it in style.
For when a sword won't do.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Voyagers_Gloves: 上将手套的质量直接关系到他们能不能稳稳地握住剑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Voyager: The quality of an admiral's gloves is directly related to how well they can grip a sword.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Voyagers_Helm: 据说铁制盔沿和花翎的设计是出自昆卡之手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Voyager: The steel sweep and sprouting brush are said to be of Kunkka's own design.
For when both a sword and a pistol still won't do.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Voyagers_Treads: 在甲板上行走的时候可要让船员们知道谁才是头儿。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Voyager: When you walk the deck, make sure they know who's in charge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cleft_Hawks_Call: 在杜鲁德高地的众多坐骑中，胆小的裂隼在许多沟壑点缀的平原上安家。据说裂隼的交配鸣声非常刺耳，响得已经突破天际。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cleft_Hawks_Call: One among the many striders of Upland Druud, the timid Cleft Hawk makes its home within the many fissures dotting the plains.  The mating call of a Cleft Hawk is said to be as grating as it is unbelievably loud.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Boreal_Watch: 布料和毛皮厚达三层，能很好地防住北方的狂风。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Bor: Three layers of cloth and fur help to guard against the northern winds.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Northern_Win: 在某些世界中，北风带来了温暖，也带来了永恒之春的承诺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Nor: In certain parts of certain worlds, the Northern wind blows warm, with a promise of eternal spring.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compass_Edge_of_the_Voyag: 这把刀在无形之中就能指引刀下亡魂前往真正的死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compass_Edge_of_: A blade that invisibly orients its victim's soul to true death.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Batalha_Gamer: 巴塔哈大赛（简称BG）由16支巴西顶尖队伍参加，争夺2 800.00雷亚尔的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Batalha_: The Battle Gamer (BG) is a tournament that features 16 of the best Brazilian teams fighting for a prize of R $ 2,800.00
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Electronic_Sports: 2013年电子竞技世界杯将在五月到九月举办区域性的在线资格赛，总决赛将于2013年10月30日到11月3日在巴黎举办。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Electron: The Electronic Sports World Cup 2013 features regional online qualifying tournaments from May to September, culminating with the Grand Final tournament in Paris from October 30 to November 3, 2013.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Neolution_GosuCup: Neolution GosuCup将每月举办比赛，顶尖亚洲队伍中将决出四支争夺1000美元的奖金。联赛为期5个月，由GosuGamer.net主办。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Neolutio: Neolution GosuCup is a monthly cup where 4 of the top Asian teams compete for a prize pool of $1000. This cup runs for 5 months and is hosted by GosuGamers.net.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Corruptor: 注入了腐蚀的力量后，腐化之锋必须尝到血肉，不然斧王将患上无药可治的烂疮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Corruptor: Infused with pustulent power, Corruptor must feed on flesh or else Axe will suffer a troubling rash no apothecary's salves can soothe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_the_Boreal_Watch: 为不愿被看到容颜的人准备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_the_Bore: For those who wish their face never to be seen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cranial_Clap_Trap: 科学研究表明，在尝试通过化学手段操控食人魔时头盖骨将是一大障碍。拉泽尔已经消除了这个障碍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cranial_Clap_Tra: Skulls, it turns out, are a hindrance when one is attempting to chemically manipulate one's ogre.  Razzil has eliminated that obstruction.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Craniomancer: 圆圆的脑袋令人生厌。圆圆的后背也是。黑暗贤者现在的脑袋是整个宇宙中最为理想的。在智慧与意志交锋的战斗中，最尖的脑袋一般会取得胜利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Craniomancer: A round head is an abomination.  So too, a round back.  Dark Seer now sports the cranium most ideal in all the universe.  In a battle of wits and wills, the pointiest head will often prevaile.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crest_of_the_Wyrm_Lords: 神龙为战而来。他的手上还拿了一面沉重的盾牌。这面盾牌巨大非常，采用神龙锻炼的钢铁打造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crest_of_the_Wyr: The dragon comes for war.  He also comes with a big, heavy shield of dragon-forged steel on his arm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_Vincere: 女王戴上了她的噩梦之冠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_Vincere: The Queen wears her nightmare crown.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_the_Death_Priest: 死亡先知戴上这顶庄严的头冠，想让她与死亡的结合得到成全。结果她只能心怀遗憾地将其再次脱下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_the_Dea: Death Prophet consecrates her union with death by donning this regal headdress. She only takes it off again with deep regret.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystalline_Initio: 想要做个先手吗？想找到比水晶首杖更容易发起先手的可是压力山大哦！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystalline_Init: Care to start something? You would be hard-pressed to find a better initiator than the Crystalline Initio!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cut_of_the_Atniw: 这把老骨头已经很久没有打架了。白色的胡须将因敌人的鲜血添上几道红纹。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cut_of_the_Atniw: It has been too long since these bones felt combat.  White hair shall be streaked red from the blood of my enemies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dagger_of_Anguish: 在许多人的鲜血中浸染，不论是否情愿。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dagger_of_Anguis: Dipped in the blood of many, willing and otherwise.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deathripper:
黑魔法与崩坏科技结合后的可怕产物，残忍的死亡撕裂者是它主人的福音，世人的噩梦。

来自于钢铁王国，死亡撕裂者是亡灵国度科瑞克斯的致命造物，正如在史诗级的桌面游戏《战争机器》上所见。想要获取更多《战争机器》的相关信息，请访问www.privateerpress.com。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deathripper:
A terrifying combination of dark magic and science-gone-wrong, the bestial Deathripper is a boon to its master and a nightmare to all others.

Hailing from the Iron Kingdoms, the Deathripper is a deadly creation of the undead nation of Cryx, as seen in the epic tabletop miniatures game, WARMACHINE. For more information on WARMACHINE, visit www.privateerpress.com
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_Armor: 在一颗名为龙星的星球残存的等离子体中铸造，这件护甲的防护之力连龙皮都望尘莫及。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_Ar: Forged in the plasmic residue of a star called Dragon, this armor protects as no mere dragon hide ever could.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_Set: 包含殁境神蚀者的“龙星锻造”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_Se: Contains all of the items in the 'Dragon Forged' set for Outworld Devourer:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_Staff: 渺小的心智很快就被击溃。有了这根法杖的话，渺小的身体甚至要更快。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_St: Small minds are quickly broken.  With this mace, small bodies, even quicker.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_Stare: 我将粉碎他们的心智，破坏他们的征服美梦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_St: Their sanity I'll shatter.  Their dreams of conquest I'll destroy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_Wings: 先兆者快速扇动的翅膀下是暗黑之兆。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Forged_Wi: The Harbinger bears dark tidings on swift wings.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Sword: 受龙炎激发的宝刀。警告：可能含有真正的龙魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Sword: A blade inspired by a dragon's fire. Warning: May contain actual soul of dragon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreaded_Bravos_Cape: 霍加拉尔沙漠就是一个遍地五彩高塔的伟大帝国所剩的废墟。吸入沙砾就跟吸入玻璃渣无异。所以规定要戴上这层多彩的面纱并非只是为了遮掩容貌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreaded_Bravos_C: The sands of Halgalareh are all that remain of a vast empire of prismatic towers. To inhale them is to breathe fine shards of glass. So it is not secrecy alone that dictates the wearing of this colorful veil.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreaded_Bravos_Guise: 到了晚上，霍加拉尔废墟上的月亮能发出致幻之光将神智凝固，正如在白天裸露的脑袋会被耀眼的太阳烤熟。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreaded_Bravos_G: At night, the moon above Halgalreh's ruins casts an hallucinatory light that curdles the mind as surely as the blazing sun broils an uncovered skull throughout the day.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreaded_Bravos_Scarf: 在霍加拉尔的沙漠废墟中追寻秘密线索的过程中，即使是刺客也乐于采拾当地的一点颜色。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dreaded_Bravos_S: When pursuing arcane leads in the desert ruins of Halgalareh, even an assassin can justify adopting a bit of the local color.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dress_of_the_Scorching_Pr: 在派人制作这件裙子的时候，纷争之国的领主很快就发现想要找到防火的布料需要很高的代价。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dress_of_the_Sco: In commissioning this dress, the lord of Misrule discovered all too quickly how expensive fireproof cloth can be.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dressings_of_the_First_Li: 这件捆绑包内含光之守卫的“原初辉光”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dressings_of_the: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Dressings of the First Light' set for Keeper of the Light:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESWC_Diamond: 2013年电子竞技世界杯（ESWC）联赛门票赠品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESWC_Diamond: Included with the Electronic Sports World Cup 2013 league pass.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Electronic_Sports_World_C: 2013年电子竞技世界杯将在五月到九月举办区域性的在线资格赛，总决赛将于2013年10月30日到11月3日在巴黎举办。门票附赠界面皮肤“ESWC之钻”。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Electronic_Sport:
The Electronic Sports World Cup 2013 features regional online qualifying tournaments from August to October 2013, culminating with the Grand Final tournament in Paris from October 30 to November 3, 2013.
	The ticket comes with the ESWC Diamond HUD
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Embers_of_Endless_Havoc_S: 内含混沌骑士的“无尽浩劫之烬”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Embers_of_Endles: Includes all of the items in the 'Embers of Endless Havoc' set for Chaos Knight:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Encasement_of_the_Eternal: 象征智慧的宝石？有着魔力洞察的闪亮透镜？跨越位面的昆虫之眼？幽鬼的答案可不是这样。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Encasement_of_th: A gem of wisdom? A polished lense of eldritch insight? A dimension-straddling insect's eye? Spectre answers not.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Axe: 自协律分裂之时，黑暗骑士就开始猎寻。现在他手握漆黑之铁骑行——一柄在星辰之间的混沌中铸造的熵战斧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Axe: Since the moment of the great schism, the dark rider has hunted.  He now rides with blackened iron in his fist--a battle axe of entropy forged in the chaos between the stars.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Battlegear_of_th: 包含混沌骑士的“混战骑士的熵战装”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Battleg: Includes all of the items in the 'Entropic Battlegear of Warrider' set for Chaos Knight:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Helmet: 在凡人世界之上的位面中铸造，熵战盔只有黑暗骑士才能戴上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Helmet: Forged in a plane far upstream of the mortal world, the entropic helm can be worn only by the dark horseman.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Shield: 手持战盾和战刃，黑暗骑士留下了混沌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Shield: By shield and blade, the dark horseman bequeaths chaos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Shoulderpads: 身穿漆黑铠甲的骑士。骑士所到之处，死亡随即降临。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Entropic_Shoulde: Knight in Blackest armor.  Where the horsemen ride, death shall follow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Epaulettes_of_the_Scorchi: 在为他的儿子追求莉娜时，纷争之国的领主派人给莉娜制作了在宫廷更为得体的服饰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Epaulettes_of_th: In trying to woo Lina for his son, the lord of Misrule commissioned finery to make Lina more presentable to the royal court.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ernest_Do_of_the_Voyager: 有三种人不会去留胡子：男孩，妇女和人格分裂患者！我要强调下，我可不是第四种！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ernest_Do_of_the: There are three kinds of people that go around beardless: boys, women and amphibians! And I am emphatically none of these things!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fashion_of_the_Scorching_: 这件捆绑包内含莉娜的“热火公主时装”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fashion_of_the_S: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Fashion of the Scorching Princess' set for Lina:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_FezzleFeez_the_Magic_Carp: 费泽尔就跟大多数打铁小恶魔一样，没有摊开魔法飞毯的地板，所以他都是在半空中展开。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_FezzleFeez_the_M: Fezzle-Feez, like most smeevils, has no floor on which to spread his magic carpet, therefore he unrolls it in mid-air.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Firebreather_of_the_Voyag: 携带主要是为了显摆，不过昆卡发现在湿润的天气下拿火器点烟斗非常靠谱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Firebreather_of_: Carried mainly for show, Kunkka does find Firebreather's flintlock a reliable means of lighting his pipe in inclement weather.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flowering_Treant: 看上去是漂亮的花朵，实际上是冬虫夏草真菌感染了可怜植物后的活动形态。依然还是在自然的先知掌控之下，但是最终树精被感染后的结局基本是不能看了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flowering_Treant: What appears to be a beautiful blossom is in fact the motile form of a cordyceps fungus which has infested the poor plant. It is still under the control of Nature's Prophet, but the ultimate outcome for the infected treant is far from pleasant.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Form_of_the_Atni: No foe shall stand against the true form!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Owls_Beacon: 在冰天雪地的北方迷路的人几乎没有希望可言，不过相传能够召唤神出鬼没的霜枭就能找到安全的地方。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Owls_Beaco: Little hope remains to those lost in the frozen north, yet it is said that those able to summon an elusive Frost Owl will always find their way to safety.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostbitten_Cloak_of_the_: 冰霜即是冰爽。但是冰霜之噬除外，所以一定要披上这件绒毛斗篷保暖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frostbitten_Cloa: Ice is nice!  Except in cases of frostbite, so stay warm in this downy cape.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Garrad_Drywiz_and_Galacta: 在这卑鄙二人组的每个姿态中，邪恶病态的意图都是昭然若揭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Garrad_Drywiz_an: Evil and ill intention are obvious in every gesture of this despicable duo.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gauntlets_of_the_Boreal_W: 一名伟大的射手曾经戴过这对神奇的手套。据说上面铭刻的奇特符文会极大地提高佩戴者在战斗中的准确性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gauntlets_of_the: A great archer once wore these magical gloves.  It is said that the strange runes there inscribed greatly improve the wearer's accuracy in battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gladys_the_LightBearing_M: 伊扎洛守护光；格莱蒂斯守护伊扎洛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gladys_the_Light: Ezalor keeps the Light; Gladys keeps Ezalor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Green_Sleeves_of_the_Voya: 绿袖子，除了船长还能有谁呢？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Green_Sleeves_of: For who else but my captain, Green Sleeves?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_Anguish: 从热切的鳏夫那摘来的头颅。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_Anguish: A skull plucked from among the eager forsaken.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Guards_of_Vincer: There will be pain.  There will be screaming.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heart_of_the_North_Set: 准备好感冒了吗？这件捆绑包内含水晶室女的“极北之心”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heart_of_the_Nor: Ready for the cold?  This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Heart of the North' set for Crystal Maiden:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heat: 克林克兹并不是他部落里唯一保留在不朽之骨形态下的成员。这把弓，作为他祖父的遗骸，有着满腔魂焰和唠叨的建议。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heat: Clinkz is not the only member of his clan to be preserved in a form of immortal bone. This bow, all that remains of his grandsire, is full of spirit fire and unwanted advice.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_HeavenPiercing_Pauldrons: 尽管本质上完全是装饰作用，但是这副华丽的肩铠暗示着即使是深不可测的天空领域，祈求者的力量也能轻松破坏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_HeavenPiercing_P: While purely decorative in nature, these ornate shoulder pieces serve as a reminder that even the depthless celestial realm is vulnerable to being punctured by Invoker's power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Endless_Havoc: 在裂缝的骚乱中铸就，头盔永远在发烫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Endless_: Forged in the tumult of the rift, the helm burns eternal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Infernal_Despair: 生灵涂炭，希望衰亡，混沌的暗黑形态碾压战场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Infernal: Hope fails as lives shatter, and the dark form of chaos rides forth.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Hypnos: 你不可能逃离自己的思想。不过司夜刺客想让你试试。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Hypn: You can't run from your thoughts.  But Nyx wants you to try.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Slithereen_Kn: 这顶头盔和金色的头饰长久以来早已成为鱼人骑士团中指挥官的象征。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_the_Slit: This helm and golden headpiece has long been a symbol of command among the Knights of the Slithereen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hook_of_the_Atniw: 自然选了名好守卫，就像真正的战士选了个好武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hook_of_the_Atni: Nature chose her guardian well, as any true warrior chooses a weapon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ice_Capped_Hood_of_the_No: 当心冰川残骸的蹂躏！现在还披上了这件时尚的头巾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ice_Capped_Hood_: Behold the scourge of Icewrack! Now in this stylish hood.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Instruments_of_the_Claddi: 包含昆卡的“铁帆海军之具”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Instruments_of_t: Includes all of the items in the 'Instruments of the Claddish Voyager' set for Kunkka:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_International_Treasure_Ke: 用于开启上锁的<font color='#9da1a9'>优胜者的财宝</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_International_Tr: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of Champions</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kunkkas_Shadow_Blade: 战争之潮通常无处可见，直到时机太晚。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kunkkas_Shadow_B: Often the tides of war go unseen until it is too late.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kunkkistadores_True_North: 在他的航程中，真北会告诉他正路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kunkkistadores_T: On his voyage, True North will show him the way.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Legplates_of_the_Boreal_W: 轻盈耐用，这对具有弹性的腿甲已经经受住时间还有疲劳战斗的考验。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Legplates_of_the: Lightweight and durable, these resilient legplates have stood the test of time, and grueling battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Leviathan_Whale_Blade: 在汹涌的海面上如可怕海怪般令人惊叹的巨鲸游过，袭击船只并吞噬船员，吃饱了以后又消失在翻腾的海浪中，生还的船员在他的尾迹中抱着木头搁浅。由其中一名生还的船员所铸造，这把刀永远在搜寻巨兽的心脏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Leviathan_Whale_: Upon the rough seas swam the wondrous and terrible leviathan whale, set upon consuming ship and crew, and when it had eaten its fill did it vanish into the roiling waves leaving stranded those in its wake. Forged by one that lived, the blade ever seeks the heart of the beast.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Longbow_of_the_Boreal_Wat: 只有适应冰霜的人才能拉动苔原行者的弓弦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Longbow_of_the_B: Only those attuned to frost may pull back the bowstring of the Tundra Walker.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lockless_Luckbox: 别心急火燎地去找钥匙啦，因为这个宝箱根本没锁！我们的无锁幸运箱里面是多种珍贵物品，其他地方根本找不到的！所以钥匙还是留给需要的宝箱吧。你已经很幸运了！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lockless_Luckbox: Don't bother looking for your keys, because this chest doesn't need one! Our Lucky Lockless Chest contains one of a number of prized possessions that may be found only inside of it. So save your keys for a chest that needs them. You already got lucky!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mace_of_the_Chosen: 在魔霭圣池的原初迷雾中铸造的武器只有圣池选定去守护之人才能挥舞自如。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mace_of_the_Chos: Weapons forged in the primal mists of the Font of Avernus may only be wielded by those the Font has chosen to defend it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mammoth_Lure: 人们一度认为已经灭绝的矮生猛犸象还有一小群能在冰川残骸最北边与世隔绝的半岛中找到。他们是非常害羞的生物，不会轻易去吃诱饵，但是一堆用鼻子去勾的水果通常能引诱他们靠近。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mammoth_Lure: Once believed extinct, a small population of dwarf Mammoths can still be found on the isolated, northernmost peninsula of Icewrack.  They are shy creatures, not easily baited, but an offered stockpile of nuzzle-fruit will often entice them to approach.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Man_O_Cladd_Cape: 一件年代久远的容器，但是不单单是经受了海洋的考验。请将这些遗骨葬在铁帆海军的旗下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Man_O_Cladd_Cape: An old vessel, but more than seaworthy.  Bury these old bones in the flag of the claddish navy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_Endless_Havoc: 无止境的战争带来了重担，不过也带来了无穷的邪恶愉悦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_Endles: Heavy is the burden of unending war, yet many are its vicious pleasures.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Maze_of_Anguish: 被她的双翼所包裹就是在她的魔网中被困。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Maze_of_Anguish: To be wrapped in her wings is to be trapped in her web.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Meat_Dragger: 有时候肉不会乱走，除非你拽着它。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Meat_Dragger: Sometimes the meat won't go nowhere unless you drag it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Might_of_the_Slithereen_K: 有了这把刀，那真的是鱼人永不败。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Might_of_the_Sli: With this sword, truly, no Slithereen may fail.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mind_Piercer_of_the_Preda: 夜神的恩典非常隐秘地进入敌人的头脑。他的角进入时就没这么隐秘了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mind_Piercer_of_: Nyx's words enter the mind with great subtlety.  His horn enters the mind with considerably less subtlety.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Morcant: 这头洁白的生物找到沿着星光之径下凡的路，好像它听到未来的女主人呼唤它一样。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Morcant: This pale creature found its way down the starlight path as if it heard its future mistress calling.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Grip: 一根风干已久的法杖，适合身怀古老智慧的林中先知。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Grip: A well-seasoned staff, suited to the hoary wisdom of a woodland prophet.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Neolution_GosuCup: Neolution GosuCup将每月举办比赛，顶尖亚洲队伍中将决出四支争夺1000美元的奖金。联赛为期5个月，由GosuGamer.net主办。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Neolution_GosuCu: Neolution GosuCup is a monthly cup where 4 of the top Asian teams compete for a prize pool of $1000. This cup runs for 5 months and is hosted by GosuGamers.net.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightblades_of_the_Hypnos: 司夜刺客是刺客阶级的一员。这阶级只有一员。马上你就会成为无命阶级。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightblades_of_t: Nyx is a member of the assassin caste.  The caste of one.  Soon you will be a caste of none.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nyx_Dagon: 司夜女神对她恩泽的刺客施以祝福，常常使他获得奇特的能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nyx_Dagon: The blessings of Nyx upon her anointed assassins oft bring with it strange energies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Old_Ironsides_Gauntlet: 前方是汹涌的大海，这对轻盈的蓝钢护手将帮助你在风暴猛烈的战斗中存活。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Old_Ironsides_Ga: With rough seas ahead, these lightweight gauntlets of blued steel will help you survive the stormiest of battles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Old_Ironsides_Pauldrons: 给我走快点，你的上将已经穿着这对轻盈的风暴肩铠上船了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Old_Ironsides_Pa: Step lively now, your Admiral has come aboard sporting these lightweight storming pauldrons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Old_Ironsides_Prow: 铁帆海军长官的帽首是精心雕刻的洛克夫人雕像，她是群海诸岛的女公爵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Old_Ironsides_Pr: A Claddish officer's prow with a carved figurehead of Lady Locke, the merry Duchess of the Isles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Old_Ironsides_Shipbreaker: 你的舰艇已经靠岸！由蓝钢铸造的强健胸甲，按照舰艇的样子进行打造。目的在于粉碎敌人最棘手的防御。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Old_Ironsides_Sh: Your ship has come in! A sturdy cuirass of blue steel forged in the likeness of a hull. Designed to smash through the most intractable of defenses.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Osky_the_Ottragon: “奥斯基！奥斯基！真是个好孩子！”他蹦蹦跳跳地与人玩耍，但是嬉戏的外表下是永远的哀伤。他很想念他的兄弟姐妹。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Osky_the_Ottrago: \"Osky! Osky! What a good boy!\" He capers and sports, but underneath the playful exterior is an abiding sadness. He misses his siblings.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the_Boreal_W: 这对护肩由北方的卓尔人采用冰渊中的矿石打造，上面印上了北方守卫的记号。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the: Forged by the Northern Drow from the ore of the chasm, these pauldrons bear the mark of the Boreal Watch.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the_Northern: 从今以后，北洋中心的居民世代流传着风行者将会穿着这对护肩回到他们的家乡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the: Generations from now, the denizens of Njord's Hearth shall know Windranger by these pauldrons should she ever return to their demesne.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Plume_of_the_Eternal_Ligh: 既非羽毛也非树叶，更非二者的结合，这些烟羽的主人是居住在一个未知领域的永恒之光中的生物，而幽鬼来到这个领域全凭感觉，世上没有第二个人能够做到。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Plume_of_the_Ete: Neither feather nor foliage, nor quite a blend of both, the being from which these plumes were plucked dwells in the eternal light of a realm unseen, which Spectre navigates by senses that have no mundane equivalent.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Possessed_Blade: 将生魂的能量进行提炼并封入刀剑的技艺世上鲜有人知。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Possessed_Blade: Few now have the skill to condense and compress a soul's raw energy into a blade.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Preyfinders_of_the_Predat: 夜神的目的即将达成。你的死亡就是他的目的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Preyfinders_of_t: Nyx's purpose draws nigh.  Your death is his purpose.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prisoners_Anchor: 他们说你有了这个就走不远了。他们错大发了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prisoners_Anchor: They say you won't go far with one of these. They're wrong.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quiver_of_the_Boreal_Watc: 弓箭上的羽毛来自于北极身形巨大的北极雉鸡，箭身在蓝心冰川的径流中沐浴，据说中箭将使目标的心冻住。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quiver_of_the_Bo: Fluted with the plumes of the great arctic arcoch, and bathed in the runoff of the blueheart glacier, these arrows are said to freeze targets to the core.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quiver_of_the_Northern_Wi: 风行者的箭矢安然地放在这个箭袋里，能使箭矢冻裂的寒风不能影响它们分毫。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quiver_of_the_No: Held safely in this quiver, Windranger's arrows defy the threat of cold winds that might cause their sinews to crack.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Radiant_Claive: 尽管天辉圣矿那不可思议的锋利程度世人皆知，它的构造还是不可预知，这意味着几乎没有刀剑能在首次交战下幸免。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Radiant_Claive: While known as much for its incredible sharpness, the unpredictable structure of Radiant Ore means that very few such blades survive their first encounter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Atniw: 毛皮已经褪去。自然的奥秘已经揭开。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Atni: Fur is shed.  Nature's mysteries are revealed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Robes_of_the_First_Light: 与格莱蒂斯非常相似，这件法袍自日出之日的黎明就在伊扎洛身上了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Robes_of_the_Fir: Much like Gladys, these robes have followed Ezalor since the dawn of the first day.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Screeauks_Talon: 女神利爪由一名长着翅膀的法师打造，用没有回报的激情留下的阴影进行铸造，在悲伤中进行调和，在她爱慕者的秘密眼泪中进行淬火。更让人遗憾的是，现在她使用的半数时间都是为了追捕他。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Screeauks_Talon: Scree'auk's Talon was fashioned by a certain winged Mage, forged from shades of unrequited passion, tempered in grief, and quenched in the secret tears of her admirer. More's the pity that she uses it now, approximately half the time, to hunt him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shade_of_Agony: 他们会恳求她。他们会注视她。他们不能拥有她。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shade_of_Agony: They will crave her. They will reach for her. They cannot have her.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadow_Armor_of_the_Hypno: 身穿暗影铠甲，司夜刺客揭示了他神圣的阶级。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadow_Armor_of_: Adorned with the Armor of Shadows, Nyx reveals his sacred caste.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshard: 黑暗世界的一小部分，已经破断，可以刺入血肉并吸走灵魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshard: A bit of the dark world, broken off and ready to pierce the flesh and drain away the soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshard__OffHand: 黑暗世界的一小部分，已经破断，可以刺入血肉并吸走灵魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshard__Off: A bit of the dark world, broken off and ready to pierce the flesh and drain away the soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshards: 黑暗世界的一小部分，已经破断，可以刺入血肉并吸走灵魂。包含力丸的暗影碎片双匕：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadowshards:
A bit of the dark world, broken off and ready to pierce the flesh and drain away the soul.
	
	Contains both of the Shadowshard Daggers for Riki:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_Endless_Havoc: 随便他们拉开弓弦还是挥舞战斧。此盾皆视为浮云。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_Endles: Let them loose their arrows and fling their axes.  The shield cares not.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulder_of_the_Atniw: 愤怒化成了实体。巨大的护肩丝毫不在乎敌人的攻击。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulder_of_the_: Ferocity takes shape.  Huge shoulders rise to shrug off attack.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the_North: 这对寒冬的绒毛护肩能让白雪在肩膀上掉落。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the: Keep the snow off your shoulders in these furry shoulders of winter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Skull_of_Xahryx: 随着放逐的持续，数个世代悄然逝去，曾经有一股暗黑势力降临森林，图谋不轨。悉拉与他们周旋了很久，直到他们片甲不留。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Skull_of_Xahryx: As exile stretched and ages crept past, there came once a dark power upon the forest, intent on malice. Long did Sylla grapple with this force, until at last it was no more.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sleeves_of_the_Scorching_: 袖子发出的火光与穿上他们的炽魂并无二致。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sleeves_of_the_S: The sleeves flare out like the fiery soul who wears them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Soulhook_Bracer: 巫妖不禁注意到某些英雄施展钩子的功效。他学习新花招的热情也没有冷却。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Soulhook_Bracer: Lich could not help but notice the efficiency of hooks deployed by certain other heroes. Nor has his enthusiasm for learning new tricks cooled.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spectral_Light: 每当在世界的黑暗角落间穿行时，不被误当作猎物抓走非常重要。这件头饰上的印记可以警告位面间的掠食者，不过会吸引其他形态更模糊的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spectral_Light: When moving between certain dark angles of creation, it is important that one not be mistaken for prey. The sigils on this headpiece serve as a warning to some interdimensional predator, but an invitation to others less visible.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spell_Surveyor: 魔法之察总是在寻找能被偷取的技能！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spell_Surveyor: The Spell Surveyor is always on the lookout for spells that might be stolen!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spiral_Staff_of_the_First: 一根弯曲的法杖，里面保留了创世时最初火花的迷人记忆。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spiral_Staff_of_: A twisted staff that holds a captive memory of the initial blaze of creation.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spirit_of_the_Atniw: 内在力量的映射，巨熊部落的保障。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spirit_of_the_At: A projection of inner strength, and the bond of the bear clan.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Armguards: 无数星辰的光芒照耀出保护的能量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Armgua: The light of the uncountable stars shines out with a protective power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Band: 这件星辰之光头环是召唤星辰坠落的完美饰物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Band: This Starlight Band is the perfect accoutrement for calling down Starfall.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Bow: 这把弓中的光离开它的故乡已经一万亿万亿光年开外了。但是现在它找到了她的敌人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Bow: The light that fills this bow left its home a trillion trillion lightyears past. But it finds her enemies NOW.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Dress: 米拉娜骑过漆黑的银夜森林时她的衣服照亮了树木。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Dress: Mirana's garb illumines the Nightsilver woods as she rides among the darkling trees.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Finery: 在没有月亮的夜晚，米拉娜用细微的色彩装饰自己。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Finery: Mirana decks herself in the subtle hues of a moonless night.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Quiver: 闪耀着迷人星光的箭矢不是这个发光的箭袋能够容下的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Quiver: Arrows that shine with captive starlight are barely contained in this glowing quiver.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Set: 这件捆绑包内含米拉娜的“星辰之光”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Starlight_Set: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Starlight' set for Mirana:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stone_Infusion: “我感觉不到我的手臂。太好了。”
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Dagger: 既然看不见了，那就捅成一副惨像。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Da: There are none so stabbed as those who will not see.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Dagger__Off: 塔林皇室衰落的夜晚力丸在他父亲尸首里掏出了一把兵刃，这把匕首已经手刃了很多敌人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Da: A blade lifted from the corpse of Riki’s father on the night that House Tahlin fell, this blade has been sheathed in many foes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Hood: 欺诈师头巾能藏住你的双眼。但是只有欺诈师之心才能藏住你的罪恶。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Ho: A trickster's hood to hide your eyes.  But it will take a trickster's heart to hide your sins.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Set: 这件捆绑包内含力丸的“塔林秘客”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Se: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Tahlin Occult' set for Riki:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Shoulder_Si: 印上塔林皇室的标记后这个肩印对于所见之人就是个象征。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tahlin_Occult_Sh: Enscribed with the symbol of the house of Tahlin, this shoulder mark is a symbol to all with the eyes to see it.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tails_of_the_Sco: A style fit for a princess.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Fnatic: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Fnatic: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Teeth_of_the_Eternal_Ligh: 在早已遗忘的领域中铸造，这些利齿将引发闻所未闻的神经痛楚。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Teeth_of_the_Ete: Forged in a realm best left forgotten, these teeth induce agony from nerves that reach beyond mortal experience.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Atniws_Fury_Set: 包含德鲁伊的“白熊之怒”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Atniws_Fury_: Contains all of the items in \"The Atniw's Fury\" set for Lone Druid:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Boreal_Watch_Set: 包含卓尔游侠的“北方守卫”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Boreal_Watch: Includes all of the items in the 'Boreal Watch' set for Drow Ranger:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Dreaded_Bravo_Set: 包含圣堂刺客的“夺命杀手”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Dreaded_Brav: Contains all of the items in 'The Dreaded Bravo' set for Templar Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Dreaded_Forgewing: 人们说，恐惧是住在天空中，翱翔于烈焰踪迹之上。人们说覆盖盔甲的恐惧在风中飘游，将毫无察觉的生物用灼热的绳索抓到空中。他们说事情很简单：如果你看见了它，赶紧跑。如果它抓住了你，赶紧祈祷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Dreaded_Forg: They say fear lives in the skies, and soars above trailing flames in its wake.  They say an armor-clad terror drifts on the wind, snatching up the unsuspecting with a blazing lasso.  They say it's simple: if you see it, run.  And if it catches you, pray.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Eternal_Light: 这件捆绑包内含幽鬼的“永恒之光”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Eternal_Ligh: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Eternal Light' set for Spectre:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Immortal_Reliquary: 打造的年代早已忘却，里面的宝藏绝无仅有。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Immortal_Rel: Crafted in ages long forgotten, within its confines lie treasures without equal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Might_and_Bite_of_a_S: 包含鱼人骑士的主手和副手武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Might_and_Bi: Contains both the main and off-hand bladse of the Slithereen Knight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Norther_Wind_Set: 这件捆绑包内含风行者的“北风行者”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Norther_Wind: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Northern Wind' set for Windrunner:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_One_Horn: 一匹平庸的坐骑只要安上了独角和丝质的鬃毛就能转身变成奇异的野兽，什么时代才有这样的奇事？史诗时代，没有之一！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_One_Horn: What age is this, when any mundane mount can be converted to a mythical beast with the simple installation of a uni-horn and silken mane? An epic age indeed!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Slithereen_Knight: 这件捆绑包内含娜迦海妖的“鱼人骑士”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Slithereen_K: This bundle contains all the items in the 'Slithereen Knight' set for Naga Siren:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Steadfast_Voyager: 包含昆卡的“稳健航海家”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Steadfast_Vo: Includes all of the items in the 'Steadfast Voyager' set for Kunkka:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Throes_of_Anguish_Set: 这件捆绑包内含痛苦女王的“痛苦挣扎”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Throes_of_Anguis: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Throes of Anguish' set for Queen of Pain:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tinkbot: 受够了传统的递送方式后，修补匠开始做一些他觉得更为靠谱的东西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tinkbot: Fed up with conventional delivery methods, Tinker set to work on something he felt was a bit more reliable.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Trapjaw_the_Boxhound: 在隔世要塞的地牢中有个遗弃已久的财宝室。很多骑士都将发财致富的梦想落在了里面的宝贝上，但是只有一个人回来，述说了一个可怕的故事，一家子溢满黄金的魔箱将他的小伙伴们一一吞噬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Trapjaw_the_Boxh: Within the dungeons of the Severed Keep there sits a treasure hoard long abandoned. Many are the raiders who have set their sights on its wonders, yet only one has ever returned, telling grisly tales of a family of enchanted chests brimming with gold, devouring his friends.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Champions_201: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>邀请赛宝箱钥匙</font>才能开启该宝箱。您可以前往DOTA 2商店购买。该宝箱将在2013年8月12日后消失。该宝箱可能掉落独特信使，而且只会在邀请赛期间出现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Cham: You will need an <font color='#9da1a9'>International Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. This chest will disappear at the end of August 12th, 2013. The unusual couriers that may drop from this chest can only be found during the International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Megadon_Mask: 据说从骨头上能读出拥有者生前的故事，但是这个头颅原来的主人后来全身缩水，死的不明不白。因此现在作为战场上的面具出现，这样不久后骨头就会拥有自己的故事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tribal_Megadon_M: All bones are said to tell the deeds of their owners, yet the creature that once held this skull died small and of unknown causes. Thus it is worn into battle as a mask, so that these bones may soon be granted stories of their own.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vengencebound_Wings: 听闻他的挚爱被她的妹妹算计，扎贡纳斯乞求将他的双翼缚上护甲，作为他没能尽到保护职责的标志。护甲用奥术魔法铸造，在他展翅飞行时将带来极度的痛苦。但是这只是个小小的代价，因为他知道他还能上天，而她再无机会。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vengencebound_Wi: Upon hearing of his Beloved's fall at the hands of her sister, Dragonus pledged to bind his wings as a symbol for his failure to protect her.  The bindings are forged in arcane magic, causing excruciating pain whenever he takes flight.  A small price to pay, for he knows that though he can fly, she never will.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Whalehook: 照例来说，用来卷起大型深海生物的钩子不能将猎物卷起并劈进骨头和血肉。不过帕吉不在意他的鲜肉是否变成烂肉。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Whalehook: Ideally, a hook made for reeling in enormous creatures of the deep would not gouge and hack into the bones and flesh of the prey. But Pudge doesn't much care if he makes a mess of his meat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Whispering_Dead_Armor: 游荡的亡灵通过手臂上的骷髅进行交流。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Whispering_Dead_: The wandering dead speak through the boneguard.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Whispering_Dead_Mantle: 对于活人来说看见的只是骷髅，但是亡灵所见的是闪耀的灯塔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Whispering_Dead_: Merely a skull to the living observer, yet to the dead it shines as a beacon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Whispering_Dead_Mask: 雕刻所用的原料是注魔之骨，所以拉娜娅可以与游离于死亡之外的亡灵对话，这副面具是来自隐者七贤的赠礼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Whispering_Dead_: Carved of imbued bone so that Lanaya might speak with those beyond death, this mask was a gift from the Unseen Seven.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Whispering_Dead_Set: 包含圣堂刺客的“亡灵私语”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Whispering_Dead_: Contains all of the items in the 'Whispering Dead' set for Templar Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wicked_Peacemaker: 半人马战行者从来不会在没准备好和平相处的时候开战！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wicked_Peacemake: Centaur Warrunner would never run a war without preparing for peace!
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Vincere: The wings of pain take flight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wise_Cap_of_the_First_Lig: 原初之光照耀着众生，它的辉煌超乎了凡人的想象。一顶圆帽帮双眼挡住了光芒，另一顶能让伊扎洛直接凝视其中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wise_Cap_of_the_: The First Light, as it shines out upon creation, is bright beyond comprehension. One cap shades the eyes from its brilliance; the other allows Ezalor to gaze into it straight on.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wizardry_Staff_of_the_Nor: 有了这根法杖，敌人的命运就像水晶般清澈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wizardry_Staff_o: With this staff, your enemies fate will be crystal clear.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wrathful_Helmet: 亚巴顿的表情完全隐于头盔之下，世人只能想象他的脸部因愤怒而扭曲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wrathful_Helmet: With Abaddon's expression completely hidden, one can only imagine his features contorted by wrath.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Dressings_of_the_Firs: Dressings of the First Light Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Electronic_Sports_World_Cup_20: 2013年电子竞技世界杯（ESWC） - 管理员门票
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Electronic_Sports_Wor: Electronic Sports World Cup 2013 - ADMIN PASS
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Entropic_Battlegear_of_the_War: 混战骑士的熵战装套装
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Entropic_Battlegear_o: Entropic Battlegear of the Warrider Set
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Fashion_of_the_Scorch: Fashion of the Scorching Princess Set
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Ice_Capped_Hood_of_th: Ice Capped Hood of the North
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Instruments_of_the_Cl: Instruments of the Claddish Voyager Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Mind_Piercer_of_the_Predator: 掠食者的穿刺神智尖角
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Preyfinders_of_the_Predator: 掠食者的猎物探测尾刺
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Spiral_Staff_of_the_F: Spiral Staff of the First Light
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Tahlin_Occult_Dagger__OffHand: 塔林秘客匕首 - 副手
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_The_Might_and_Bite_of: The Might and Bite of a Slithereen Knight
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Wise_Cap_of_the_First: Wise Cap of the First Light
Tokens.DOTA_WearableType_Necromantic_SteamTech_: 亡灵蒸汽科技的递送机器
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Arms_of_the_Bladebrea: Arms of the Bladebreaker Dagger Pack
Arms of the Bladebreaker Order Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Blade_of_Shattered_Crystals_Of: 碎裂水晶之刃 - 副手
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Bracer_and_Band_of_Ancestral_L: 祖传吉运的护腕和布带
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bracer_and_Band_of_An: Bracer and Band of Ancestral Luck
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Deep_Wardens_Darkray_Cape: 深海守卫的暗射线斗篷
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Luck_Set: 包含食人魔魔法师的“祖传吉运”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestral_Luck_S: Includes all of the items in the 'Ancestral Luck' set for Ogre Magi:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Bladebreaker_: 包含力丸的“碎刃社铠甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Blad: Includes all of the items in the 'Arms of the Bladebreaker Order' set for Riki:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Augurs_Bounty: 智慧的裨益产生了珍贵的奖励。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Augurs_Bounty: The virtues of wisdom yield precious rewards.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Ancestral_Luck: 坚韧的腰带，非常舒适，在食人魔种族中甚至还有点时髦，不过真相是阿格隆在长老上锁的箱子里没找到发霉的食物结果非常失望。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Ancestra: A sturdy belt, comfortable, even fashionable among ogre-kind, yet in truth Aggron was disappointed that the elder's lockbox in which it was found did not contain a few scraps of moldy food.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_Armor_Hood: 头巾的颜色代表了碎刃社的规矩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_Armor_Hood: The hood is colored to represent the Bladebreaker order.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Dark_Wraith: 引起暗黑死神的注意与死亡无异。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Dar: A reminder that the Dark Wraith's full attention is equivalent to death.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Brush: 平衡是一个非常尖锐的东西。这个平衡物也是。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Bru: Balance can be a prickly thing. So is this counterweight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Dagger: 根据碎刃社的规定，得饶人处且饶人。刀把上的凹槽就是用来俘获敌人的刀剑，使其倒转，借此希望被缴械的对手不战而逃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Dag: According to the Bladebreaker Order, only those that must will die. The notches atop the hilt are meant to capture and turn enemy swords in the hopes that the disarmed opponent might flee instead of fight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Guards: 每个碎刃社的成员都在手腕上装备了倒钩，用来抓住敌人的刀剑并将其粉碎。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Gua: Each member of the Bladebreaker Order is equipped with barbs along their wrist, meant to catch and shatter an enemy sword.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Offhand_Dagg: 根据碎刃社的规定，得饶人处且饶人。刀把上的凹槽就是用来俘获敌人的刀剑，使其倒转，借此希望被缴械的对手不战而逃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Off: According to the Bladebreaker Order, only those that must will die. The notches atop the hilt are meant to capture and turn enemy swords in the hopes that the disarmed opponent might flee instead of fight.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Spaulders: 碎刃社更喜欢在肉搏战中将他们的敌人缴械，再饶恕他们。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladebreaker_Spa: The Bladebreaker Order favors disarming and sparing their opponents over direct combat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blades_of_The_Malicious_E: 崭露头角，实力彰显，百折不挠，无人能挡。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracer_and_Band: 食人魔能想起他的血统可谓是极其少见，还碰上有遗产继承的那绝对是吉运的眷顾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracer_and_Band: Rare is the ogre that can recall their lineage and lucky is the one with claim to an inheritance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Malicious_: 拥有危险之美的双臂来自一直在流动的未知暗黑以太。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_M: Of flowing dark and unknown aethers come arms of dangerous beauty.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Guard: 多穿点盔甲就能有很大的作用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Guard: A little armor can go a long way.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Mistress_Set: 包含痛苦女王的“锁链妖姬”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Mistress: Includes all of the items in the 'Chained Mistress' set for Queen of Pain:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Spur: 他们带着痛楚的尖叫其实是痛到了极乐。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Spur: Delight in pain as they squeal with agony.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Wings: 让她占有你，她会好好待你的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Chained_Wings: Let her have you, and she will keep you.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Dark_Wraith: 莫崔蒂对服饰的选择就跟她选择目标一样神秘。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cloak_of_the_Dar: Mortred's choice of garb is as mysterious as her choice of target.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Insomnia49_Dota_2: Insomnia49 Dota 2锦标赛将会在英国泰尔福德（Telford）的Insomnia49举办。英国的顶尖战队将争夺2000多英镑的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Insomnia: The Insomnia49 Dota 2 tournament will take place at Insomnia49 in Telford, England. The best teams from Great Britain will compete for a share of ÃÂ£2,000 or more!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_Pro_Leagu: Netolic职业联赛带着2000美元的奖金回归了。本次赛事将通过资格赛产生8支队伍与8支受邀队伍一决高下！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_: Netolic Pro League returns with a prize pool of $2000! The tournament will have eight qualified teams compete against eight invited teams!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Wraith_Set: 包含幻影刺客的“暗黑死神”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Wraith_Set: Includes all of the items in the \"Dark Wraith\" set for Phantom Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Warden_Cape: 能跟暗射线相提并论的东西并不多，但是你还是会发现极为耐用的东西。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Warden_Cape: There's not a lot to a darkray, but you'll find what's there to be pretty durable.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Warden_Haul: 包含斯拉克的“深海守卫财物”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Warden_Haul: Includes all of the items in the 'Deep Warden Haul' set for Slark:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Warden_Scimitar: 在守卫的私人藏品中，没有武器比其珍贵，弯刀消失后也没有更值得怀念的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Warden_Scim: No weapon was more prized among the warden's private collection, nor more missed when it vanished.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Wardens_Conch_Pauldr: 大家说一枚闪光的贝壳能在黑市卖个漂亮的一分钱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Wardens_Con: They say a glow conch can fetch a pretty penny on the black market.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Wardens_Impounded_Ho: 大家都说原来戴着这头巾的窃贼曾经杀了11名守卫，后来被抛出了海面处以极刑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Wardens_Imp: They say the thief that used to own this hood killed eleven guards before he was finally sent up for air.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Wardens_Tooth_Bracer: 如果你打算排除万难去越狱，那你还能带上几件纪念品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Deep_Wardens_Too: If you're going to go through all the trouble of breaking out of prison, you may as well take a few souvenirs!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Diviners_Bounty: 强烈的直觉作用下如此强力的贤赏为人所发现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Diviners_Bounty: Through strong intuition have such potent rewards been found.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flaming_Scepter_of_Ancest: 它到阿格隆手里实乃天经地义，它正好着火则是运气使然！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flaming_Scepter_: By rights it came to Aggron, and by luck it happened to be on fire!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_Arms: 在变体精灵获得的巨大恩惠中，这些碎骨能将有形的身体和非凡的灵魂分离。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_: Among the greatest of gifts offered to Morphling, these fines that separate tangible body from ineffable soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_Dorsal_Wi: 大海的首个恩惠就是迅捷，注入了像翅膀一样的背鳍中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_: The sea's first gift was swiftness, imbued in these winglike dorsal fins.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_Fin: 一条海蟒的部分尾巴？俘获海洋能量的水晶体？本身就是谜团的变体精灵才没空去瞎猜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_: A fragment of a sea-serpent's tail? A crystalline imprisonment of the sea's energy? Not even the enigmatic Morphling would hazard a guess.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_Head: 头顶深海的雄心和先天的学识，变体精灵身披发光的鳞片，豪情万丈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_: Crowned with ambition and innate knowledge of the depths, Morphling wears these shimmering scales with eldritch pride.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_Shoulders: 谁能够抗拒这样象征力量的光荣恩惠呢？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_: Who can say no to such a glorious gift of strength and power?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Girdle_of_the_Dark_Wraith: 在缄默的声音中，他们低声说着在名为罗德兰的遥远大陆学到的经验教训。这到底是什么意思？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Girdle_of_the_Da: In hushed voices, they whisper of lessons learned in a distant land known as Lordran. What can it mean?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_the_Dark_Wraith: 像死神一样，她与世人擦肩而过，不被看见。不过你发现她的话你肯定会喜欢她衣服上优雅的线条。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_the_Dar: Wraithlike, she passes unseen. But should you espy her, you would appreciate the graceful lines of her garb.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of__the_Dark_Wraith: 与她灵魂一样漆黑的头盔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of__the_Dar: A helm as dark as her soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_The_Malicious_Ef: 象征着绝对抗争的双角刺进了凡人的世界。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_The_Mal: Into the mortal universe pierce the horns of purest strife.
