Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Insomnia49_Dota_2_Cup: Insomnia49 Dota 2锦标赛将会在英国泰尔福德（Telford）的Insomnia49举办。英国的顶尖战队将争夺超过2000英镑的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Insomnia49_Dota_: The Insomnia49 Dota 2 tournament will take place at Insomnia49 in Telford, England. The best teams from Great Britain will compete for a share of Â£2,000 or more!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_the_Forest_Boots: 如同溪流在流淌般的美丽在林荫深处闪耀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_the_For: Their fleet-running beauty gleams and shimmers, deep in the forest shade.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_the_Forest_Bow: 密林的珍宝实际上是石化的树浆，一种色彩丰富的琥珀，来自非常古老的树木，可以追溯到卓尔人定居于密林时。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_the_For: Jewels of the Forest are in fact a fossilized sap, a richly colored amber from woods that were ancient when the drow folk took up residence there.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_the_Forest_Cape: 宝石需要完美的陪衬才能完全将其惊艳的美丽发挥到极致。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_the_For: A jewel deserves the perfect surrounds to show its stunning beauty to best advantage.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_the_Forest_Glove: 众所周知，卓尔游侠她自己不会亲自承认：她才是密林真正的珍宝。因此这对手套能够完美地穿上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_the_For: We all know what Drow herself will never admit: She is the true Jewel of the Forest. And thus these gloves are perfectly fitting.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_the_Forest_Scarf: 璀璨的宝石必须时而有所暗淡，以免被贪婪的眼睛发现。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_the_For: A brilliant jewel must shade itself at times, lest it be spied by greedy eyes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Malicious_Efflorescence_S: 包含幽鬼的“绝顶恶鬼”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Malicious_Efflor: Includes all of the items in the \"Malicious Efflorescence\" set for Spectre:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_Ancestral_Luck: 相传古时的食人魔是伟大的建筑家，技艺非凡的工匠...按食人魔的标准来说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_Ancest: The ogres of the elder days were said to be great builders and skilled artisans... by ogre standards.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Masks_of_Ancestral_Luck: 这对面具曾经的双胞胎主人早已被遗忘了名字。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Masks_of_Ancestr: The names of the twin leaders who once owned these masks have been lost to ignorance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Pro_League_3rd_Ed: Netolic职业联赛带着2000美元的奖金回归了。本次赛事将通过资格赛产生8支队伍与8支受邀队伍一决高下！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Pro_Leag: Netolic Pro League returns with a prize pool of $2000! The tournament will have eight qualified teams compete against eight invited teams!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ocula_the_Observer: 有着这么大的眼珠，还有什么能藏在大目酱的眼皮底下！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ocula_the_Observ: With an eye that big, there's no hiding from Ocula!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Peculiar_Prestidigitator_: 包含拉比克的“幻术鬼才”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Peculiar_Prestid: Includes all of the items in the 'Peculiar Prestidigitator' set for Rubick:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prestidigitators_Oculus: 真正的欺诈师可以识穿千方百计中的奸计。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prestidigitators: A true trickster can see through the wiliest of ways.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prestidigitators_Source_o: 千万小心已经成为山寨之祖的男人！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prestidigitators: Beware he who reaches beyond to the root of duplicity!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prestigitators_Shiners: 虚假和欺骗永远是幻术师的盟友。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prestigitators_S: Untruth and beguilement are ever a conjurer's allies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prestigitators_Wraps: 愚弄他人？欺骗他人？蒙蔽他人？千万别质疑魔法师的奇思妙想！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prestigitators_W: To fool? To trick? To deceive? Never question a sorcerer's whim!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prophets_Bounty: 离奇的洞察力助你揭晓了如此惊艳的奖赏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prophets_Bounty: By uncanny insight were such wondrous rewards revealed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Redmoon_Assassins_Secret_: 当腥月会的头领提议给拉娜娅传授行会特有的秘密时，她考虑到会知道太多秘密而迟疑...直到她瞥见了这件神秘的护甲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Redmoon_Assassin: When the master of the Redmoon Order offered to indoctrinate Lanaya in its particular mysteries, she hesitated to know more...until she caught a glimpse of this mysterious armor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Redmoon_Assassins_Secret_: 腥月会的老对头感官都非常敏锐，只要是一根头发没系上他们就能发现刺客的行踪。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Redmoon_Assassin: So keenly tuned are the senses of the Redmoon Order's ancient foes that even a stray hair can betray an assassin's presence.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Redmoon_Assassins_Secret_: 包含圣堂刺客的“腥月刺客的隐秘华服”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Redmoon_Assassin: Includes all of the items in the 'Redmoon Assassin's Secret' set for Templar Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Redmoon_Assassins_Secret_: 拉娜娅行动时周遭一片隐秘的寂静，这样的缄默氛围已经达到了神秘的极致。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Redmoon_Assassin: Lanaya moves in a hushed and secret silence that has never been more mysteriously complete.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Robes_of_The_Malicious_Ef: 汹涌澎湃的鬼影之光凝聚成了可怕的形状。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Robes_of_The_Mal: A billowing flow of haunted light plays about a dreaded form.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Orb_Carapace: 在虫巢上千次的循环期中，有次司夜女神赐给她的刺客神圣宝珠外壳。这是最为痛苦的一次蜕变...但是一代传奇意味着巨大的牺牲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Orb_Carap: Once in a thousand cyclings of the hive, Nyx grants one of her Assassins the Carapace of the Sacred Orb. It is the most painful of molts...but legend requires great sacrifice.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Orb_Helm: 司夜刺客，在神圣宝珠的作用下，察觉到司夜女神又给了他恩典：有这么多目标可以收割！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Orb_Helm: The Nyx Assassin, under the influence of the Sacred Orb, perceives even more of Nyx's bounty: So many targets to reap!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Orb_Set: 包含司夜刺客的“神圣宝珠”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Orb_Set: Includes all items in the 'Sacred Orb' set for Nyx Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Orb_Venom_Claws: 在面对特殊敌人的时候，司夜刺客会将剧毒注入自己的武器中，这是他们唯一的弱点。但是即使是只有这样的一个弱点，让我们赞美司夜女神的恩典吧！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sacred_Orb_Venom: Against certain foes, the Nyx assassin imbues its blades with a venom that is their only weakness. Praise Nyx that they have even one such vulnerability!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Seers_Bounty: 乌云密布的视野下到来的是公正的奖赏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Seers_Bounty: From clouded visions come just rewards.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SteelSeries_Euro_Cup: 赛睿欧洲杯是一项公开赛事，欧洲顶尖豪门中将决出两支队伍争夺1000美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SteelSeries_Euro: Steelseries Euro Cup is an open tournament where 2 of the top European teams compete for a prize pool of $1000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Understudy_Ba: 尽管他身上的装束来自愚昧的异国，但是血魔还是依靠带来力量的圣词将他允许的鲜血进行引导。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Unde: Although he wears the garb of a benighted foreign land, Bloodseeker still relies on sacred lines of power to channel the blood he lets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Understudy_Bl: 战刃包内含极刑学魔的主手和副手战刃。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Unde: Pack includes both the main and off-hand Gallows Understudy blades.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Understudy_Ga: 麻绳是用作绞刑的天然工具，但是血魔试图去了解他追猎时经过的蛮荒大陆中存在的方式。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Unde: Hempen ropes are a crude tool for execution, but Bloodseeker seeks to understand the ways of the backwards lands through which his hunting takes him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Understudy_Ho: 在使用绞刑架处以极刑的大陆上，史德利古尔将他的脸部遮住，这样他的双眼虽因双子的渴望变得通红也不会被有疑心的行人注意到。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Unde: In the land where executions are accomplished by gallows, Strygwr shadows his face that the thirst of the Twins that burns in his eyes may go unremarked by suspicious passersby.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Understudy_Ma: 在噬血之峰附近从来没见过这样的款式，但是剥皮双子的走狗肯定会偶尔远离他早已习惯的大陆到处徘徊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Unde: Such a style has never been seen near Xhacatocatl, but the Hound of the Flayed Twins must on occasion roam far from his accustomed lands.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Understudy_Of: 在他的旅程中，偶尔也有必要舍弃惯用的黑曜岩之刃，回到由当地铁匠打造的武器上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Unde: It is sometimes necessary, in his travels, to forego his accustomed blades of volcanic glass and fall back on something fashioned by the local smith.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Understudy_Se:
血魔在远离剥皮双子庙宇的大陆上踌躇不前，在那里人们歌颂死刑高于献祭，依靠的是麻绳和钢刀而非黑石和渴望鲜血的神明心中的意愿。但是他们简陋的方法中有东西吸引了他，所以他花了三个月在那研究刽子手，看着人群每次在这恐怖景象发生时全部出动，直到后来他才意识到民众自身就是他们献祭的对象。后来他就用着迷人群看极刑的眼神再望了一眼这大陆后踏上了返乡的道路，去与他祭祀团体的血腥之主分享他学习到的经验。
包含极刑学魔套装内所有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Unde:
Far from the temples of the Flayed Twins, Bloodseeker stumbled upon a land that lauded execution above sacrifice, relying on hempen rope and metal blades instead of black stone and the will of bloodthirsty gods. Yet there was something in their crude approach that appealed to him, and so he spent a season studying the executioners, watching from the crowd that turned out for every morbid spectacle, until he realized that the mob itself was the god to whom they made their sacrifices. With a leer that matched those to be seen on the faces of the enrapt audience, he made his way home to share the lessons he had learned with his own bloody masters of the priestly caste. 
	
	Includes all items from the Gallows Understudy Set.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Understudy_Sk: 血魔给他从尸体肿胀的脖子上偷来的绞绳找到了许多用途，这样他有空的时候就能研究这自然的极刑方式。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Unde: Bloodseeker found many uses for the gallows rope he stole from a corpse's distended neck, in order to study this crude means of execution at his leisure.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Understudy_We: 在他的旅程中，偶尔也有必要舍弃惯用的黑曜岩之刃，回到由当地铁匠打造的武器上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Unde: It is sometimes necessary, in his travels, to forego his accustomed blades of volcanic glass and fall back on something fashioned by the local smith.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_Chains: 我曾经用剩下的一堆脚踝给自己做了一个手镯，但是一直会裂开。铁链帮上了忙。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_: I once made me a bracelet with a bit of spare ankle, but it kept coming apart. Some chain helped with that.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_Choppin_A: 这就是我屠肉用的那只手！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_: This the arm I do me choppin' with!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_Cleaver: 屠刀很钝，不过很沉。面对骨头和鲜肉的时候，沉重更为重要。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_: It's dull, but it's heavy.  When it's to bone and meat, heavy counts for more.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_Dinner_Br: 你知道吗，有人曾经告诉我，钩子抓住人的时候并不是最疼的，从肉里拿出来的时候才是。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_: Y'know, someone once told me it ain't the hook catching you that really hurts, but when I take it back out.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_Grizzled_: 有个家伙说森林里有个疯子，会专门去找路过的人把他们大卸八块。不过我更了解真相。我没疯。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_: Some folk talk about a crazy man up in them woods, finding and cutting on those what come through. But I know better. I ain't crazy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_Meat_Jack: 如果不能拿来炫耀还干嘛给自己找麻烦去屠肉？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_: Why go to the trouble of a proper butcherin' if you can't show it off?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_Set: 这件捆绑包内含帕吉的“老屠手套装”内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Ol_Choppers_: This bundle contains all of the items in 'The Ol' Copper's Set' for Pudge:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Waldi_the_Faithful: 自小失去双亲被遗弃在银夜森林的边缘，王尔迪被一群游侠隐士救下，接受了各种作战方式的训练。王尔迪一般都会遭到敌人的低估，但是他低调的外表下是坚忍的韧性和始终如一的忠诚。他是最强大战士的可靠信使和伙伴，真正的尽职之犬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Waldi_the_Faithf: Orphaned and abandoned on the fringes of the Nightsilver Woods, Waldi was rescued by a reclusive band of rangers and trained in the ways of war. Waldi is often underestimated by his foes, but his unassuming appearance belies his relentless tenacity and unfailing loyalty. He is a worthy courier and companion for the mightiest of warriors, a true dog of duty.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Malicious_Ef: 充盈的能量将虚幻的生命紧密地维系。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_the_Mal: Charged energies hold tight to a shadowy being.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wolfhound_Rifle: 这把做工复杂的杠杆来复枪是受到捕杀时精准致命的犬类食肉动物的启发。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wolfhound_Rifle: This intricately crafted lever-action rifle is inspired by the deadly precision of canine predators.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Gift_of_the_Sea_Dorsa: Gift of the Sea Dorsal Wings
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Insomnia49_Dota_2_Cup__ADMIN: Insomnia49 Dota 2锦标赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Netolic_Pro_League_3rd_Edition: 第三届Netolic职业联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Redmoon_Assassins_Secret_Set: 腥月刺客的隐秘华服套装
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_Gallows_Understudy_Blade__: 极刑学魔战刃 - 副手
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Form_of_the_Onyx_Grove: 在北方的松林中悉拉发现了永夜幽林的黑暗，在那里凶猛奇特的生物聚集争吵。后来，德鲁伊改变了自己的形态来加入战斗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Form_of_the_Onyx: Among the northern pine did Sylla discover the darkness of the Onyx Grove, where creatures both fierce and strange gather to quarrel.  In time, the lone druid adapted his own form to join in the fray.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_August_and_S: 本届技嘉E-Sports锦标赛中八支来自东南亚的参赛队伍一决胜负后获胜队伍将赢取1500美元的现金大奖。获胜战队将与中国的顶尖战队同台竞技，再赢取1500美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_GEST_Aug: The Gigabyte E-Sports Tournament will have the winners of 8 GMPGL qualifiers from South-East Asia compete against one another for a cash prize of $1500. The winners then compete against the top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_MLG_NA_League_and: MLG北美线上联赛的参赛队伍都是北美一流战队，他们将争夺参加线下赛的资格，前往福赛大学（Full Sail University）争夺15 000美金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_MLG_NA_L: The MLG North American Online League will have the best teams in North America vie for a chance to compete for $15,000 at Full Sail University.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall_EMS_One_: RaidCall EMS One联赛已经迈入了2013年秋季，世界顶尖队伍将争夺39 000美元的巨额奖金。在经过一个赛季的线上选拔后，八支脱颖而出的队伍将在线下总决赛对冠军发起挑战。除了能观看大量比赛外，购买门票还将获得官方信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_RaidCall: In the Fall 2013 season of the RaidCall EMS One, the world's best teams compete for a massive prize fund of $39,000 US. After an online season, the eight best teams get to battle it out at the live event finals. Besides lots of matches, ticket holders also receive our official courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_StarSeries_Season: SLTV的传奇赛事StarSeries联赛的崭新赛季已经开始了！预计多达120场的线上比赛，最终战队还将前往在基辅Cybersport Arena举办的线下总决赛争夺22 500美元的奖金。招牌解说 - v1lat 和 TobiWan。本次Starladder特别推出能随着比赛不断升级的专属拉比克套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_StarSeri: The new season of the legendary SLTV StarSeries is here! Watch 120 matches and the Kiev Cybersport Arena LAN finals where teams will compete for a total prize pool of $22,500. Caster headliners - v1lat & TobiWan. Includes an exclusive evolving Rubick set from Starladder.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SteelSeries_Euro_: 赛睿欧洲杯是一项公开赛事，欧洲顶尖豪门中将决出两支队伍争夺1000美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SteelSer: Steelseries Euro Cup is an open tournament where 2 of the top European teams compete for a prize pool of $1000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_TriniDota_2_Leagu: 特立尼达和多巴哥的精英战队将展开一番激烈的冠军争夺战！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_TriniDot: The top teams of Trinidad and Tobago compete to be crowned champions!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Focus_of_Resonant_Vibranc: 将狂野，隐形的能量按照一个人的奇思妙想进行聚焦并为他所用可是一项非常罕有的本事！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Focus_of_Resonan: To focus and bend the wild, unseen energies to one's whim is a skill few possess!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_August_and_September: 本届技嘉E-Sports锦标赛中八支来自东南亚的参赛队伍一决胜负后获胜队伍将赢取1500美元的现金大奖。获胜战队将与中国的顶尖战队同台竞技，再赢取1500美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GEST_August_and_: The Gigabyte E-Sports Tournament will have the winners of 8 GMPGL qualifiers from South-East Asia compete against one another for a cash prize of $1500. The winners then compete against the top Chinese Teams for another $1500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hood_of_Resonant_Vibrance: 受训了解超凡力量之人自然是无所不晓。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hood_of_Resonant: There is little that cannot be understood by one trained to know the powers beyond.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Insomnia49_Dota_2_Cup__AD: Insomnia49 Dota 2锦标赛将会在英国泰尔福德（Telford）的Insomnia49举办。英国的顶尖战队将争夺超过2000英镑的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Insomnia49_Dota_: The Insomnia49 Dota 2 tournament will take place at Insomnia49 in Telford, England. The best teams from Great Britain will compete for a share of £2,000 or more!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MLG_NA_League_and_Full_Sa: MLG北美线上联赛的参赛队伍都是北美一流战队，他们将争夺参加线下赛的资格，前往福赛大学（Full Sail University）争夺15 000美金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MLG_NA_League_an: The MLG North American Online League will have the best teams in North America vie for a chance to compete for $15,000 at Full Sail University.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nibbles_the_Wartoise: 历经无数战斗的老将，跨越的时代数之不尽，尼伯斯理应得到世上最坚毅的战士应得的尊重和钦佩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nibbles_the_Wart: A veteran of countless battles spanning untold centuries, Nibbles commands the respect and admiration of even the most hardened warrior.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_EMS_One_Fall_201: RaidCall EMS One联赛已经迈入了2013年秋季，世界顶尖队伍将争夺39 000美元的巨额奖金。在经过一个赛季的线上选拔后，八支脱颖而出的队伍将在线下总决赛对冠军发起挑战。除了能观看大量比赛外，购买门票还将获得官方信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_RaidCall_EMS_One: In the Fall 2013 season of the RaidCall EMS One, the world's best teams compete for a massive prize fund of $39,000 US. After an online season, the eight best teams get to battle it out at the live event finals. Besides lots of matches, ticket holders also receive our official courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Resonant_Vibrance_Set:
内含群星联赛第7赛季的门票，还有能随着观看本届比赛场数的增加不断升级的拉比克“共振之颤”套装内所有物品：

- 共振之颤燕尾
- 共振之颤头巾
- 共振之颤披肩
- 共振之颤焦点

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Resonant_Vibranc:
Includes the Star Series 7 Tournament Ticket as well as all of the items in the 'Resonant Vibrance' set for Rubick that evolve as you watch the tournament:

- Tails of Resonant Vibrance
- Hood of Resonant Vibrance
- Shawl of Resonant Vibrance
- Focus of Resonant Vibrance

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shawl_of_Resonan: To harness such unpredictable power is a heavy burden. Or so say those who have not yet learned to turn back gravity!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tails_of_Resonan: The nether whips and the ether swirls, and yet such beauty eludes those who lack the discipline to pierce the mundane.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_2013_National_Electronic_: 全国电子竞技大赛（简称NEST）由国家体育总局体育信息中心和中国体育报业总社主办。杭州娃哈哈集团有限公司倾情赞助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_2013_National_El: The National Electronic Sports Tournament (NEST) is hosted by the Center of National Sports and Chinese Sports Newspaper Agency. It is sponsored by the Hangzhou Wahaha Group CO.,LTD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_2013_National_Ele: 全国电子竞技大赛（简称NEST）由国家体育总局体育信息中心和中国体育报业总社主办。杭州娃哈哈集团有限公司倾情赞助。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_Sponsorship: Nexon赞助联赛在韩国还是首次推出，参赛的精英战队将争夺Nexon的赞助机会。NSL将于2013年9月开始，持续3个赛季，赞助金额将达到3亿韩元（约合267 153美金）。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_Sp: The Nexon Sponsorship League is the first of its kind and will feature the best teams vying for a chance to be sponsored by Nexon. Starting in Sept 2013, the NSL will span three seasons with a total of KRW 300 million($267,153 USD) worth of sponsorship funding.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WPCACE_Dota_2_Lea: 世界电子竞技职业精英赛（World E-Sports Professional Classic）是一项崭新的国际性赛事，由上海体育总会和景瑞地产集团合作举办。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WPCACE_D: The World E-Sports Professional Classic is a brand new international event supported by Shanghai Sports Federation and Jingrui Properties Group.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WePlayTV_Dota_2_L: WePlay.TV带着第二赛季回来了！今年秋天，二十支西方顶尖Dota战队将会争夺25 000美元的现金大奖，赛事将通过6种以上语言进行解说，英文解说由Beyond the Summit提供。门票附赠专属信使“贾斯汀狸伯”和WePlay.TV主题的游戏内界面皮肤。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WePlayTV: WePlay.TV is back for Season 2! This Fall, twenty of Western Dota's finest will compete for $25,000 in cash prizes with commentary in 6+ languages, including English commentary by Beyond the Summit. Comes with exclusive \"Justin Beaver\" courier and WePlay.TV HUD in-game skin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dim_Forest: 在树叶和枝干之中有什么已被世人所遗忘呢？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dim_Forest: What lies forgotten among the leaves and logs?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorship_League: Nexon赞助联赛于2013年9月28日全面开战，持续3个赛季，总奖金是高达3亿韩元（约合27万美金）的战队赞助奖金。快来观看第一赛季的顶尖对决。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorshi: Starting in Sep 28th 2013, the Nexon Sponsorship League will span three seasons with a total of KRW 300 million(USD 270k) worth of sponsorship funding. Watch the top team matches of Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WPCACE_Dota_2_League: 世界电子竞技职业精英赛（World E-Sports Professional Classic）是一项崭新的国际性赛事，由上海体育总会和景瑞地产集团合作举办。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WePlayTV_Dota_2_League__S: WePlay.TV带着第二赛季回来了！今年秋天，二十支西方顶尖Dota战队将会争夺25 000美元的现金大奖，赛事将通过6种以上语言进行解说，英文解说由Beyond the Summit提供。门票附赠专属信使伐木精和WePlay.TV主题的游戏内界面皮肤。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WePlayTV_Dota_2_: WePlay.TV is back for Season 2! This Fall, twenty of Western Dota's finest will compete for $25,000 in cash prizes with commentary in 6+ languages, including English commentary by Beyond the Summit. Comes with exclusive Woodchopper courier and WePlay.TV HUD in-game skin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Woodchopper: 大多数人肯定会说，木头只能是木头。但是如果你是住在一片魔法森林的下游，一根木头可不仅如此哦！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Woodchopper: Most would say a log's a log, but when you live downstream from an enchanted forest a log can be so much more!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arnabus_the_Fairy_Rabbit: 不像其他不怎么可靠的兔类动物，神兔运送物品可不会迟到。信它没错！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arnabus_the_Fair: Unlike other, less dependable lagomorphs, Arnabus shall never be late with your items. Depend on it!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Diffusal_Lance: 一把格外受到所有阿兹瑞斯幻象看重的长矛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Diffusal_Lance: One lance is especially prized by all of Azwraith's phantoms.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Enchanted_Manglewood_Staf: 绞木森林中一棵最粗糙的树上砍下的枝干。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Enchanted_Mangle: A limb hewn from the gnarliest tree in the Manglewood Forest.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_End_of_Order: 还不快谢过这让你不能看到翻涌混沌的头盔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_End_of_Order: Be grateful that you cannot gaze upon the seething chaos that churns beneath this helm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Izoku: 主宰从来不会为自己失去的东西感到哀伤。他的悲痛早已在追求荣耀时忘却，意志从未有所撼动。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Izoku: Juggernaut never weeps for what he has lost. Implacable, he purges his grief in pursuit of honor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Last_Judgement: 末日使者宣布判决之时，正当性毋庸置疑。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Last_Judgement: When Doom passes Judgment, there is never any doubt as to its validity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mistblade: 在魔霭圣池铸造，充满了黑色的渴望。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mistblade: Forged in the Font of Avernus, and filled with a dark thirst.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mistral_Braid: 将她的头发轻轻吹乱的海风，给风行者的箭矢带来了无与伦比的飞行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mistral_Braid: The wind that gently tousles her locks, gives unmatched flight to Windranger's arrows.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Golem: 逐渐冷却的岩浆下走出来的是个燃烧的形体。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Obsidian_Golem: From cooling lava stalks a burning form.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Polycount_Treasure_2013: 宝箱中所有物品均由Polycount社区的艺术家所打造。你可以前往http://www.polycount.com观摩这些物品的制作进程，也可以学习创建你自己的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Polycount_Treasu: All of the items within were crafted by artists of the Polycount community.  You can view the process by which these items were designed, as well as learn to create your own items at http://www.polycount.com
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Radiant_Cutter: 与斯温非常相似，一把拥有准则的大剑，不在乎其他刀剑能砍掉什么。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Radiant_Cutter: Much like Sven himself, a blade with a code of its own, which cares not what other swords may be doing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_of_Silence: 铸造所用的矿石采自一颗死星的核心，死星位于宇宙的角落，没有确切的位置。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_of_Silence: Forged of the ore at a dead star's heart, in a corner of the universe that has never known sound.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Style_of_the_Occult_Prote: 宣誓守护秘密的人所用的发型。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Style_of_the_Occ: A fashion for those who vow to protect the mysteries.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_Rubiline_: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含完整的物品套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_CyberGamer_Dota_2_Pro_League__: CyberGamer Dota 2 Pro League - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_GLaDOS: 这件物品将把默认播音员替换为语调忽高忽低，尖酸刻薄，消极又不失攻击性，嘲讽意味十足的《传送门》中人气角色GLaDOS，科幻小说中最为致命又无礼的人工智能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_GLaDOS: This item replaces the Default announcer with the withering sarcasm and passive-aggressive taunting of Portal's GLaDOS, science fiction's deadliest insult A.I.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Pirate_Captain: 这一物品将把默认播音员替换为一个患有坏血病的海盗船长醉酒后的胡言疯语。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Pirate: This item replaces the Default announcer with the drunken antics of a scurvy-ridden Pirate Captain.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Tusk: 这一物品将把默认播音员替换为铿锵有力的巨牙海民。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Tusk: This item replaces the Default announcer with punchy lines from Tusk.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aperture_Science_Wardcore: 你这样看着，他们可干不了活。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aperture_Science: They can't do it while you're watching.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armblade_of_the_Chiseled_: 从刚硬守卫的斧头改造而来，这把臂刃既是盾牌，也是佩刀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armblade_of_the_: Fashioned from an ax of the Chiseled Guard, this blade serves as shield and side arm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_from_the_Gloom: 在来世闹鬼的时间中有许多能够起死回生的装备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_from_the_G: Within the haunted fields of the hereafter lie many useful arms for those with the ability to return to the living.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armory_Expander: 使用该工具为兵器库添加240个槽位。兵器库扩展工具为消费性物品，只能使用一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armory_Expander: Use this tool to add 240 slots to your armory. Armory Expanders are consumable items that may only be used once.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Beard_of_the_Verdant_Outc: 先知在各处森林中浪荡，他的胡须长得跟他一样狂野。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Beard_of_the_Ver: From grove to grove did the prophet wander, and so his beard grew as wild as he.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bindings_of_the_StormStea: 这件捆绑包内含剃刀的”风暴窃贼之缚“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bindings_of_the_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Bindings of the Storm-Steaaler' set for Razor:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Chiseled_Gua: 据说刚硬守卫的大剑足足有十个人的重量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_the_Chi: The blade of the Chiseled Guard is said carry the weight of ten men.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blindfold_from_the_Gloom: 没几个人能预测出穿越死亡需要付出的代价。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blindfold_from_t: Few can predict the price to be paid for piercing the veil.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_CyberGamer_Dota_2: 澳洲顶尖职业战队将争夺4000澳元的现金大奖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_CyberGam: The top professional Australian teams fight for a $4000 AUD prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Hero_Dota_First_S: 本项锦标赛的参赛选手都是来自俄罗斯、乌克兰和白俄罗斯的半职业和非职业战队，他们将争夺1 000美元的奖金以及赞助商和合作方提供的外设奖品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Hero_Dot: This tournament gives an opportunity for semi-pro and non-pro teams from Russia, Ukraine, and Belarus to compete for the prize of $1,000 USD as well as prizes provided by sponsors and partners.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Perfect_World_Dot: 完美世界刀塔学院提供了多种多样的教学比赛，涵盖了英雄使用、游戏机制和战术策略等内容的教学，为正在上手DOTA2的玩家开创了一种绝佳的学习方式。学院还将定期播送由完美世界举办的各项比赛活动。这档教学节目与赛事竞技的跨界演出将会免费开放观看。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Perfect_: Featuring various kinds of instructive matches including guides to heroes, mechanics and tactics. Perfect World Dota Academy offers a perfect route for beginners to learn Dota. Also, the academy periodically broadcast exciting activities held by Perfect World. Entrance to this tutorial-competition show is completely free for Dota players of the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Core_of_Stoneshard_Majest: 玄武岩石柱，聚集后就像大地的枝干，依靠无人铭记的先祖怒颜得以不散架。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Core_of_Stonesha: Basaltic columns, gathered like limbs of the earth, all presided over by the glowering face of a forgotten ancestor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CyberGamer_Dota_2_Pro_Lea: 澳洲顶尖职业战队将争夺4000澳元的现金大奖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CyberGamer_Dota_: The top professional Australian teams fight for a $4000 AUD prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_Amulet: 你知道这是什么路数：你遇到想打一架的人，你们大战了一场，然后他最好的东西就归你了！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_A: You know how it goes: you meet some people who like to fight, you fight them, and you keep their best bits for yourself!
Good for mining. Great for punching.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_Flail: 让他们浸泡在红色前先给他们点绿色瞧瞧！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_F: Make 'em see green before they're soaked in red!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_Helmet: 满是尖刺的背部也许在打架时有很大作用，但是在翡翠矿里你的头也必须够硬。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_H: A prickly back might be great for a fight, but down in an emerald mine you'll need a hard head too.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_Set: 这件捆绑包内含钢背兽的”翡翠之癫“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_S: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Emerald Frenzy' set for Bristleback:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_Spikes: 让他们见识见识别具一格的尖刺！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Frenzy_S: Show those spikes off in style!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_from_the_Gloom_Set: 包含死亡先知的”幽暗之域的馈赠“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_from_the_Gl: Includes all of the items in the 'Gifts of the Gloom' set for Death Prophet:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Greathelm_of_the_Chiseled: 尽管曾经牢牢戴着头盔的人或者东西早已不在了，但是刚硬守卫的铠甲流传至今。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Greathelm_of_the: Though what or who they once held safe has long since passed, the armor of the Chiseled Guard remains.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hecates_Belts: 在幽暗的冥界里充斥着物质的碎片，还有迷失在以太中的精神体。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hecates_Belts: In the dim nether are shreds and shards of material, spectral matter lost in the ether.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hecates_Dress: 早已在历史长河中失却的文化残存的风尚。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hecates_Dress: Remnant fashion of a culture long lost to the ages.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hecates_Shreds: 在幽暗的冥界里充斥着物质的碎片，还有迷失在以太中的精神体。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hecates_Shreds: Remnant shreds of a fashion from ages long gone past, returned from the nether.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hero_Dota: 本项锦标赛的参赛选手都是来自俄罗斯、乌克兰和白俄罗斯的半职业和非职业战队，他们将争夺1 000美元的奖金以及赞助商和合作方提供的外设奖品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hero_Dota: This tournament gives an opportunity for semi-pro and non-pro teams from Russia, Ukraine, and Belarus to compete for the prize of $1,000 USD as well as prizes provided by sponsors and partners.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_GLaDOS: 这件物品将把默认播音员替换为语调忽高忽低，尖酸刻薄，消极又不失攻击性，嘲讽意味十足的《传送门》中人气角色GLaDOS，科幻小说中最为致命又无礼的人工智能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_GLaDOS: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the withering sarcasm and passive-aggressive taunting of Portal's GLaDOS, science fiction's deadliest insult A.I.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Outcast_Horns: 浪荡先知的长角永远是盛开的样子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Natures_Outcast_: Ever in bloom are the horns of the wandering prophet.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Oak_of_the_Verdant_Outcas: 源于种子和阳光，先知在大陆间浪荡，帮助他人寻找幽谷和深林。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Oak_of_the_Verda: Born of seed and sun, the Prophet wandered the lands in search of glen and grove in need of aid.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pack_of_the_Verdant_Outca: 他从来没有扎根，一直在野林中浪荡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pack_of_the_Verd: Never to plant his roots, always to wander the wilds.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldron_of_the_Chiseled_: 抵消宝剑重量的沉重物事。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldron_of_the_: A heavy counterweight to a heavy blade.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Perfect_World_Dota_Academ: 完美世界刀塔学院提供了多种多样的教学比赛，涵盖了英雄使用、游戏机制和战术策略等内容的教学，为正在上手DOTA2的玩家开创了一种绝佳的学习方式。学院还将定期播送由完美世界举办的各项比赛活动。这档教学节目与赛事竞技的跨界演出将会免费开放观看。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Perfect_World_Do: Featuring various kinds of instructive matches including guides to heroes, mechanics and tactics. Perfect World Dota Academy offers a perfect route for beginners to learn Dota. Also, the academy periodically broadcasts exciting activities held by Perfect World.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Petals_of_the_Verdant_Out: 随着时光流逝，四季更迭，他的肩上落满了树叶，重新开始茂盛的生命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Petals_of_the_Ve: As ages spent and seasons changed the leaves gathered upon his shoulder, returned to flourishing life.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Portal: 大家好，欢迎来到光圈科技饰品数据外围。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Portal: Hello, and welcome to the Aperture Science Cosmetic Data Enclosure.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Portal_Pack:
再次体验非暴力解密游戏不时带来的不变快感，尽管没有百万美金的大赛。

大礼包内含：
- 播音员：GLaDOS
- 连杀配音：GLaDOS
- 光圈科技守卫核心
- 《传送门》游戏界面皮肤
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Portal_Pack:
Relive the stationary, intermittent excitement of a non-violent puzzle game with no million-dollar prize at the end.

This pack includes:
- Announcer: GLaDOS
- Mega-Kills: GLaDOS
- Aperture Science Wardcore
- Portal HUD Skin
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pride_of_the_Verdant_Outc: 结了木瘤的枝干做成了旅行的工具，后来，战斗的工具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pride_of_the_Ver: Of gnarled branch was made a tool for travel, and in time, a tool for battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Raiment_of_the_Chiseled_G: 这件捆绑包内含斯温的”刚硬守卫之服“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Raiment_of_the_C: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Raiment of the Chiseled Guard' set for Sven:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stoneshard_Belt: 巨石的碎片，采自深不见底的采石场，保护着撼地者的腰部。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stoneshard_Belt: Shards of stone, gathered from a bottomless quarry, gird Earthshaker's loins.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stoneshard_Bracers: 撼地者的力量与他的威严同在。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stoneshard_Brace: Earthshaker's might is bound in majesty.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stoneshard_Crown: 灼热的大地在冷却的过程中，它的意志开始由碎石王冠所体现；但是直到撼地者到来加冕礼才算完成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stoneshard_Crown: As the molten earth cooled, its will was manifested in the Stoneshard Crown; but there was no coronation until Earthshaker's arrival.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_StormStealers_Armor: 剃刀窃取的风暴能量在他身穿的盔甲上激荡不已，感觉找到了用武之地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_StormStealers_Ar: All the sweeter for being stolen, Razor wears an armor alive with the energy of the storms he has angered.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_StormStealers_Belt: 剃刀趾高气扬地夸耀着他从雷电交加的天空中汲取的电能。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_StormStealers_Be: Paraded with pride, Razor flaunts the power he draws from electric skies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_StormStealers_Bracers: 剃刀力量充盈，发出爆裂声--都是窃取的能量。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_StormStealers_Helm: 剃刀将他的脸庞藏在这顶头盔之下，带着惊天霹雳的风暴再也不能认出他了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_StormStealers_He: Razor hides his face beneath this helm, that no lightning-lashing storm may recognize him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_StormStealers_Whip: 运用着自然最为恶劣的时候截获的能量，剃刀挥舞着鞭子将狭窄迷宫的受难者送入尽头。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_StormStealers_Wh: With a power seized from nature at its nastiest, Razor lashes the Narrow Maze's victims toward their end.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tassets_of_the_Chiseled_G: 尽管它的重量与整件铠甲相差无几，但是这已经是刚硬守卫的整套铠甲中最轻的配件了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tassets_of_the_C: Though it weighs as much an entire suit of armor, this piece is actually the lightest piece among the arms of the Chiseled Guard.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Nightwatchers_Set: 这件捆绑包内含天怒法师的“夜巡法师”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Nightwatcher: This bundle contains all of the items in 'The Nightwatcher's Set' for Skywrath Mage:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Stoneshard_Majesty_Se: 这件捆绑包内含撼地者的”碎石尊王“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Stoneshard_M: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Stoneshard Majesty' set for Earthshaker:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Underwater: Beneath the waves are powers unknown.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wights_from_the_Gloom: 死亡之外的凶猛鬼魂一直萦绕在生者周围。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wights_from_the_: The wild spirits beyond the veil are ever clawing and clinging to those that live.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Woodland_Outcast_Set: 内含先知的“林地浪人”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Woodland_Outcast: Includes all of the items in the 'Woodland Outcast' set for Nature's Prophet:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Hero_Dota_First_Step__ADMIN: Dota争霸：第一阶 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Perfect_World_Dota_Academy__AD: 完美世界刀塔学院 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_AMD_Dota_2_Beginners_Challenge: AMD Dota 2新生挑战联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Baekho__Nexon_Sponsorship_Leag: 白虎信使与Nexon赞助联赛门票捆绑包
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Copa_Latinoamerica_Plantronics: 拉丁美洲杯缤特力与LPD联赛
拉丁美洲杯缤特力与LPD联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Copa_Latinoamerica_Pl: Copa Latinoamerica Plantronics Gaming LPD - ADMIN
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota_2_Beginners_Chal: Nexon隆重推出AMD Dota 2新生挑战联赛，由韩国非职业队伍参加的线上每周赛事。每个战队每周都会争夺由AMD赞助的奖品！比赛将于2013年10月5日开始，为期三个月，每月月底还将举行月末决赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Dota_2_Begin: Nexon presents the AMD Dota 2 Beginner'ss Challenge league, a series of weekly online tournaments open for amateur teams in Korea. Each team competes weekly to win prizes sponsored by AMD! The event will begin on Oct 5, 2013 and run for three months including the grand finals at each month's end.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Baekho: 金秋到来，落叶纷飞，随着第一阵刺骨的寒风吹遍了高山，白虎自西而来。力量和勇猛是白虎的天赋，你的物品将在虎啸声中送达。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Baekho: From the west, the White Tiger came, as the leaves grew golden in the Fall and the first touch of frost cut like steel through the mountain air. Strength and bravery are Baekho's gifts, delivered with a growl alongside your items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Baekho__Nexon_Sponsorship: 内含Nexon赞助联赛门票和白虎信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Baekho__Nexon_Sp: Includes access to the Nexon Sponsorship League and Baekho!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copa_Latinoamerica_Plantr: 8支经过资格赛筛选的拉丁美洲战队将在本次赛事中一分胜负。比赛由缤特力和LPD联合赞助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copa_Latinoameri: 8 Latin American teams from a qualifier willl be competing to bring their best team to represent them in this tournament. Sponsored by Plantronics.Inc and LPD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_AMD_Dota_2_Beginn: Nexon隆重推出AMD Dota 2新生挑战联赛，由韩国非职业队伍参加的线上每周赛事。每个战队每周都会争夺由AMD赞助的奖品！比赛将于2013年10月5日开始，为期三个月，每月月底还将举行月末决赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_AMD_Dota: Nexon presents the AMD Dota 2 BeginnerÃ¢ÂÂs Challenge league, a series of weekly online tournaments open for amateur teams in Korea. Each team competes weekly to win prizes sponsored by AMD! The event will begin on Oct 5, 2013 and run for three months including the grand finals at each monthÃ¢ÂÂs end.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Copa_Latinoameric: 8支经过资格赛筛选的拉丁美洲战队将在本次赛事中一分胜负。比赛由缤特力和LPD联合赞助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Copa_Lat: 8 Latin American teams from a qualifier willl be competing to bring their best team to represent them in this tournament. Sponsored by Plantronics.Inc and LPD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Electronic_Sports: 6支受邀战队将与两支预选战队将为荣耀和2 000美金一较高下。受邀战队有Dignitas，Liquid，Rattlesnake.int，Evil Geniuses，Fnatic，和Menace！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Electron: Six invited teams and two qualifier teams face off for glory and $2,000 USD. Featuring Dignitas, Liquid, Rattlesnake.int, Evil Geniuses, Fnatic, and Menace!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_LigaBEL: 来自巴西的16支精英战队将争夺5万雷亚尔的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_LigaBEL: A Brazlian tournament featuring 16 of the best national teams competing for a prize of R$ 500,00!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Rising_Stars_Dota: 明日之星联赛将由16支战队上演巅峰竞技。其中8支为受邀战队（4支来自巴西，4支来自南美洲），另外8支则来自资格赛选拔。每8支战队分为一组，各淘汰4支战队后将争夺500.00雷亚尔的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Rising_S: Rising Stars is a tournament featuring 16 total teams. 8 teams are invited (4 from Brazil and 4 from South America) and 8 more from a qualifier). The top 4 teams for 2 groups of 8 teams will compete for a total prize of $500.00!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SCD_Tides_Wrath_S: Dota 2联赛“潮汐之怒”面向澳大利亚和新西兰的广大玩家，已经到了第三赛季。澳大利亚和新西兰的全新组织，Dota南部邦联作为成功在澳大利亚和新西兰运营了两个赛季的组织，将继续运营第三赛季 - 潮汐之怒！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SCD_Tide: The third season of the open registration Australian and New Zealand Dota 2 Tournament \"Tide's Wrath\" is upon us. Southern Cross Dota, a news organisation for Dota 2 in Australia and New Zealand is running the third series of an event successfully run in Australia - Tide's Wrath!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Serbian_Weekly_Do: 覆盖所有巴尔干国家的塞尔维亚周赛将召集精英战队展开奖品的争夺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Serbian_: A weekly Serbian tournament including all Balkan countries where top teams compete for a prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WETA_Placeholder_: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WETA_Pla: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WETA_Placeholder_: 这件新物品还没有描述。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Electronic_Sports_Prime_D: 6支受邀战队将与两支预选战队将为荣耀和2 000美金一较高下。受邀战队有Dignitas，Liquid，Rattlesnake.int，Evil Geniuses，Fnatic，和Menace！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Electronic_Sport: Six invited teams and two qualifier teams face off for glory and $2,000 USD. Featuring Dignitas, Liquid, Rattlesnake.int, Evil Geniuses, Fnatic, and Menace!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Polycount_Key: 用于解封<font color='#9da1a9'>Polycount翡翠合集</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Emerald_Polycoun: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Emerald Polycount Collection</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Niuhi: 渔夫扁平的矛刃上镶嵌的是他杀掉虎鲨后取得的眼睛，这是一种来自深海的猛兽，虽然很久以前就被人打败，但是还有人经常提起。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Niuhi: Engrained within the beaten blade of the fisherman who first slew him lies the eye of Niuhi, a monster from the deep, long defeated but not forgotten.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fengyun_Tournament: 今年参加风云争霸赛的众多草根队伍将与亚洲Dota 2豪门一同争夺10万元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fengyun_Tourname: This year's Fengyun Tournament features grassroots teams competing against top Asian Dota 2 powerhouses for a prize pool of 100,000 RMB.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fengyun_Tournament__ADMIN: 今年参加风云争霸赛的众多草根队伍将与亚洲Dota 2豪门一同争夺10万元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fengyun_Tourname: This year's Fengyun Tournament features grassroots teams competing against top Asian Dota 2 powerhouses for a prize pool of 100,000 RMB.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_Set: 内含变体精灵的“大海的恩惠”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Sea_: Includes all of the items in the 'Gift of the Sea' set for Morphling:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Krakens_Bane: 这把骇人的鱼叉最初打造是用于消灭海洋中最大的怪兽，现在则是用来对付当初胆敢挥舞它的人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Krakens_Bane: Created to cleanse the sea of its greatest scourge, this fearsome harpoon is now used against those who once dared wield it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Laments_of_the_Dead: 由一位精通亡灵巫术的铁匠打造，打造过程中铁砧上无数灵魂经过痛彻心扉的锤打变得服服帖帖，而罗坦德吉利非常乐意确保这把夺命镰刀能完成唯一的愿望：收割生者之魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Laments_of_the_D: Forged by a necromantic smith, on whose anvil tortured souls were hammered into obedience, it is Rotund'jere's pleasure to make sure this deadly scythe fulfills its only wish: to reap the souls of the living.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_LigaBEL: 来自巴西的16支精英战队将争夺5万雷亚尔的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_LigaBEL: A Brazlian tournament featuring 16 of the best national teams competing for a prize of R$ 500,00!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Meadows_Mercy: 尽管森林本属中立，但是惊扰了他人的家园就别怪这矛不客气！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Meadows_Mercy: Though the forest itself may be neutral, this spear will bring a swift end to those who dare disturb the creatures who call it home.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Megalodon_Cup_Season_1: 巨齿鲨杯Dota 2联赛的参赛队伍是8支巴西顶尖战队，他们将争夺1000雷亚尔的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Megalodon_Cup_Se: The Megalodon Cup features the top 8 teams from Brazil competing for a total prize of R$1,000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Megalodon_Cup_Season_1__A: 巨齿鲨杯Dota 2联赛的参赛队伍是8支巴西顶尖战队，他们将争夺1000雷亚尔的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Megalodon_Cup_Se: The Megalodon Cup features the top 8 teams from Brazil competing for a total prize of R$1,000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightwatchers_Belt: 无月之夜中在苍白之巢巡逻的法师会从他们特有的华服中感到一丝舒适。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightwatchers_Be: Those who patrol the Ghastly Eyrie on moonless nights take some comfort from their exclusive finery.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightwatchers_Bracers: 在夜巡法师守夜之时，一眼就能区分敌我非常关键。这对显眼的护腕能防止误伤的情况发生。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightwatchers_Br: In the dark of the Nightwatch, it is critical to be able to tell friend from foe at a glance. These distinctive bracers have prevented many a case of mistaken identity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightwatchers_Guard: 暗黑魔物连苍白之巢也能飞上去。必须做好保护，不被他们的利爪抓伤。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightwatchers_Gu: Dark things soar above even the Ghastly Eyrie. The raking of their talons must be guarded against.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightwatchers_Mask: 天怒一族中的崇高地位让他在秋分时带着荣耀和恐惧作为夜巡法师展开巡逻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightwatchers_Ma: High rank among the Skywrath incurs the mingled honor and dread of equinoctial patrols among the Nightwatchers.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightwatchers_Staff: 夜巡法师的神杖带有隐秘的咒语，能在苍白之巢上方的广域中猎食的任何生物俯冲时给自己提供防护。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nightwatchers_St: The Nightwatcher's Staff offers a subtle line of defense against whatever might swoop down from the open reaches of space, to prey on the Ghastly Eyrie.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Perfect_World_Dota_Academ: 完美世界刀塔学院提供了多种多样的教学比赛，涵盖了英雄使用、游戏机制和战术策略等内容的教学，为正在上手DOTA2的玩家开创了一种绝佳的学习方式。学院还将定期播送由完美世界举办的各项比赛活动。这档教学节目与赛事竞技的跨界演出将会免费开放观看。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Perfect_World_Do: Featuring various kinds of instructive matches including guides to heroes, mechanics and tactics. Perfect World Dota Academy offers a perfect route for beginners to learn Dota. Also, the academy periodically broadcasts exciting activities held by Perfect World.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rising_Stars_Dota_League: 明日之星联赛将由16支战队上演巅峰竞技。其中8支为受邀战队（4支来自巴西，4支来自南美洲），另外8支则来自资格赛选拔。每8支战队分为一组，各淘汰4支战队后将争夺500.00雷亚尔的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rising_Stars_Dot: Rising Stars is a tournament featuring 16 total teams. 8 teams are invited (4 from Brazil and 4 from South America) and 8 more from a qualifier). The top 4 teams for 2 groups of 8 teams will compete for a total prize of $500.00!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SCD_Tides_Wrath_Season_3: Dota 2联赛“潮汐之怒”面向澳大利亚和新西兰的广大玩家，已经到了第三赛季。澳大利亚和新西兰的全新组织，Dota南部邦联作为成功在澳大利亚和新西兰运营了两个赛季的组织，将继续运营第三赛季 - 潮汐之怒！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SCD_Tides_Wrath_: The third season of the open registration Australian and New Zealand Dota 2 Tournament \"Tide's Wrath\" is upon us. Southern Cross Dota, a news organisation for Dota 2 in Australia and New Zealand is running the third series of an event successfully run in Australia - Tide's Wrath!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Serbian_Weekly_Dota_2_Cup: 覆盖所有巴尔干国家的塞尔维亚周赛将召集精英战队展开奖品的争夺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Serbian_Weekly_D: A weekly Serbian tournament including all Balkan countries where top teams compete for a prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Electronic_Sports_Prime_Dota_2: Dota 2电子竞技精英联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Electronic_Sports_Pri: Electronic Sports Prime Dota 2 Cup - ADMIN
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Fengyun_Tournament__ADMIN: 风云争霸赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Frozen_Stein_of_the_Bar_Brawle: 酒馆格斗家的冰冻酒杯
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Frozen_Stein_of_the_B: Frozen Stein of the Bar Brawler
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Megalodon_Cup_Season_1__ADMIN: 巨齿鲨杯第1赛季 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Rising_Stars_Dota_League__ADMI: 明日之星Dota联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_SCD_Tides_Wrath_Season_3__ADMI: SCD潮汐之怒第3赛季 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Serbian_Weekly_Dota_Cup__ADMIN: 塞尔维亚Dota联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Admirals_Salty_Shawl: 采用洪流恶魔的皮制成的斗篷，经过铁帆海军的颜料染色，昆卡穿上后就不怕任何邪恶的生物向他冲去。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Admirals_Salty_S: A cape made from the skin of a Cataract Demon, and dyed in the colors of the Claddish Navy, Kunkka wears it to fend off any wicked creature that dares lunge at him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_Arms: 在变体精灵的掌中流水找到了它最完美的形态。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_Ar: Water finds its perfect form in Morphling's grip.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_Back: 一面几乎不会隐藏变体精灵力量的盾牌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_Ba: A shield that barely skims the surface of Morphling's power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_Breastplate: 水流中再加上硬物，被变体精灵冲到脸上，他还戴着这对胸甲，可谓是痛上加痛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_Br: Injury added to insult, there is nothing worse than being struck full on by Morphling when he wears these plates.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_Helmet: 脑子进水了那可戴不了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_He: Watery thoughts can scarcely be contained.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_Set: 包含变体精灵的“远古战甲”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_Se: Includes all of the items in the 'Ancient Armor' set for Morphling:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_Shoulder_Sh: 元素有序排列，增强了远古的力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancient_Armor_Sh: The elements align themselves to enhance an ancient strength.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armaments_of_Leviathan: 包含昆卡的“利维坦军装”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armaments_of_Lev: Includes all of the items in the 'Armaments of Leviathan' set for Kunkka:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Barathrums_Fury_Set: 包含裂魂人的“狂暴巴拉森”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Barathrums_Fury_: Includes all of the items in the 'Barathrum's Fury' set for Spirit Breaker:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Fury: 如果你的腰带这般强大，裤子那就是累赘。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_Fury: Proving pants are superfluous, if your belt is this powerful.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Fury: 这对臂甲能挡下偶尔向后摆的连枷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_Fury: These arm  guards protect against the occasional wayward strike of your own flail.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_3: CEVO DOTA 2第3赛季将面向北美的职业和非职业选手。战队将在为期8周的赛季中经过双淘汰赛制的洗礼获得现金大奖，还有晋级到后续赛季的机会。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_3: CEVO DOTA 2 Season 3 is an event that is open to both amateur and professional players in North America. Teams compete in a 8 week regular season followed by a double-elimination playoff bracket where they compete for cash prizes and a chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Guard: 高高的领子能挡住咸湿的海水和恶劣的天气，保护好昆卡的脸庞，而沉重的肩甲能让黑暗的海水中潜伏的可怕生物不能用牙齿和利爪将其抓住。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Guard: A high collar keeps salty waters and harsh weather from marring Kunkka's visage, while heavy shoulder-plates have deflected many a tooth and claw belonging to such abominations as lurk in the murky waters.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_CEVO_Season_3: CEVO DOTA 2第3赛季将面向北美的职业和非职业选手。战队将在为期8周的赛季中经过双淘汰赛制的洗礼获得现金大奖，还有晋级到后续赛季的机会。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_CEVO_Sea: CEVO DOTA 2 Season 3 is an event that is open to both amateur and professional players in North America. Teams compete in a 8 week regular season followed by a double-elimination playoff bracket where they compete for cash prizes and a chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_Pro_Leagu: Netolic职业联赛第4赛季将再次召集顶尖队伍展开对荣耀和奖金的争夺！门票附赠一只一流信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_: Netolic Pro League 4 brings the action once again inviting the best teams out there to fight over the glory, pride and prize money! Includes a pretty cool courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Road_to_the_Asian: 8支印度精英队伍将经过层层角逐，在决赛中产生的冠军队伍将前往新加坡参加2013年ACG联赛！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Road_to_: The top 8 Indian teams will qualify to compete in the finals where the winner will earn a spot to compete in Singapore at the Asian Cyber Games 2013!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_South_Ural_League: 众多战队将在线上比赛中争夺出线资格，再选出16支战队前往线下决赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_South_Ur: Teams compete in an online competition to earn a spot in the top 16 teams which compete in a LAN finals.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Epaulets_of_Hells_Ambassa: 护肩过于邪恶，不能在地狱多待一刻。莱恩非常乐意将它们带出魔渊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Epaulets_of_Hell: Shoulderpieces too evil to reside in Hell a moment longer. Lion was only too happy to spare them from the Pit.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Treasures: Riches are won on the battlefield.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hand_of_Hells_Ambassador: 他抬起这支吓人的手臂，敌人顿时瑟瑟发抖，而队友也不会去跟他拍手致意。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hand_of_Hells_Am: Enemies cower when he raises this horrific hand, but friends merely return the greeting.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hare_Hunt_Cape: 秋天他在森林里尾随着胆小的猎物，身旁金色的叶子不断飘落，颜色与这件披风如出一辙。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hare_Hunt_Cape: A cape as golden as the autumn woods through which he stalks his tremulous prey.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hare_Hunt_Hat: 一张毛茸茸的林地兽皮拿来保护脑袋相当合适。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hare_Hunt_Hat: A furry woodland pelt is a perfect pate protector.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hare_Hunt_Rifle: 就为了猎杀兔子完全是大材小用？你还是看看都是些什么兔子吧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hare_Hunt_Rifle: Overkill for a rabbit hunt? You haven't seen these particular rabbits.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hare_Hunt_Shoulders: 你说什么？我听不到。我耳朵里一直是嘶嘶声。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hare_Hunt_Should: What's that? I can't hear you. There's a lit fuse hissing in my ear.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hare_Hunt_Sleeves: 狙击手匍匐穿过林荫时能够为他的前臂提供十足的防护，因为这对狙击手这个职业来说可谓是家常便饭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hare_Hunt_Sleeve: Richly ornate protection for Sniper's forearms when he creeps through shady cover, as snipers do.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hells_Ambassador_Set: 包含莱恩的“地狱之使”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hells_Ambassador: Includes all of the items in the 'Hell's Ambassador' set for Lion:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_Hells_Ambassado: 这件斗篷能让人想起地狱中的高阶恶魔长袍，是一个魔裔为了表达谢意将其恭恭敬敬地赠予莱恩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_Hells_: Suggestive of the robes of office of some infernal dignitary, the cape was an honorific bestowed on Lion by a grateful demon populace.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_Fury: 你的脸已有遮挡，但是你的狂暴并没有。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mask_of_Fury: Your face is masked but your fury won't be.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Neptunian_Sabre: 据说昆卡逼迫基恩岛的工匠打造的这把砍刀，采用的是洪流恶魔被击溃后海水冲刷上岸的财物。人们猜测他是拿着这把刀将大海劈成两半，找到了深渊触手麦尔朗恩，并把它的一根触手斩断作为与洪流恶魔一役胜利的证物。现在他身怀勇猛的力量和经过大海洗练的意志，将挥舞这把刀在碧蓝的大海上将他的敌人砍成肉酱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Neptunian_Sabre: It is said that Kunkka compelled Keen artisans to make this sabre from the salvage of vanquished Cataract Demons that were washed upon the shores of Keen homelands. It is speculated that he split the sea in half with it to locate Maelrawn the Tentacular and sever one of Its tentacles as a testament of his triumph against the Demons of Cataract. Wielding it with brute force and sea-hardened will, he now splits apart his enemies in torrents of sea blue and crimson red.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Pro_League_4: Netolic职业联赛第4赛季将再次召集顶尖队伍展开对荣耀和奖金的争夺！门票附赠一只一流信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Pro_Leag: Netolic Pro League 4 brings the action once again inviting the best teams out there to fight over the glory, pride and prize money! Includes a pretty cool courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_Fury: 在你宽阔的肩膀上负担的是开战的重任。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_Fur: Upon your broad shoulders, the weight of the war rests.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Road_to_the_Asian_Cyber_G: 8支印度精英队伍将经过层层角逐，在决赛中产生的冠军队伍将前往新加坡参加2013年ACG联赛！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Road_to_the_Asia: The top 8 Indian teams will qualify to compete in the finals where the winner will earn a spot to compete in Singapore at the Asian Cyber Games 2013!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scuttling_Scotty: 在一次冰暴中与他的群落失散，爱冒险的小企鹅就在蓝心冰川徘徊，他找不到食物也没有同伴，后来他才知道自己被年轻的寒冰室女所救。水晶室女用爱呵护，喂他吃好吃的鱼，照料他恢复健康。于是他发誓不再去冒险，要回报她的好心，他只会冲去为需要的人运送补给和食物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scuttling_Scotty: Separated from his flock in an ice storm, the adventurous young pengling Scotty wandered the Blueheart Glacier, starving and alone, until he found himself rescued by a certain young Ice Maiden. Crystal Maiden nursed him back to health with love and fishy treats. Swearing to return her kindness, Scotty swore off adventuring, and now he has no urge other than to carry supplies and treats to those in need.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_South_Ural_League_Season_: 众多战队将在线上比赛中争夺出线资格，再选出16支战队前往线下决赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_South_Ural_Leagu: Teams compete in an online competition to earn a spot in the top 16 teams which compete in a LAN finals.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spirit_Crusher: 一看到这把吓人的武器你的敌人就魂飞魄散。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spirit_Crusher: Your enemy's spirits will be crushed by the sight of this dread weapon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Strifemaul_of_Hells_Ambas: 为地狱代言的人可能还会拿着纷争魔锤来进一步强调他话里的重点。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strifemaul_of_He: He who speaks for Hell may carry the Strifemaul to further emphasize the important points of his argument.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_Fury: 诗人会写下狂暴巴拉森的篇章。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_Fury: Poets will tell the tale of the great fury of Barathrum.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Hare_Hunt_Set: 包含狙击手的”猎兔能手“套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Hare_Hunt_Se: Includes all of the items in the \"Hare Hunt\" set for Sniper:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tremor: 战争撼动着每一块基石。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Viridi_Inanitas_Set: 包含虚空假面的“空虚松绿”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Viridi_Inanitas_: Includes all of the items in the 'Viridi Inanitas' set for Faceless Void:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Viridus_Claw: 如果你想要抓住瑞格教会中教义的优点，你必须戴对东西，将神经束裂成一丝一丝。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Viridus_Claw: If you wish to grasp the finer points of Dhreg Cult dogma, you must wear the proper gear for rending the tracts into ribbons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Viridus_Crusher: 只有在超维视界的教堂才能存在的武器。而即使是在那里，也是非常勉强。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Viridus_Crusher: A weapon that makes sense only in the Chapels of Claszureme. And even then, only barely.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Viridus_Leggings: 被疯狂所包围，这对腿甲藐视意义性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Viridus_Leggings: Girded in madness, these leggings defy meaning.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Viridus_Spine: 神秘的确定性过度将导致剧烈的出疹。尽管痛苦异常，这些赘生物是掌握终极知识的标志。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Viridus_Spine: A surfeit of arcane certainty may lead to exquisite eruptions. While painful, these excrescences mark one who has mastered the ultimate lore.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_arm_lev_admiral_cap: 在基恩岛海岸发现的一顶帽子，没被海水冲刷多久昆卡就上岸了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_arm_lev_admiral_: A cap found washed up on a Keenish shore, shortly before Kunkka's arrival there.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_arm_lev_claddish_gauntlet: 昆卡被冲上基恩海岸时身上唯一剩下的装备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_arm_lev_claddish: The only piece of equipment left on Kunkka after he washed up on a Keen shore.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_arm_lev_claddish_shoes: 这双钢铁的趾甲能够挡住海中的怪兽，还能给偷懒的基恩水手来上一下子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_arm_lev_claddish: These steel toe-guards are effective at fending off sea monsters, as well as punishing booties of lazy Keen sailors.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_arm_lev_pipe: 一根从失事的潮水池中捡到的老烟斗，然后老水手就觉得能给他带来好运和财富，从此就一直叼在患了败血症的嘴里。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_arm_lev_pipe: An old pipe Kunkka plucked from a tidepool after being shipwrecked, the old seadog claims it brings him fortune and good luck, and thus never ever takes it from his scurvy-ridden mouth.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_arm_lev_stash_belt: 这根腰带上挂着的钥匙据说能打开基恩首都的房门，舰船的牢房和他那艘宏伟大船“非凡利维坦”的船体内无数的宝箱...还有大海深处让人心惊肉跳的秘密。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_arm_lev_stash_be: The keys that hang from this belt are said to unlock the gates of the Keen capital, the prisons of his fleet, countless treasure chests that lie inside the hull of his majestic ship \"Mighty Leviathan\" ... and terrifying secrets that lie deep at the bottom of the sea.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_DotaTalk_SteelSer: 来自澳大利亚和新西兰的Dota 2战队将激烈争夺价值超过1万美元的Na'Vi专属赛睿外设！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_DotaTalk: Australian and New Zealand Dota 2 teams compete for SteelSeries Na'Vi gear worth over $1000!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_C: The Champions League will feature 12 teams from Europe and North America fighting for $50,000! 25% of all ticket sales will be added to the prize pool!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SteelSer: SteelSeries Euro Cup is back for Season 2! This tournament is open to all teams in Europe where it will have the top 2 teams competing for a prize pool of $1000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SteelSeries_South: 本次联赛对所有东南亚队伍开放报名，冠军队伍将获得1000美元的奖金和5部赛睿西伯利亚Elite耳机！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SteelSer: This tournament is open to all teams in Southeast-Asia where the 2 top teams will compete for a prize pool of $1000 and 5 Steelseries Siberia Elite Headsets!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sunday_Evening_Cu: 周日Dota夜系列赛起始于2009年12月，是迄今运营时间最长的Dota联赛。周日Dota夜为北美和南美的队伍提供了开放式竞技平台，给他们获取实战经验的机会。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sunday_E: The Sunday Evening Cup Series (SECS) began in December 2009 and is the longest running Dota tournament series to date. SECS provides an open competitive platform for North and South American teams to gain real tournament experience.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WH_Overgaming_Cha: 第二届WH挑战赛是WH联赛第二赛季最后一项赛事。在这项赛事中，8支队伍将争夺1000雷亚尔的巨额奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_WH_Overg: The WH Challenge 2 is the last tournament in the WH League Season 2. After this, 8 team will compete for a R$1000 grand prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaTalk_SteelSeries_Ocea: 来自澳大利亚和新西兰的Dota 2战队将激烈争夺价值超过1万美元的Na'Vi专属赛睿外设！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaTalk_SteelSe: Australian and New Zealand Dota 2 teams compete for SteelSeries Na'Vi gear worth over $1000!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SteelSeries_Euro: SteelSeries Euro Cup is back for Season 2! This tournament is open to all teams in Europe where it will have the top 2 teams competing for a prize pool of $1000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SteelSeries_Southeast_Asi: 本次联赛对所有东南亚队伍开放报名，冠军队伍将获得1000美元的奖金和5部赛睿西伯利亚Elite耳机！

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sunday_Evening_C: The Sunday Evening Cup Series (SECS) began in December 2009 and is the longest running Dota tournament series to date. SECS provides an open competitive platform for North and South American teams to gain real tournament experience.

- 灼热动荡之刃

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Burning_Turmoil: 在垂死恒星的热量中铸就。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Burning: Forged in the heat of a dying star.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SteelSeries_Dota_: 中国各地的实力队伍齐聚一堂争夺赛睿Dota 2联赛的靠前名次加上挑战亚洲豪门队伍的机会。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SteelSer: Rising teams across China gather together to compete for top ranks in SteelSeries Dota 2 League for prizes plus a chance to challenge Asian elite teams.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Enmity: 仇恨之步，审判之蹄，行进毁灭之驰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Enmity: Its strides are hatred, its bray a judgment, its gallop the march of destruction.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Burning_Turmoil: 无边的黑暗策马冲出超乎凡人认知的世界。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Burning_: From realms beyond mortal knowledge rides forth a heaving darkness.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_HyperX_D2L_Season_4: 本次回归的D2L已经迎来了第4赛季，更多的队伍，更高的奖金！亲眼目睹全世界最顶尖的16支Dota 2战队争夺超过5万美元的奖金和前往拉斯维加斯的凯撒宫参加直播决赛的入场券！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_HyperX_D2L_Seaso: The D2L returns for its fourth season with more money and more teams! Witness sixteen of the world's best Dota 2 teams battle it out for over $50,000 and a ticket to the Live Finals at Caesar's Palace in Las Vegas!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_HyperX_D2L_Season_4__ADMI: 本次回归的D2L已经迎来了第4赛季，更多的队伍，更高的奖金！亲眼目睹全世界最顶尖的16支Dota 2战队争夺超过5万美元的奖金和前往拉斯维加斯的凯撒宫参加直播决赛的入场券！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_HyperX_D2L_Seaso: The D2L returns for its fourth season with more money and more teams! Witness sixteen of the world's best Dota 2 teams battle it out for over $50,000 and a ticket to the Live Finals at Caesar'Âs Palace in Las Vegas!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_Burning_Turmoil: 在位面间的暗黑冥界中冷却，它的核心并未硬化，仍然灼热无比。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_Burnin: Cooled in the black nether between worlds, its core still bends and burns.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spaulder_of_Burning_Turmo: 在动荡的星体中，热量偏斜，万物旋转。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spaulder_of_Burn: Within the astral turmoil, heat bends and matter swirls.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SteelSeries_Dota_2_League: 亚洲各国的晋升队伍齐聚一堂，争夺赛睿Dota 2联赛的靠前名次加上挑战豪门队伍的机会。内含用户界面皮肤“竹林”！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SteelSeries_Dota: Rising teams across Asia gather together to compete for top ranks in SteelSeries Dota 2 League for prizes plus a chance to challenge elite teams. Includes the Vermilion HUD skin!
