Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Polish_Dota_2_Online_Cham: 波兰Dota 2线上锦标赛由8支波兰顶尖战队参加，奖金为1000波兰兹罗提！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Polish_Dota_2_On: The Polish Dota 2 Online Championships will feature the top 8 Polish teams competing for 1000PLN!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prismatic_Gem: 该宝石将会改变镶入物品的虚灵特效颜色。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prismatic_Gem: This gem will change the color of the Ethereal effects on the item it is socketed in.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quest_Forge_Rare_Item: 本任务需要你收集数件特定物品，从而创造一件稀有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quest_Forge_Rare: This quest requires you to collect several specific items in order to create a rare item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quest_Seek_Exceptional_It: 本任务需要你收集数件特定物品，从而创造一件全新的珍稀物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quest_Seek_Excep: This quest requires you to collect several specific items to an exceptional new item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificers_Brand: 本图纸将融合多件物品，产生巧匠烙铁。烙铁可以应用于信使，为其增加特效和颜色的镶孔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificer: This recipe will combine a number of items and produce an Artificer's Brand. The brand can be used to make a courier unusual bu adding effect and color sockets to it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificers_Chisel: 本图纸将融合多件物品，产生可以为物品增加镶孔的凿刀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificer: This recipe will combine a number of items and produce an chisel that can be used to add sockets to items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificers_Hammer: 本图纸将融合多件物品，产生巧匠之锤。巧匠之锤用于提取物品中的宝石，但是会将物品摧毁。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Artificer: This recipe will combine a number of items and produce an Artificer's Hammer. The hammer can be used to extract gems from items, but at the cost of destroying the gemmed item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_Common_Ite: 本图纸将融合多件特定的普通品质物品，随机产生一件全新的罕见品质物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_C: This recipe will combine a number of specific common items and produce a random new uncommon item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_Rare_Items: 本图纸将融合多件特定的稀有品质物品，随机产生一件全新的神话品质物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_R: This recipe will combine a number of specific rare items and produce a random new mythical item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_Uncommon_I: 本图纸将融合多件特定的罕见品质物品，随机产生一件全新的稀有品质物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Augment_U: This recipe will combine a number of specific uncommon items and produce a random new rare item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Create_Artificers_: 本图纸将融合多件物品，产生提取效果更佳的巧匠大师之锤。使用其提取宝石后原有的物品也将保留。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Create_Ar: This recipe will combine a number of items and produce an upgraded Master Artificer's Hammer. The upgraded hammer will not destroy items when used to release gems.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Dire_Reward: 本图纸将融合多个魔法精华，随机产生一件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Dire_Rewa: This recipe will combine a number of magical essences and produce a random item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Hollow_Jack: 本图纸将夜魇暗潮的灵异宝箱掉落的物品与任意凶煞前缀的物品相融合，会产生空心南瓜人信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Hollow_Ja: This recipe will combine an item from the Ghastly Treasure of Diretide with any Cursed item to produce a Hollow Jack courier.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Materialize_Item: 本图纸将使多个魔法精华融合，并随机产生新的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Materiali: This recipe will combine a number of magical essences and produce a random item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph_Common_I: 本图纸将使多件普通物品融合，并随机产生新的普通物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph: This recipe will combine a number of common items and produce a random new common item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph_Mythical: 本图纸将使多件神话物品融合，并随机产生新的神话物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph: This recipe will combine a number of mythical items and produce a random new mythical item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph_Rare_Ite: 本图纸将使多件稀有物品融合，并随机产生新的稀有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph: This recipe will combine a number of rare items and produce a random new rare item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph_Uncommon: 本图纸将使多件罕见物品融合，并随机产生新的罕见物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Polymorph: This recipe will combine a number of uncommon items and produce a random new uncommon item.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Redwood_Arms_Set: 这件捆绑包内含风行者的“红木之兵”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Redwood_Arms_Set: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Redwood Arms' set for Windranger:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Riptide_Blades_Set: 这件捆绑包内含娜迦海妖的“激流之刃”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Riptide_Blades_S: This bundle contains all the items in the 'Riptide Blades' set for Naga Siren:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Cruel_Magicia:
为了与暗影达成一致，必须要穿着得体。

选手物品是与玩家最喜爱的选手联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Crue:
To consort with the shades, one should dress appropriately.

These Player Items are created in partnership with your favorite player, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Runesmiths_Brand: 一把具有魔力的凿刀，可以给信使打上独特的镶孔。这把凿刀将给信使打上特效和颜色的镶孔，使其成为独特信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Runesmiths_Brand: A magical chisel used to add unusual sockets to couriers. This chisel will add an effect and color socket to a courier and make it unusual.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Runesmiths_Chisel: 具有魔力的凿刀，可以给物品打上镶孔。只能打上普通镶孔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Runesmiths_Chise: A magical chisel used to add sockets to items. This chisel creates general sockets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sabatons_of_the_Crested_C:
甲板之下一排火炮都已装填完毕准备开火，所以可要千万站稳。

选手物品是与玩家最喜爱的选手联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sabatons_of_the_:
Below decks, behind a line of artillery primed to fire, sure footing is essential.

These Player Items are created in partnership with your favorite player, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sash_of_the_Crested_Canno:
腰带上的猎鹰标志只授予在海战中有赫赫战功的老将。

选手物品是与玩家最喜爱的选手联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sash_of_the_Cres:
The falcon seal upon the sash is granted only to distinguished veterans of naval warfare.

These Player Items are created in partnership with your favorite player, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadow_Brand: 如此之刃定将混沌之印深深烙在秩序之布上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shadow_Brand: Such a blade will sear the stamp of chaos deep into the fabric of order.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shard_of_Blight: 由丧失之魂的痛苦打造而成的匕首。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shard_of_Blight: A dagger forged from the pain of lost souls.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shattered_Axe_of_the_Vanq: 布拉德瓦登从来没对敌人手软，但是让这把斧头裂成两半的头颅使他产生了深深的敬意。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shattered_Axe_of: Bradwarden has never treated an enemy lightly, but the skull that shattered this blade instilled in him an even deeper sense of respect.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shattered_Destroyer: 从无数倒下敌人的尸骨上，一把武器为一人之王产生。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shattered_Destro: From the shards of numerous broken enemies, a weapon to be borne by one King alone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shawl_of_the_Glacier_Dust:
舒适的披肩，可以挡住冻原上刺骨的寒风。

选手物品是与玩家最喜爱的选手联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shawl_of_the_Gla:
A cozy garment to block the tundra's whipping winds.

These Player Items are created in partnership with your favorite player, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the_DeathCha: 熔掉两面盾牌后进行重铸，铁制的肩铠覆盖了裂魂人宽阔的肩膀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the: It took the steel of two shields, melted down and recast, to cover the broad shoulders of Spirit Breaker.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the_Forest_H: 撼地者一直处于沉思中，他根本没注意到有小东西跳上来。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the: Deep in his thoughts, Earthshaker scarcely notices the occasional hop-on.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Slashing_Quickslicer: 如果恶言相向会导致拔刀相向，那最好别对娜迦海妖无礼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Slashing_Quicksl: If cross words lead to crossed swords, then it's best to be polite to the Naga Siren.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Slashing_Quickslicer_Pack: 这件捆绑包内含主手和副手的迅猛砍刀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Slashing_Quicksl: This bundle contains both the main and off-hand Slashing Quickslicer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Slashing_Quickslicer__Off: 如果恶言相向会导致拔刀相向，那最好别对娜迦海妖无礼。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Slashing_Quicksl: If cross words lead to crossed swords, then it's best to be polite to the Naga Siren.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Slicer_of_the_Depths: 用私藏的玉石拼成的小刀。最好别问斯拉克是怎么把它藏在暗黑之礁监狱的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Slicer_of_the_De: A shiv assembled from contraband gems. Better not ask how Slark kept it concealed in Dark Reef Prison.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spectator_Gem: 物品在镶入该宝石后可以记录观看特定比赛或特定战队的比赛场数。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spectator_Gem: Adding this gem to an item will enable that item to track games viewed for a league or team.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spoils_from_the_Shifting_:
让法术破灭。

以上物品是与选手BurNing联合创建，每售出一套他都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spoils_from_the_:
Shatter their sorcery.

These items were created in partnership with BurNing, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_Infernal_Chaos: 一根恐惧之木法杖，上面的地狱符文让异界之狱的灵魂在法杖内听候调遣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_Inferna: A Dreadwood staff  engraved with hellish runes to confine a spirit from the Outer Hells inside it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Cruel_Magici:
最黑暗的海峡中经过的是最强大的法术。

选手物品是与玩家最喜爱的选手联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Cru:
Through the darkest channels travel the most powerful sorceries.

These Player Items are created in partnership with your favorite player, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Glacier_Dust:
注入了远古冰川的精华，冰冷的顶部如同羽毛一样轻灵。

选手物品是与玩家最喜爱的选手联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Gla:
Imbued with the essence of ancient glaciers, its icy prow is as light as a feather.

These Player Items are created in partnership with your favorite player, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Double_S: 宝石包内含巧匠凿刀和双人束缚宝石。凿刀可以给任意物品打造镶孔，宝石则可以进行镶嵌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Double Shackles Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Double Shackles Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier_Quad_Rav: 宝石包内含巧匠凿刀和全体毁灭宝石。凿刀可以给任意物品打造镶孔，宝石则可以进行镶嵌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strange_Modifier: This pack contains a Runesmith's Chisel and a Quad Ravages Gem. The chisel can be used to add a socket to any item and the Quad Ravages Gem can be placed in a socket.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Style_of_the_Glacier_Dust:
来自寒冬之心的冰爽造型！

选手物品是与玩家最喜爱的选手联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Style_of_the_Gla:
A cool look from the heart of winter!

These Player Items are created in partnership with your favorite player, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sword_of_the_Warriors_Ret: 曾经属于斯温父亲的武器，多年以后他才发现武器的变换属性。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sword_of_the_War: A weapon that once belonged to Sven's father, it was years before the son discovered its transformative properties.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tabard_of_the_Crested_Can:
铁帆炮兵队的无畏精神值得永远受到尊敬。

选手物品是与玩家最喜爱的选手联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tabard_of_the_Cr:
The bravery of the Claddish cannon crew shall always be honored.

These Player Items are created in partnership with your favorite player, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_the_DeathCharge: 都是尾巴哪有区别，除非是这根尾巴。分叉的末梢决定它是独一无二的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tail_of_the_Deat: One tail is much like another, unless it's this tail.  A bifurcated appendage like no other.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Celestial_Bane: 法杖上的脸，对于世俗的敌人来说极为骇人；不过对于产生并凌驾于殁境之上的生物，这代表着安逸和信心。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Celestial_Ba: This visage, so terrifying to mundane enemies, is a face of comfort and reassurance to those conceived and reared above the Outworld.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Creepers_Cruelty_Set: 包含赏金猎人的“匍匐猎人的残忍”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Creepers_Cru: Includes all of the items in the 'Creeper's Cruelty' set for Bounty Hunter:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Elegant_Stroke: 由铁匠大师赛伯在一千多年前打造，这把美丽的刀长久以来证明了最致命的招式也是最优雅的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Elegant_Stro: Forged more than a thousand years ago by the master bladesmith Sabasteen, this beautiful sword has long proven the deadliest stroke can also be the most elegant.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gleaming_Seal:
寒光一闪，命运已定。

选手物品是与玩家最喜爱的选手联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gleaming_Sea:
With but a flash, a final fate is sealed.

These Player Items are created in partnership with your favorite player, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Savage_Orchid: 采用一只炎魔的精华制作而成的深红色木杖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Savage_Orchi: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Throe: 徜徉在外的魔鹿其实无家可归。在激烈的战斗中非常显眼，但是有时又无迹可寻，他的神出鬼没也是他的诅咒，带给战场的不一致。曾经由未知的恶魔所引领，现在只有恐惧能带着他在位面大战之间穿行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Throe: There is no home for the wandering Throe. Apparent in some fierce battles, but hidden from others, his myth is both his curse and inconsistency brought to the battlefield. Once believed to be led by demons unknown, only fear now leads this wandering stag through the plains of war.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tidehunter_Blink_Dagger: 有这么一说，一只不怎么可靠的海葵告诉潮汐猎人，他把这带电的家伙和闪烁匕首有机结合将使其拥有额外的闪烁之力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tidehunter_Blink: Accurate or not, an untrustworthy anemone convinced Tidehunter that his blink dagger would have extra blinking power with this optional organic power-pack.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TongFu_Pennant: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TongFu_Pennant: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Totem_of_the_Forest_Hermi: 撼地者在森林的寂静中寻求到了一丝欢迎的意味。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Totem_of_the_For: Earthshaker seeks and finds a welcome in the quiet of the woods.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_Earth_Ess: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含完整的物品套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_Ember_Ess: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含完整的物品套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Earth_Essence: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含单件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Eart: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Ember_Essence: 您需要一个<font color='#9da1a9'>灰烬精华的燧石</font>才能将珍藏解封。您可以前往刀塔商城购买。每个珍藏系列的掉落物品均不相同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Embe: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key of Ember Essence</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Heroic_Bounty: 您需要一个<font color='#9da1a9'>符印</font>才能将珍藏解封。您可以前往刀塔商城购买。每个珍藏系列的掉落物品均不相同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Hero: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Trident_of_the_Deep_One: 寺庙里的雕像曾经是面朝一座山上的要塞，但是这些山脉都已沉入波涛之下。雕刻这些守卫石像的人们早已被遗忘，就连国度也无人铭记。在斯拉达将这把远古三叉戟从藤壶盘绕的石像手中取出时，石像貌似无动于衷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Trident_of_the_D: Once the temple's caryatids looked out upon a mountain fastness, but those lofty peaks have long since slumped beneath the waves. No one remembers who carved those guardian figures, or even what that nation called itself. And the statue merely scowled a little when Slardar slipped the ancient trident free of its barnacle-encrusted paws.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Trine_Announcer_Pack: 这件播音包将把默认播音员和连杀配音替换为《魔幻三杰》中用平静的语调编织故事的旁白。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Trine_Announcer_: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the soothing tones of Trine's tale-weaving narrator.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tsunami_Blade: 这把有魔力的刀是在秘歌湾的激烈大战中获得，现在归昆卡所有。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tsunami_Blade: Acquired after the ferocious battle of Port Mignin, this enchanted blade now belongs to Kunkka.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vermilion: 每场战斗都是独一无二，就像夏季热浪中开花的竹子。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vermilion: Each conflict is unique, like bamboo's bloom in summer's heat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the_Ten_Plag: 每根胡须都代表一个在近期的瘟疫中被折磨的灵魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the: Each hair represents a soul stricken in the latest round of plague.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the_Ten_Plag: 且看疫病在这不祥的头盔下聚集。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the: Consider the sheer pestilence concentrated beneath this ominous helm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the_Ten_Plag: 十大瘟疫在这把镰刀上混合，产生了邪恶的光芒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the: The ten plagues mingle in this blade to create a malevolent glow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the_Ten_Plag: 包含瘟疫法师的“十大瘟疫法衣”套装内所有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the: Includes all the items in the \"Vestments of the Ten Plagues\" set for Necrophos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the_Ten_Plag: 传播最流行瘟疫的毒虫充当着上面的饰物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vestments_of_the: Emblazoned with some of the most popular plague-bearing vermin.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vingspan: 骑士在毕生不断寻找新刺激的时候，在一片遥远的大陆上离奇地强占了一只坐骑，靠的只是相互的摩擦和满嘴的大蒜味。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vingspan: Ever in search of new thrills, the Rider commandeered an unlikely steed in a faraway land, with nothing but grit and persuasive Garlic breath.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WE_Pennant: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WE_Pennant: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Warriors_Retribution_Set:
包含斯温的“复仇勇者”套装内所有物品。复仇勇者大剑和战盔可以通过积累胜场和巨力挥舞击杀敌人的数量进行升级，从而解锁全新款式。

以上物品是与DotaCinema网站联合创建，每售出一套网站都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Warriors_Retribu:
Contains all the items in the \"Warrior's Retribution\" set for Sven. The Sword and the Helm of the Warrior's Retribution can be leveled up to unlock new styles by winning games and cleaving enemies as Sven.

These items were created in partnership with Dota Cinema, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Windweave_Headband: 最精美的丝绸制成的头带。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Blight: 地下世界的皮质羽翼。由深渊渡鸦所赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Blight: Leathery feathered wings of the underworld. Gifted by the ravens of the abyss.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Lunacy_Bringer: 重力只是这对翅膀藐视的众多无形力量之一。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Lunacy_: Gravity is but one of the unseen forces these wings defy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Solstice_Fashion: 用死去的冰川长牙狐毛皮制成的围巾，不仅保暖，而且在极寒的暴风雪天气中还会非常美丽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Solstice_: Furred in the down of glacial tusk-foxes, this scarf will keep you warm and looking good in the coldest of snowstorms.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wrap_of_the_Shifting_Sorc:
据说巫师索罗首变身后的形态极为恐怖，即使是再冷静的人看到都会魂飞魄散。

选手物品是与玩家最喜爱的选手联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wrap_of_the_Shif:
The shifted forms of the sorcerer Throsho were said to be so hideous as to shatter even the strongest mind upon sight.

These Player Items are created in partnership with your favorite player, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Glacier_Dust:
尽管看上去不大，但是设计非常巧妙，数层材料经过组合后非常保暖，在冰川残骸的霜冻森林中绝对行走自如！

选手物品是与玩家最喜爱的选手联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraps_of_the_Gla:

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Platinum_Baby_Ro: A unique and glistening trophy awarded to the deadliest heroes to face Sugar Rush Roshan.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Unusual_Artificers: 本图纸将融合若干物品并产生独特巧匠之锤。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Unusual_A: This recipe will combine a number of items and produce an Unusual Artificer's Hammer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_1: SDL联赛聚集了48支业余战队来争夺总计500雷亚尔的奖金以及不朽物品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_1: The SDL features 48 amateur teams competing for a total prize pool of R$500 and Immortal items!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sina_Cup_Supernova_Dota_2: 第2届新浪杯超新星刀塔公开赛开启了新赛季！除了8支邀请战队，还有通过预赛选拔的4支战队一同争夺总计65 000元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sina_Cup_Superno: Sina Cup Supernova Dota 2 Open is back for another season! In addition to the 8 invited teams, 4 teams will advance through qualifiers to compete for a total prize pool of 65,000RMB.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_South_American_Elite_Leag: 南美最具天赋的选手将在传统内战联赛赛制下进行为期六周的激烈比赛，争夺1000美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_South_American_E: The most talented players in South America compete for $1,000 in the classic in-house league format for six weeks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Northern_Wind_Set: 这件捆绑包内含风行者的“北风行者”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Northern_Win: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Northern Wind' set for Windranger:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Orena: 来自南非的32支顶尖Dota 2战队争夺总计8500兰特的奖金和来自赛睿的游戏外设！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Orena: 32 of South Africa's top Dota 2 teams compete for a total prize pool of R8500 and gaming hardware from SteeelSeries!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Unusual_Artificers_Hammer: 一柄具有强大魔力的锤子，用于提取镶入独特信使的宝石。提取后将会摧毁信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Unusual_Artifice: A powerful enchanted hammer used to extract gems that have been socketed into unusual couriers. This item will destroy the courier it is used on.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Windrangers_Sylvan_Bundle: 本捆绑包内含2012年10月发布的所有风行者物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Windrangers_Sylv: This bundle contains all of the items for Windranger released in October 2012.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Yard_Orange_Festival: 16支队伍将争夺1 000美元的巨额奖金！其中12支参赛战队为直接邀请，剩下4支则是选拔产生。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Yard_Orange_Fest: 16 teams will compete for a grand prize of $1,000! 12 teams will be invited and 4 will earn their spot through qualifying.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ZaruKina_Protectors_Hair: 风行者被摧毁的故乡——扎茹吉娜村里常用的发式。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ZaruKina_Protect: A hairstyle common to the Zaru'Kina people of Lyralei's destroyed village.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Garb_of_the_Cruel_Mag: Garb of the Cruel Magician Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Sina_Cup_Supernova_Dota_2_Open: 第2届新浪杯超新星刀塔公开赛
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Sina_Cup_Supernova_Do: Sina Cup Supernova Dota 2 Open Season 2
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Yard_Orange_Festival__ADMIN: 千金节联赛 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Anointed_Armor_of_Ruinati: 这件物品包含亚巴顿的“毁灭魔铠”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Anointed_Armor_o: This item includes all of the items in the 'Anointed Armor of Ruination' set for Abaddon:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Axe_of_Phractos: 炽焰战斧锐利异常，伤敌自如，体现了风度所不能比拟的力量。由乌尔马瑞恩的炼钢厂新鲜出炉，斧刃上因灼焰的热气还冒着火光——烧灼已就绪。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Axe_of_Phractos: An instrument of keen-edged trauma, the Axe of Phractos embodies power over grace. Newly forged by the steelworks of Ulmarain, searing heat still shimmers across its facets--a cauterisation in waiting.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Birds_Stone_Set: 包含先知的“飞鸟金石”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Birds_Stone_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Bird's Stone' set for Nature's Prophet:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Shadowcat: 采用毛皮、象牙和最精良的卓尔金属制成的弓。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Shado: A bow made of skin, fur, ebony and finest pieces of drow metal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Coco_the_Courageous: 真的勇士不是敢于高举宝剑，而是敢于高举酒杯...有时候，即使是最强大的英雄也需要激发斗志！在此隆重推出欢欢，红爪酿酒厂的信使勇士，他将不惜代价坚决将佳酿送往战场！英雄的酒瘾休想再折磨他们！佳酿必流芳。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Coco_the_Courage: True courage is not how high you can hold a sword but how high you can hold your spirit... And sometimes, even the strongest of heroes need their spirit boosted! Introducing Coco, a courageous courier of the Redpaw Brewery, determined to bring brew to the battlefield at any cost! No longer shall a heroes thirst go unquenched! The call for brew is sacred and by oath it must be upheld! The brew must flow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_Sponsorship: Nexon赞助联赛于2013年9月28日全面开战，持续3个赛季，总奖金是高达3亿韩元（约合27万美金）的战队赞助奖金。快来观看第二赛季的顶尖对决。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Nexon_Sp: Starting in Sep 28th 2013, the Nexon Sponsorship League will span three seasons with a total of KRW 300 million ($267,153 USD) worth of sponsorship funding. Watch the top team matches of Season 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pinoy_Dota_2_Onli: Pinoy Dota联赛为您奉上菲律宾巅峰竞技！本届联赛将邀请2支战队，并选拔产生6支战队共同争夺1万菲律宾比索的奖金。好戏将从12月9日至2014年2月1日不断上演！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pinoy_Do: Pinoy Dota delivers Philippine E-sports in your hands! This tournament features 2 teams with 6 qualifiers that will compete for P10,000 prize pool on December 9th through February 1, 2014!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Darkstar_the_Mistforged: 这把魔霭家族祖传的长剑投入了圣池重新铸就。后来出现的是钢铁和迷雾的混合体，能够吞噬敌人的灵魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Darkstar_the_Mis: This ancestral blade of House Avernus was cast into the Font, to be forged anew. What emerged was an amalgam of steel, and mist, that feasts upon the souls of its foes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Shard: 在天国之门的惊天一役中，世界之刃有所破损，碎裂成了上千个碎片。最大的碎片后来被偷偷带回地狱的铸造间进行了重铸，上面流转的符文赋予了全新的名字，恶魔刀烽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Shard: Shattered during the cataclysmic battle of Heaven's Gate, the Blade of Worlds fell as a thousand pieces. Smuggled back into the foundries of Hell, the largest fragment was later reformed, the runes upon its surface shifting to denote a new name, Demon Shard.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Furstole_of_the_Shadowcat: 采用灵猫的皮毛制成的披肩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Furstole_of_the_: A stole created from the skin and pelt of the shadowcat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gaiters_of_the_Shadowcat: 后腿毛和猫爪，最终制成了这对腿罩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gaiters_of_the_S: Hindlegs and paws, fur and claws, crafted into gaiters.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gifts_of_the_Shadowcat_Se: 包含卓尔游侠的“灵猫之礼”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gifts_of_the_Sha: Includes all of the items in the 'Gifts of the Shadowcat' set for Drow Ranger:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_the_Red_Mist: 盾牌在铸就之初红雾军团还并非单兵之军，蒙哥可汗还只是个小喽啰。后来决心用作护盾后，战斗饥渴的凶煞符印就变成了表面的装饰。只有死亡和杀戮才能解除邪咒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_the_Red: Forged when the Red Mist were many and Mogul Khan was but a lowly grunt, the Guard is a rock among a sea of blows. As much a statement of intent as a shield, the cursed sigil of Battle Hunger lies emblazoned upon its face. Only death and slaughter may remedy its hex.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Monarch_Bow: 此神器来自一位早已离世的霸主。对于重视致命的精准和技巧而不是蛮力的英雄，霸王蝶定能助其一臂之力。无论是静还是动，在最致命的环境下，都能与最冷静的头脑进行相互弥补。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Monarch_Bow: A relic from a hegemony long since passed, the Monarch rewards those who value lethal precision and skill over blunt force. As graceful in action as at rest, it complements perfectly the coolest of heads under the deadliest of circumstances.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Netherax_Nightmare_of_the: 当圣池增强亚巴顿力量时，它还召唤了一只生物，同他一样可怕，供他驰骋进战场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Netherax_Nightma: When the Font anointed Abaddon with its power, it also conjured up a creature, equally terrifying, for its champion to ride into battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorship_League_: Nexon赞助联赛于2013年9月28日全面开战，持续3个赛季，总奖金是高达3亿韩元（约合27万美金）的战队赞助奖金。快来观看第二赛季的顶尖对决。包含抬轿兄弟信使！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorshi:
Starting in Sep 28th 2013, the Nexon Sponsorship League will span three seasons with a total of KRW 300 million ($267,153 USD) worth of sponsorship funding. Watch the top team matches of Season 2.
	Includes the Gama Brothers courier!
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Paws_of_the_Shad: The claws of the shadowcat, deadly and powerful.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pelt_of_the_Shadowcat: 将她的猎物扒皮后制成的斗篷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pelt_of_the_Shad: A cape created from the pelt of her prey.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pinoy_Dota_2_Online_Battl: Pinoy Dota联赛为您奉上菲律宾巅峰竞技！本届联赛将邀请2支战队，并选拔产生6支战队共同争夺1万菲律宾比索的奖金。好戏将从12月9日至2014年2月1日不断上演！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pinoy_Dota_2_Onl: Pinoy Dota delivers Philippine E-sports in your hands! This tournament features 2 teams with 6 qualifiers that will compete for P10,000 prize pool on December 9th through February 1, 2014!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Quiver_of_the_Shadowcat: 箭和箭袋都是采用森林中最好的材料制成，并由卓尔金属一同打造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Quiver_of_the_Sh: Quiver and arrows made from the finest materials the forest offers and crafted together with the metals of the drow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_8: SLTV传奇赛事StarSeries联赛第8赛季的参赛队伍是欧洲顶尖的18支战队。本赛季的奖金将在50 000美元的基础上不断增加，每售出一张门票奖金都会增加2.50美元。经过线上的循环赛后战队将前往基辅的Cybersport Arena进行线下的最终角逐。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series: The 8th season of the legendary SLTV StarSeries will feature best 18 teams from Europe. They will compete for growing prize pool starting at $50,000. $2.50 of every purchase will go to the SLTV StarSeries prize pool. Round-robin online tournament and LAN finals in Kyiv Cybersport Arena.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_8: SLTV传奇赛事StarSeries联赛第8赛季的参赛队伍是欧洲顶尖的18支战队。本赛季的奖金将在50 000美元的基础上不断增加，每售出一张门票奖金都会增加2.50美元。经过线上的循环赛后战队将前往基辅的Cybersport Arena进行线下的最终角逐。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series: The 8th season of the legendary SLTV StarSeries will feature best 18 teams from Europe. They will compete for growing prize pool starting at $50,000. $2.50 of every purchase will go to the SLTV StarSeries prize pool. Round-robin online tournament and LAN finals in Kyiv Cybersport Arena.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Series_8_Battle_Poin: 使用该物品后将使获得<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提升至<font color='#9da1a9'>225%</font>，持续6天。此外，您将使其他玩家额外获得<font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font>的<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>获得速率，该速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Series_8_Ba: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> to <font color='#9da1a9'>225%</font> for 6 days. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Caustic_Consumption_S: 这件套装包含沙王的“腐蚀之噬”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Caustic_Cons: This set contains all of the items in the 'Caustic Consumption' set for Sand King:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Exiled_Demonologist_S: 这件捆绑包内含术士的“流亡恶魔学家”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Exiled_Demon: This bundle contains all of the items in 'The Exiled Demonologist' set for Warlock:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciple: 包含赏金猎人的“第二门徒”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: Includes all of the items in the 'Second Disciple' set for Bounty Hunter:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Bast: 有时候猎人会想在完事之后收获更多，他也就不需要马上去领赏。刚铎混入叛军之中，他想要给自己找些耐用的装备，同时去了解索鲁克失窃的秘方为何会被叛军所掌握。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: Sometimes a bounty does not need to be collected immediately if the hunter believes there is more to gain on a job. Gondar enlists in the army of the infidel in order to obtain sturdy gear and learn the stolen secrets of Soruq that have been bestowed upon the undeserving army.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Blad: 这把刀是收集战场散落的装备后打造而成，同时提醒着刚铎和他的敌人，背信弃义之人会有何下场。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: This blade, fashioned of salvaged equipment from the battlefield, serves as a reminder to both Gondar and his enemies of what happens to those who betray sacred trusts.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Chak: 这件武器背在身后，在战场上攻守兼备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: Carried upon his back, this weapon serves as both defense and offense on the field of battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Dagg: 刚铎将这把武器从奸诈的背叛者手中偷回，再用它将那将军的喉咙撕开，并决定了整支叛军的命运。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: Stolen from the betrayer himself, Gondar used this weapon to slit the throat of the deceitful war general and seal the fate of the army founded on infidelity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Satc: 刚铎将重要的材料和器具放在背包中，时刻做好追捕的准备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: Gondar carries his important materials and implements in his satchel, always prepared for future hunts.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disciples_Veil: 感受到第二门徒面纱中注入的能量后，刚铎从他的师傅那学到了稀罕而实用的招数。借助附咒之刃上的符印，猎人可以感受到卑鄙的背叛者几近失去的强大力量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Second_Disci: With the power imbued in the veil of the second disciple, Gondar learned a rare and useful technique passed down from his old master. With the sigil of the enchanted blade, the hunter can feel a great power that was nearly lost to the filthy traitor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Seers_Command_Set: 包含黑暗贤者的“贤者司令”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Seers_Comman: Includes all of the items in 'The Seers Command' set for Dark Seer:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Threads_of_Entwined_Fate_:
包含可以升级的命运纠缠之线套装，6天有效期的125%战斗加成和群星联赛第8赛季门票。

每售出一份捆绑套装，比赛的总奖金都将增加2.50美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Threads_of_Entwi:
Includes the evolving Threads of the Entwined Fate Set, 125% 6 day Battle Bonus and access to Star Series 8.

$2.50 of every purchase will go directly to the Star Series 8 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tory_the_Sky_Guardian: 相传青天卫鸟自时间之初就御风而行，诚心去做远古部落的信使。现在选择它做盟友将后勤无忧，因为清风在他朝目的地翱翔时为他敞开了道路，高耸的山脉或是激烈的战场他都能畅行无阻，相比其他鸟类，他绝对是在各方面都完胜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tory_the_Sky_Gua:
It's been told that Tory, the Sky Guardian, has been riding the winds since the beginning of time, serving the ancient tribes faithfully as a proficient messenger. 
	Everlasting glory shall be provided to those who are chosen by Tory as allies, as the winds seem to open a path for him while he gracefully flies towards his destination. 
	A skilled companion who can fly above the highest mountain and glide over the bloodiest battlefield, Tory can surpass every flying being in every way possible.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wind_Rangers_Sylvan_Bundl: 这件捆绑大包内含在2012年10月发布的所有风行者物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wind_Rangers_Syl: This bundle contains all of the items for Wind Ranger released in October 2012.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Nexon_Sponsorship_League_Seaso: Nexon赞助联赛第2赛季 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Pinoy_Dota_2_Online_Battle__AD: Pinoy Dota 2线上大战 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_8__ADM: SLTV群星联赛第8赛季 - 管理员
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Star_Series_8_Battle_Point_Boo: 群星联赛第8赛季经验飞升
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Threads_of_Entwined_Fate__Star: 命运纠缠之线套装和群星联赛第8赛季捆绑礼包
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Threads_of_Entwined_F: Threads of Entwined Fate & Star Series 8 Bundle
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Blessings_of_the_Eter: Blessings of the Eternal Eclipse Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Araceaes_Tribute_Set: 这件捆绑包内含魅惑魔女的“天南星之礼”内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Araceaes_Tribute: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Araceae's Tribute' set for Enchantress:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blessings_of_the_Eternal_: 包含露娜的“无尽月蚀的福佑”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blessings_of_the: Includes all of the items in the 'Blessings of the Eternal Eclipse' set for Luna:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Awakened: “愿尔等仇恨施以力量，粉碎同胞惨死之象征，只因象征之内蕴含无穷之力！” ——摘自《星隐录》
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_A: \"May thine Hatred lend thee the strength to shatter the symbol of thine bretheren's demise, for within its remains lies absolute power!\" - Taken from Tael'Am
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_Winter_Ope: 16支来自中西部地区的战队将前往芝加哥无情的冬季中争夺2000美元的奖金和更多大奖！比赛由芝加哥当地名嘴Vykromond解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_W: 16 teams from around the Midwest go head to head in the midst of Chicago's unforgiving winter for a $2000 prize pool and more! Also featuring live casting by Chicago-local Vykromond.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Gigabyte_Premier_: 技嘉联手DotaTalk，非常自豪地向您带来技嘉超级联赛。参赛的都是东南亚精英战队，他们将争夺1500美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Gigabyte: Gigabyte in partnership with DotaTalk proudly brings you the Gigabyte Premier league. It features Southeast Asia's finest teams as they compete for a total prize pool of $1,500.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_MLG_Championship_:
MLG首个Dota 2国际大赛的参赛战队分别是来自欧洲，中国和北美的世界顶级队伍，比赛的起始奖金为5万美元。
捆绑包内含：
* 鳞甲猎狗信使
* 据点用户界面皮肤
* 螺旋岗哨守卫
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_MLG_Cham:
MLG's first International Dota 2 competition will feature the world's best teams from Europe, China and North America competing for a growing prize pool starting at $50,000.
Included in this bundle:
* Scalehound Courier
* Stronghold HUD Skin
* Tethered Sentinel Ward
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Montenegro_Nation: 黑山共和国全国联赛是黑山共和国首个Dota 2职业联赛，由黑山电竞协会组织主办。全国的顶尖队伍将激烈争夺冠军大奖！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Monteneg: The Montenegro National League is the first professional Dota 2 league in Montenegro organized by Montenegro E-Sports Association. The best teams from country will compete for the championship and prizes!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Raidcall_Southeas: Raidcall为您带来东南亚邀请赛，参赛的16支顶尖战队将争夺1000美元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Raidcall: Raidcall presents the Southeast Asian Invitational League, featuring 16 of the best teams competing for $1000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Razer_Pinoy_Cup_S: 8支菲律宾顶尖战队将争夺雷蛇提供的外设，价值1000美元！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Razer_Pi: The top 8 Filipino teams will compete for gaming equipment from Razer worth $1,000!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sudamerican_Maste: 本届联赛的参赛队伍是来自南美洲的16支顶尖战队；其中10支为直接邀请，剩余6支通过选拔产生。来自智利，秘鲁，阿根廷，巴西，委内瑞拉和哥伦比亚的选手们已经为超过600美元的奖金蓄势待发！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sudameri: This tournament will feature the top 16 South American teams;' 10 invited teams and 6 qualifying teams. Chile, Peru, Argentina, Brazil, Venezuela and Colombia squaring off for the award of more than $600!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Winter_Open: 16支来自中西部地区的战队将前往芝加哥无情的冬季中争夺2000美元的奖金和更多大奖！比赛由芝加哥当地名嘴Vykromond解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Winter_Op: 16 teams from around the Midwest go head to head in the midst of Chicago's unforgiving winter for a $2000 prize pool and more! Also featuring live casting by Chicago-local Vykromond.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Elite_Southeast_Asian_Lea: 南美最具天赋的选手将单独比赛，再组成战队争夺冠军头衔！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Elite_Southeast_: The most talented players in Southeast Asia compete individually then form teams to be crowned the champion!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Elite_Southeast_Asian_Lea: 南美最具天赋的选手将单独比赛，再组成战队争夺冠军头衔！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Elite_Southeast_: The most talented players in Southeast Asia compete individually then form teams to be crowned the champion!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frosty_Treasure_of_Frosti: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>2013年迎霜节的宝箱钥匙</font>来打开这个宝箱。您可以前往Dota 2商店购买。注意！<font color='#9da1a9'>2014年1月12日后</font>这个宝箱就会化为无用的雪花。宝箱内含有以下数件全新神秘物品之一：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frosty_Treasure_: You will need <font color='#9da1a9'>Frostivus 2013 Treasure Key</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Beware! At the end of <font color='#9da1a9'>January 12, 2014</font> this chest will crumble into useless snowflakes. This chest contains one of several mysterious new items:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Awakened: “飞升圣洁，跨越堕落恶徒之梦，利欲熏心、盲目无知实乃其早逝之因”——摘自《星隐录》
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_of_the_Awak: \"Ascend to Divinity upon shattered dreams of the fallen unworthy, whose lust for power and blind ignorance led them to their untimely demise.\" - Taken from Tael'Am
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gigabyte_Premier_League_S: 技嘉联手DotaTalk，非常自豪地向您带来技嘉超级联赛。参赛的都是东南亚精英战队，他们将争夺1500美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gigabyte_Premier: Gigabyte in partnership with DotaTalk proudly brings you the Gigabyte Premier league. It features Southeast Asia's finest teams as they compete for a total prize pool of $1,500.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Montenegro_National_Leagu: 黑山共和国全国联赛是黑山共和国首个Dota 2职业联赛，由黑山电竞协会组织主办。全国的顶尖队伍将激烈争夺冠军大奖！

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shard_of_Retribu: \"Let not thine conviction blind thee, but embrace Retribution for the Redemption of thine Order.\" - Taken from Tael'Am
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shard_of_Vengeance: “切让复仇光芒万丈，笼罩邪灵的暗影就此退散...”——摘自《星隐录》
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shard_of_Vengean: \"Let Vengeance be thine Radiance, so it may disperse the shadows that shroud the Wicked...\" - Taken from Tael'Am
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroud_of_the_Awakened: “愿汝之征程不受无智之徒阻挠，汝须终结其受难的一生...”——摘自《星隐录》
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroud_of_the_Aw: \"May thine visage not be hindered by those of absent mind and eternal hunger, for thou shall bring an end to their suffering...\" - Taken from Tael'Am.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sudamerican_Master: 本届联赛的参赛队伍是来自南美洲的16支顶尖战队；其中10支为直接邀请，剩余6支通过选拔产生。来自智利，秘鲁，阿根廷，巴西，委内瑞拉和哥伦比亚的选手们已经为超过600美元的奖金蓄势待发！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_80_Battle_Point_Booster_5:
使用后战斗点数的获得速率提高80%，持续500分钟。而且其他玩家的战斗点数获得速度也将提高16%，效果可以叠加。

战斗点数飞升的效果持续时间只有在获得战斗点数的过程中才会被消耗，在游戏内观战或者作为教练指导并不会消耗时间。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_80_Battle_Point_:
Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points by 80% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 16% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_A_Welcoming_Gift: <font color='#9da1a9'>右键点击并选择“拆开礼物”进行开启。</font>
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_A_Welcoming_Gift: <font color='#9da1a9'>Right click and select 'Unwrap Present' to open.</font>
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Frozen_Axe: 冰盾之惧尤弥尔打造这柄独特冰斧的地方是狼穴酒馆所在的极地山脉。他握着斧头，豪情万丈。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ancestors_Frozen: Yzir, Terror from the Barrier, crafted his very own axe in the arctic mountains of Wolfsden Tavern. Hold it with pride.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Anguilla: 像水陆两栖的电鳗兽一样将干扰者周围的电流运转自如的坐骑屈指可数。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Anguilla: There are few mounts that handle the electric currents that surround Disruptor as well as Anguilla, the amphibious electric eel.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Lina: 这件物品将默认播音员替换为风风火火的莉娜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Lina: This item replaces the Default announcer with the fiery attitude of Lina.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Cryogenic_Emb: 在乌尔萨被伤病和寒冷所摧残时，萨满将他的部分生命与附近的冰锥进行束缚，帮助他康复。现在熊战士自豪地穿上这件嵌入冰咒碎片的毛皮护甲，显示自己精神上战胜了死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Cryo: As Ulfsaar lay ravaged by battle and cold, the shaman bound parts of his life force to the nearby icicles until he recovered. The warrior now proudly wears this fur armor embedded with shards of that spellbound ice as a reminder of his spirit's victory over death itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Back_of_the_Cryogenic_Emb: 在乌尔萨被伤病和寒冷所摧残时，萨满将他的部分生命与附近的冰锥进行束缚，帮助他康复。现在熊战士自豪地穿上这件嵌入冰咒碎片的毛皮护甲，显示自己精神上战胜了死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Back_of_the_Cryo: As Ulfsaar lay ravaged by battle and cold, the shaman bound parts of his life force to the nearby icicles until he recovered. The warrior now proudly wears this fur armor embedded with shards of that spellbound ice as a reminder of his spirit's victory over death itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Cryogenic_Emb: 在乌尔萨被伤病和寒冷所摧残时，萨满将他的部分生命与附近的冰锥进行束缚，帮助他康复。现在熊战士自豪地穿上这件嵌入冰咒碎片的毛皮护甲，显示自己精神上战胜了死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Belt_of_the_Cryo: As Ulfsaar lay ravaged by battle and cold, the shaman bound parts of his life force to the nearby icicles until he recovered. The warrior now proudly wears this fur armor embedded with shards of that spellbound ice as a reminder of his spirit's victory over death itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blood_Drainer_Hook: 一把碰到敌人就能从多个角度刺入的钩子，在帕吉卷走猎物时能够快速进行放血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blood_Drainer_Ho: A hook designed to pierce foes in multiple areas upon impact and draw blood as Pudge reels in his prey.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blueheart_Tails: 这是莉莱在北极的巨大冰川上接受教导时头上的发型。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blueheart_Tails: The hairstyle worn by Rylai during her lessons atop the great glacier of the north.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Serpent: 在荒狱丛林怪树丛生的中心长着一片古老又有魔力的树林，粗糙的树根和枝干上可以找到一种异常致命的毒蛇。而在荒狱丛林的部落间一直有所流传，有一把用这树木制成的弓，上面注入了结晶后的蛇毒。现在凭借美杜莎渴望复仇的双手，林蟒之弓就像其得名的毒蛇撕咬猎物一样快速致命。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Serpe: A grove of ancient and magical trees rises from the tangled heart of the Yama Raskav Jungle, and in its gnarled roots and branches may be found a unique and singularly deadly species of viper. The tribes of Yama Raskav tell of a bow crafted from the wood of this grove, infused with the crystallized venom of the serpents which dwell there. In MedusaÃ¢ÂÂs vengeful hands, the Bow of the Serpent is as swift and deadly as the bite of the viper for which it is named.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_The_Howling_Wo: 护腕上精心雕刻的兽骨是霜寒之风部落的仪式符号。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_The_H: Bone-carved arm bracers display the ceremonial markings of the Frosted Winds tribe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Frozen_Fea: 在巫师进入冰川闭关的前一天，他给了水晶室女这些珍贵的礼物：护服和法杖，坚实如冰，轻盈如羽，据说曾经是冬神之物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_F: A day before the wizard descended into the glacier to begin his hibernation, he offered Crystal Maiden these last, precious gifts: armor and a staff, strong as ice but light as a feather, believed to have once belonged to a winter deity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Burning_Spear: 一把用磨尖的石头制成的长矛，并注入了魔火。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Burning_Spear: A spear of sharpened rock blades imbued with magical fire.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cap_of_the_Fungal_Lord: 注入了蘑菇先祖的精华。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cap_of_the_Funga: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Frozen_Feathe: 在巫师进入冰川闭关的前一天，他给了水晶室女这些珍贵的礼物：护服和法杖，坚实如冰，轻盈如羽，据说曾经是冬神之物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cape_of_the_Froz: A day before the wizard descended into the glacier to begin his hibernation, he offered Crystal Maiden these last, precious gifts: armor and a staff, strong as ice but light as a feather, believed to have once belonged to a winter deity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cinch_of_the_Mortal_Coil: 死亡先知所穿的深红色华服。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cinch_of_the_Mor: A fine crimson cloth adorned by the Death Prophet.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Clash_of_Heroes_II: 这件新物品还没有描述。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Clash_of_Heroes_: This new item has no description.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Commission_for_Legion_Com: 右键点击使用，军团指挥官即可加入阵容。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Commission_for_L: Right-Click and use to add Legion Commander to the roster.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_Romania_IV: 第四届罗马尼亚Dota 2联赛，战队将争超过100欧元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_R: The fourth Dota 2 Romania tournament where teams compete for a grand prize of over 100€!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sina_Cup_Supernov: 第2届新浪杯超新星刀塔公开赛开启了新赛季！除了8支邀请战队，还有通过预赛选拔的4支战队一同争夺总计65 000元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sina_Cup: Sina Cup Supernova Dota 2 Open is back for another season! In addition to the 8 invited teams, 4 teams will advance through qualifiers to compete for a total prize pool of 65,000RMB.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sri_Lanka_Cyber_G: 斯里兰卡网游联赛已经成为国内最大的电竞联赛，今年联赛将把游戏文化提升到新的高度。赶快来观看顶尖Dota 2战队在这场盛事中同台竞技！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sri_Lank: SLCG has become the largest e-Sports tournament in the country, and this year it aims to take the culture of games to the next level. Watch top Dota 2 teams compete in the largest event in Sri Lanka!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure_Key: 用于开启上锁的<font color='#9da1a9'>迎霜节的冰霜财宝</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Frosty Treasure of Frostivus</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Coronet_of_the_Mortal_Coi: 克萝贝露丝最漂亮的头饰。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Corset_of_the_Mortal_Coil: 极度奢华的胸衣，为大多数致命场合打造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Corset_of_the_Mo: An extravagant corset fashioned for the most deathly occasions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cryogenic_Embrace_Set: 包含熊战士的“极寒之拥”套装内所有物品和极寒之拥载入画面
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cryogenic_Embrac: Includes all of the items in the 'Cryogenic Embrace' set for Ursa plus the Ursa Cryogenic Embrace loading screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Generals_Mantle: 黑暗贤者当年还是神王达玛瑞克斯麾下将军时穿着的金色斗篷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Generals_Ma: A golden mantle from Dark Seer's days as one of god-king Damathryx's great generals.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Romania_IV: 第四届罗马尼亚Dota 2联赛，战队将争夺超过100欧元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Romania_I: The fourth Dota 2 Romania tournament where teams compete for a grand prize of over 100 Euros!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Equipment_of_the_Northlig: 伊扎洛以守卫白天的光辉在各大位面闻名，但是来自远方的传说，悲叹山脉上白雪皑皑的村庄里讲述的他是另一副传说：无从寻觅的捍卫者，身怀北极星的指引之光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Equipment_of_the: Ezalor is known throughout the realms as Keeper of the radiance of day, but legends from the remote, snowbound villages of the Wailing Mountains tell of him appearing in another guise: that of a champion of the lost, a bearer of the guiding light of the North Star.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Avernus: 魔霭圣池可以看透迷雾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Avernus: The Font of Avernus can see through the mist.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Familiar_Woods: 可靠的伙伴，熟悉的道路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Familiar_Woods: A trusted friend on a well-worn path.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Foulfell_Shard: 暗黑水晶的碎片，辐射出深渊冥灵的能量。里面悸动的是遭到囚禁的恶魔无声的仇恨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Foulfell_Shard: A fragment of black crystal that radiates corrupting, abyssal energy. It throbs with the voiceless hatred of demons imprisoned within.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Touched_Cleaver: 深冬之寒碰到了这把巨牙海民的大刀！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Touched_Cl: A deep winter chill touches this cleaver for Tusk!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frozen_Feather_Set: 包含水晶室女的“冰羽霓裳”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frozen_Feather_S: Includes all of the items in 'Frozen Feather' set for Crystal Maiden:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frozen_Formation: 如果你被人发现，那接下来应该关心的就是千万别被冻住！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frozen_Formation: If you're spotted, it would be in your best interest not to freeze!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fungal_Lord_Set: 包含先知的“青蕈领主”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fungal_Lord_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Fungal Lord' set for Nature's Prophet:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gauntlet_of_the_Treachero: 从背叛莱恩的恶魔身上扯下的手腕做成了护臂相当合适。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gauntlet_of_the_: The torn hand of the demon that betrayed Lion makes a fitting gauntlet.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Reel_Guardian_Set: 这件捆绑包内含撼地者的“黄金卷轴卫士”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Reel_Guar: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Golden Reel Guardian' set for Earthshaker:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gown_of_the_Mortal_Coil: 死亡先知克萝贝露丝美丽飘逸的长袍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gown_of_the_Mort: The beautiful flowing robes of Krobelus, the Death Prophet.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Great_Moss_Cape_of_the_Fu: 注入了蘑菇先祖的精华。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Great_Moss_Cape_: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hat_of_The_Howling_Wolf: 由珍稀的三尾呼啸之狼身上的毛皮制成的皮帽。狂狼之灵自在其中！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hat_of_The_Howli: A pelt hat made of the fur of the rare Triple-Tailed Howling Wolf. The spirit of the creature lives within!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heaven_Sent: 纯洁之人见过上苍之赐的内在光辉后他们的灵魂将被静谧洗涤，病痛也将缓解。而邪恶之物无法直视其光芒。这就是光之守卫的法杖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heaven_Sent: When the innocent gaze upon Heaven Sent's internal glow, their souls are awash with tranquility and respite from pain. The wicked cannot bear its light. This is a weapon for Keeper of Light.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Impasse: 战盔上的双角曾被魔法触碰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Impasse: A helm featuring horns touched by enchantment.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helmet_of_the_Cryogenic_E: 在乌尔萨被伤病和寒冷所摧残时，萨满将他的部分生命与附近的冰锥进行束缚，帮助他康复。现在熊战士自豪地穿上这件嵌入冰咒碎片的毛皮护甲，显示自己精神上战胜了死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helmet_of_the_Cr: As Ulfsaar lay ravaged by battle and cold, the shaman bound parts of his life force to the nearby icicles until he recovered. The warrior now proudly wears this fur armor embedded with shards of that spellbound ice as a reminder of his spirit's victory over death itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_HobblyBob: 让虫子远离视线的时髦做法。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_HobblyBob: The fashionable way to keep bugs out of your sights.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hood_of_the_Frozen_Feathe: 在巫师进入冰川闭关的前一天，他给了水晶室女这些珍贵的礼物：护服和法杖，坚实如冰，轻盈如羽，据说曾经是冬神之物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hood_of_the_Froz: A day before the wizard descended into the glacier to begin his hibernation, he offered Crystal Maiden these last, precious gifts: armor and a staff, strong as ice but light as a feather, believed to have once belonged to a winter deity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hood_of_the_Northlight: 伊扎洛以守卫白天的光辉在各大位面闻名，但是来自远方的传说，悲叹山脉上白雪皑皑的村庄里讲述的他是另一副传说：无从寻觅的捍卫者，身怀北极星的指引之光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hood_of_the_Nort: Ezalor is known throughout the realms as Keeper of the radiance of day, but legends from the remote, snowbound villages of the Wailing Mountains tell of him appearing in another guise: that of a champion of the lost, a bearer of the guiding light of the North Star.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ironwood_Arms_of_the_Fung: 注入了蘑菇先祖的精华。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ironwood_Arms_of: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Keeper_of_the_Northlight_: 包含光之守卫的“北极光守卫”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Keeper_of_the_No: Includes all of the items in 'Keeper of the Northlight' set for Keeper of the Light:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_the_Awakened: 敌法师缓慢地陷入死亡的无底洞，他深知复仇时刻已经来临...
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_the_Aw: Anti-Mage slowly began his descent into the maw of death itself, assured that the time of his vengeance is at hand...
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Level_2_Present: <font color='#9da1a9'>右键点击并选择“拆开礼物”进行开启。</font>
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Level_2_Present: <font color='#9da1a9'>Right click and select 'Unwrap Present' to open.</font>
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lina_Announcer_Pack: 这件播音包将游戏内默认播音员和连杀配音替换为风风火火的莉娜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lina_Announcer_P: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the fiery attitude of Lina.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mastery_Gem: 该宝石在镶入物品后能改变相应英雄的技能特效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mastery_Gem: This gem will modify an ability effect on the hero that wears the item it is socketed in.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Lina: 这件物品将默认连杀配音替换为风风火火的莉娜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Lina: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the fiery attitude of Lina.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the_Frozen_F: 在巫师进入冰川闭关的前一天，他给了水晶室女这些珍贵的礼物：护服和法杖，坚实如冰，轻盈如羽，据说曾经是冬神之物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pauldrons_of_the: A day before the wizard descended into the glacier to begin his hibernation, he offered Crystal Maiden these last, precious gifts: armor and a staff, strong as ice but light as a feather, believed to have once belonged to a winter deity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pelt_of_The_Howling_Wolf: 由珍稀的三尾呼啸之狼身上的毛皮制成的披风。隐秘又保暖！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pelt_of_The_Howl: A pelt cape made of the fur of the rare Triple-Tailed Howling Wolf. Stealthy and warm!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Present: <font color='#9da1a9'>右键点击并选择“拆开礼物”进行开启。</font>
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Present: <font color='#9da1a9'>Right click and select 'Unwrap Present' to open.</font>
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Present_Dynamic:
一件珍贵的礼物，里面至少有一件稀有品质的物品。

右键点击并选择“拆开礼物”进行开启。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Present_Dynamic:
A valuable present, guaranteed to contain at least a rare item.

Right click and select 'Unwrap Present' to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Training: 这张图纸需要你收集2件普通品质的物品进行重铸，将产生一种全新物品：巫医的自定义嘲讽动作。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Training: This recipe requires you to collect 2 Common items to craft a new kind of item: A custom Taunt animation for Witch Doctor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Wraith_Kings_Relic: 奥斯塔里昂寻求将他的领土扩张到地狱，他曾经去搜索收集一个分裂位面的碎片，据说能囚禁恶魔的灵魂。这张图纸将会从冥魂大帝宝库中的恶魔宝物中选择并产生幽冥圣物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Wraith_Ki: Seeking to extend his dominion to the Infernal Regions, Ostarion once sought to collect shards of a riven dimension rumored to be capable of imprisoning demon's souls. This recipe will produce a corrupted relic selected from the Wraith King's stock of demonic, shard-invested artifacts.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_Mortal_Coi: 包含死亡先知的“致命缠绕华服”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Regalia_of_the_M: Includes all of the items in 'Regalia of the Mortal Coil' set for Death Prophet:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rifle_of_The_Howling_Wolf: 传奇狙击手的栓式步枪，装有焦点镜片和铁十字。嘭！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rifle_of_The_How: The legendary Sniper bolt action rifle, featuring a scope lens and iron crosshair. BOOM!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Northlight: 伊扎洛以守卫白天的光辉在各大位面闻名，但是来自远方的传说，悲叹山脉上白雪皑皑的村庄里讲述的他是另一副传说：无从寻觅的捍卫者，身怀北极星的指引之光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Robe_of_the_Nort: Ezalor is known throughout the realms as Keeper of the radiance of day, but legends from the remote, snowbound villages of the Wailing Mountains tell of him appearing in another guise: that of a champion of the lost, a bearer of the guiding light of the North Star.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rune_of_the_Commanders_Ch: 将宝石镶入物品后将使物品具有记录军团指挥官决斗胜利次数，同时在决斗胜利时还将出现文字特效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rune_of_the_Comm: Adding this gem to an item will enable that item to track Legion Commander's successful duels, with a special effect displayed upon victory.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sermon_of_the_Frozen_Apos: 这件捆绑包内含亚巴顿的“寒冰使徒的训诫”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sermon_of_the_Fr: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Sermon of the Frozen Apostle' set for Abaddon:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_Stillness: 这面盾牌散发着沉着和静寂，让沉默术士周围的敌人统统安静。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shield_of_Stilln: This shield emanates calm and stillness, quieting Silencer's nearby foes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shining_Booster_500_minut:
使用此物品后即可在冥魂之夜中获得闪光碎片。闪光碎片可以用于兑换冥魂之夜骨瓮。

只有在进行冥魂之夜游戏时才会消耗闪亮加成的时间，而且闪亮加成能使其他玩家额外获得10%的数量，效果可以叠加。而在游戏内观战或做教练并不会消耗闪亮加成的时间。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shining_Booster_:
Use this item to earn Shining Fragments in Wraith-Night. Shining Fragments can be redemeed for Wraith-Night Ossuaries.

Shining Booster minutes are only consumed when you play Wraith-Night and will grant a 10% stackable bonus to each of your cohorts. Features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the_Fungal_L: 注入了蘑菇先祖的精华。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shoulders_of_the: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroom_Thing: 使用真菌和苔藓制造，并注入了蘑菇祖先的精华...菇人前来觐见！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroom_Thing: Constructed from fungus and moss and infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.. Shroom Thing is here to serve!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spaulders_of_The_Howling_: 护肩上精心雕刻的兽骨是霜寒之风部落的仪式符号。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spaulders_of_The: Bone-carved shoulder spaulders display the ceremonial markings of the Frosted Winds tribe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spirit_of_the_Howling_Wol: 包含狙击手的“呼啸狂狼之灵”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spirit_of_the_Ho: Includes all of the items in 'Spirit of The Howling Wolf' set for Sniper:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sri_Lanka_Cyber_Games_201: 斯里兰卡网游联赛已经成为国内最大的电竞联赛，今年联赛将把游戏文化提升到新的高度。赶快来观看顶尖Dota 2战队在这场盛事中同台竞技！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sri_Lanka_Cyber_: SLCG has become the largest e-Sports tournament in the country, and this year it aims to take the culture of games to the next level. Watch top Dota 2 teams compete in the largest event in Sri Lanka!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Frozen_Feath: 在巫师进入冰川闭关的前一天，他给了水晶室女这些珍贵的礼物：护服和法杖，坚实如冰，轻盈如羽，据说曾经是冬神之物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Fro: A day before the wizard descended into the glacier to begin his hibernation, he offered Crystal Maiden these last, precious gifts: armor and a staff, strong as ice but light as a feather, believed to have once belonged to a winter deity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Fungal_Lord: 注入了蘑菇先祖的精华。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Fun: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Northlight: 伊扎洛以守卫白天的光辉在各大位面闻名，但是来自远方的传说，悲叹山脉上白雪皑皑的村庄里讲述的他是另一副传说：无从寻觅的捍卫者，身怀北极星的指引之光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Staff_of_the_Nor: Ezalor is known throughout the realms as Keeper of the radiance of day, but legends from the remote, snowbound villages of the Wailing Mountains tell of him appearing in another guise: that of a champion of the lost, a bearer of the guiding light of the North Star.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stag_of_the_Northlight: 相传守卫骑着巨大的牡鹿在结冰的北部荒原游历，向最需帮助的人施以援手，并击败了黑暗与邪恶。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stag_of_the_Nort: The Keeper is said to travel the icy Northern wastes astride a magnificent stag, giving aid to those in greatest need and vanquishing evil and darkness wherever it is found.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stoneforged_Horns: 意识到所在的世界存在的危险后，瑞格将自己的形态进行改变，变得更具攻击性，帮助他面对即将到来的挑战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stoneforged_Horn: After realising the dangers of the living world, Raigor shaped himself towards a more aggressive form that would help him face the challenges that were to come.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Blades_of_Voth_Domosh: 特蕾丝汀动身去深渊报仇后，她遇到了邪恶的武器匠奎斯。奎斯赠予她这对象征地狱的战刃。尽管她得来全不费工夫，但是她发现，手握如此力量所付出的代价远超自己所能舍弃的一切，而这时候已经太迟了...
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Blades_of_Vo: Blind to any cost in her crusade against the abyss, Tresdin was courted by the baleful armorer Qwyth, who offered these hellbound blades. None know what horrific price she may have paid for such power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gama_Brothers: 抬轿兄弟前进的目的只有一个，为出价最高的人穿越战场，运送物品。抬着金色的骄子，他们用装备和补药减轻了战士们的负担。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gama_Brother: The Gama Brothers are driven by one goal, to deliver goods across the battlefield to the highest bidder. With their golden palanquin they ease the burden of weary warriors with armaments and healing tonics.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_TP: 观看2013年全球16支最强战队在国际邀请赛一较高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Watch 2013's top 16 Dota teams from around the world compete in The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tidal_Blade: 这把刀内流转的是大地和海洋的真正精华。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tidal_Blade: Within this blade, runs the true essence of the earth and sea.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_the_Artis: 用于开启上锁的<font color='#9da1a9'>能工巧匠的财宝</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of the Artisan Enthralled</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Artisan_E: 您需要一把<font color='#9da1a9'>能工巧匠的宝箱钥匙</font>来打开这个宝箱。您可以前往Dota 2商店购买。每个宝箱系列的掉落物品均不相同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: You will need a <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure Key of the Artisan Enthralled</font> to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ursa_Cryogenic_Embrace: 在乌尔萨被伤病和寒冷所摧残时，萨满将他的部分生命与附近的冰锥进行束缚，帮助他康复。现在熊战士自豪地穿上这件嵌入冰咒碎片的毛皮护甲，显示自己精神上战胜了死亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ursa_Cryogenic_E: As Ulfsaar lay ravaged by battle and cold, the shaman bound parts of his life force to the nearby icicles until he recovered. The warrior now proudly wears this fur armor embedded with shards of that spellbound ice as a reminder of his spirit's victory over death itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Welcoming_Chest: 内含神秘物品的宝箱。必须使用迎新宝箱钥匙才能开启。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Welcoming_Chest: A treasure chest with mysterious contents. You must use a Welcoming Chest Key to open this.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Welcoming_Chest_Key: 用于打开上锁的<font color='#9da1a9'>迎新宝箱</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击钥匙并选择想要打开的宝箱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Welcoming_Chest_: Used to open the locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Welcoming Chest</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Moss_Beard_of_the_Fu: 注入了蘑菇先祖的精华。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wild_Moss_Beard_: Infused with the essence of the Father Mushroom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Obelis_Set: 以上物品是与Navi战队联合创建，每售出一套战队都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wings_of_Obelis_: These items were created in partnership with Navi, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wizened_Bear: 多年的放逐岁月让悉拉的所有形态都拥有了非凡的智慧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wizened_Bear: The long years spent in exile have granted Sylla great wisdom in all of his forms.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WraithNight_Ossuary: 来自大帝的独家恩赐。冥魂之夜骨瓮只能使用闪光碎片兑换。激活冥魂大帝的赏赐后你将获得闪光碎片。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blades_of_Voth_Domosh: 特蕾丝汀动身去深渊报仇后，她遇到了邪恶的武器匠奎斯。奎斯赠予她这对象征地狱的战刃。尽管她得来全不费工夫，但是手握如此力量所付出的代价远超自己所能舍弃的一切，而她发现这一点时已经太迟...
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blades_of_Voth_D: Set in her vengeance against the abyss, Tresdin approached the baleful armorer Qwyth, who gifted to her these hellbound blades. Though she obtained the swords without cost, she may realize too late that the price extracted for wielding such incredible power could be more than she is willing to part with...

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SteelSeries_Malaysia_Cham: 8支战队面对2000美元的巨额奖金和赛睿外设展开激烈的争夺。其中7支战队为直接邀请，剩下1支则是通过资格赛选拔。马来豪门Orange和Titan也将登场。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraith_Kings_Favor:
使用后战斗点数的获得速率提高80%，持续500分钟。而且其他玩家的 bonus to their 战斗点数获得速度也将提高16%，效果可以叠加。

战斗点数飞升的效果持续时间只有在获得战斗点数的过程中才会被消耗，在游戏内观战或者作为教练指导并不会消耗时间。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wraith_Kings_Fav:
Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points by 80% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 16% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Asian_Cyber_Game: The top Asian teams compete in the Asian Cyber Games for a total prize pool of $30,000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Atramentos_the_Apocalypti: 来自地狱的战马，能够打破预言的魔物，怀有暗黑印记，身披三重诅咒的铠甲。这只可怕的生物最近才从荒邪之狱这个位面逃离。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Atramentos_the_A: The stygian steed, breaker of prophecies, bearer of the blackened mark, and steeled in thrice-cursed barding. This horrible creature is recently escaped from the prison-plane Fellfoul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Avon_of_the_Crescent_Moon: 新月兽由月光蝶诞下，此后一直由星月养大。尽管她还是年少好奇，不过已经训练有素，为她的首战做好准备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Avon_of_the_Cres: Spawned from the Lunar Moth, this felmoth named Avon was raised by Nova. Still young and curious Avon is now trained and ready for her first battle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Asian_Cyber_Games: 亚洲电竞大赛中顶尖亚洲战队将争夺3万美元的奖金！

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Defense_: Defense of the Australians brings you its summer 2014 tournament. Professional teams throughout Australia will compete Australia wide online and in a Melbourne LAN event finals.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flight_of_the_Crescent_Mo: 包含露娜的“新月蝶舞”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flight_of_the_Cr: Includes all of the items in the 'Flight of the Crescent Moon' set for Luna:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaves_of_the_Crescent_Mo: 战刃如同月光一般削铁如泥。上面加上一对薄翼后就能在敌人面前漫天飞舞。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glaves_of_the_Cr: Glaves as sharp as moon beams cut swaths through her enemies. Ribboned by a pair of glossamar wings, they fly true and far.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_the_Crescent_Moo: 由纯净的圆月之银打造的护盾，上面撒上月光蝶翅膀上的磷粉。如果露娜没能躲避攻击，那这面护盾照样能完美抵挡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Guard_of_the_Cre: A shield made from pure MoonSilver and dusted with the wing scales of the Lunar Moth. Attacks that luna fails to evade are blocked effortlessly by this guard.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Headress_of_the_Crescent_: 戴着神圣的月光蝶双翼装饰的护服，露娜驾临战场可谓是技压群雄。她能在敌人出招前就有所觉察，从而娴熟地躲开向她要害攻去的招式。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Headress_of_the_: Adorned with the wings of the sacred Lunar Moth, Luna rides into battle with strength and agility. Able to sense an attack before it happens, she can deftly avoid blows that would otherwise seek to harm her.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Iceforged_Set: 包含祈求者的“三冰铸就”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Iceforged_Set: Includes all of the items in the 'Iceforged'' set for Invoker:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Iceshard: 相传魔霭黑雾中低声诉说着领主，开战和统治的秘密。所以地狱中永生的恶魔无一例外地对亚巴顿又恨又怕也就不足为奇了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Iceshard: The black mist of Avernus is said to whisper the secrets of lordship, war-making, and dominance. It is no wonder that the immortal demons of hell hate and fear Abaddon in equal measure.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Infernal_Pactblade: 由恶魔铸造的武器，在荒邪之狱破碎前不久被深受烙印之苦的末日获得。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Infernal_Pactbla: A demon-forged weapon obtained by the Branded One shortly before the shattering of Fellfoul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_the_Crescent_Mo: 护甲是用纯净的圆月之银打造，上面是蝶翼的图案。像这样的衣饰不仅非常稀有，而且还具有魔力，能让穿着之人获得额外的敏捷。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_the_Cr: Plaid with moth wings and dressed with armour made from pure Moonsilver. A vestment like this is both rare and magical as it grants its wearer with the boon of increased agility.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mountain_Splitter: 尽管只有乌尔的贤者铁匠才会应用，但是木瑞麋鹿的石质鹿茸是世间少有的能够与乌尔峭壁间燃烧的燧石结合的工具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mountain_Splitte: Usually used only by the Sagesmiths of Vuur, the stone antlers of the Murex elk are one of few tools capable of grasping the burning heartflint of the Vuurcrag mountains.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WraithNight_Fere: A unique gift from the King. Wraith-Night Feretories can only be acquired with Shining Fragments.  Shining Fragments are earned by activiting a Wraith King's Favor.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_500_Battle_Point_Booster_:
1月3日后不再销售。使用后战斗点数的获得速率提升至500%，持续500分钟。而且其他玩家的战斗点数获得速度也将提高80%，效果可以叠加。

战斗点数飞升的效果持续时间只有在获得战斗点数的过程中才会被消耗，在游戏内观战或者作为教练指导并不会消耗时间。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_500_Battle_Point:
Available until January 3rd. Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points to 500% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 80% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bucktooth_Jerry: 杰瑞是来自森林的灵兽，在神圣的树木上他得到了翅膀和双角。不过可别相信那些他装了木牙的谣言。这可是实实在在的。只要问被他咬过的坚果就知道了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bucktooth_Jerry: A fan of the forest, Jerry fashioned wings and horns from the wood of a sacred Windwood tree. But don't believe the rumors that he made his famous teeth out of the same stuff. They're real. Just ask any nut he's bitten.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Thursday_Evening_: 周四Dota夜系列赛是由迄今运营时间最长的联赛周日Dota夜改编而来的全新半职业联赛。周四Dota夜为北美和南美的队伍提供了开放式竞技平台，给他们获取实战经验的机会。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kangdae_the_Dokkaebi:
恶煞在韩国的民间故事中是不详的生物。他们会对旅者进行各种恶作剧，喜欢吹嘘自己的摔跤技术，但是不会害人，只为搞笑。

以上物品是与Nexon赞助联赛联合创建，每售出一套赛事主办方都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kangdae_the_Dokk:
The dokkaebi are mischievous creatures in Korean folklore. They're known to play tricks on travelers and boast their wrestling skills, but are usually more humorous than harmful.

This item was created in partnership with Nexon Sponsorship League, who receives a portion of every purchase.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorship_League_: NSL回来了，这是其最终赛季。您可观看到8支顶级强队争夺Nexon的赞助以及高达8000万韩元（7万5千美金）的总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorshi: NSL returns for its final season. Watch the top 8 teams battle it out for Nexon's sponsorship with KRW 80 million (USD 75,000) in total prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorship_League_: Nexon赞助联赛即将迎来最后一个赛季。NSL将于2014年1月回归，最终称霸3个赛季的冠军队伍将获得3亿韩元（约合26.7万美元）的赞助奖金。比赛中将有众多战队为Nexon的赞助机会一决胜负。内含专属的恶煞信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorshi: The Nexon Sponsorship League starts its final season. Starting in January 2014, the NSL spans three seasons with a total of KRW 300 million ($267,153) worth of funding. The best team from Korea will compete for Nexon's sponsorship. Includes exclusive Kangdae the Dokkaebi courier.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Thursday_Evening: The Thursday Evening Cup Series is a new semipro tournament series based on SECS, the longest running DotA tournament series to date. TECS provides an open competitive platform for North and South American teams to gain real tournament experience.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_500_Prosperous_Battle_Poi:
2月20日后不再销售。使用后战斗点数的获得速率提升至500%，持续500分钟。而且其他玩家的战斗点数获得速度也将提高80%，效果可以叠加。

战斗点数飞升的效果持续时间只有在获得战斗点数的过程中才会被消耗，在游戏内观战或者作为教练指导并不会消耗时间。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_500_Prosperous_B:
Available until February 20th. Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points to 500% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 80% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fortune_of_Three: Contains all of the items in the 'Strength of the Demon Stone', 'Flames of Prosperity', and the 'Gifts of Fortune' for the Three Spirits. Also includes a bonus loading screen and HUD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fortunes_Favor: 使用这件物品后获得<font color='#fdd692'>火盐金锭</font>的速率将提升<font color='#9da1a9'>100%</font>，持续500比赛分钟。另外还将加速获得<font color='#a1c6bd'>翠玉之币</font>，并给予其他玩家<font color='#9da1a9'>20%</font>的额外速率获得<font color='#fdd692'>火盐金锭</font>和<font color='#a1c6bd'>翠玉之币</font>，此速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fortunes_Favor: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#fdd692'>Flamesalt Ingots</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>100%</font> for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will earn <font color='#a1c6bd'>Jade Tokens</font> at an increased rate and you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>20%</font> bonus to their <font color='#fdd692'>Flamesalt Ingot</font> and <font color='#a1c6bd'>Jade Token</font> rate.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Garb_of_the_Cruel_Magicia:
你的无情应当毁天灭地。

以上物品是与选手Kuroky联合创建，每售出一套他都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Garb_of_the_Crue:
Your cruelty shall be legendary.

These items were created in partnership with KuroKy, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Garbs_of_the_Eastern_Rang: 包含祈求者的“东方道骨”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Garbs_of_the_Eas: Includes all of the items in the \"Garbs of the Eastern Range\" set for Invoker including loading screen and alternate hair and wrap styles:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Godhorse: 悲西派的赤兔信使长久以来都相传是个迷。作为一支上古军队最后的幸存者，他们的骑手在短兵和弓箭下丧了命，但是这些顽强的战马返回了原来养育它们的森林，随着一代又一代的繁殖变得野性十足。这匹凶猛的赤兔是在它幼年时被俘获的，但是它完全地显露出它的战马祖先拥有的勇气。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Godhorse: The Redhooves of the Western Wails were long thought a thing of myth.  The last survivors of an ancient army, their riders lost to sword and arrow, these hardy steeds returned to the wilds where they bred and grew more feral with each passing generation.   Caught young, this fiery Redhoof shows all the courage of its warsteed ancestors.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Handful_of_Jade_Tokens: 打开这件礼物将获得50枚翠玉之币。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Handful_of_Jade_: Unpack this gift to earn 50 Jade Tokens.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Healing_Fount_of_the_Lost: 群岛虽已消失，疗伤技艺并未有丝毫遗忘。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Healing_Fount_of: The healing arts of bygone lands have lost none of their potency.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Imbued_Stone: 剧烈的滑坡都是来自简单的石块翻滚。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Imbued_Stone: From simple stones tumbles a raging landslide.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Little_Green_Jade_Dragon: 翠玉小龙肩上的背包满载着好运，它会给最英勇的勇士带去长久的祝福。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Little_Green_Jad: With a bag full of luck on its shoulder, the Little Green Jade Dragon brings good fortune to the worthiest of warriors.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Seal_of_Vermilion_Renewal: 可以开启<font color='#9da1a9'>朱红新生的珍藏</font>。双击或右键点击背包中的古印再选择想要打开的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Seal_of_Vermilio: Used to access the <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of Vermilion Renewal</font>. Double click or right-click the seal in your backpack and select the treasure you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Single_Battle_Point_Boost:
使用后将会使你下一场比赛结束时战斗点数的获得速率提升至150%。而且其他玩家的战斗点数获得速度也将提高5%，效果可以叠加。

战斗点数飞升的效果持续时间只有在获得战斗点数的过程中才会被消耗，在游戏内观战或者作为教练指导并不会消耗时间。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Single_Battle_Po:
Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points to 150% for a single match. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 5% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_ESPL_Season_1: 电子竞技职业联赛第一季是一个长达三个月的赛事，业余队伍每周将角逐100美金的奖金以及联赛积分。联赛的最终阶段是两支职业队伍与六支顶尖业余队伍为5900美金的奖池同台竞技。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_ESPL_Sea: The Electronic Sports Professionals League Season One is a three month long event where amateur teams will compete every week for $100 plus league points. The season will conclude with a finale comprising of two professional teams and the top 6 amateur teams all competing for a $5900 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESPL_Season_1: 电子竞技职业联赛第一季是一个长达三个月的赛事，业余队伍每周将角逐100美金的奖金以及联赛积分。联赛的最终阶段是两支职业队伍与六支顶尖业余队伍为5900美金的奖池同台竞技。请注意，本门票只允许您观看电子竞技职业联赛第1赛季，捆绑包内附赠套装不包括在内。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESPL_Season_1:
The Electronic Sports Professionals League Season One is a three month long event where amateur teams will compete every week for $100 plus league points. The season will conclude with a finale comprising of two professional teams and the top 6 amateur teams all competing for a $5900 prize pool.
	This ticket only gives you access to view games in the ESPL Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESPL_Season_1_Bundle: 电子竞技职业联赛第一季是一个长达三个月的赛事，业余队伍每周将角逐100美金的奖金以及联赛积分。联赛的最终阶段是两支职业队伍与六支顶尖业余队伍为5900美金的奖池同台竞技。门票包含信使变体小石人瓦尔，天辉和夜魇款式各有不同！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESPL_Season_1_Bu: The Electronic Sports Professionals League Season One is a three month long event where amateur teams will compete every week for $100 plus league points. It concludes with a finale comprising of two pro teams and the top six amateur teams all competing for a $5900 prize pool. Includes Vaal the Animated Construct courier with two styles for Dire and Radiant!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jadehoof: 相传碧云霞早已灭绝，最后一只历史可考的信使据说是一位将军领兵出征时悲西派赠予他的礼物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jadehoof: Long thought extinct, the last Jadehoof that the histories recall was said to have been a gift from the Western Wails given to a great general as he prepared to march his armies toward an uncertain fate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Little_Green_Jade_: 本图纸将融合“朱红新生的珍藏”中解封的物品与任何“吉祥”前缀的物品并生成翠玉小龙信使。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recipe_Little_Gr: This recipe will combine a specific item from the Treasure of Vermilion Renewal with any Auspicious item to produce a Little Green Jade Dragon courier.
