Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_King_of_the_North: 曼彻斯特大学电竞社团为您带来北方之王联赛！线上选拔赛将于2月15日和22日举行。选拔赛对所有由英格兰和威尔士北部的大学学生开放报名。最终脱颖而出的战队将会于今年3月19日被邀请至曼彻斯特，参加火热的线下决赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_King_of_: The University of Manchester E-Sports Society brings you King of the North! The online qualifier will run on February 15th and 22nd. Qualifiers are open to any teams made up from university students in the north of England and Wales. The finalists who emerge from these qualifiers will be invited to Manchester on March 19th this year to play in front of a live audience at the event.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Orena_Dota_2_Cup: 32支南非战队将争夺12 700兰特的总奖金和赛睿的外设产品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Orena_Do: 32 South African teams compete for a total prize pool of R12,700 and gaming equipment from SteelSeries!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fractal_Shard_of_Inner_Ab: 在荒邪之狱中，恐怖利刃受困于分形之墙，被判处进行永恒的扭曲冥想。他被迫直视自己灵魂最可怕的投影，他的灵魂投影也长久地注视着他。而现在，他们已合二为一，前所未有的强大，一同从荒邪之狱崛起。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fractal_Shard_of: Deep in the hell of Hell, Terrorblade lay bound behind fractal walls, sentenced to an eternity of twisted contemplation. He stared long into the reflection of his own worst self. And long did his worst self stare into him. Now they rise together, a single entity more powerful than ever before.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_King_of_the_North: 曼彻斯特大学电竞社团为您带来北方之王联赛！线上选拔赛将于2月15日和22日举行。选拔赛对所有由英格兰和威尔士北部的大学学生开放报名。最终脱颖而出的战队将会于今年3月19日被邀请至曼彻斯特，参加火热的线下决赛。

Qualifiers are open to any teams made up from university students in the north of England and Wales. The finalists who emerge from these qualifiers will be invited to Manchester on March 19th this year to play in front of a live audience at the event.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: Nexon在2014年与KeSPA和SPOTV合作启用了全新联赛。整个KDL联赛将有四个赛季，总奖金6亿5千万韩元（60万5千美金）。购买门票来观看第一赛季第一二级的10支强队一较高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: Nexon presents all new league for 2014, in partnership with SPOTV and KeSPA. The KDL will span four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million (USD 605,000) prize pool. Watch the very first season of its kind featuring the top 10 teams in Tier 1 and 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: 韩国Dota联赛将采用全新的排级系统。联赛将横跨四个赛季，冠军将获得总额约650万韩元的赞助奖金。在全新的比赛赛制下，战队最终获得的奖金将根据获胜的场数逐步累计。附赠信使蔚蓝之霆！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: The KDL launches its first season featuring all new Tier system. The KDL spans four seasons with a total of KRW 6.5 million worth of prize funding. The new winner system creates more incentive for players to win since prize money accumulates based on the number of wins. Includes the Blue Lightning courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: 韩国Dota联赛将采用全新的排级系统。联赛将横跨四个赛季，冠军将获得总额约650万韩元的赞助奖金。在全新的比赛赛制下，战队最终获得的奖金将根据获胜的场数逐步累计。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: The Korea Dota League launches its first season featuring all new Tier system. The new winner system creates more incentive for players to win since prize money accumulates based on the number of wins.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Sunday_E: The Sunday Evening Cup Series (SECS) began in December 2009 and is the longest running Dota tournament series to date. SECS provides an open competitive platform for North and South American teams to gain real tournament experience.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_Amateur_L: Netolic业余联赛是一项公开赛事，欢迎全世界的战队前来参加，完全免费！每个赛季将持续4个双休日，每月的基础奖金为1100美元！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Netolic_: The Netolic Amateur League is an open tournament where teams from all around the world are welcome to join for free! Each season will consist in 4 weekends, the base prize pool for this League is $1,100.00 monthly!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Red_Bull_Battle_G: 红牛集团计划举办多个线上和线下赛事，最终优秀选手将汇集到年底的总决赛。赛事的覆盖范围和宣传将与2013年活动类似。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Red_Bull: Red Bull plans to hold multiple online and live events to lead up to our grand finals at the end of the year. We aim to have coverage and promotion similar to our 2013 events circuit.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SDL_2014_Season_O: 经过3个赛季的业余联赛后已经诞生了16支巴西顶尖战队，他们将争夺1千雷亚尔的奖金和南美洲最大联赛之一，SDL的冠军奖杯！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_SDL_2014: After three amateur leagues we have the top 16 Brazilian teams fighting for the trophy and R$1000,00 of SDL, one of the biggest Leagues of South America!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Zotac_Starleague_: 索泰2014年群星联赛将是有史以来最为盛大的Dota 2巴西联赛！奖金更是创下了巴西Dota史之最（10万雷亚尔）！32支南美洲的精英战队经过两轮资格赛后将会角逐这巨额的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Zotac_St: The Zotac Starleague 2014 is the biggest Brazilian Dota 2 Tournament ever! It has the biggest prize pool in the history of Brazilian Dota (R$ 10.000,00)! After two qualifiers 32 elite teams of South America will fight for the grand prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DC_Presents_The_XMG_Capta: DotaCinema隆重推出XMG队长征召邀请赛！这将是首个采用队长征召（CD）模式为比赛模式的大型Dota 2赛事！参赛战队包括Alliance，Na`Vi，Fnatic，RoX.KIS，Sigma.int和Team Liquid，他们将争夺2万美元的奖金！请注意，本门票只允许您观看XMG队长征召邀请赛，捆绑包内附赠信使不包括在内。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DC_Presents_The_:
DotaCinema presents the XMG Captains Draft Invitational! This is the first major competitive Dota 2 tournament being played in Captains Draft mode! Teams included are Alliance, Na`Vi, Fnatic, RoX.KIS, Sigma.int and Team Liquid. The teams battle for $20,000! 
	This ticket only gives you access to view games in the XMG Captains Draft Invitational.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DC_Presents_The_XMG_Capta: DotaCinema隆重推出XMG队长征召邀请赛！这将是首个采用队长征召（CD）模式为比赛模式的大型Dota 2赛事！参赛战队包括Alliance，Na`Vi，Fnatic，RoX.KIS，Sigma.int和Team Liquid，他们将争夺2万美元的奖金！门票附赠信使榛榛，同时每售出一张总奖金就会增加1.25美元！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DC_Presents_The_: DotaCinema presents the XMG Captains Draft Invitational! This is the first major competitive Dota 2 tournament being played in Captains Draft mode! Teams included are Alliance, Na`Vi, Fnatic, RoX.KIS, Sigma.int and Team Liquid. The teams battle for $20,000! Each ticket purchase includes JanJou courier and adds $1.25 to the total prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Amateur_League_Se: Netolic业余联赛是一项公开赛事，欢迎全世界的战队前来参加，完全免费！每个赛季将持续4个双休日，每月的基础奖金为1100美元！请注意，本门票只允许您观看Netolic业余联赛第1赛季，捆绑包内附赠套装不包括在内。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Amateur_:
The Netolic Amateur League is an open tournament where teams from all around the world are welcome to join for free! Each season will consist in 4 weekends, the base prize pool for this League is $1,100.00 monthly!
	This ticket only gives you access to view games in the Netolic Amateur League Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Amateur_League_Se: Netolic业余联赛是一项公开赛事，欢迎全世界的战队前来参加，完全免费！每个赛季将持续4个双休日，每月的基础奖金为1100美元！门票附赠卓尔游侠的“近卫游侠”套装！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Netolic_Amateur_: The Netolic Amateur League is an open tournament where teams from all around the world are welcome to join for free! Each season will consist in 4 weekends, the base prize pool for this League is $1,100.00 monthly! Includes the Sentinel Set for Drow Ranger!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Curse_of_the_Malignan: Curse of the Malignant Corruption Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Antiquity: 纷乱大陆的文明古老非常，让这些文明自相残杀的教派也已长眠地下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Antiquity: Ancient are the civilizations of the contested lands, and deep are the schisms which drive them to war.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Beneath_the_War_Moon: 对2013年国际邀请赛总决赛决胜局的颂赞，140万美元的归属由此决定。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Beneath_the_War_: A tribute to game 5 of the Grand Finals at the International in 2013, where over $1.4 million hung in the balance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Carapace_of_Bukivak_the_C: 位于沉没之城下方的地狱谷里住着堕落之王布吉瓦克，他永世都在深海中扩张着自己的势力。听闻他的力量后，莱恩就动身去获取他的身体，将其移植到自己身上。经过一番激烈的交战，莱恩将其打败，并如愿以偿地得到他的手臂。但是这并非意味着没有代价。就跟他上一条手臂一样，这条手臂也让他面目全非。他被邪恶堕落的力量所感染，身上长出了诡异的黑曜碎片，与原来的形态已经大相径庭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Carapace_of_Buki: Far away beneath the Sunken Cities and through the Infernal Hollow, Buki'vak the Corrupted dwells in the depths forever expanding his corruption throughout the sea. Hearing of his power, Lion seeked to harvest his parts for a fresh demonoplasty. After a strenuous battle he defeated Buki'vak and gained the hand he desired as a reward, but it was not without cost. Just as his previous hand transformed him, so did this one. He became afflicted with the Malignant Corruption, causing unseemly shards of Obsidian to grow from his body and further disfigure him into something even more unrecognizeable from his original form.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_the_Malignant_Cor: 位于沉没之城下方的地狱谷里住着堕落之王布吉瓦克，他永世都在深海中扩张着自己的势力。听闻他的力量后，莱恩就动身去获取他的身体，将其移植到自己身上。经过一番激烈的交战，莱恩将其打败，并如愿以偿地得到他的手臂。但是这并非意味着没有代价。就跟他上一条手臂一样，这条手臂也让他面目全非。他被邪恶堕落的力量所感染，身上长出了诡异的黑曜碎片，与原来的形态已经大相径庭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_the_Mali: Far away beneath the Sunken Cities and through the Infernal Hollow, Buki'vak the Corrupted dwells in the depths forever expanding his corruption throughout the sea. Hearing of his power, Lion seeked to harvest his parts for a fresh demonoplasty. After a strenuous battle he defeated Buki'vak and gained the hand he desired as a reward, but it was not without cost. Just as his previous hand transformed him, so did this one. He became afflicted with the Malignant Corruption, causing unseemly shards of Obsidian to grow from his body and further disfigure him into something even more unrecognizeable from his original form.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cuffs_of_Divine_Ascension: 像这样的护腕需要对神圣奥法掌握自如才能驾驭得当。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cuffs_of_Divine_: Cuffs like these require a mastery over the divine arcane arts to wield effectivly.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Curse_of_the_Malignant_Co: 这件捆绑包内含莱恩的“邪恶堕落的诅咒”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Curse_of_the_Mal: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Curse of Malignant Corruption' Set for Lion:

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dimensional_Infe: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Dimensional Infestation' set for Weaver:

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Divine_Ascension: 一副头盔，适合拥有飞升之力和破敌之法的法师。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Helm_of_Divine_A: A helm befitting one who can ascend and raze his foes with divine arcana.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_the_Malignant_Co: 位于沉没之城下方的地狱谷里住着堕落之王布吉瓦克，他永世都在深海中扩张着自己的势力。听闻他的力量后，莱恩就动身去获取他的身体，将其移植到自己身上。经过一番激烈的交战，莱恩将其打败，并如愿以偿地得到他的手臂。但是这并非意味着没有代价。就跟他上一条手臂一样，这条手臂也让他面目全非。他被邪恶堕落的力量所感染，身上长出了诡异的黑曜碎片，与原来的形态已经大相径庭。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_the_Mal: Far away beneath the Sunken Cities and through the Infernal Hollow, Buki'vak the Corrupted dwells in the depths forever expanding his corruption throughout the sea. Hearing of his power, Lion seeked to harvest his parts for a fresh demonoplasty. After a strenuous battle he defeated Buki'vak and gained the hand he desired as a reward, but it was not without cost. Just as his previous hand transformed him, so did this one. He became afflicted with the Malignant Corruption, causing unseemly shards of Obsidian to grow from his body and further disfigure him into something even more unrecognizeable from his original form.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jolly_Roger: 出航大海只为娱乐，征战四方实乃消遣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jolly_Roger: He that goes to sea for pleasure, goes to war for pastime.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jolly_Roger_Bundle: 包含惊涛怪浪的界面皮肤和载入画面。。界面皮肤拥有两种款式，可以让肖像框沉入海底或浮出水面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jolly_Roger_Bund: Includes the Jolly Roger Hud Skin and Loading Screen. Hud Skin features two styles, with the portrait either underwater or above water.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jolly_Roger_Loading_Scree: 咕嘟咕嘟咕嘟咕嘟咕嘟咕嘟。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kunkka_Loading_Screen_Bun: 为您呈现多年来Dota社区天才画师Kunkka的杰作，三款载入画面绝对超值！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kunkka_Loading_S: Bring the talents of longtime Dota community artist Kunkka to your game with this series of three load screens.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_Divine_Ascensio: 这件斗篷华丽又醒目，能帮助扎贡纳斯承受飞升带来的巨大压力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mantle_of_Divine: Dashing and bold, this mantle helps Dragonus bear the great weight of Ascension's power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Outland_Witchs_Hem: 外域女巫并非满怀恶意，但是她算到的命运可不容忽视。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Outland_Witchs_H: The Witch of the Outlands wasn't necessarily malevolent, but the fate she spoke of was not one to be ignored.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sash_of_Divine_Ascension: 系得整齐的腰带就是提取飞升的复仇之力所需的全部。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sash_of_Divine_A: A neatly tied sash is all one needs when extracting ascended vengeance.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Converted_Abundant_Fortunes_Fa: 富贵万年芳华玉佩（已转化）
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Converted_Abundant_Fortun:
使用后战斗点数的获得速率提高400%，持续500分钟。而且其他玩家的战斗点数获得速度也将提高80%，效果可以叠加。

战斗点数飞升的效果持续时间只有在获得战斗点数的过程中才会被消耗，在游戏内观战或者作为教练指导并不会消耗时间。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Converted_Abunda:
Available until January 3rd. Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points by 400% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 80% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Converted_Fortunes_Favor:
1月3日后不再销售。使用后战斗点数的获得速率提高80%，持续500分钟。而且其他玩家的战斗点数获得速度也将提高16%，效果可以叠加。

战斗点数飞升的效果持续时间只有在获得战斗点数的过程中才会被消耗，在游戏内观战或者作为教练指导并不会消耗时间。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Converted_Fortun:
Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points by 80% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 16% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_ICL_Dota_2_LAN: 匈牙利线下联赛将以Infinity Csarnok LAN联赛继续，参赛的匈牙利战队将争夺冠军头衔！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Thursday_Evening_: 周四Dota夜系列联赛的第2赛季已经回归！这项半职业联赛面向北美和南美的战队。每周将淘汰产生1支优胜战队，获得100美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Thursday: The Thursday Evening Cup Series returns for its second season! This semi-pro tournament series is for North and South American teams. Every week there is a best-of-1 single elimination bracket, $100 winner-take-all.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorship_League_: NSL联赛已经进入第2赛季。8支顶尖战队将争夺总额为1亿韩元（约合9万3千美元）的奖金。NSL联赛由三个赛季组成，Nexon赞助的总奖金为3亿韩元（约合267 153美元）。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nexon_Sponsorshi: NSL enters its second season. Top 8 teams will compete for their share of KRW 100 million (USD 93,000) prize fund. NSL consists of three seasons with a total of KRW 300 million (USD 267,153) sponsorship funding by Nexon.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_4: CEVO联赛第4赛季是一项北美职业赛事，将在为期8周的常规赛季中为战队提供竞技的舞台，最终将角逐超过5千美元的奖金，还有直接晋级未来赛季的资格。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLeague_Seas: 华硕ROG梦幻联赛第1赛季由华硕ROG，ROCCAT和TV6赞助。比赛从2014年3月3日开始，世界顶尖战队经过84场比赛后将淘汰产生2014年DreamHack夏季联赛的参赛战队，去争夺10万美元的奖金。比赛还将推出互动手册，每售出一份都将使总奖金增加，并获得参与梦幻联赛的资格！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLe: ASUS ROG DreamLeague Season 1 is sponsored by ASUS ROG, ROCCAT & TV6. Starting on March 3rd, 2014 of the world's best teams will compete in 84 league matches and the playoffs at DreamHack Summer 2014 for a $100,000 prize pool. Purchase the Compendium, increase the prize pool, and play the Fantasy League!

SLTV群星联赛的第9赛季将是全球性的舞台！来自中国、欧洲、美洲和韩国的众多战队将争夺8万美元的奖金，随着门票的销售奖金还将不断增加！

Teams from China, Europe, America, & Korea will compete for a base prize pool of $80,000! Bundle includes the SLTV Star Series Season 9 Ticket, SLTV Loading Screen, and the Frozen Star Lich set. The Lich set will unlock styles the more games you view!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_Hells:
你会死在我的王冠之上。

以上物品是为了纪念Valve出品的纪录片《Free to Play》上映，特意与选手hyhy联合创建，每售出一套他都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_Hells:
Upon my crown, I'll gore thee.

These items commemorate the release of Valve's documentary, Free to Play, and were created in partnership with hyhy, who receives a portion of every purchase.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Free_to_Play_Collectors_P:
这些物品是为了纪念Valve出品的纪录片《Free to Play》上映。礼包售出后电影中的选手主演们将获得一定的分成 - Danil 'Dendi' Ishutin，Clinton 'Fear' Loomis和Benedict 'hyhy' Lim。

这件捆绑包内含斯温的“铁意战甲”套装，帕吉的“血鸦战团”套装，末日使者的“魔狱霸主”套装内所有物品，更有主题守卫“广角镜头”，信使“片尾”和界面皮肤“景深”：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Free_to_Play_Col:
These items commemorate the release of Valve's 'Free to Play' documentary. A portion of the purchase will go toward the players featured in the film - Danil 'Dendi' Ishutin, Clinton 'Fear' Loomis and Benedict 'hyhy' Lim.

The bundle includes all of the items in the 'Forge of Iron Will' set for Sven, the 'Murder of Crows' set for Pudge, the 'Crown of Hells' set for Doom and the exclusive 'Wide Angle' Ward, 'Filmtail' Courier and 'Depth of Field' HUD:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gombangdae_Dosa: 包含黑暗贤者的“长斗贤者”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gombangdae_Dosa: Includes all of the items in the 'Gombangdae Dosa' set for Dark Seer:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Murder_of_Crows:
没事别来插嘴。

以上物品是为了纪念Valve出品的纪录片《Free to Play》上映，特意与选手Dendi联合创建，每售出一套他都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Murder_of_Crows:
Shoulda' kept your beak out of this.

These items commemorate the release of Valve's documentary, Free to Play, and were created in partnership with Dendi, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_9:
SLTV群星联赛的第9赛季将是全球性的舞台！来自中国、欧洲、美洲和韩国的众多战队将争夺8万美元的奖金，随着门票的销售奖金还将不断增加！ 
这张门票只允许你观看SLTV群星联赛第9赛季，并不包含捆绑包中的套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series: SLTV Star Series returns with Season 9 taking over the entire globe! Teams from China, Europe, America, & Korea will compete for a base prize pool of $80,000! This ticket only gives you access to view games in the SLTV Star Series Season 9.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Shagbark: 胡小桃是森林里可靠的灵兽，靠运送物品获得的兴奋感为生。他的爱好是秘密和宝物，最大的愿望是你在线上永远别回家。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DC_Presents_The_XMG_Capta: DotaCinema隆重推出XMG队长征召邀请赛！这将是首个采用队长征召（CD）模式为比赛模式的大型Dota 2赛事！参赛战队包括Alliance，Na`Vi，Fnatic，RoX.KIS，Sigma.int和Team Liquid，他们将争夺2万美元的奖金！门票附赠信使榛榛。

Teams included are Alliance, Na`Vi, Fnatic, RoX.KIS, Sigma.int and Team Liquid. The teams battle for $20,000! Each ticket purchase includes JanJou courier.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_the_Shape: 用于解封<font color='#9da1a9'>塑造者的传承珍藏</font>。在您的兵器库页面中双击或者右键点击符印并选择想要解封的珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_Key_of_: Used to open locked <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasures of the Shaper's Legacy</font>. Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the treasure you want to open.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Shapers_L: 里面封印的都是社区饰品制作大师Anuxi打造的套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: A chest of sets created by the community contributor Anuxi.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Snowdrop: 水晶室女在学习冰霜法术时有着不为人知的故事，她曾经极大的触怒了她的导师，为了能够重新获得导师的恩宠并证明自己值得被教导，她在蓝心冰川与沸腾之海交界处的融雪淤泥里面居住了一年。这里永世无雪，瑞莱进行了数月的深度冥想，以掌握自己的力量。一天下午，在醒来之时她轻启芳唇，念出一个冰冷的词：“雪落！”转瞬之间原本充斥四周的蒸汽结为寒冰，原本温暖的水珠化作飘雪。当她回到她导师处时，她发现导师早已带着微笑在等她，对她的魔法杰作俨然已经知晓，于是他将这套衣服送给了她，以彰显她的价值和技艺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Snowdrop: It is little known of Crystal Maiden, that in her long study of the Frozen Arts, she once greatly displeased her Ice Wizard master and to restore herself to his graces and prove worthy of his instruction, she passed a year dwelling in the climes of slush where the Blueheart Glacier spends itself at the edge of the Boiling Sea. Here, where snow had never fallen, Rylai spent months in deep meditation, mastering her powers, before waking one afternoon with a single frigid word upon her lips: 'Snowdrop!' For a moment, the steam that filled the air turned to ice, and the warm precipitation became a softly falling snow. When she returned to her old teacher, she found him waiting with a smile, fully aware of the magic she had wrought, as he presented her this outfit to show her worth and mastery.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ElPadrinoth_Latin_Cup: 16支来自拉丁美洲地区的顶尖战队将争夺450美元的奖金。这件捆绑包除了观看ElPadrinoth拉丁联赛外还将赠送斯拉克的武器“鱼匕”。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DreamHack_Bucharest_2014_: 4支来自世界各地的Dota 2顶尖战队将在2014年DreamHack布加勒斯特邀请赛中将决一死战。基础奖金为25000美元，每售出一张门票都会增加2.50美元！这张门票只允许你观看2014年DreamHack布加勒斯特邀请赛，不包括附赠的物品。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Telebolt_Projektor: 有些发明就是与所处的年代格格不入。遥电装置在近一百年前被人首次发现后，人们马上就有了觉悟，上天那雷霆的能量最好还是别到凡间来。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Telebolt_Projekt: Some inventions are too controversial for their age. When the Telebolt Projektor was first unveiled almost a century ago, the audience quickly decided that the thunderous energy of heavens should probably stay in the heavens.

Bundle includes the Hellfire HUD!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Defense_of_the_Australian: 第3赛季将举行公开选拔赛，从64支澳大利亚战队中选拔产生8支晋级队伍，他们将面对第2赛季的前8队伍，一同争夺澳大利亚王牌战队的头衔。这张门票包含守卫澳大利亚联赛第3赛季的观战门票和狙击手的软木披风。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Defense_of_the_A: Season 3 brings you an open qualifier with 64 teams from around Australia competing against each other. The top eight teams advance to battle the top eight teams from Season 2 to claim the title as the #1 team in Australia. This ticket gives you access to view games from the Defense of the Australians Season 3 Leagu and the Hobbly Cape for Sniper.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Cloud9: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Clo: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Frankfurt_2014: 在6月28日和29日，8支世界顶尖队伍将会空降德国法兰克福，为超过15万美元的奖金决一死战。购买门票即可获得互动手册，并提高赛事的总奖金，并获得挑战目标达成后的赠品。赠品包括战斗点数飞升，界面皮肤，载入画面，撼地者的图腾饰品，以及特有的噬魂鬼套装！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Frankfur: On June 28th and 29th, eight of the best teams from around the world travel to Frankfurt, Germany to battle it out for the $150,000+ prize pool. Purchase the Compendium, increase the prize pool, and receive stretch goal items. The stretch goals include Battle Point Booster, HUD, Loading Screen, Earthshaker Totem, and a unique Lifestealer Set!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Esports_Champion_League: 12支来自中国的精英战队将为10万元的奖金展开激烈的争夺。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit: 巅峰联赛是一项全球性Dota 2赛事！来自欧洲、美洲和亚洲的顶尖队伍将在线上齐聚一堂，展开一番激烈的角逐。最终名列前茅的四支队伍将会飞赴美国洛杉矶，与受邀的Na'Vi和DK两支战队进行线下的对决，比赛的基础奖金为8万美元（折合50万元）！每售出一张门票，总奖金都将增加2.5美元！捆绑包内含客户端门票，斧王的“战争先驱”套装以及载入画面！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit: The Summit is a global Dota 2 event! Top teams from Europe, America, & Asia will fight to qualify via online play. The best four teams will fly to LA to challenge invited teams Na'Vi & DK on LAN for a base prize pool of $80,000! Each ticket purchased increases the prize pool by $2.50! Bundle includes the DotaTV ticket, Harbinger of War Axe set, and loading screen!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_Ticket: 巅峰联赛是一项全球性Dota 2赛事！来自欧洲、美洲和亚洲的顶尖队伍将在线上齐聚一堂，展开一番激烈的角逐。最终名列前茅的四支队伍将会飞赴美国洛杉矶，与受邀的Na'Vi和DK两支战队进行线下的对决，比赛的基础奖金为8万美元（折合50万元）！这张门票只允许你观看巅峰联赛，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_Ticke: The Summit is a global Dota 2 event! Top teams from Europe, America, & Asia will fight to qualify via online play. The best four teams will fly to LA to challenge invited teams Na'Vi & DK on LAN for a base prize pool of $80,000! This ticket only gives you access to view games in The Summit.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Torneos_Dota_Latino_Seaso: Torneos Dota拉丁联赛的首个赛季中32支战队将在线上赛事中争夺冠军头衔。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_VietDOTA_League_Season_1: VietDOTA联赛第1赛季是一项线上赛事，32支战队将在双淘汰制的赛制下争夺越南前六战队的名额。他们将争夺1000美元的奖金！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WPL_Champions_League_Seas: 8支欧洲顶尖战队加上2支外卡赛队伍将争夺3000美元的奖金。这件捆绑包除了观看WPL冠军联赛第2赛季的门票外还将赠送噬魂鬼的“赤怒暴行者”套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WPL_Champions_Le: Eight of the best teams in Europe in addition with two wild card teams compete for a price pool of $3,000. This bundle gives you the league ticket to view games from the WPL Champions League Seaon 2 and includes the Redrage Crawler Lifestealer item set.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Serbian_Charity_Cup: 32支来自塞尔维亚的战队将一决高下！比赛的所有收入将用于公益事业！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Cloud_League_Season_: 星云联赛的第2赛季将举办职业和业余两个级别，总奖金超过400美元。所有人都能免费报名参赛！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Star_Cloud_Leagu: The second season of the Star Cloud League now has two different skill classes with a total prize pool of over $400. It is free and open for everybody!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vicara_Gaming_Open: Vicara电竞公开赛是一项公开赛事。众多战队经过资格赛后前三名的队伍将晋级邀请赛，与4FC，Monomaniac和mYi等职业战队一决胜负。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vicara_Gaming_Op: The Vicara Gaming Open is an open bracket tournament! Teams will compete in a qualifier and the top three teams will be invited to the invitational to play against professional teams such as 4FC, Monomaniac and mYi.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Weekly_Dota_2_Tournaments: 本联赛每周都将在周一和周四举办由业余队伍参赛的选拔赛。选拔赛中获胜的队伍将晋级周六的决赛。每周的冠军将获得25美元，亚军获得10美元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Weekly_Dota_2_To: The Weekly Dota 2 Tournaments features amateur teams that participate in qualifiers on Monday and Thursday. Winners of the qualifiers move on to play in the finals on Saturday. First place receives $25 and second place receives $10.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Balkan_Dota_2_Premier_Cup: 20支来自巴尔干地区的战队将争夺200美元的奖金。本联赛将有超过100场的精彩比赛！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Balkan_Dota_2_Pr: 20 of the teams from Balkan region will battle it out for their share of the $200 prize pool. More than 100 matches!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cybercap_Dota_2_: 16 teams will compete in the Cybercap Dota 2 League for a total prize pool of 1,000,000 Rubles!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_League_of_Dota_EU_Season_: 刀塔联盟本次带着10支欧洲业余战队回归，他们将进行为期超过1个月的比赛。战队在单淘赛制下每周争夺两次现金大奖。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Semipro_Evening_Cup_Serie: 周日Dota夜系列赛起始于2009年12月，是迄今运营时间最长的Dota联赛。本联赛为公开报名，每周都有现金大奖！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Silver_Dota_League: 一项南美洲联赛，战队经过比赛将在Dota 2巴西战队排行榜上获得相应积分！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sunt_CDEC_New_Star_Cup: 讯拓CDEC全年联赛包含2014年度讯拓CDEC IH联赛和讯拓CDEC职业新星杯赛，其中IH联赛分为三个等，,是不同级别玩家和中国最顶尖职业选手打散后的积分匹配赛。新星杯赛则延续传统选拔模式，通过线上报名选拔出的新队将挑战包含DK、iG、LGD、VG等职业战队，并角逐每季10万元的高额总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sunt_CDEC_New_St: New Star is the continuation of traditional selection mode, the new team through the online registration will challenge pro teams which include DK, iG, LGD, VG and fight for 100000RMB price pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_deafESL_Cup_America_Seaso: 为聋哑团体准备的deafESL联赛经过首个赛季后带着美洲赛区的首个赛季回归了！每周战队都将通过单淘赛制进行角逐，所有比赛都是一局定胜负，总决赛为三局两胜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_deafESL_Cup_Amer: The deafESL behind the first season in a tournament made for the deaf community returns with the first season for the American division! 铁帆骁勇疾破浪，
灵喙精勤谊犹长，
航深路险浑不怕，

Tis said of sailing Claddish fleet,
There was once one of hardened beak,
Trained well to ferry to and fro,
All tools for use to bring foes low.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2014_Ba: 使用后<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的获得速率提升至<font color='#9da1a9'>180%</font>，持续到国际邀请赛结束。 而且其他玩家的<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>获得速度也将提高<font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font>，效果可以叠加。获得速率将根据国际邀请赛互动指南的等级随之提升。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> to <font color='#9da1a9'>180%</font> until the end of the International. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate. The rate will increase as you level up your International Compendium.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_Compend: 使用国际邀请赛互动指南来跟进今年的大赛进展。收集选手卡牌，不断升级并赢取奖励，还有更多内容即将登场！仅次于亲临现场的至尊体验。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Use the International Compendium to keep up to date on this year's tournament action. Earn rewards, level up, collect player cards, and more! It's the next-best thing to being there.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_175_Battle_Point_Booster_: 使用该物品后将使获得<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提升至<font color='#9da1a9'>175%</font>，持续3天。此外，您将使其他玩家额外获得<font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font>的<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>获得速率，该速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_175_Battle_Point: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> to <font color='#9da1a9'>175%</font> for 3 days. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_175_Battle_Point_Booster_: 使用该物品后将使获得<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提升至<font color='#9da1a9'>175%</font>，持续6天。此外，您将使其他玩家额外获得<font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font>的<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>获得速率，该速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_175_Battle_Point: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> to <font color='#9da1a9'>175%</font> for 6 days. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>15%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_180_Battle_Point_Booster_:
1月3日后不再销售。使用后战斗点数的获得速率提升至180%，持续500分钟。而且其他玩家的战斗点数获得速度也将提高16%，效果可以叠加。

战斗点数飞升的效果持续时间只有在获得战斗点数的过程中才会被消耗，在游戏内观战或者作为教练指导并不会消耗时间。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_180_Battle_Point:
Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn Battle Points to 180% for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking 16% bonus to their Battle Points rate.

Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Adornings_of_the_Quas_Pre: 包含祈求者的“凝冰之炎”套装内所有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Adornings_of_the: Includes all of the items in the \"Adornings of the Quas Precor\" set for Invoker.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaTalk_DatBet_Champions: 16支来自东南亚、韩国和大洋洲的Dota 2顶尖战队将争夺3000美元的现金大奖！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaTalk_DatBet_: 16 of the best Dota2 teams in Southeast Asia, Korea, and Oceania competing for a cash prize of $3000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dream_League_Battle_Point: 使用该物品后将使获得<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提升至<font color='#9da1a9'>225%</font>，持续3天。此外，您将使其他玩家额外获得<font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font>的<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>获得速率，该速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dream_League_Bat: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> to <font color='#9da1a9'>225%</font> for 6 days. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Battle_Point_Boos: 使用该物品后将使获得<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提升至<font color='#9da1a9'>225%</font>，持续6天。此外，您将使其他玩家额外获得<font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font>的<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>获得速率，该速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Battle_P: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> to <font color='#9da1a9'>225%</font> for 6 days. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Single_Item_Treasure: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏中包含散件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Single_Item_Trea: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2013_Ba: 使用该物品后将使获得<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>的速率提升至<font color='#9da1a9'>225%</font>，持续到国际邀请赛结束。此外，您将使其他玩家额外获得<font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font>的<font color='#9da1a9'>战斗点数</font>获得速率，该速率可以叠加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> to <font color='#9da1a9'>225%</font> until the end of the International. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>25%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Stanley_Parable: 这件物品将把默认播音员替换为冷嘲热讽能力十足的《The Stanley Parable》旁白。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Stanle: This item replaces the Default announcer with the sardonically meta wit of the Narrator from The Stanley Parable.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Single_Item_Treas: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏中包含散件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Single_I: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horn_of_Luminous_Crystal: 从上一个冰河时代以来世代传承的魔咒。晶灿之角是荣誉的象征，只属于最伟大的战士。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horn_of_Luminous: An enchantment passed down through the generations since the cold, dark heart of the last ice age, the Horn of the Luminous Crystal is a mark of distinction worthy of only the greatest warriors.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Stanley_Parable: 这件物品将把连杀配音替换为冷嘲热讽能力十足的《The Stanley Parable》旁白。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Stanle: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the sardonically meta wit of the Narrator from The Stanley Parable.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Monty: 这位久经世故的流浪汉蒙迪已经突破天际。如果他有嘴巴一定会嘲笑你。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Monty: A sophisticate vagabond of the highest order, Monty would look down his nose at you if he had one.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Guard: 这把武器是从沃达伦的最后一个赤红护卫冰冷的手里缴获的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Red_Guard: A blade taken from the cold dead hand of the last of the Red Guard of Ogdaroon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroomling: 在淹没深林里所有的活动菌类里，青蕈精因他们无畏的天性以及对潮湿黑暗的喜爱而名声在外。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shroomling: Among all the shuffling fungi of Drowned Forest, Shroomlings are renowned for their fearless nature and love of all things dank and dark.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stanley_Parable_Announcer: 这件播音包将把默认播音员和连杀配音替换为冷嘲热讽能力十足的《The Stanley Parable》旁白。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stanley_Parable_: This pack replaces the Default announcer and Mega-Kills announcer with the sardonically meta wit of the Narrator from The Stanley Parable.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Zephyr: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Zep: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Triumph: 为丰功而战不在少数。享伟绩而归寥寥无几。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Triumph: Many will fight.  Few will achieve immortality.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_FGCL_Fight_Club_Promote_S: 八支受邀的职业战队和八支通过选拔晋级的队伍将在战斗俱乐部宣传赛季中争夺1000美元！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_FGCL_Fight_Club_: Eight invited professional teams and eight qualifying teams compete in Promote Season of Fight Club for $1,000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Good_Play_SEA_Invitationa: 10支东南亚的顶尖战队将在“好戏不断”东南亚邀请赛中争夺20000马币的奖金。所有比赛将由Beyond the Summit负责解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Good_Play_SEA_In: Featuring 10 of the top teams in Southeast Asia battling it out in the Good Play SEA Invitational for a RM 20,000 prize pool. All games will be casted by Beyond the Summit.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_National_Esports_League: 32支队伍将在全国电竞联赛首个赛季的Dota 2超级赛中争夺250美元！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_National_Esports: 32 teams will compete in the first season of the National Esport League in the Dota 2 Super Cup for $250!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Private_Games_Brazil_Girl: 巴西首个Dota 2女子联赛已经开始，众多战队将争夺现金大奖和游戏内的宝箱钥匙！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Private_Games_Br: The first female Dota 2 tournament in Brazil where teams will compete for a cash prize and treasure keys!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Stella_Champ: 独联体国家的业余战队将在比赛中争夺200个稀有物品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Stella_Champ: Amateur teams in CIS countries will face off for a prize of 200 rare items!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_MVP_Phoenix: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_MVP: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_fastDOTA_Solo_Ranked: fastDOTA天梯Solo赛中32名来自俄罗斯的选手将争夺冠军的头衔！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_fastDOTA_Solo_Ra: 32 players from Russia participate in the fastDOTA Solo Ranked tournament for a prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gloom_Dota_Season_3: 16支半职业战队将在Gloom Dota第三赛季中争夺3000卢布的总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gloom_Dota_Seaso: 16 semi-pro teams will participate in the third season of Gloom Dota for a total prize pool of 3000 Rubles!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_LeadersLeague_Spring_Cup_: 16支战队将在LeadersLeague春季赛的首个赛季中争夺35 000卢布的奖金！捆绑包内含“暗黑之世”界面皮肤！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_LeadersLeague_Sp: 16 teams compete in the first season of the LeadersLeague Spring Cup for a prize pool of 35,000 Rubles! Bundle includes the Living in Darkness HUD skin!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_LeadersLeague_Spring_Cup_: 16支战队将在LeadersLeague春季联赛的首个赛季中争夺35 000卢布的奖金！这张门票只允许你观看Leadersleague春季联赛第1赛季，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_LeadersLeague_Sp: 16 teams compete in the first season of the LeadersLeague Spring Cup for a prize pool of 35,000 Rubles! This ticket only gives you access to view games in the LeadersLeague Spring Cup Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Liga_Livedota_Chile: LiveDota的首个联赛中智利战队将在两个月内争夺冠军头衔和现金大奖！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Liga_Livedota_Ch: The first league from LiveDota allows teams from Chile to participate for two months to become champions and receive a cash prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mad_Moon_Summoning_Cup_Se: 欧洲超过32支战队将为奖金一决高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mad_Moon_Summoni: Over 32 teams from Europe are fighting for a prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Trolls_Treasure: 联赛将定期举行一轮比赛，获胜的战队将获得丰富奖励！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Trolls_Treas: A series of tournaments are played and the winners will receive a prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_ViCi_Gaming: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_ViCi_Gam: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Tour_Season_3: SLTV巡回赛带着众多战队回归了，他们将在循环赛制中争夺现金大奖！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Tour_Season: SLTV Tour returns with teams competing in a round-robin format for a cash prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_First_Arrival_Dota_2_Tour: 联赛采用双败淘汰制，战队将争夺Dota 2内的道具奖品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_First_Arrival_Do: A double elimination tournament where teams will compete for treasure keys in Dota 2!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Griffin_Cub: 此信使是与韩国Dota联赛第1赛季冠军Zephyr战队联合创建，每售出一只他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Royal_Griffin_Cu: This courier was created in partnership with KDL Season One winners Zephyr, who receive a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Bulgarian_Amateur_League_Seaso: 保加利亚业余联赛第2赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bulgarian_Amateur_League_: 保加利亚业余联赛已经进入第2赛季。这是项公开联赛，多达50支队伍将为大奖而战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bulgarian_Amateu: This is the second season for the Bulgarian Amateur League. It's an open league with up to 50 teams competing for a prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dream_of_Dota__The_Final_: 这是“刀塔之梦”联赛的最后一个赛季。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dream_of_Dota__T: This is the last season of the Dream of Dota League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Frankfurt_2014_Pr: 在6月28日和29日，8支世界顶尖队伍将会空降德国法兰克福，为超过15万美元的奖金决一死战。顶级门票包含以下挑战目标物品：战斗点数飞升，界面皮肤，载入画面，撼地者的图腾饰品，以及特有的噬魂鬼套装！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Frankfur: On June 28th and 29th, eight of the best teams from around the world travel to Frankfurt, Germany to battle it out for the $150,000+ prize pool. The premium ticket includes the following stretch goal items: Battle Point Booster, HUD, Loading Screen, Earthshaker Totem, and a unique Lifestealer Set!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Frankfurt_2014_Pr: 在6月28日和29日，8支世界顶尖队伍将会空降德国法兰克福，为超过15万美元的奖金决一死战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Frankfur: On June 28th and 29th, eight of the best teams from around the world travel to Frankfurt, Germany to battle it out for the $150,000+ prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dream_of_Dota__The_Final_Seaso: 刀塔之梦 - 最终赛季
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Dream_of_Dota__The_Fi: Dream of Dota - The Final Season
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dawn_of_the_Moon: 在每个新月升起的夜晚，祭祀之歌将会响起，人们为月之女神赛利蒙妮献上祭品，希望她能再度广施恩泽。出席这样的祭祀仪式必须身穿庄严而神圣的服饰。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dawn_of_the_Moon: On the night of each new moon, rites are sung and offerings burned in honor of the goddess of the moon, Selemene, in the hope that her countenance may shine once more. To wear the garb customary to these rituals is considered a sacred honor.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MarsTV_Dota_Elite_Invitat: 直接受邀前往西雅图参加总决赛的四支中国战队，将和2014DOTA2国际邀请赛中国区预选赛的冠亚军，LGD和CIS战队进行精彩的精英邀请赛！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MarsTV_Dota_Elit: The first and second places from CN Qualifer for the International will face up four invited Chinese top teams in Huaxi, the top village in China.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_MarsTV_Dota_Elite_Invitational: MDL华西杯国际精英邀请赛
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_YoDota_Championship_Seaso: 32支来自南美洲的战队将争夺YoDota冠军赛第2赛季的8个席位之一。晋级的战队将会面对8支受邀战队。门票附赠YoDota冠军赛第2赛季载入画面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_YoDota_Champions: 32 teams from South America compete to earn one of eight qualifying spots in the second season of the YoDota Championship. The qualifiers will fight against eight invited teams for over $700 in prizes! Bundle includes the YoDota Championship Season 2 loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_YoDota_Championship_Seaso: 来自南美洲的战队将争夺YoDota冠军赛第2赛季的8个席位之一。晋级的战队将会面对8支受邀战队。本门票只允许你观看YoDota冠军赛第2赛季载入画面，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_YoDota_Champions: 32 teams from South America compete to earn one of eight qualifying spots in the second season of the YoDota Championship. The qualifiers will fight against eight invited teams for over $700 in prizes! This ticket only gives you access to view games from the YoDota Championship Season 2 league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_YoDota_Championship_Season_2_L: YoDota冠军赛第2赛季载入画面
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Techlabs_Cup_2014_Season_: Techlabs杯联赛第2赛季即将回归。来自独联体地区的顶尖业余战队将共同争夺1万美元的总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Techlabs_Cup_201: The Techlabs Cup returns for the 2nd Season. Some of the top amateur teams from around the CIS region compete for a $10,000 prize pool.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_XMG_Captains_Draft_In: XMG Captains Draft Invitational Ticket - No Contribution
XMG Captains Draft Invitational - No Contribution
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Angels_Tournament_Season_: 众多业余战队将在天使之战第2赛季中争夺50美元奖金和丰富的稀有饰品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Angels_Tournamen: Amateur teams compete once again in Angel's Tournament for $50 and rare items!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cabeca_Dota_2_League: 24支战队将在Cabeca Dota 2联赛为冠军头衔一决高下！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cabeca_Dota_2_Le: 24 teams will compete in the Cabeca Dota 2 League to become champions!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cyberfight_Season_1: 12支队伍将在线上大赛第1赛季中争夺200美元的总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cyberfight_Seaso: 12 teams will compete in the first season of CyberFight for up to a total prize pool of $200!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Cup_Season_2: 20支队伍将在Dota 2联赛第2赛季中共同争夺300美元的总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Cup_Seaso: The second season of the Dota 2 Cup puts 20 teams against each other to compete for a prize pool of $300!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Tester_League: 来自中国的众多战队将在Dota 2测试员联赛中为3万1千元的奖金决一死战！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Tester_Le: Teams from China will compete in the Dota 2 Tester League for 31,000 Yuan!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fin_Kings_Charm: 鳍皇的秘术师曾用此物将逆贼发落到万丈深渊，但这魔法的奥秘也自此失传，效果已大不如前。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fin_Kings_Charm: Though once used by the Fin King's arcanists to dispatch his foes to the underwater realm, the core technique of the charm has since been lost, and much of its potency along with it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Inkling_Wings: 死亡先知克萝贝露丝在世界之纱前飘摇，窥探无法直视的领域。她挥动着背后的死亡之翼，翅脉中涌动的笔墨是她尚未成书的预言。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Inkling_Wings: The Death Prophet Krobelus flutters beyond the veil of the world, peering into realms best unseen.  At her back, flutters death itself, while in her veins pulses the dark ink of all her prophecies still unwritten.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Krabick_Cup_Season_2: 16支战队将在Krabick联赛第2赛季中共同争夺3200卢布的总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Krabick_Cup_Seas: 16 teams will battle it out in the Krabick Cup Season 2 for a total prize of 3200 Rubles!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MSI_Beat_IT_Gosu_Cup_Asia: 微星Beat IT GosuCup亚洲联赛将邀请来自亚洲的顶尖战队与业余战队共同争夺2000美元的总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MSI_Beat_IT_Gosu: GosuCup Asia welcomes invites top Asian teams to compete alongside amateurs in the $2,000 MSI Beat IT GosuCup!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MSI_Masters: ESAU微星大师赛将汇集来自澳大利亚的顶尖选手。最终八支队伍将共同争夺冠军头衔及3 000美元的总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MSI_Masters: The ESAU MSi Masters is a professional tournament compiling Australia's most talented players. Eight final teams will compete for the title and $3,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Malaysians_Hall_of_Fame_L: 来自马来西亚的战队将在此联赛中共同争夺1000林吉特的总奖金！排名前四的队伍还将直接晋级下一赛季。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Malaysians_Hall_: A league for  Malaysian's teams to play competitively for a prize pool of 1000 MYR! The top 4 teams will receive a slot for the next season.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mecha_Boots_of_Travel_Mk_: 既然不稳定的机器都这么危险了，那干嘛还要用不可靠的魔法？重制这双靴可谓是费尽千辛万苦，因为图纸我早就记不清了，里面蕴含的穿越技术理论上足够再次引发紫罗兰高原事故了。当然，肯定不会再出事故啦。呃，应该不会吧？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mecha_Boots_of_T: Why rely on uncertain sorcery when an unstable machine can be just as dangerous? Painstakingly reconstructed from half-remembered schematics, the transdimensional technologies built into these boots is theorized to have caused the Violet Plateau Incident. Of course, that couldn't possibly happen again. Er, could it?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Merry_Wanderers_Brush: 在朔夜之下有一幕凡人无缘见到的魔幻景象：飞舞的精灵在空中摇曳，华丽的尾巴舒展着在空中划过耀眼的弧线。这曼妙而多变的光芒可能有机会一观，但试图寻找这番景象的人大多已经生死未卜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Merry_Wanderers_: Beneath the magic moonless night sprout sights rare-seen by mortal man: the swaying sweep of faerie flight unfurls to gorgeous shimmering span. And from this beauteous wonder light of shifting hue there might be spied, yet those who seek such perilous views may oft then find their lives denied.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Muh_Keen_Gun: 狙击手因为不满足于每次只能发出一颗子弹击杀目标，他委托世间最好的枪匠为他打造火器，能够与他弹无虚发的天赋相称。这名基恩的铸枪大师倾其所能进行设计和打造，完成的武器几近完美，可以作为传家之宝。巨枪只有一边非常沉重，的确没错，但是倒在这把枪下的尸体远远超出了枪的重量。而且还是扒光后的尸体。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Muh_Keen_Gun: Not content to kill things one bullet at a time, Sniper commissioned the best gunsmith in the land to construct him a firearm worthy of his talented trigger finger.  Lovingly designed and crafted with all the skill and attention to detail befitting a master smithy of the keen, the weapon that resulted is truly one for the ages.  It's a bit on the heavy side, true, but not when balanced against the weight of corpses it will produce.  Hernia not included.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_OVS_Dota_2_LAN: 匈牙利的顶尖战队就爱那个在双败淘汰制的联赛中进行对决，晋级队伍还将在线下决赛中一决胜负！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_OVS_Dota_2_LAN: The top Hungarian teams compete in a double bracket elimination tournament where the winners will compete at a LAN finals!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_PAGE_Premier_League: PAGE超级联赛中104支队伍将争夺8 500美元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_PAGE_Premier_Lea: 104 team compete for $8,500 in the PAGE Premier League!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_PowerPlay_Phillipine_Dota: 10支顶尖Dota 2菲律宾战队，其中8支为直接邀请，2支通过公开选拔赛晋级，他们将共同争夺5万菲律宾比索（约合7110元）的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_PowerPlay_Philli: The top 10 Filipino Dota 2 teams, 8 invited and 2 through open qualifiers, battle it out for a prize pool of P50,000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rampant_Outrage: 就凭你们那些生锈的刀剑和三脚猫的魔法就想干我？看我不劈了你的盔甲，剥了你的皮！你真的以为抓住了我的软肋？居然还开始得意忘形了？我的大斧会让你明白！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rampant_Outrage: Let them swing their puny swords and cast their pitiful spells. Let them scar the flesh and blacken the armor. Let them think they've found a weakness. Let them smile in their triumph. Then let them feel terror as the heavy blade ends their laughter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Lightning_Orchid: 帽檐之下，巧舌如簧的他深谙沉默之道。脑海之中，咒怨如同兰花一般绽放。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Lightning_Or: He who loudly speaks with silver tongue, in this helm wields silence golden.   Malevolence blooms like an orchid in the mind behind the mask.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Torneo_Tecnobar_De_Dota_2: 超级火箭联赛将由8支队伍相互对决，最终在TecnoBar进行线下决赛！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Torneo_Tecnobar_: The Giant Rocket League pits 8 teams against each other to compete at a LAN Final at TecnoBar!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Watch_4_Dota_Tournament: “饱览刀塔”联赛将由32支队伍争夺50美元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Watch_4_Dota_Tou: The Watch 4 Dota tournament allows 32 teams to compete for a prize of $50!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_MSI_Beat_IT_GosuCup_Asia: 微星Beat IT GosuCup亚洲联赛
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Malaysians_Hall_of_Fame_League: 马来西亚名人堂联赛第1赛季
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Malaysians_Hall_of_Fa: Malaysian's Hall of Fame League Season 1
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Mecha_Boots_of_Travel: Mecha Boots of Travel Mk III
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_Ice: 在寒冷的北方，即使是已在传说中失落的物事也有可能会在寒冰中重现。追溯到无法考证的年代，冰雪女巫亚尔萨莉亚统治着这片白雪之地，冒犯她的人都会受到天降暴雪和风雨的惩罚，而大陆上也会出现一队徘徊的冰雪魔像，消灭所有的温暖。随着时间的推移，雪女的南侵触怒了古龙斯莱瑞克，他的冲天怒火让雪女的大军在他无尽的火焰下消融殆尽，最终雪女也被其征服。现在，数百年过后，寒冰中升起的是她帝国最后残留的碎片：她的冰川王冠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_Ice: In the frigid north, that which is lost to myth may still be found within the ice. In an age now lost to time, the Frozen Witch Yulsaria ruled the whitelands, summoning blizzards and hail storms upon those who displeased her, while an army of ice golems roamed the lands to snuff out all warmth. In time, her southward expansion angered the Eldwurm Slyrak who, in his terrible rage, melted Yulsaria's armies with his endless flame before conquering the Frozen Witch herself. Now, centuries later, shifts in the ice have heaved up the last remaining shard of her empire: her glacial crown.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hand_of_Glory_Staff: 经过整整一周的施咒，凡间慢慢地被撕裂，异界魔物缓缓地进入。最后，一小片地狱之光出现，未知的异界深处远远地传来充满着痛楚和愤怒的悲号。令人难受的声音逐渐变成了震耳欲聋的咆哮，一只来自地狱的魔爪从燃烧的眼泪中进入了凡间。然而在这笼罩世界的盛怒下侵入的附肢却干扰了仪式，原本大张的异界之口突然紧闭，就这样这条邪恶的手臂永远地离开了无从知晓的主人。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hand_of_Glory_St: A week of incantations were spent to pierce beyond the mortal realm and consort with what lay beyond. Finally, a sliver of infernal light appeared and from depths unknown rumbled a distant wail of suffering and anger. The wretched sound grew and grew into a deafening roar before a hellborn claw reached through the burning tear into the world. Yet in its unseeing fury the invading appendage disrupted the ritual, and the vile mouth from whence it sprang suddenly closed shut, forever severing the vile hand from its unknowable owner.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Cascade: 披风采自清风播散的花丝，由魔法蜉蝣织就，可谓是集万千美感于一身，而且出乎意料地实用。她穿上这件披风后，风永远会在背后助阵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sylvan_Cascade: A cape woven from the finest wind-strewn filaments of enchanted ephemera, this is a garment of both rare beauty and unexpected utility.  For she who wears the cape of the Sylvan Cascade, the wind will be always at her back.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortal_Strongbox: 无需任何符印即可解封此宝藏。其中内含的珍宝无与伦比。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortal_Strongb: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. Within its confines lie treasures without equal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kaliningrad_Dota_2_Open_C: 加里宁格勒Dota 2公开冠军赛是一项免费线上联赛，线下决赛将于加里宁格勒举行，奖金高达15 000卢布！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kaliningrad_Dota: The Kaliningrad Dota 2 Open Championship is a free online league with a LAN finale in Kaliningrad for a prize of 15,000 Rubles!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Kindred_of_the_Iron_Drago: 斯莱瑞克的龙血在龙骑士体内流淌，长久以来变身的力量已经成为了传奇。对于少数获得了龙血的人，魔法变得非常强烈，效果有所增强，但也有所扭曲。在这几个人中，变身的作用效果更加强大了，而变身的力量不再是来自一头龙，而是来自最古老的先祖血缘以及那个被遗忘的时代，当年整个王国都在巨龙的威胁下战栗不已，身披铠甲的盲龙在国土上为祸四方。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Kindred_of_the_I: The blood of Slyrak flows strong through the Dragon Knight, and its transformative powers have long been a thing of legend.  For a chosen few who have received dragon blood, the magic runs unusually thick, its effects magnified and distorted.  In these rare recipients, the reach of the transformation is enhanced, drawing strength not from any single dragon but from the oldest ancestral strains, and a forgotten age when whole kingdoms shook with fear, and eyeless, armored dragons raged wars across the countryside.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Kaliningrad_Dota_2_Open_Champi: 加里宁格勒Dota 2公开冠军赛
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League: 32支职业和半职业队伍将为1000美元的奖金一决高下。这张门票将允许你观看GG联赛，并附赠帕吉的原力之钩。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League: 32 professional and semi-professional teams battle it out for the $1000 prize pool. This ticket gives access to view games from the GG League and the Force Hook for Pudge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pennant_ViCi_Gami: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pennant_: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Logitech_G__Free_to_Play_: 印度最大的线下联赛已携第3赛季回归。这项公开赛事将在线下进行，众多战队将争夺13万印度卢比（约合13 638元）的总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Logitech_G__Free: India's Biggest LAN Tournament is back for a 3rd season. This open tournament takes place in a LAN environment where teams compete for the 130,000 INR Prize Pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Logitech_G__Free_to_Play_3: 罗技神联赛·Free to Play第3赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_International: 冠军之神盾的得主悬而未决。且看全世界顶尖战队在国际邀请赛中谁能捧得神盾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Inte: The Aegis of Champions hangs in the balance. See the world's top teams battle in the International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MSI_Beat_IT_2014: 今年微星Beat IT联赛包含了Dota 2，所有人都有机会通过公开选拔赛参与赛事，与全球的Dota 2顶尖战队进行正面交锋，争夺44 000美元的奖金！每售出一张门票总奖金还将增加1.50美元！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MSI_Beat_IT_2014: This year, MSI Beat IT includes Dota 2 and presents an opportunity to anyone out there to take part in the event through the open qualifiers and face off best Dota 2 teams in the world with a $44,000 prize pool! Each ticket purchased adds $1.50 to the prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bounty_Hunter_Series: Dota 2山丘之王赏金猎人系列赛回归了！2支受邀队伍将共同争夺赢得1000美元的机会。捆绑包内含信使雷克！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bounty_Hunter_Se: The Dota 2 King of the Hill Bounty Hunter Series returns! Two invited teams teams to go head-to-head for a chance to win $1000. Bundle includes Raiq courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bounty_Hunter_Series_Tick: Dota 2山丘之王赏金猎人系列赛回归了！2支受邀队伍将共同争夺赢得1000美元的机会。这张门票只允许你观看赏金猎人系列赛，不包括附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bounty_Hunter_Se: The Dota 2 King of the Hill Bounty Hunter Series returns! Two invited teams teams to go head-to-head for a chance to win $1000. This ticket only gives you access to view games in the Bounty Hunter Series.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gigabyte_Esports_Tourname: 观看东南亚的顶尖战队争夺2000美元的奖金，并赢得进入GEST挑战赛的名额。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gigabyte_Esports: Watch the best Dota 2 teams from South-East Asia battle it out for the $2,000 prize pool and to earn their spot in the GEST Challenge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortal_Gift__Hellborn_G: 开启不朽秘宝箱获得的额外奖励
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortal_Gift__H: A bonus item granted for opening an Immortal Strongbox
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortal_Reward__Kindred_: 开启不朽秘宝箱获得的额外奖励
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortal_Reward_: A bonus item granted for opening an Immortal Strongbox
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_Team_Empire: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_Team_Emp: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Immortal_Reward__Hellborn_Gras: 不朽奖励 - 魔裔之攫
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Immortal_Reward__Kindred_of_th: 不朽奖励 - 铁龙血脉
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Immortal_Reward__Kind: Immortal Reward - Kindred of the Iron Dragon
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Acolyte_of_Vengeance: 包含敌法师的“复仇侍僧”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Acolyte_of_Venge: Contains all of the items in the 'Acolyte of Vengeance' set for Anti-Mage plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Amateur_Dota_2_League_Sea: Dota 2业余联赛第4赛季将由众多业余队伍根据最后的成绩赢得相应的奖励（100美元、50美元和游戏内饰品）！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Amateur_Dota_2_L: The fourth season of the Amateur Dota 2 League kicks off where Amateur teams compete to receive prize pools depending on the tier they are in! (Prize pools are $100, $50 and items)
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AsacsPLAY_League_Season_1: AsacsPLAY联赛第1赛季是一项业余联赛，崭新的队伍将有机会为奖金一战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AsacsPLAY_League: The AsacsPLAY League Season 1 is an amateur league which allows new teams to compete for a prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Brazilian_Dota_League: 20支队伍将在巴西Dota联赛首个赛季中争夺350雷亚尔的总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Brazilian_Dota_L: 20 teams will compete in the first season of the Brazilian Dota League for a total prize pool of R$350!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copa_Sand_King_Peru: 64支队伍将在“沙漠之王”联赛中争夺超过2000索尔（约合4454元）的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copa_Sand_King_P: 64 teams will compete for the Sand King Cup and over 2000 Soles in prizes!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crescent: 包含米拉娜的“新月英姿”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面和自定义的月之神箭相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crescent: Contains all of the items in the 'Crescent' item set for Mirana plus loading screen and custom Sacred Arrow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Cebu_League_Season: Dota 2宿雾联赛第5赛季将给宿雾的Dota 2业余队伍提供一个决出冠军的机会！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Cebu_Leag: Season 5 of the Dota 2 Cebu League gives Cebu's Dota 2 Amateur Teams a chance to battle it out to be the league champion!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Legends: 这是一项国际联赛，每个地区的精英战队将争夺500美元以上的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Legends: This is an international league for our top teams where they compete for a prize pool starting at $500 per region.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragonterror: 包含幻影刺客的“神龙之袭”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragonterror: Contains all of the items in the 'Dragonterror' set for Phantom Assassin plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Finnish_Dota_League: 芬兰Dota 2联赛的首个赛季将向众多芬兰战队提供一个提高芬兰电竞水平的平台！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Finnish_Dota_Lea: The first season of the Finnish Dota 2 League provides Finnish teams a platform to develop Finnish eSports to the next level!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GEMplay_Challenge_Season_: GEMplay挑战赛第1赛季将由全球的众多战队争夺200欧元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GEMplay_Challeng: GEMplay Challenge Season 1 pits teams from around the world against each other for 200 Euros!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Garb_of_the_Consuming_Tid: 包含娜迦海妖的“毁灭浪潮之服”套装内所有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Garb_of_the_Cons: Contains all of the items in the 'Garb of the Consuming Tides' set for Naga Siren.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_HSL_Summer_Academic_Showd: 来自美国和加拿大的高中队伍将争夺夏季学院决战的13个晋级名额之一。他们将与3支大学队伍同台竞技，最终4支队伍将赢得现金大奖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_HSL_Summer_Acade: High school teams from US/Canada will compete to earn one of 13 qualifying spots in the Summer Academic Showdown. These teams will be pitted against 3 collegiate teams with the top four teams earning cash prizes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Intercollegiate_Dota_2_On: 这项电竞赛事将面向菲律宾的所有在校大学生，比赛的总奖金将在15 000比索（约合2133元）左右。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jin_and_Yin_Fox_Spirits: 友善的天辉狐灵小金时刻守卫着竹林。害羞的夜魇狐灵小银则喜欢躲在阴影之中。相传这对狐灵采日月之精华后将长生不老。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jin_and_Yin_Fox_: Friendly Jin of the Radiant protects the bamboo forests from intruders. Shy Yin of the Dire prefers to hide in the shadows. It is said the Fox Spirits can achieve immortality with sufficient essence from the Sun and the Moon.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Beneplay_Cup_#1: 首届Beneplay联赛的业余参赛战队将争夺超过2 000卢布的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Beneplay_Cup_#1: Amateur teams participate in the first Beneplay Cup for over 2,000 Rubles!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hells_Glare: 唯有无尽燃烧之人才可持有这把永不熄灭之剑。这把与佤什昂多的丧钟使用同一块铁锭同时铸造的魔剑被世人尊称为地狱之耀，它如同末日使者吞噬天谴的灵魂一般吞噬着世间的黑暗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hells_Glare: Only he that burns and is not consumed can wield a sword whose radiance cannot be quenched.  Forged at the same time and from the same ingot of steel as the great bell of Vashundol, the great-sword known as Hell'Âs Glare devours the darkness just as Doom devours the souls of the damned.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AD2L_Season_4_WTS_1v1: AD2L周末联赛系列的发源，比赛模式将采用中单模式，作为周末联赛的补充，采用Valve推出的最新游戏模式。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AD2L_Season_4_WT: Home of the AD2L's Weekend Tournament Series featuring a 1v1 mid and the Alternative Tournament Series for friendly tournaments using Valve's newest game modes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aceh_Dota_Classic: Aceh Dota经典联赛将由8支最具天赋的业余战队争夺超过400美元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aceh_Dota_Classi: Aceh Dota Classic Tournament is a Dota 2 competition between 8 most talented amateur teams in the region competing for a prizepool of over $400!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Australian_Esports_League: 澳大利亚电竞联赛2014年冬季赛将由澳大利亚和大洋洲地区的顶尖战队争夺5千澳元的现金和赞助商奖品！总决赛将于3月1日在悉尼举行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Australian_Espor: The 2014 Winter Cup for the Australian E-Sports League will see top teams from across Australia and the Oceanic region compete for their share of AUD $5,000 in cash plus sponsor prizes! The Grand Finalswill be held live in Sydney on the 1st of March.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Balkan_Floods_Charity_Cup: 联赛将筹集捐款帮助克罗地亚，塞尔维亚和波斯尼亚等遭受严重洪灾的国家。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Balkan_Floods_Ch: Raising money for Croatia, Serbia and Bosnia, countries that got hit by heavy floods.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_BoraDota_Stars: 南美洲的顶尖战队将在BoraDota众星联赛中争夺1500雷亚尔的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_BoraDota_Stars: The best teams in South America compete in the BoraDota Stars for a prize pool of R$1,500!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Summit_Ticket: 巅峰联赛是一项全球性Dota 2赛事！来自欧洲、美洲和亚洲的顶尖队伍将在线上齐聚一堂，展开一番激烈的角逐。最终名列前茅的四支队伍将会飞赴美国洛杉矶，与受邀的Na'Vi和DK两支战队进行线下的对决，比赛的基础奖金为8万美元（折合50万元）！这张门票只允许你观看巅峰联赛，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Summ: The Summit is a global Dota 2 event! Top teams from Europe, America, & Asia will fight to qualify via online play. The best four teams will fly to LA to challenge invited teams Na'Vi & DK on LAN for a base prize pool of $80,000! This ticket only gives you access to view games in The Summit.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gold_Spectator_Gem: 物品在镶入该宝石后可以记录观看特定比赛或特定战队的比赛场数。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gold_Spectator_G: Adding this gem to an item will enable that item to track games viewed for a league or team.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Guf_Australia_Winter_Regi: Guf澳大利亚冬季地区赛是一项瑞士赛制的联赛，在澳大利亚的各地Guf网吧进行，总奖金为1 600澳元，截至6月22日！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Guf_Australia_Wi: The Guf Australia $1600 Winter Regional is a swiss format tournament played at Guf LAN Centres around Australia with a total prize pool of $1,600 AUD on the 22nd of June!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Invasion_of_Comrades_Vol_: 来自欧洲的战队将在4项比赛中一决高下，每项比赛的奖金为1500卢布！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nvidia_Dota_2_Vietnam_Tou: 英伟达DOTA2越南联赛第2赛季已经回归！锁定越南的众多战队，且看他们博得现金大奖！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nvidia_Dota_2_Vi: The 2nd season of the NVIDIA DOTA 2 Vietnam Tournament is back! Catch the action of the local Vietnamese teams as they battle it out for cash prizes!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Perfect_World_Dota_Academ: 完美世界刀塔学院提供了多种多样的教学比赛，涵盖了英雄使用、游戏机制和战术策略等内容的教学，为正在上手DOTA2的玩家开创了一种绝佳的学习方式。学院还将定期播送由完美世界举办的各项比赛活动。这档教学节目与赛事竞技的跨界演出将会免费开放观看。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Perfect_World_Do: Featuring various kinds of instructive matches including guides to heroes, mechanics and tactics. Perfect World Dota Academy offers a perfect route for beginners to learn Dota. Also, the academy periodically broadcasts exciting activities held by Perfect World.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pudge_Cup: 8支队伍将参与前所未有的帕吉联赛，5v5的单中模式，所有人都必须使用帕吉。他们将争夺冠军头衔和精彩奖品！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit__No_Contributi: 巅峰联赛是一项全球性Dota 2赛事！来自欧洲、美洲和亚洲的顶尖队伍将在线上齐聚一堂，展开一番激烈的角逐。最终名列前茅的四支队伍将会飞赴美国洛杉矶，与受邀的Na'Vi和DK两支战队进行线下的对决，比赛的基础奖金为8万美元（折合50万元）！捆绑包内含客户端门票，斧王的“战争先驱”套装以及载入画面！

The best four teams will fly to LA to challenge invited teams Na'Vi & DK on LAN for a base prize pool of $80,000! Bundle includes the DotaTV ticket, Harbinger of War Axe set, and loading screen!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Cup_Season_3: Dota 2联赛是一个面向欧洲的业余及半职业联赛，第3赛季现已回归。各战队将在为期一个月的比赛中争夺5v5及1v1比赛的奖金。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESPOT_Dota_2_Rare_Challen: E-SPOT Dota 2稀有挑战赛将由16或32支队伍参赛，他们将每周争夺稀有物品和现金奖励。
