Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Krabick_Cup_3: 来自独联体国家的16支战队将在Krabick联赛第3赛季中争夺3200卢布的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Krabick_Cup_3: 16 teams from CIS countries will participate in the Krabick Cup #3 for the prize pool of 3200 Rubles!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spanish_Dota_2_Pro_Series: Dota 2职业系列赛的决赛是西班牙最为盛大的Dota 2赛事。线下赛事将于6月27-29日在马德里举行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spanish_Dota_2_P: The finals of the Dota 2 Pro Series are the biggest event of Dota 2 in Spain. The live event will take place in Madrid from June 27th-29th.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Z_Sword_League_Season_1: 首届曙光之剑联赛将有100余支中国战队参与。职业战队HGT，LGD.CDEC，Tongfu，Speedgaming.cn和Orenda也会在表演赛亮相。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Z_Sword_League_S: More than 100 teams compete in the first season of the Z Sword League in China. Professional teams HGT, LGD.CDEC, TongFu, Speedgaming.cn, and Orenda will participate in the exhibition matches.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_BenQ_Southeast_Asian_Go4Dota2_: 明基东南亚“刀塔之战”联赛
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bestowments_of_the_Di: Bestowments of the Divine Anchor Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Crystal_Scavengers_Augmented_M: 晶石搜寻者的强化晶槌
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Crystal_Scavengers_Digging_Glo: 晶石搜寻者的挖掘手套
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Crystal_Scavengers_Galvanic_Mi: 晶石搜寻者的直流矿灯
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Crystal_Scavengers_Reinforced_: 晶石搜寻者的强化肩甲
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Crystal_Scavengers_Transducing: 晶石搜寻者的提炼装置
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Cyclone_Wave_Smasher_: Cyclone Wave Smasher of the Divine Anchor
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dark_Reef_Escape_Loading_Scree: 暗黑之礁逃犯载入画面
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Artisan_of_Havoc: 包含发条技师的“浩劫之匠”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Artisan_of_Havoc: Contains all of the items in the 'Artisan of Havoc' set for Clockwerk plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Beaver_Knight_Bundle: 包含“海狸骑士”信使，内有多种款式，更有载入画面相赠。此物品是与选手SingSing联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Beaver_Knight_Bu: Includes the 'Beaver Knight' courier with multiple styles plus a loading screen. These items were created in partnership with SingSing, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_BenQ_Southeast_Asian_Go4D: “刀塔之战”联赛于每周日举行，各Dota 2战队将有机会获得每月750美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_BenQ_Southeast_A: Dota 2 teams will get the chance to win as much as $750 every month. Go4Dota2 weekly cups occur every Sunday.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bestowments_of_the_Divine: 包含昆卡的“圣锚之赐”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bestowments_of_t: Contains all of the items in the 'Bestowments of the Divine Anchor' set for Kunkka plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodrage_Axe: 在欧梅克斯的试炼战场上，战败者的武器将被他们的对手缴获。这把血怒之斧是布拉德瓦登纪念他第100场胜利时带走的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloodrage_Axe: On the proving grounds of Omex, the victorious have right to the weapons of any warrior they vanquish.  This Bloodrage Axe was taken by the Bradwarden in remembrance of his 100th victory.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cadenza_Magic_Master: 这件捆绑包内含祈求者的“魔法巨匠”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面和熔炉精灵相赠。此物品是与LGD-Gaming战队联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cadenza_Magic_Ma: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Cadenza Magic Master' set for Invoker plus loading screen and custom forge spirit. These items were created in partnership with LGD-Gaming, who receive a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cicatrix_Regalia: 包含司夜刺客的“叶痕徽记”套装内所有物品，内有4种不同款式：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cicatrix_Regalia: Includes all items in the 'Cicatrix Regalia' set for Nyx Assassin and includes 4 different styles:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Artisan_of_Havoc: 包含发条技师的“浩劫之匠”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Artisan_: Contains all of the items in the 'Artisan of Havoc' set for Clockwerk plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dragonfire: 包含莉娜的“炎龙之焰”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dragonfi: Contains all of the items in the 'Dragonfire' set for Lina plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Coveted_Arms_Cache: 这件捆绑包内含数件“神往之兵”：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Coveted_Arms_Cac: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Coveted Arms Cache':
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystal_Dryad: 如果那位古代法师知道他的神杖将会对世界造成这样的侵蚀，他一定会将其焚毁，并进行掩埋，再在上面撒上盐完成诅咒。阿哈利姆神杖如果落入石头之手，将会释放出水晶妖藤的精魂，敌人将无一幸免。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystal_Dryad: Had the ancient mage but known what corruption his scepter would inflict upon the world, he would have burned and buried it, and sown salt over its cursed grave.  For when carried in a fist of stone, Aghanim's scepter unleashes the spirit of the Crystal Dryad, and no foe is safe.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystal_Scavenger: 包含米波的“晶石搜寻者”套装内所有物品以及技能图标和载入画面。以上物品是与Fnatic战队联合创建，每售出一套战队都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crystal_Scavenge: Contains all of the items in the 'Crystal Scavenger' set for Meepo including ability icons and loading screen. These items were created in conjunction with Team Fnatic, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Angel: 这件捆绑包内含痛苦女王的“邪恶天使”套装内所有物品。此物品是与选手SOLO联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Angel: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Dark Angel' set for Queen of Pain. These items were created in partnership with SOLO, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Reef_Escape: 这件捆绑包内含斯拉克的“暗黑之礁逃犯”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。此物品是与Empire战队联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Reef_Escape: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Dark Reef Escape' set for Slark plus loading screen. These items were created in partnership with Team Empire, who receive a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Diabolical_Appendages: 这些恶魔附器实为梦魇之物，蕴含着最为污秽的邪恶魔法，单凭外相就足以让人陷入癫狂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Diabolical_Appen: A demon magic most foul, these diabolical appendages are the stuff of nightmares, and have driven many to madness just by their appearance.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragonfire: 包含莉娜的“炎龙之焰”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragonfire: Contains all of the items in the 'Dragonfire' set for Lina plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragons_Ascension: 这件捆绑包内含龙骑士的“神龙飞升”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragons_Ascensio: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Dragon's Ascension' set for Dragon Knight plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Elixir_of_Dragons_breath: 由千年龙血的精华酿造而成，这桶罕有的佳酿保证会让你入口后胸口着火。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Elixir_of_Dragon: Fermented from the concentrate of thousand-year-old Dragon's blood, this rare elixir is guaranteed to put hair on your chest.  And then set fire to that hair.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Everlasting_Heat: 包含莉娜的“热力永恒”套装内所有物品。此物品是与选手DD联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Everlasting_Heat: Includes all of the items in the 'Everlasting Heat' set for Lina. These items were created in partnership with DD, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Forge_Warrior: 包含发条技师的“熔炉战士”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Forge_Warrior: Contains all of the items in the 'Forge Warrior' set for Clockwerk plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Furious_Rune: 什么时候剑成了符文，什么时候符文又成了剑？斯温都朝你脑袋劈来了你还有空想这种问题！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Furious_Rune: When is a rune a sword, and a sword a rune?  This is not a question you worry about when Sven swings this at your head.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Geodesic_Eidolon: 虚灵体的创造环境千奇百怪。有些是在宇宙中连光也无法逃脱的暗黑中心由奇异的重力所创造。就像横穿扭曲空间的直线一样，他们将为你的敌人提供最短的死路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Geodesic_Eidolon: Not all eidolons are created equal.  Some are forged of strange gravities in the dark heart of the universe where even light cannot escape.  Like lines across curved space, they provide the shortest distance to your enemy's death.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavenly_General: 包含风暴之灵的“天篷元帅”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。此物品是与选手ZSMJ联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavenly_General: Contains all of the items in the 'Heavenly General' set for Storm Spirit plus a loading screen. These items were created in partnership with ZSMJ, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hunter_with_No_Name: 包含赏金猎人的“无名猎人”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。此物品是与选手Funn1k联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hunter_with_No_N: Includes all of the items in the 'Hunter with No Name' set for Bounty Hunter plus a loading screen. These items were created in partnership with Funn1k, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Infernal_Shredder: 一把来自地狱的无尽之刃，从基本法则的位面拖拽出来只为一件事：掐灭世上最后一束光。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Infernal_Shredde: A blade both infernal and timeless, pulled from the Fundamental plane with only one goal in mind: to snuff out the last light of the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Inverse_Bayonet: 一把传言四起却鲜有露面的武器。如此设计是为了应付最危急的关头，就连剑都必须全副武装的时候。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Inverse_Bayonet: A weapon long-rumored but rarely seen.  Designed for those most dangerous times when even your sword absolutely must be armed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Just_For_Fun: 128支战队将在“乐者为王”联赛中相互较量争夺500雷亚尔总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Just_For_Fun: Just For Fun pits 128 teams agains teach other competing for a prize of R$500!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_KUL_Gaming_Cup: 首届KUL电竞联赛中众多来自巴尔干地区的战队将争夺大奖！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_KUL_Gaming_Cup: The first KUL Gaming Cup has Balkan teams compete against each other for a prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_2_League_Seaso: Nexon在2014年与KeSPA和SPOTV合作启动了KDL联赛第2赛季。整个KDL联赛将有四个赛季，总奖金6亿5千万韩元（60万5千美金）。捆绑包内含守卫“骑士之像”和斯拉克的套装“深海恶徒”！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_2_Lea: Nexon presents the second season of KDL with SpotTV and KeSPA. Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier.  The KDL spans four seasons with a total of KRW 6.5million ($6,370) worth of prize money. Bundle includes the Knight Statue ward and Deep Sea Scoundrel Slark set!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_2_League_Seaso: Nexon在2014年与KeSPA和SPOTV合作启用了全新联赛。整个KDL联赛将有四个赛季，总奖金6亿5千万韩元（60万5千美金）。购买门票来观看第一赛季第一二级的10支强队一较高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_2_Lea: Nexon presents the second of KDL with SpoTV and KeSPA, Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier. The KDL spans four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million ($638,506) worth of prize money. Watch the very second season of its kind featuring the top 10 teams in tier 1 and 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mechjaw_the_Boxhound: 在紫罗兰高原上的实验室里，两名工程师在进行穿越位面的科学试验，在此期间他们设计了一台设备，用于储存和保护他们最最珍贵的珍宝。如果他们后来不是被难以言状的恐惧所吞噬，那绝对会成为一代土豪！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mechjaw_the_Boxh: Between their experiments in transdimensional science, a pair of engineers in the facility atop the Violet Plateau designed a device to store and protect their most valuable valuables. Had those engineers not been eaten by indescribable horrors, they surely would have become rich!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Might_of_the_Old_World: 采用星体位面的魔力合金打造的头盔，这样上古巨神就能更好地引导他的游魂，操控他破碎灵魂的两个方面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Might_of_the_Old: A helm forged of enchanted alloys deep in the Astral plane, so that Elder Titan might better channel his Sprit and control both aspects of his broken soul.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mystic_Instruments_of_Tan: 这件捆绑包内含暗影萨满的“灵媒秘器”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mystic_Instrumen: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Mystic Instruments of Tang-Ki' set for Shadow Shaman plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Oculopus: 从遥远的古代开始，为了更好地了解周围的世界和他们在宇宙中的地位，章鱼们致力于天文学研究，然而他们长期不得要领。有一天，一片神圣科技的物事从上天诸神那飘落，这份圣洁的礼物能解开世界的秘密，研究因此迎来了重大突破。就这样，暴眼章鱼声名鹊起，他变得家喻户晓，成为了最伟大的水下天文学家。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Oculopus: Long-thwarted in their astrological studies, Octopi have since time immemorial sought to better understand the world around them and their place in the larger universe.  The breakthrough came when a powerful piece of divine technology drifted down from the gods above, an anointed gift, that the secrets of the world be unlocked.  Thus did Oculopus rise to prominence, the greatest underwater astronomer that the world had ever known.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pale_Mausoleum: 挽歌自地底呼号而上。它的召唤无人能挡，黑暗和冰冷是它的音符。万物都逃不过它的魔力，无论是暴君还是平民，战士还是巫师。挽歌将夺去一切生灵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pale_Mausoleum: The dirge howls from the deep. Its call is irresistible, its song a melody of dark and cold. All will fall under the spell, be they tyrant or peasant, soldier or thief. The dirge shall claim.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pudgling: 他们说小伙子吃得饱就会笑呵呵。那是他们没遇见过帕吉。如果你在路上想要吃一口的零食，那帕吉正好有哦。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pudgling: There's them that says a well-fed lad's a happy lad.  They never met Pudge.  If it's a bite-sized snack for the road you want, he's got just the thing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Relic_Sword: 就像残疾的战士感觉失去的肢体依然健在，这把圣者遗物也是如此，渴望还能再添杀戮。只有鲜血能让它满足。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Relic_Sword: As a maimed warrior might scratch an itch on a phantom limb, so too the Relic Sword has its own itch to scratch.  And only blood will satisfy.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Static_Lord: 包含干扰者的“静电之主”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Static_Lord: Includes all of the items in the 'Static Lord' set for Disruptor including a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Witch_Hunter: 包含敌法师的“巫师猎手”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。此物品是与Navi战队联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Witch_Hunter: This bundle contains all of the items in 'The Witch Hunter' set for Anti-Mage plus loading screen. These items were created in partnership with Navi, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Timberthaw: 包含伐木机的“天木梭”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。此物品是与选手iceiceice联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Timberthaw: Contains all of the items in the 'Timberthaw' item set for Timbersaw plus loading screen. These items were created in partnership with iceiceice, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Deep: 包含娜迦海妖的“深海奇珍”套装内所有物品。此物品是与选手Arteezy联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: Includes all of the items in the 'Treasure of the Deep' set for Naga Siren. These items were created in partnership with Arteezy, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Shattered: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含单件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Sunken_Ma: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内包含单件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Twin_Blades_Assassin: 包含赏金猎人的“双刀刺客”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。此物品是与选手YYF联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Twin_Blades_Assa: Includes all of the items in the 'Twin Blades' set for Bounty Hunter plus a loading screen. These items were created in partnership with YYF, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WarVestments_of_the_Magno: 这件捆绑包内含马格纳斯的“半人犀牛战袍”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WarVestments_of_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'War-Vestments of the Magnoceri' set for Magnus plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_White_Sentry: 守卫的制作对于任何打造法器的工匠来说都是件大事。尽管莉莱她最终的爱好变成了战场上的法术，她很早就发现自己具备成为天才匠师的本领。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_White_Sentry: The construction of a ward is considered a rite of passage for any aspiring artificer of magical goods. Though her interests eventually turned toward combat sorcery, Rylai discovered early that she had the skill required to become a talented artificer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_compendium_emoticons_unlo: 马上打开国际邀请赛互动指南奖励的25个聊天表情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_compendium_emoti: Unlocks the 25 emoticons earned via the International Compendium.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Hunter_with_No_Name_L: Hunter with No Name Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Lord_of_the_Scouring_Dunes_Loa: 沙丘之蚀君主载入画面
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Lord_of_the_Scouring_: Lord of the Scouring Dunes Loading Screen

Mentor of the High Plains Great Cuirass

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLeague_Seas: 华硕ROG梦幻联赛第1赛季由华硕ROG，ROCCAT和TV6赞助。比赛从2014年3月3日开始，世界顶尖战队经过84场比赛后将淘汰产生2014年DreamHack夏季联赛的参赛战队，去争夺10万美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLe: ASUS ROG DreamLeague Season 1 is sponsored by ASUS ROG, ROCCAT & TV6. Starting on March 3rd, 2014 of the world's best teams will compete in 84 league matches and the playoffs at DreamHack Summer 2014 for a $100,000 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aiyou_Joy_League: 爱游欢乐联赛是一项免门票观看的赛事，由爱游DOTA2小组发起，面向所有DOTA2精英玩家开放报名，详请请查看爱游DOTA2小组置顶内容。同时爱游还将定期邀请大神、职业玩家举办友谊赛活动。本次比赛将会免费开放观看。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aiyou_Joy_League: The Aiyou Joy League is a free league to spectate event where all players are encouraged to participate!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bladesrunner: Contains all of the items in the 'Bladesrunner' set for Juggernaut:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_5: CEVO联赛第5赛季是一项北美职业赛事，众多战队将在为期8周的常规赛季中同台竞技，然后在淘汰赛中争夺超过1000美元的奖金和直接晋级未来赛季的机会。捆绑包内含主宰的“刀锋行者”套装，同时每售出一张门票总奖金将增加1.25美元！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_5: CEVO Season 5 is a North American Pro-Am event where teams compete in an 8-week regular season, followed by Playoffs for over $1,000 and the chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons. Bundle includes the Bladesrunner Juggernaut set and gives $1.25 to the prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_5_Ticket: CEVO联赛第5赛季是一项北美职业赛事，众多战队将在为期8周的常规赛季中同台竞技，然后在淘汰赛中争夺超过1000美元的奖金和直接晋级未来赛季的机会。这张门票只允许你观看CEVO联赛第5赛季，不包括附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_5_Ti: CEVO Season 5 is a North American Pro-Am event where teams compete in an 8-week regular season, followed by Playoffs for over $1,000 and the chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons. This ticket only gives you access to view games from CEVO Season 5.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_World_Splitt: This bundle contains all of the items in 'The World Splitter' set for Elder Titan plus loading screen. These items were created in partnership with BuLba, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Torneos_Dota_Latino_Seaso: 64支南美战队将在TDL的第二赛季中争夺450美元的奖金！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Tears: 就像变体精灵能同时存在于凡间和星际这两个位面一样——泪水之刃是一把变化多端的武器，既为虚无又非虚无。只有亡者的泪水才是真实的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blade_of_Tears: Just as Morphling exists on two planes at once--both terrene and astral--the blade of tears is a weapon of extreme versatility, both ethereal and not.  Only the tears of the slain are real.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_DreamHack_Buchare: 4支来自世界各地的Dota 2顶尖战队将在2014年DreamHack布加勒斯特邀请赛中将决一死战。基础奖金为25000美元，每售出一张门票都会增加2.50美元！这件捆绑包内含2014年DreamHack布加勒斯特邀请赛的观战资格和幻影长矛手的“崇高战士”套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_DreamHac: Four of the top Dota 2 teams from around the word compete during the DreamHack Bucharest 2014 Invitiational Tournament. The base prize pool is $25,000 and increased by $2.50 for each ticket sold! This ticket only gives you access to view games from DreamHack Bucharest 2014.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_DreamHack_Buchare: 4支来自世界各地的Dota 2顶尖战队将在2014年DreamHack布加勒斯特邀请赛中将决一死战。这件捆绑包内含2014年DreamHack布加勒斯特邀请赛的观战资格和幻影长矛手的“崇高战士”套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_DreamHac: Four of the top Dota 2 teams from around the word compete during the DreamHack Bucharest 2014 Invitiational Tournament. This bundle gives you access to view games from DreamHack Bucharest 2014 and the Noble Warrior Phantom Lancer Set.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Wolf_Hunter: 包含德鲁伊的“屠狼猎士”套装内所有物品，更有熊灵，熊形态和载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_The_Wolf: Contains all of the items in 'The Wolf Hunter' set for Lone Druid plus Spirit Bear, True Form and loading screens.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dormant_2014_Compendium_G:
当一切尘埃落定，年度冠军加冕后，这颗宝石将与一个聊天表情一同觉醒，上面将彰显你对国际邀请赛做出的贡献，镌刻互动指南的等级。宝石的种类将由邀请赛结束时互动指南的等级决定：
- 黄铜 1级
- 青铜 10级
- 白银 25级
- 黄金 50级
- 白金 100级
- 钻石 500级
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dormant_2014_Com:
Once the dust has settled and the new champions have emerged, this gem will awaken alongside an emoticon to show off your support of The International and the competitors by displaying your Compendium level.  It will increase in prestige as your Compendium does:
	- Copper at Level 1
	- Bronze at Level 10
	- Silver at Level 25
	- Gold at Level 50
	- Platinum at Level 100
	- Diamond at Level 500
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Wall_Totem: 大地生之，大地灭之。经过地岩的不断挤压，万物都将化为尘埃。远在不可考的时代，强大的石巨人建造了众多城市。而现在皆已变成绵延不绝的卵石之海。石海中央裂开了一条巨大的沟壑，里面是无数石巨人的碎石遗骸。如今只有一根石柱的其中一段依然在纪念这个远古文明的消亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Wall_Tote: That which the strength of earth may create, the strength of earth may destroy, chewed into dust by shifting rock. Where once, in a time before knowledge of time, great stone giants built their cities, now lies an endless sea of pebbles. At its center yawns a great fissure, filled with the gravel remains of the countless many. Only a single segment of a single pillar remains to mark a grave for this ancient civilization.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Empyrean: 天怒一族中流传着莎尔德拉的传奇，她的翅膀黝黑，不顾众人的劝阻向黑暗的苍穹飞去，一心想要遇见天上的诸神。后来她回来了，翅膀上的羽毛变成了金色，手上还拿着九天玄杖，这把神杖让她在空中异常耀眼。据说她在位的时间长达一千又一年。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empyrean: 'Tis told among Skywrath-kind the legend of Shaldera, a being of black wing who in hubris flew into the darker skies hoping to meet the heavenly lords above. She who returned did so upon golden feathers, bearing the divine spear Empyrean, a symbol of her flight. It is said her kingdom endured for a thousand years and one.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Skadi: 在深渊的沉没之牢里，斯拉克挖到了这把斯嘉蒂之刃。这把神秘的大刀让他看到了越狱的希望，并且在越狱途中帮助他打败了敌人。从此以后，斯嘉蒂之刃和斯拉克一同在世上无从追寻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Skadi: In the depth of Sunken Prison, Slark once dug up this Skadi Blade. This mysterious weapon gave him hope of escape from Sunken and power to defeat enemy on the escape way. Since then, Skadi Blade and Slark disappeared together in world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flourishing_Lodestar: 在原初之林的树荫下，清澈的溪流，散发着温暖的大地。翠绿的丛林里精灵们忙碌着修修补补，年迈的生命藉由他们焕然一新。北极星正是寻找常年没有长大的树苗，取其枝条雕刻而成，它将帮助大自然中友善的仆人指引、治疗并保护受到珍视的一切。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flourishing_Lode: In the shade of the first trees, water runs clear, and the earth radiates a gentle warmth. The spirits of the verdant wild coil about, endlessly mending, and eternally twisting old life into new. From the boughs of these elder saplings was carved the Lodestar, a tool to aid nature's benevolent servants so that they may guide, heal, and preserve all that must be held dear.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Genuine_Shadow_Flame: 包含戴泽的“暗影之焰”套装内所有物品，更有头巾的额外款式和载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Genuine_Shadow_F: Includes all of the items in the 'Shadow Flame' set for Dazzle plus an additional style for the Headdress and loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lamb_to_the_Slaughter: 这段咒语是很久以前由法师发明，用于对抗失眠，吟唱过后能使人马上开始数绵羊，不过数来数去都只有一只。暗影萨满只需轻轻挥动手里的神杖，念出这段咒语就能让最凶恶的狼也披上羊皮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lamb_to_the_Slau: Invented long ago as a way to combat insomnia, this spell will have you counting sheep in no time.  Provided you can only count to one.  With a wave of his wand, Shadow Shaman can clad even the deadliest wolf in sheep's clothing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Manias_Mask: 在广袤的丛林中徘徊徜徉，心中明白自己孤苦伶仃，亲生父母将自己抛弃，抚养之人把自己遗忘，又不愿被乐善好施之人所发现...这是一条通向疯狂的路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Manias_Mask: To wander the woods knowing you are alone, an orphan of those who birthed you, rejected by those who raised you, hidden from those who might give warmth and comfort... this is a path to madness.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Punctured_Crest: 面对狭窄迷宫的守卫也敢抬头那就是拒绝接受轮回。而世上就是有人反抗自己的命运，对施刑之人进行抗争，最终落得更加悲惨的下场。他们用不了多久就会发现自己在最黑暗的冥河上飘摇，生生世世都只能在此徘徊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Punctured_Crest: To face the guardians of the Narrow Maze is to deny eternity itself. Yet there are those who would dare defy their fate and strike at the source of their torment, only to be thrown down time and again. These insolent few may soon find themselves flung to the darkest reaches of the herebetween, and left to wander fateless, for all eternity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Soul_Diffuser: 这把武器将会郑重地介绍她，死亡之使。身怀你临终的恐惧，她会让你肉体黯淡，五脏俱灭，魂魄四散。她一闪而过，你的灵魂无以维系，你的肉体因此解放，你也终于窥得终极奥秘的真谛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Soul_Diffuser: By this blade shall you know her, bringer of death, bearer of your final moments of mortal terror.  She who renders your soul diffuse, your body lifeless dark, mere meat and viscera.  In a flash of movement, she slices your soul's tether, and frees you to learn the truth of the last great mystery.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Newbee: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_New: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_Champions_: Dota 2冠军联赛第2赛季的10支参赛队伍来自欧洲和北美，将争夺5万美元的奖金。这张门票只允许你观看Dota 2冠军联赛，并不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Dota_2_C: Champions League Season 2 will feature 10 top teams from Europe and North America fighting for $50,000! This ticket only gives you access to view games in the Dota 2 Champion's League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pale_Mausoleum: 挽歌自地底呼号而上。它的召唤无人能挡，黑暗和冰冷是它的音符。万物都逃不过它的魔力，无论是暴君还是平民，战士还是巫师。挽歌将夺去一切生灵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Pale_Mau: The dirge howls from the deep. Its call is irresistable, its song a melody of dark and cold. All will fall under the spell, be they tyrant or peasant, soldier or thief. The dirge shall claim.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure_of_the_S: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内含散件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Doomling: 末日小子在此，一直燃烧又不会殆尽的信使。身材略显不足，但身为黑暗的炽热之主路西法这不算什么。有末日小子做你的信使，你的末日马上到了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Doomling: Fear Doomling, the courier who burns and is not consumed.  What he lacks in size, he makes up for by being Lucifer, fiery lord of Darkness.  For One such as Doomling, being your courier is hell.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hwytty__Shyzzyrd: “这次来迟绝对是意外！”年老的骑手大声的说，但是他的话并没有使身受诅咒的妻子减少丝毫的不快。而就在一瞬间，这对始终拖拉的搭档发现双方互换了身体！尽管浑身都是毛病，现在老迈的基拉必须背上沉重的行囊。一看这顶魔法帽就知道家里到底是谁做主！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hwytty__Shyzzyrd: \"We encountered unexpected delays!\" the old rider croaked, but his words did nothing to lessen the curse-wife's displeasure. In an instant, the perpetually tardy partnership found itself vendor-swapped! Despite his many infirmities, the elder Hwytty must now strap on Shyzzyrd's saddlebags. And it's plain to see who wears the magic hat in this relationship!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Virtus_Werebear: 这只拥有多种款式的信使是与Virtus.Pro战队联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Virtus_Werebear: This courier includes multiple styles and was created in partnership with Virtus.Pro, who receives a portion of every purchase.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Titan: 购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。另外，装备锦旗后，在观看支持队伍参加的客户端内赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。本战队锦旗能和其他赛事的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总数量。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Tit: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Doomling: 末日小子在此，一直燃烧又不会殆尽的信使。身材略显不足，但身为黑暗的炽热之主路西法这不算什么。有末日小子做你的信使，你的末日马上到了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Doomling: Fear Doomling, the courier who burns and is not consumed.  What he lacks in size, he makes up for by being Lucifer, fiery lord of Darkness.  For One such as Doomling, being your courier is hell.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Empyrean: 天怒一族中流传着莎尔德拉的传奇，她的翅膀黝黑，不顾众人的劝阻向黑暗的苍穹飞去，一心想要遇见天上的诸神。后来她回来了，翅膀上的羽毛变成了金色，手上还拿着九天玄杖，这把神杖让她在空中异常耀眼。据说她在位的时间长达一千又一年。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Empyrean: 'Tis told among Skywrath kind the legend of Shaldera, a being of black wing who in hubris flew into the darker skies hoping to meet the heavenly lords above. She who returned did so upon golden feathers, bearing the divine spear Empyrean a symbol of her flight. It is said her kingdom lasted for a thousand years and one.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Gravelmaw: 大地生之，大地灭之。经过地岩的不断挤压，万物都将化为尘埃。远在不可考的时代，强大的石巨人建造了众多城市。而现在皆已变成绵延不绝的卵石之海。石海中央裂开了一条巨大的沟壑，里面是无数石巨人的碎石遗骸。如今只有一根石柱的其中一段依然在纪念这个远古文明的消亡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Gravelma: That which the strength of earth may create, the strength of earth may destroy, chewed into dust by shifting rock. Where once, in a time before knowledge of time, great stone giants built their cities, now lies an endless sea of pebbles. At its center yawns a great fissure, filled with the gravel remains of the countless many. Only a single segment of a single pillar remains to mark a grave for this ancient civilization.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lamb_to_the_Slaug: 这段咒语是很久以前由法师发明，用于对抗失眠，吟唱过后能使人马上开始数绵羊，不过数来数去都只有一只。暗影萨满只需轻轻挥动手里的神杖，念出这段咒语就能让最凶恶的狼也披上羊皮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lamb_to_: Invented long ago as a way to combat insomnia, this spell will have you counting sheep in no time.  Provided you can only count to one.  With a wave of his wand, Shadow Shaman can clad even the deadliest wolf in sheep's clothing.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Severing_Crest: 面对狭窄迷宫的守卫也敢抬头那就是拒绝接受轮回。而世上就是有人反抗自己的命运，对施刑之人进行抗争，最终落得更加悲惨的下场。他们用不了多久就会发现自己在最黑暗的冥河上飘摇，生生世世都只能在此徘徊。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Severing: To face the guardians of the Narrow Maze is to deny eternity itself. Yet there are those who would dare defy their fate and strike at the source of their torment, only to be thrown down time and again. These insolent few may soon find themselves flung to the darkest reaches of the herebetween, and left to wander fateless, for all eternity.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frull: 这是什么奇葩的野兽？哈，这是弗拉尔— 忠实的四蹄搬运工。虽然并非人类但她的确是淑女，而你的东西对她来说根本就是鸿毛！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frull: What strange beast is this? Why, it's Frull--faithful four- footed freighter of mercantile wares. She may be a beast but she's also a lady, and your goods are never a burden to her!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Pale_Mausoleum: 挽歌自地底呼号而上。它的召唤无人能挡，黑暗和冰冷是它的音符。万物都逃不过它的魔力，无论是暴君还是平民，战士还是巫师。挽歌将夺去一切生灵。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Pale_Maus: The dirge howls from the deep. Its call is irresistible, its song a melody of dark and cold. All will fall under the spell, be they tyrant or peasant, soldier or thief. The dirge shall claim.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Splattering_Forcipule: 基迪岛上最黑暗的丛林恰恰是可怕生物的乐园。作为多足节虫家族的远亲，飞溅钳棘多见于潮湿的裂缝或者树根的间隙。他们自出生后就不会移动，如果有生物不识相向他们靠近，他们会对其射出致命的毒液，用不了多久就会毒发身亡，死后毒液还有帮助消化的功能。倒霉鬼死去后，遗骸会不断降解，被身下的土地快速吸收，这样钳棘在地下盘旋的根须还能对养分进行二次吸收。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Splattering_Forc: The darkest wilds of Jidi Isle are home to wondrous horrors. A distant relative to the Spitterpede family, the Splattering Forcipule can often be found growing in damp crevices or between the roots of trees. They will spend their entire lives bound to a single location, and the toxic venom they eject upon any creature foolish enough wander nearby is often more than sufficient to poison the hapless victim, as well as begin its digestion. Once this poor soul expires, their melting remains are quickly absorbed into the earth where they fall, allowing the Forcipule's subterranean root-tendrils to absorb the nutrients.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Swift_Claw: 逃离他的愤怒很容易。将他回荡的咆哮抛诸脑后也不难。然后你逃到了一片空地上，或者峡谷里，看不到追杀之人的踪影，以为自己已经安全了。结果突然间，他的利爪找到了你，然后就没有然后了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Swift_Claw: You may flee from his rage. You may leave his echoing roar far behind. And you may think yourself safe, perhaps in a clearing or canyon, with no sign of your pursuer. Then, suddenly, his claws find you, and it is the last you know.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternal_Machine_Head: 这个可怜的生意人怪他的工具无法用于战斗，但事实上商场就是战场，工具则是战斗中的命根。正是因为这个原因，瑞托崔普早已着手将他自己转变为族人前所未见的最强大的战争道具。通过数年不间断的自我修炼，他最终获得了最具毁灭性的的力量，踏上战场的他被称为永恒机械。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternal_Machine_: Tis a poor tradesman who blames his tools, but when your tradecraft is warfare, your tools take on a particular importance.  For this reason, Rattletrap long ago set out to transform himself into a the greatest tool of warfare that the keen folk had ever known.  Constantly improving himself over the course of many years, he has now finally reached the pinnacle of destructive power, stepping onto the battlefield as the Eternal Machine.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Empyrean: 天怒一族中流传着莎尔德拉的传奇，她的翅膀黝黑，不顾众人的劝阻向黑暗的苍穹飞去，一心想要遇见天上的诸神。后来她回来了，翅膀上的羽毛变成了金色，手上还拿着九天玄杖，这把神杖让她在空中异常耀眼。据说她在位的时间长达一千又一年。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Empyrean: 'Tis told among Skywrath kind the legend of Shaldera, a being of black wing who in hubris flew into the darker skies hoping to meet the heavenly lords above. She who returned did so upon golden feathers, bearing the divine spear Empyrean, a symbol of her flight. It is said her kingdom endured for a thousand years and one.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Balkan_Challenger: Dota 2塞尔维亚协会为您带来巴尔干挑战赛，来自欧洲的众多战队将争夺价值800美元的奖金和罗技外设！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Balkan_Challenge: Dota 2 Serbia brings you the Balkan Challenger where teams from Europe will compete for a prize pool and Logitech Gaming Gear in value of $800!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_: 加拿大联赛又回来了！本次参赛的是来自北美和南美的精英战队。捆绑包还将附赠信使“小白熊”，现已推出冰棍球小白熊款式！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cu: The Canada Cup is back! Featuring some of the finest teams from North and South America. This bundle includes the Bearzky courier, now with added Skatestick style!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cup_Season_: 加拿大联赛又回来了！本次参赛的是来自北美和南美的精英战队。这张门票只允许你观看加拿大联赛第3赛季的比赛，并不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Canada_Cu: The Canada Cup is back! Featuring some of the finest teams from North and South America. This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Dota 2 Canada Cup Season 3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Latino_Cup_Season_: Dota 2拉丁联赛进入第2赛季，本次由DreamLive TV赞助支持，将由32支拉丁美洲的队伍争夺300美元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Latino_Cu: Dota 2 Latino enters its second season with support from DreamLive TV and will feature 32 Latin American teams competing for a grand prize of $300!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gamersportperu_Season_6: 32支战队将在秘鲁电竞联赛第6赛季中为2000新索尔一较高下！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gamersportperu_S: 32 teams will compete in the sixth season of Gamersportperu with a prize pool of 2,000 Peruvian Nuevos!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Judge_of_the_Battlefield: 包含军团指挥官的“战场主宰”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Judge_of_the_Bat: Includes all of the items in 'Judge of the Battlefield' set for Legion Commander:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Array_of_Tranquility: 这件捆绑包内含风行者的“静谧之裳”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Array_of_Tranqui: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Array of Tranquility' set for Windranger plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_4_Arcana: 至宝之战是一项线上赛事，获胜队伍将获得价值200美元的游戏内道具奖品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_4_Arcana: Battle 4 Arcana is an online tournament where winners get in game items worth $200 as a prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_Arena_Tournament: 竞技赛联赛是一项邀请性赛事。欧洲的部分顶尖业余战队将会接受邀请为200欧元的奖金一决高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_Arena_Tou: The Battle Arena Tournament is an invite only league. Some of the top amateur teams from around Europe battle for the €200 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Horns_of_Lunacy_B: 殁境神蚀者注视着神智边缘之外的远方，而他所见之物赋予了他现在的外形。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Horns_of: Outworld Devourer gazes far beyond the rim of sanity, and what he sees has shaped him.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternal_Nymph: 包含帕克的“万世之仙”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternal_Nymph: Contains all of the items in the 'Eternal Nymph' set for Puck plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Father_of_the_Forest: 包含先知的“丛林之父”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。其中武器包含模型的粒子特效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Father_of_the_Fo: Includes all of the items in the 'Father of the Forest' set for Nature's Prophet plus loading screen. The weapon includes an ambient particle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Firestarter: 包含蝙蝠骑士“纵火狂徒”套装内的所有物品，更有载入画面相赠、
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Firestarter: Contains all of the items in the 'Firestarter' set for Batrider plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flame_Bat: 纵火蝠的血液跟柏油一样浓稠，一点即燃。骑手不断拍打他的坐骑，它的血液就这样不断满足了他的需求。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flame_Bat: The Flame Bat's blood is as thick as tar and burns just as hot.The rider taps the creature's blood, harvesting it for his own fiery needs.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Grimoire_The_Book_Wyrm: 魔典小龙多年以来早已被人遗忘，而他自己则陶醉在秘湮学院图书馆里茫茫书海之中。与书为伴的他听从主人的吩咐，他也一直希望能找到再次使自己解放的咒语。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Grimoire_The_Boo: Grimoire is a long forgotten Book Wyrm, who literally lost himself studying the books in the great library of The Ultimyr Academy. Bound to the book, he does his master's bidding, forever hopeful he will find the incantation to set himself free once more.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Imperial_Relics: 包含黑暗贤者的“帝国圣物”套装内所有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Imperial_Relics: Includes all of the items in the 'Imperial Relics' set for Dark Seer plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_InterCafe_Championship__P: 网吧冠军赛将会选取十家印度的网吧举办选拔赛。选拔赛的晋级选手将参加9月27-28日举办的总决赛，争夺5万卢比的奖金和罗技的电竞外设！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_InterCafe_Champi: The Inter-Cafe Championship will take 10 cafes from India to participate in qualifiers. The winners from the qualifiers will take part in the grand finals on September 27-28th for 50,000 INR and Logitech Gaming Gear!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NADota_Elite_League_Augus: 北美最具天赋的选手将在传统内战赛制下进行为期四周的鏖战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NADota_Elite_Lea: The most talented players in North America compete in the classic inhouse league format for four weeks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ossetia_Open_Cup_Season_1: 众多战队将在首届奥赛梯公开联赛中争夺5万卢布的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ossetia_Open_Cup: Teams will compete in the first Ossetia Open Cup for a prize pool of 50,000 Rubles!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Prime_DX_Dota_2_Master_To: DX Indonesia Dota 2联赛已经进入第三赛季。联赛由印度尼西亚16支顶尖战队参加，他们将争夺1000美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Prime_DX_Dota_2_: The third series of DX Indonesia Dota 2 Tournament. The tournament consists of 16 top teams in Indonesia and will compete for $1000 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_2014_Season_3: 32支南美战队将在SDL的第三个赛季中争夺2000雷亚尔的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_2014_Season_: 32 teams from South America will compete for a prize pool of R$2,000 in the third season of the SDL!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Children_of_Verodicia: 在丛林中第一批降临的生命中，这些活泼的树精自远古以来就已在先知身旁。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Children_of_: Amongst the first born of the forest, these spry treants have been with the Prophet since time immemorial.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Emerald_D: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内含散件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wandering_Harlequins_Rega: 包含拉比克的“小丑华服”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。其中武器包含模型和攻击弹道的粒子特效以及特殊的攻击动作。所有物品分别包含一个技能图标。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wandering_Harleq: Contains all of the items in the 'Wandering Harlequin's Regalia' set for Rubick plus loading screen. The weapon includes ambient and attack particles and an attack animation. All items include an ability icon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_World_Esports_Championshi: 2014世界电子竞技冠军赛是一项职业电子竞技联赛，由帝霸网络科技有限公司主办。线下总决赛将于中国杭州的黄龙体育馆举办，众多战队将争夺超过15万美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_World_Esports_Ch: The World Esport Championships 2014 is a professional e-sports tournament organized by D8TV. The Grand Finals will take place in the city of Hangzhou, China and teams will compete for a prize pool over $150,000.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Father_of_the_Forest_: Father of the Forest Loading Screen
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_InterCafe_Championshi: Inter-Cafe Championship - Powered by Logitech G
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Ossetia_Open_Cup_Season_1: 奥赛梯公开联赛第1赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: Nexon携手SpotTV和KeSPA联合推出韩国Dota联赛第3赛季。参赛队伍将进入对应级别的比赛。韩国Dota联赛横跨四个赛季，总奖金达到6.5亿韩元（折合60.5万美元）。观看甲级和乙级的前十战队奋勇拼搏！捆绑包内含信使“死亡信徒”！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: Nexon presents the third season of KDL with SpotTV and KeSPA. Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier. The KDL will span four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million (USD $605,000) prize pool. Watch the very second season of its kind featuring the top 10 teams in tier 1 and 2! Bundle includes the Boooofus courier!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: Nexon与SpotTV和KeSPA联合奉献KDL第3赛季。各战队将分别参加相应级别比赛。KDL四个赛季总奖金高达6.5亿韩元（约合605,000美元）。敬请关注十支顶尖战队的甲级联赛！此门票仅用于观看韩国Dota联赛第3赛季的比赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: Nexon presents the third season of KDL with SpotTV and KeSPA. Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier. The KDL will span four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million (USD $605,000) prize pool. Watch the very second season of its kind featuring the top 10 teams in tier 1 and 2! This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Korea Dota League Season 3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Tier_3_: Dota 2 KDL乙级联赛由AMD Dota 2业余联赛和PC bang联赛组成。乙级联赛的顶尖队伍将获得KDL的积分奖励，并有机会进入甲级联赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: Dota 2 KDL Tier 3 is composed of AMD Dota 2 Amateur League and PC bang League. The best teams in Tier 3 leagues will receive KDL Tier points and have chance to advance to Tier 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_joinDOTA_League_Season_3: Dota 2全球赛事，面向所有玩家！激烈的比赛中不乏高手的顶尖对决，也有业余战队的精彩过招。每售出一张门票奖金都将增加1.00美元！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_joinDOTA_League_: The global Dota 2 league for everyone. Featured are all of the matches from division 1 and 2. There are three leagues: Europe, America, and Asia. The top 10 from each league meet in the premier division. $1.00 from each ticket purchased will go directly into the prizepool.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Aorus_Corsair_Dota_2_: Aorus Corsair Dota 2 Clash by NGL
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Aorus_Corsair_Dota_2_Clas: 由NAG电竞联盟（NGL）主办的Aorus海盗船Dota 2大战是一项分成4个阶段的线上赛事，晋级队伍最终将在非洲最大的游戏展上进行总决赛！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Aorus_Corsair_Do: The Aorus Corsair Dota 2 Clash hosted by the NAG Gaming League is 4 online qualifiers followed by the LAN Grand Final at Africa's Biggest Gaming Expo and LAN!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CSPL_Dota_2_Pro_League: CSPL Dota 2职业联赛的首个赛季中来自俄罗斯的顶尖选手将争夺神圣的冠军头衔！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CSPL_Dota_2_Pro_: The first season of the CSPL Dota 2 Pro League has top players from Russia compete to become champions!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Defense_of_the_Australian: 第3赛季将是公开选拔赛，64支来自澳大利亚周围的战队将一较高下。排名前八的队伍将会晋级，与第2赛季的前八队伍会师，争夺澳大利亚冠军战队的头衔。这张门票只允许你观看守卫澳大利亚第3赛季联赛，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Defense_of_the_A: Season 3 brings you an open qualifier with 64 teams from around Australia competing against each other. The top eight teams advance to battle the top eight teams from Season 2 to claim the title as the #1 team in Australia. This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Defense of the Australians Season 3 League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Community_Crackdow: “社区之争”联赛第2赛季是一项由玩家社区组织的比赛，面向新西兰的广大业余队伍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Community: The Community Crackdown Tournament #2 is a community driven tournament for amateur teams in New Zealand.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Kings_of_LAN: Game Edge将在斯里兰卡举办“线下王者”联赛。众多业余战队将为大奖一争高下！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Kings_of_: Game Edge hosts the Kings of LAN in Sri Lanka. Amateur teams will compete for a prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flux_Dota_2_Tournament: Flux Dota 2联赛中64支战队将争夺超过950美元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flux_Dota_2_Tour: Flux Dota 2 Tournament is a Dota 2 Competition consisting of 64 teams competing for a prize pool of over $950!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GEMplay_Challenge_Season_: GEMplay挑战赛第2赛季将由巴尔干地区的顶尖战队争夺2000欧元！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GEMplay_Challeng: GEMplay Challenge Season 2 puts the best teams from the Balkan region against each other for 2000 Euros!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GrossuCup_Season_1: 来自南美的众多战队将在GrossCup联赛的首个赛季中争夺450美元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GrossuCup_Season: Teams from South America will compete in the first  season of the GrossuCup for a prize pool of $450!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Indonesia_Game_Show_2014_: 印度尼西亚游戏展上将举办奖金达到600美元的Dota 2联赛，联赛冠军将代表印度尼西亚参加于菲律宾宿务岛举办的2014年国际电竞联盟亚洲冠军赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Indonesia_Game_S: The Indonesia Game Show hosts a Dota 2 tournament where the prize pool is $600 and the champion of this tournament will represent Indonesia in IeSF Asia Championshiop Cebu 2014.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_OnArt_Cup: 首届OnArt联赛中64支战队将分成16组，争夺4000雷亚尔的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_OnArt_Cup: The first OnArt Cup will have 64 teams divided into 16 groups fighting for a prize pool of R$ 4.000,00!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SCL_New_Star_Tournament: 星云联赛的全新项目，比赛为期4周，将分成2个水平！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SCL_New_Star_Tou: The new tournament from the Star Cloud League. The event is 4 weeks of Dota matches at 2 skill levels!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_vg_Masters: 这是一项业余赛事，来自4chan's /vg/论坛的战队将决一死战，看谁才是/vg/ dota社区的终极冠军！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_vg_Masters: An amateur league in which teams from 4chan's /vg/ board face off against each other to see who is the ultimate champion of the /vg/ dota community!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_UCL_Moscow_Cup: 来自莫斯科各大高校的莘莘学子将在首届高校线上联赛中共同争夺50000卢布的大奖！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_UCL_Moscow_Cup: Students from varies universities in Moscow will compete in the first season of the University Cyber League for 50,000 Rubles!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_CZSK_Dota_2_League_Season_2: Dota 2捷克斯洛伐克联赛第2赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_CZSK_Dota_2_League_Season_2_Ti: Dota 2捷克斯洛伐克联赛第2赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CZSK_Dota_2_League_Season: 捷克斯洛伐克联赛第二赛季为期两个月，冠军将获得高额奖金！捆绑包内含“巨神之辉”界面皮肤！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CZSK_Dota_2_Leag: The second season of Czech-Slovakia league will take place over a two months period. The winner will receive prize money upon victory! Bundle includes the Titan HUD Skin!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CZSK_Dota_2_League_Season: 捷克-斯洛伐克联赛第二赛季为期两个月，冠军将获得高额奖金！这张门票只允许你观看捷克-斯洛伐克联赛第二赛季的比赛，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CZSK_Dota_2_Leag: The second season of Czech-Slovakia league will take place over a two months period. The winner will receive prize money upon victory! This ticket only gives you access to viewing games from the CZ-SK Dota 2 League Season 2 event.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Top_Europe_Challenge: 欧洲巅峰挑战赛采用循环赛制，来自欧洲的职业队伍将争夺1000美元的奖金！捆绑包内含守卫“先觉之眼”！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Top_Europe_Chall: The Top Europe Challenge is a round robin tournament featuring professional teams from Europe competing for a prize pool of $1,000! Bundle includes the Eye of Foresight ward!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Top_Europe_Challenge_Tick: 欧洲巅峰挑战赛采用循环赛制，来自欧洲的职业队伍将争夺1000美元的奖金！这张门票只允许你观看欧洲巅峰挑战赛，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Top_Europe_Chall: The Top Europe Challenge is a round robin tournament featuring professional teams from Europe competing for a prize pool of $1,000! This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Top Europe Challenge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_iLeague: IMBATV为您带来全新联赛，众多业余战队将有机会与全世界的顶尖战队一较高下。脱颖而出的业余战队最后将在职业战队面前证明自己的实力。晋级总决赛的8支队伍将在中国上海展开最终的对决。捆绑包内含“虚空神锤”，而且每卖出一份，总奖金都会增加2.50美金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_iLeague: IMBATV present a new league where amateur teams are able to compete with top teams from all over the world. The best teams from the amateur tournament will face the professional team. In the final stage the top 8 teams will compete in Shanghai,China. Each bundle purchased increases the prize pool by $2.50 and includes the Voidhammer!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_iLeague_Ticket: IMBATV为您带来全新联赛，众多业余战队将有机会与全世界的顶尖战队一较高下。脱颖而出的业余战队最后将在职业战队面前证明自己的实力。晋级总决赛的8支队伍将在中国上海展开最终的对决。捆绑包内含“虚空神锤”，而且每卖出一份，总奖金都会增加2.50美金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_iLeague_Ticket: IMBATV present a new league where amateur teams are able to compete with top teams from all over the world. The best teams from the amateur tournament will face the professional team. In the final stage the top 8 teams will compete in Shanghai,China. This ticket only gives you access to view games from the i-League event.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_D2TV_League_Season_2: D2TV联赛第2赛季中16支业余战队将争夺1000元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_D2TV_League_Seas: D2TV League Season 2 is an Amateur League where 16 teams will compete for a prize of 1000 Yuan.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fantasy_Season_1_Bronze_T: 梦幻刀塔第1赛季的季军奖品
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fantasy_Season_1: Prize for third place in a Fantasy Season 1 League
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fantasy_Season_1_Gold_Tro: 梦幻刀塔第1赛季的冠军奖品
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fantasy_Season_1: Prize for winning a Fantasy Season 1 League

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_Insomnia52_Dota_: Insomnia52将举办本年度最盛大的Dota 2联赛：华硕ROG Dota 2联赛。来自欧洲各地的战队将在英国最大的游戏节上决一死战，主舞台上将连续三天上演让人热血沸腾的总决赛。每支战队都需要扫清英伦王者战队之路上一切障碍，且看6500英镑花落谁家。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_Insomni: Insomnia52 hosts their biggest Dota 2 tournament of the year: the ASUS ROG Dota 2 Cup. Teams from across Europe will compete at the UKâs biggest gaming festival, bringing you three full days of heated action culminating in a Main Stage Final. With Â£6,500 on the line, each team will be pulling out all the stops to be crowned the greatest Dota 2 team in Britain.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Excellent_Moscow_Cup_Seas: 全球顶尖战队将在莫斯科豪杰联赛第2赛季中争夺6万美元的奖金！捆绑包内含酒仙的“赤龙战铠”套装！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Excellent_Moscow: The top teams in the world compete for $60,000 in the Excellent Moscow Cup Season 2! Bundle includes the Red Dragon Brewmaster set!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Excellent_Moscow_Cup_Seas: 全球顶尖战队将在莫斯科豪杰联赛第2赛季中争夺6万美元的奖金！这张门票只允许你观看莫斯科豪杰联赛第2赛季，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Excellent_Moscow: The top teams in the world compete for $60,000 in the Excellent Moscow Cup Season 2! This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Excellent Moscow Cup Season 2 league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Esports_League_Sea: 瑞典顶尖战队将在3个月的比赛中争夺3万瑞典克朗的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Esports_L: The top Swedish teams compete over 3 months for 30,000 SEK!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Liga_Dotera_Venezolana: 20支来自委内瑞拉的战队将在循环赛制下争夺250美元的总资金
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Liga_Dotera_Vene: 20 teams from Venezuela in competition in a format everyone against everyone and a prize pool of $250
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_PAGE_Esports_Club_League: PAGE电竞俱乐部联赛是印度尼西亚的全国性Dota 2联赛，众多战队将争夺600美元的总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_PAGE_Esports_Clu: PAGE Esports Club League is the Indonesia's national Dota 2 league where teams will compete for a total prize of $600!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Semipro_Cup_Series_Season: 半职业系列联赛将对北美和南美的战队开放，获胜队伍将获得现金大奖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Semipro_Cup_Seri: The Semipro Cup Series are cash prize tournaments with open registration for North and South American teams.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_VPGAME: VP菠菜网举办联赛是为了提高网站与Dota 2之间的结合度，让玩家能在联赛中同样享受Dota 2的乐趣。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_VPGAME: The purpose of the VP gambling tournament is to increase the cooperation between VP games and Dota 2 in order for users to casually enjoy the game of Dota 2 through the format of a tournament.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Excellent_Moscow_Cup_Season_2_: 莫斯科豪杰联赛第2赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hookblade_of_Skadi: 在暗黑之礁监牢的深处，斯拉克挖到了这把斯嘉蒂之刃，看上去是一名无从考察的囚犯埋下的。这把神秘的武器在他从暗黑之礁越狱的途中起到了很大的作用，一路上至少使一名准备大声呼喊的守卫闭上了嘴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hookblade_of_Ska: In the depths of Dark Reef Prison, Slark dug up this Skadi Blade, buried by some long-forgotten inmate. This mysterious weapon encouraged him in his escape from Dark Reef, and silenced at least one guardian's cry of alarm along the way.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fantasy_Ticket_Season_2: 这张门票允许你在梦幻刀塔第2赛季中设立梦幻联赛或加入他人的梦幻联赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fantasy_Ticket_S: This ticket will allow you to create a new Fantasy League or join an existing one in Fantasy Season 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Barganizer_Online_Tournam: 由Barganizer主办的首届线上联赛，来自印尼的众多业余战队将一较高下！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Barganizer_Onlin: The first online tournament organized by Barganizer for amateur teams to compete from Indonesia!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CSPL_Dota_2_League_Season: 在CSPL Dota2职业联赛第2赛季中，数以千计的选手将共同争夺奖金及冠军头衔！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CSPL_Dota_2_Leag: The second season of the CSPL Dota 2 League continues where more than a thousand different players will fight for a prize and the title of champion!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Regions: Dota地区联赛中16支职业或半职业队伍将争夺1500美元的现金大奖！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Regions: Dota Regions is a tournament where 16 top semi-pro/pro teams compete for a $1,500 cash prize!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Champions_League_S: Dota 2冠军联赛第4赛季已经回归！顶尖战队将会共同争夺50000美元的总奖金，附加出售礼包的每份2.5美元奖金加成。礼包内包含巨萌海民信使及载入画面！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Champions: The Dota 2 Champion's League is back with Season 4! The top teams will compete for $50,000 plus $2.50 from each bundle sold! Bundle also includes the Basim courier and loading screen!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Champions_League_S: Dota 2冠军联赛第4赛季已经回归！顶尖战队将会共同争夺50000美元的总奖金，附加出售礼包的每份2.5美元奖金加成。此门票仅用于观看Dota 2冠军联赛第4赛季的比赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Champions: The Dota 2 Champion's League is back with Season 4! The top teams will compete for $50,000 plus $2.50 from each bundle sold! This ticket only gives you access to view games from Dota 2 Champion's League Season 4.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Translational: 一年一度的大赛，由Steam翻译组的志愿翻译们协助组织举办，参赛战队为各语言的翻译组成员，联赛可以免费观看。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Translationa: A free to spectate yearly tournament organized with the help of the volunteer translators on Steam Translation.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_2014_National_Electronic_: 2014年全国电子竞技联赛中16支队伍将进行选拔赛，晋级的一支队伍将与邀请的7支战队共同参加总决赛，争夺16万美元的奖金！捆绑包内含“烈火之铠”套装！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_2014_National_El: The 2014 National Electronic Sports Tournament has 16 teams compete in a qualifying round where one of them will go to an 8 team grand final for a $160,000 prize pool! Bundle includes the Blaze Armor set!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_2014_National_Electronic_: 2014年全国电子竞技联赛中16支队伍将进行选拔赛，晋级的一支队伍将与邀请的7支战队共同参加总决赛，争夺16万美元的奖金！本门票只允许你观看2014年全国电子竞技大赛，不包含附赠的物品！

This ticket only gives you access to view games from the 2014 National Electronic Sports Tournament!

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortals_Pride: Includes all of the items in 'Immortals Pride' set for Legion Commander plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Japan_Dota_Cup_Season_2: 来自日本的众多战队将在第二届日本Dota联赛中争夺冠军！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Japan_Dota_Cup_S: Teams from Japan will compete in the second Japan Dota Cup to become champions!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_KESL_Season_1: 土耳其的电竞圈将迎来KONTAKT电子竞技联赛的首个赛季，众多战队将争夺4000美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_KESL_Season_1: Turkish E-sports scene reveils the first season of the KONTAKT Electronic Sports League where teams will battle for a $4000 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Megalodon_Starters_League: 众多战队将在巨齿鲨杯新手联赛的首个赛季中争夺奖金和硬件奖品！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Megalodon_Starte: Teams participate in the first season of the Megalodon Starters League for cash and hardware prizes!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NADota_Elite_League_Septe: 北美最具天赋的选手将在传统内战赛制下进行为期四周的鏖战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NADota_Elite_Lea: The most talented players in North America compete in the classic in-house league format for four weeks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Persian_Gulf_Cup: 波斯湾联赛汇聚波斯湾地区的顶尖战队，他们将争夺1000美元的总奖金！捆绑包内含“永恒之傲”套装！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Persian_Gulf_Cup: The Persian Gulf Cup pits the best teams from the Persian Gulf region against each other for a prize pool of $1000! Bundle includes the Immortals Pride set!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Persian_Gulf_Cup_Ticket: 波斯湾联赛汇聚波斯湾地区的顶尖战队，他们将争夺1000美元的总奖金！本门票只允许你观看波斯湾联赛的比赛，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Persian_Gulf_Cup: The Persian Gulf Cup pits the best teams from the Persian Gulf region against each other for a prize pool of $1000! This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Persian Gulf Cup.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_PinoyDota_Online_Battle_S: PinoyDota线上大战又回归了！现在已经迈入第3个赛季，7支晋级的业余队伍将面对卫冕冠军MSI-EvoGT.TRIC，争夺4万菲律宾比索的总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_PinoyDota_Online: PinoyDota Online Battle is back! Now on its 3rd season seven qualifying amateur teams will face the defending champion MSI-EvoGT.TRIC for a P40,000 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_VietDOTA_League_Season_2: VietDOTA联赛第2赛季是一项线上赛事，将由3个级别的联赛组成：高端联赛，业余联赛和Dota女子表演赛。各项联赛的总奖金均为1000美元！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_VietDOTA_League_: VietDOTA League Season 2 is an online tournament that contains of three tiers: Premier League, Amateur League and Girl Dota Showmatch. All compete for a prize pool of $1000!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Megalodon_Starters_League_Seas: 巨齿鲨杯新手联赛第1赛季
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Armor_of_the_Iron_Clo: Armor of the Iron Clock Knight
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_1: 今年十月Starladder旗下品牌群星联赛将迎来十周年。在第10赛季中，全球实力最雄厚的战队将会决一死战，且看谁将在史册上留下自己的名字。每售出一份捆绑包，总奖金都会增加2.50美金，并且附赠小小的“鲜红之石”套装！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series: This October marks the 10th anniversary of Starladder's original Star Series. In Season 10, the world's strongest teams will face off and compete for the right to mark down their names in the history books as champions. Each bundle purchased will increase the prize pool by $2.50 and includes the 'Scarlet Quarry' set for Tiny!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_1: 今年十月Starladder旗下品牌群星联赛将迎来十周年。在第10赛季中，全球实力最雄厚的战队将会决一死战，且看谁将在史册上留下自己的名字。本门票只允许你观看SLTV群星联赛第10赛季，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series: This October marks the 10th anniversary of Starladder's original Star Series. In Season 10, the world's strongest teams will face off and compete for the right to mark down their names in the history books as champions. This ticket only gives you access to view games from SLTV Star Series Season 10.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarlet_Quarry: 包含小小的“鲜红之石”套装内所有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scarlet_Quarry: Contains all of the items in the 'Scarlet Quarry' set for Tiny.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Head_of_the_Iron_Cloc: Head of the Iron Clock Knight
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Hook_of_the_Iron_Cloc: Hook of the Iron Clock Knight
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Rocket_of_the_Iron_Cl: Rocket of the Iron Clock Knight
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Its_in_the_Bag:
在比赛正式开始前呐喊，对另一方进行嘲讽，并预测本次比赛的胜利。如果最终胜利，胜利预测宝石会增加一点积分。如果最终失利，胜利预测宝石的积分清零。
在使用物品前，先在动作物品中装备，再前往设置页面设定“动作物品”的快捷键，然后就可以在选择英雄后使用了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Its_in_the:
Use this taunt before the round beings to taunt the other team and predict a victory. If you win the match, your Victory Prediction gem will gain a point. If you lose, your Victory Prediction gem will lose all of its points.
To use this item, equip it and bind a key to \"Action Item.\" Use your action item button in game after you've selected a hero.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Swine_of_the_Sunken_G: Swine of the Sunken Galley Set
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Black_Wyrm_Bow_Hunter: Black Wyrm Bow Hunter Loading Screen
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Chest_Plate_of_the_Rh: Chest Plate of the Rhinoceros Order
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Techies: 这件物品将默认播音员替换成爆破工程师斯奎和斯布林的爆炸性风格解说。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Techie: This item replaces the Default announcer with explosive commentary from Squee and Spleen of Techies Demolitions!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Assured_Victory_Shout: 在比赛正式开始前呐喊，对另一方进行嘲讽，并预测本次比赛的胜利。如果最终胜利，胜利预测宝石会增加一点积分。如果最终失利，胜利预测宝石的积分清零。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Assured_Victory_: Use this shout before the round begins to taunt the other team and predict a victory. If you win the match, your Victory Prediction gem will gain a point. If you lose, your Victory Prediction gem will lose all of its points.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_Glory_Kill_Banner: 随着暴走的诞生必须要大肆庆祝自己最致命的表演！独家赠与2014年国际邀请赛互动指南玩家。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_Glory_Kil: Celebrate your most deadly plays as you fight your way to a Rampage! Granted to owners of the 2014 Compendium for The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Wyrm_Bow_Hunter: 包含卓尔游侠的“黑龙猎人”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Wyrm_Bow_H: Contains all of the items in the 'Black Wyrm Bow Hunter' set for Drow plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Burning_Iron: 他踏着烈焰与死亡而来，叫嚣着穿梭于燃烧的天空。谁也无法使其停下！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Burning_Iron: Belching fire and death, he screams across burning skies. Can't stop the rider!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cavalier_of_Anarchy: 这件捆绑包内含混沌骑士的“无序骑士”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cavalier_of_Anar: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Cavalier of Anarchy' set for Chaos Knight plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Current_Prediction_Streak: 记录使用胜利预言嘲讽后连续正确预测的当前次数。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Current_Predicti: Tracks the current streak of successful victory predictions made by a victory prediction taunt.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Gabriel: 包含幽鬼的“暗黑天使”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Gabriel: Includes all of the items in the 'Dark Gabriel' set for Spectre plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Geode: 包含虚空假面的“神秘晶石”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dark_Geode: Contains all of the items in the 'Dark Geode' set for Faceless Void plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Despair_Emoticon_Pack:
获得动态表情包“绝望透顶”中的5个聊天表情：
:aaaah: :burn: :hide: :iceburn: :tears:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Despair_Emoticon:
Unlocks the 5 emoticons in the Despair Emoticon Pack:
	:aaaah: :burn: :hide: :iceburn: :tears:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_New_York_2014: 今年10月9日和10日，ESL将麦迪逊广场花园变成全世界Dota粉丝的盛会。本次大赛将有8支参赛战队，来自三大赛区。通过选拔赛将有4支欧洲战队，3支北美战队和1支中国战队夺得纽约总决赛的席位！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_New_York: On the 9th and 10th of October, ESL will be transforming the Theatre at Madison Square Garden into the place to be for Dota fans from all over the world. The event will feature eight teams from three different regions. 4 European, 3 North American and one Chinese team will make their way through the qualifiers and secure themselves a spot for the finals in New York!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glacial_Commander: 这件捆绑包内含巨牙海民的“冰河指挥官”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glacial_Commande: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Glacial Commander' set for Tusk plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Techies: 这件物品将连杀配音替换为爆破工程师斯布恩的爆炸性热情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Techie: This item replaces the Default announcer with the explosive enthusiasm of Spoon of Techies Demolitions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mei_Nei_Jade_Rabbit_Bundl: 包含信使“玉兔美萱”和载入画面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mei_Nei_Jade_Rab: Contains the Mei Nei Jade Rabbit courier and loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mei_Nei_the_Jade_Rabbit: 美萱就跟月亮一样永寿无尽，在战场上无畏地穿梭只为众人消解疲乏和伤痛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mei_Nei_the_Jade: As eternal as the moon, Mei Nei fearlessly traverses the fields of battle in order to replenish the weary and wounded.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Nilbog_the_Mad: 尼尔伯格，一只矮小基恩，喜欢鼓捣小发明，是一位自然主义者，也是名探险家，他对贪魔有着可以说是“不健康”的兴趣。事实上，他花了相当多的时间和精力制作了一套非常精美的服饰，让他能够在贪魔的天然栖息地进行探索，与贪魔进行互动（还有逃走）。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Nilbog_the_Mad: A small keen, a tinkerer, naturalist and explorer, Nilbog has what some might describe as an /\"unhealthy/\" interest in Greevils. In fact, he spent an incredible amount of time and effort constructing an elaborate costume to allow him to explore and interact with (and escape from) Greevils in their natural habitat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rhinoceros_Order: 包含斯温的“灵犀教团”套装内所有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rhinoceros_Order: Includes all of the items in the 'Rhinoceros Order' set for Sven.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Arsenal: 爆破工程师为豚炮制作了上百种炮弹，但是斯布林觉得太可爱了，在豚炮装上战舰时不忍心与其分别。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Arsenal: Techies Demolitions built hundreds of custom-built explosives to use with The Swine, but Spleen thought they were so adorable he couldn't bear to part with them as they were loading the cannon onboard the galley.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Helmet: 在制造豚炮时，爆破工程师还为炮手打造了时尚的头盔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Helmet: When constructing The Swine, Techies Demolitions also forged some stylish headgear for its crew.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Powder_Barrel: 想要安全地发动豚炮需要将易燃药粉进行一定地混合，结果斯奎在交付给购买豚炮的战舰时完全忘记向水手们交代了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Powder_Bar: Safely firing The Swine requires a custom mix of flammable powders, which Squee completely forgot to mention to the crew of the doomed galley who purchased the cannon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Visor: 出于某种原因，预定豚炮的舰长不想要附赠的头饰。他亏大了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Swine_Visor: For some reason, the galley captain who commissioned The Swine didn't want the headgear that came with it. His loss.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Techies_Squint_and_: 所有东西工程师都不放在眼里。他们的敌人就更不用说了。2014年国际邀请赛互动指南玩家专属奖励。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Techies_Sq: Techies take nothing seriously, least of all their enemies. Granted to owners of the 2014 Compendium for The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Techies_Arcana: 爆破工程师骄傲地公布了他们最新的科研成果：豚炮，众多设计中最为强大的火炮。但是豚炮在回航战舰的处女秀中异常疯狂，母舰在它惊人的火力下四分五裂，而豚炮也被这火力震得朝岸边飞去。数天之后它又重见天日，被人发现深深地嵌入了制造者工坊下的悬崖峭壁之中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Techies_Arcana: After months of work, Techies Demolitions proudly unveiled their latest commission: The Swine, the most powerful cannon ever designed. Yet during its first frantic use aboard a homebound galley, the Swine's awesome blast tore its host ship asunder, rocketing the cannon itself backwards toward the shore. It was found days later, deeply embedded in a rocky cliffside just below its makers' workshop.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Techies_Bombastic_Box: 包含工程师播音员，信使“贪小疯魔”和界面皮肤“爆炸在即”。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Techies_Bombasti: Includes Techies Announcer, Nilbog the Mad courier and Detonation HUD.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2014_Mu: 耳边环绕着屡获殊荣的作曲家Chance Thomas操刀的史诗级音乐进入战场。2014年国际邀请赛互动指南玩家专属奖励。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Ride into battle with epic music from award-winning artist Chance Thomas. Granted to owners of the 2014 Compendium for The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Swine_of_the_Sunken_G: 爆破工程师骄傲地公布了他们最新的科研成果：豚炮，众多设计中最为强大的火炮。但是豚炮在回航战舰的处女秀中异常疯狂，母舰在它惊人的火力下四分五裂，而豚炮也被这火力震得朝岸边飞去。数天之后它又重见天日，被人发现深深地嵌入了制造者工坊下的悬崖峭壁之中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Swine_of_the: After months of work, Techies Demolitions proudly unveiled their latest commission: The Swine, the most powerful cannon ever designed. Yet during its first frantic use aboard a homebound galley, the Swine's awesome blast tore its host ship asunder, rocketing the cannon itself backwards toward the shore. It was found days later, deeply embedded in a rocky cliffside just below its makers' workshop.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Forged_Fu: 无需符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内含完整的物品套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Zephyrus_Flight: 这件捆绑包内含风行者的“西风之舞”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Zephyrus_Flight: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Zephyrus' Flight' set for Windranger plus loading screen.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Great_Sword_of_the_Rh: Great Sword of the Rhinoceros Order
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Mei_Nei_Jade_Rabbit_L: Mei Nei Jade Rabbit Loading Screen
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Swine_of_the_Sunken_G: Swine of the Sunken Galley Bundle
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Taunt_Techies_Squint_and_Laugh: 嘲讽：工程师的嘻嘻哈哈

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fires_of_the_Bap: Contains all of the items in the 'Fires of the Baphomet' set for Doom plus loading screen.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Rift: Contains all of the items in the 'Moon Rift' item set for Mirana plus loading screen.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Rift_Style: Has two styles, Mask and No Mask
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Fires_of_the_Baphomet: Fires of the Baphomet Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Promo_Mei_Nei_Jade_Rabbit_Bund: 神秘 玉兔美萱捆绑包
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Promo_Mei_Nei_Jade_Ra: Promo Mei Nei Jade Rabbit Bundle
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Set_Swine_of_the_Sunken_Ga: Swine of the Sunken Galley Set
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Bulgarian_Amateur_League_Seaso: 保加利亚业余联赛第3赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_of_Central_Europe_: 中欧大战联赛中64支参赛战队将争夺晋级名额，与8支受邀战队一同争夺500美元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_of_Centra: In the Battle of Central Europe 64 registered teams compete to qualify with 8 invited teams for a $500 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bulgarian_Amateur_League_: 保加利亚业余联赛已经进入第三赛季。这项公开联赛中50支战队将争夺丰厚的奖品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bulgarian_Amateu: This is the third season for the Bulgarian Amateur League. It's an open league with up to 50 teamscompeting for a prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESpot_Dota_2_Challenge: E-Spot Dota 2挑战赛由16支参赛战队，他们将争夺160欧元的总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESpot_Dota_2_Cha: The E-Spot Dota 2 Challenge is a tournament consisting of 16 teams which compete for a prize pool of 160 Euros!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_European_Elite_League_Sep: 欧洲最具天赋的选手将在传统内战赛制下进行为期四周的鏖战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_European_Elite_L: The most talented players in Europe compete in the classic inhouse league format for four weeks.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Game_Show_Dota_2_League: 9月11-13日六支欧洲战队将争夺5万美元的总奖金。联赛将以六国语言进行直播解说。最终决赛将于DreamHack莫斯科现场进行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Game_Show_Dota_2: On 11-13 September six European teams will compete for the prize pool of $50,000. The tournament will be casted in six languages. Final matches will be played at DreamHack Moscow.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Revival_ESports_Dota_2_Op: Revival电竞Dota 2公开联赛有32支业余和半职业印尼队伍参加，他们将争夺3百万印尼盾（约合1570元）的总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Revival_ESports_: The first series of the Revival E-Sports Dota 2 Open Tournament featuring 32 amateur to semi-pro Indonesian teams who will complete for a prize pool of IDR 3,000,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rise_of_the_Myrimidons: 匈牙利的众多战队将为赞助名额和1500美元的奖金一较高下！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rise_of_the_Myri: Hungarian teams compete to receive a sponsorship and a $1500 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SCL_1v1_Mirror_Series: 你真的是万中挑一？在星云联赛全新的1v1单挑系列赛中向我们展现你的实力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SCL_1v1_Mirror_S: Are you the best? Show us your skills in the new 1v1 Mirror Series of the Star Cloud League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sina_Cup_Seaosn_5: 新浪超新星Dota 2公开赛的第五赛季中众多中国战队将争夺10万元的总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sina_Cup_Seaosn_: The fifth season of the Sina Cup has Chinese teams competing for a prize pool of 100,000 Yuan!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TP_Anatolian_Cup: 由dota2lig.com主办的首届土耳其联赛。8支来自土耳其的队伍将争夺500美元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TP_Anatolian_Cup: The first tournament in Turkey by dota2lig.com.There will be 8 teams from Turkey competing for a $500 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Sina_Cup_Season_5: 新浪超新星Dota 2公开赛第5赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Moon_Rift: 包含米拉娜的“星月之痕”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Moon_Rif: Contains all of the items in the 'Moon Rift' item set for Mirana plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mark_of_the_Taunting_Swin: 为了警告人们别靠近他们测试豚炮的地点，斯布恩制作了一个特殊的标识。当然，豚炮的首次测试并不是他们完成的。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mark_of_the_Taun: Spoon built a special sign to warn people away from where they intended to test the Swine cannon. Of course, they never got around to testing the cannon in the first place.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Promo_Burning_Iron: 他踏着烈焰与死亡而来，叫嚣着穿梭于燃烧的天空。谁也无法使其停下！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Promo_Burning_Ir: Belching fire and death, he screams across burning skies. Can't stop the rider!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rage_of_the_Three: 包含干扰者的“三兽之怒”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rage_of_the_Thre: Includes all of the items in the 'Rage of the Three' set for Disruptor including a loading screen:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Rage_of_the_Three_Loa: Rage of the Three Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Alpha_Predator_Set: 包含司夜刺客的“头号掠食者”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Alpha_Predator_S: Includes all of the items in the 'Alpha Predator' set for Nyx Assassin:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flamestitched_Suitings_Se: 包含蝙蝠骑士的“炎纫面料”套装内所有物品：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flamestitched_Su: Includes all of the items in the 'Flamestitched Suitings' set for Batrider:
