Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mexican_Cup: 来自墨西哥的顶尖战队将受邀参赛，证明自己是墨西哥的最强队伍。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mexican_Cup: The top teams from Meixco are invited to prove they are the top team from the region.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_OGSeries_Dota_2_Online_Se: 西班牙的精英战队将争夺250美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_OGSeries_Dota_2_: Some of the top Spanish teams compete for the $250 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Oem_Dota_Camp: 四支当地顶尖战队将角逐1,000雷亚尔的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Oem_Dota_Camp: The top four teams from the region compete for the R$1,000 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TEvent_Dota_2_Season_1: 这项公开联赛有64支来自俄罗斯中部的队伍，他们将争夺该地区最强战队的荣誉。这张门票将附赠全能骑士的“天国之光”套装，以及TEvent Dota 2联赛第1赛季的观战资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TEvent_Dota_2_Se: This open tournament contains 64 teams from Central Russia competing for the rights to call themselves the best team in the region. This ticket grants the Heavenly Light Omniknight set and access to view games from TEvent Dota 2 Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TEvent_Dota_2_Season_1_Ti: 这项公开联赛有64支来自俄罗斯中部的队伍，他们将争夺该地区最强战队的荣誉。这张门票只允许你观看TEvent Dota 2联赛第1赛季，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TEvent_Dota_2_Se: This open tournament contains 64 teams from Central Russia competing for the rights to call themselves the best team in the region. This ticket only gives you access to view games from TEvent Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tactic_Hive_League_Season: Tactic Hive联赛专为半职业和业余Dota 2玩家而设。它是选手间互相切磋、赢得大奖的平台。各战队将争夺2000美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tactic_Hive_Leag: Tactic Hive League is designed for semi-professionals and amateur Dota 2 gamers. Tactic Hive is a ladder where players can have fun, compete and win prizes. Teams compete for the $2,000 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Telkom_Gaming_Championshi: 南非的顶尖战队将争夺价值17万南非兰特的奖品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Telkom_Gaming_Ch: South Africa's top teams compete for prizes valuing R170,000.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Fullmetal_Machinst: 包含伐木机的“钢之机械师”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Fullmetal_Ma: Contains all of the items in the 'Fullmetal Machinst' item set for Timbersaw plus loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Prime_Dota_2_Tourname: The Prime联赛是面向所有玩家的印尼公开联赛。参赛队伍将争夺1500万印尼卢比的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Prime_Dota_2: The Prime is an Indoesia tournament that is open to everyone. Teams compete for the 15 million Rupiah prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_2: 巅峰联赛第2赛季是一个全球Dota 2盛会，万众期待的巅峰联赛延续！全球顶尖战队将在线上争夺今年12月线下总决赛的4个参赛名额，晋级队伍将挑战一支受邀队伍，还有卫冕冠军Evil Geniuse，比赛奖金将超过10万美元。25%的捆绑包收入将直接进入总奖金，捆绑包内含互动手册，信使，载入画面还有观战门票！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_2: The Summit 2 is the long-awaited sequel to a global Dota 2 event! The world's best teams will fight online for 4 slots at the LAN Finals this December, where they will challenge Evil Geniuses and another invited team for $100,000+. 25% of each bundle sold goes towards the prize pool and the bundle includes Compendium access, a courier, loading screen, and DotaTV ticket!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_2_Ticket: 巅峰联赛第2赛季是一个全球Dota 2盛会，万众期待的巅峰联赛延续！全球顶尖战队将在线上争夺今年12月线下总决赛的4个参赛名额，晋级队伍将挑战一支受邀队伍，还有卫冕冠军Evil Geniuse，比赛奖金将超过10万美元。这张门票只允许你观看巅峰联赛第2赛季，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_2_Tic: The Summit 2 is the long-awaited sequel to a global Dota 2 event! The world's best teams will fight online for 4 slots at the LAN Finals this December, where they will challenge Evil Geniuses and another invited team for $100,000+. This ticket only gives you access to view games from The Summit 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Summits_P: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内含完整的物品套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Watch_4_Dota_Tournament_S: “饱览刀塔”联赛是一项公开联赛，众多队伍将争夺3000卢布的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Watch_4_Dota_Tou: The Watch 4 Dota Tournament is an open tournament where teams compete for the 3,000 Rubles prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_World_Cyber_Arena: 世界电子竞技大赛是一项电竞邀请赛事，线下总决赛将于中国银川举行。四支中国战队和四支外国战队将共同争夺47万美元的总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_World_Cyber_Aren: World Cyber Arena is an invite only tournament with LAN Finals taking place in Yinchuan, China. Four teams from China and four foreign teams compete for the $470,000 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Yard_Red_Festival: 千金节联赛第3赛季是一项民间赛事，旨在支持红十字会组织。来自欧洲和独联体地区的顶尖战队将共同争夺5000美元总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Yard_Red_Festiva: The Yard Red Festival is the third charity event supporting the Red Cross. The best teams in Europe and CIS will compete for the $5,000 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ZoZo_Cup_#1: 首届针对独联体选手的业余联赛。各战队将共同争夺10000卢布的总奖金及500件稀有品质的游戏饰品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ZoZo_Cup_#1: The first amateur league for CIS players. The teams compete for the 10,000 Rubles prize pool and 500 rare items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dota_International_Clan_Wars__: Dota国际战队大赛 - 第1赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_The_Summit_2_Loading_Screen: 巅峰联赛第2赛季载入画面
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_New_York_Summons_: 今年10月9日和10日，ESL将麦迪逊广场花园变成全世界Dota粉丝的盛会。本次大赛将有8支参赛战队，来自三大赛区。通过选拔赛将有4支欧洲战队，3支北美战队和1支中国战队夺得纽约总决赛的席位！购买召唤物礼包还能使联赛总奖金增加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_New_York: On the 9th and 10th of October, ESL will be transforming the Theatre at Madison Square Garden into the place to be for Dota fans from all over the world. The event will feature eight teams from three different regions. 4 European, 3 North American and one Chinese team will make their way through the qualifiers and secure themselves a spot for the finals in New York! Purchase the Summons bundle and increase the prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Lil_Nova: 就算是暗月最强的猎人也有一个起点。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Lil_Nova: Even the greatest hunters of the Dark Moon have to start somewhere.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_ESL_One_New_York_Summons_Bundl: ESL One纽约联赛召唤物礼包
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_ESL_One_New_York_Summ: ESL One New York Summons Bundle
Tokens.DOTA_Item_AD2L_Season_5_Inhouse_League: Dota 2业余联赛第5赛季内战赛
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AD2L_Season_5_In: The 5th season of the Ameteur Dota 2 In-House League
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copa_Chile_2_Expogeek: 智利规模最大的联赛，智利顶尖战队将争夺1300美元的赛事奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copa_Chile_2_Exp: Chile's largest tournament where the top teams from Chile compete for the $1,300 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2VO_Ability_Cup_#2: Dota2VO技艺联赛的第二赛季。欧洲的顶尖战队将争夺超过300美元的奖金。这件捆绑包内含用户界面“午夜噩梦”和Dota2VO技能联赛的观战资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2VO_Ability_: The second season of the Dota2VO Ability Cup. The top teams from EU compete for the $300+ prize pool. This bundles gives you the Bane Midnight Terror HUD and access to watch games from Dota2VO Ability Cup #2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2VO_Ability_Cup_#2_Ti: Dota2VO技艺联赛的第二赛季。欧洲的顶尖战队将争夺超过300美元的奖金。这张门票只允许你观看Dota2VO技艺联赛，不包括附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2VO_Ability_: The second season of the Dota2VO Ability Cup. The top teams from EU compete for the $300 prize pool. This ticket only gives you access to view games from Dota2VO Ability Cup.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaPy_#2_Encore: This is the second season of the DotaPy League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_Think_Fast_Razer_Leag: 众多战队将在这项公开联赛中争取自己在“灵机一动”雷蛇淘汰赛中的参赛资格。这件捆绑包内含界面皮肤“搏击格斗家”和ESL“灵机一动”雷蛇联赛的观战资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_Think_Fast_R: Teams compete in this open tournament to earn their spot in the Think Fast Razer League Playoffs. This bundle includes the Brawl Basher HUD and grants access to view games from the ESL Think Fast Razer League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_Think_Fast_Razer_Leag: 众多战队将在这项公开联赛中争取自己在“灵机一动”雷蛇淘汰赛中的参赛资格。这张门票只允许你观看ESL“灵机一动”雷蛇联赛，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_Think_Fast_R: Teams compete in this open tournament to earn their spot in the Think Fast Razer League Playoffs. This ticket only grants access to view games from the ESL Think Fast Razer League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Free_Treasure_Redemption: 右键点击并选择“兑换”即可免费换取任一款珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Free_Treasure_Re: Right click and redeem this item to exchange it for a free treasure of your choice.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_HyperX_D2L_Season_5: HyperX D2L第五赛季跨度两个月，参赛的是全球顶尖的16支电竞队伍，他们将争夺2015年CES位于赌城凯撒宫的5万美元奖金线下赛的4个参赛名额。赶快购买门票，支持联赛，还能使联赛总奖金增加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_HyperX_D2L_Seaso: The HyperX D2L's fifth season is a two month Dota 2 league featuring sixteen of the world's best gaming teams battling it out for four spots at the over fifty thousand dollar Live Finals event at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas during CES 2015. Buy now to show your support and increase the prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_PKDotas_Weekend_Showdown: 巴基斯坦的8支精英战队将证明谁才是巴基斯坦的顶尖战队，不菲奖金又会花落谁家。赶快购买门票来支持比赛，还能使联赛总奖金增加。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_PKDotas_Weekend_: The top 8 teams from Pakistan battle to claim themselves as the top team in Pakistan and their part of the prize pool. Buy the ticket to show your support and increase the prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_STG_League_Season_One: 16支业余队伍将争夺超过300件游戏内稀有装备。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_STG_League_Seaso: 16 Amateur teams compete for300+ rare in-game items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Synergy_League_Season_1: 来自欧洲，东南亚和中国的顶级队伍将争夺超过5万美元的奖金。购买门票还能使联赛总奖金增加。捆绑包内含莉娜的“战鹰之服”套装内所有物品，以及“同心协力”联赛第1赛季的观战资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Synergy_League_S: The top teams from Europe, South-East Asia, and China compete for the $50,000+ prize pool. Purchase the ticket and increase the prize pool. This bundle includes the Warhawk Vestiments Lina set andy grants access to view games from the Synergy League Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Synergy_League_Season_1_T: 来自欧洲，东南亚和中国的顶级队伍将争夺超过5万美元的奖金。购买门票还能使联赛总奖金增加。这张门票只允许你观看“同心协力”联赛第1赛季，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Synergy_League_S: The top teams from Europe, South-East Asia, and China compete for the $50,000+ prize pool. This ticket only grants access to view games from the Synergy League Season 1.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_VIP_Dota_2_Tournament: Barganizer主办的首届线下联赛。众多战队将争夺200美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_VIP_Dota_2_Tourn: The first offline tournament organized by Barganizer. Teams compete for the $200 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vake_Female_Tournament: 16支来自独联体地区和欧洲的顶尖Dota 2女子战队将争夺8000卢布的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vake_Female_Tour: 16 of the top female Dota 2 teams from CIS and Europe compete for the 8,000 ruble prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vietnam_eSports_Champions: 越南的顶尖战队将争夺WECG的参赛资格和“越南巅峰战队”的称号。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vietnam_eSports_: The top teams in Vietnam compete for a spot in the WECG and to be crowned the top team from Vietnam.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_WECG_Korea_National_Final: 众多顶尖战队将为WECG总决赛的一席之地展开激烈的争夺战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_WECG_Korea_Natio: Some of the top teams compete to earn a spot in the WECG Grand Finals.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_ESL_Think_Fast_Razer_: ESL Think Fast Razer League Ticket
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Vietnam_eSports_Champions_Leag: 越南电竞冠军联赛第2赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Secondary_Pro_Leag: DOTA2次级职业联赛是由完美世界主办，与MarsTV合作的职业联赛。DSPL通过线上海选赛形式在全国范围内选拔出最强的民间战队，并晋级至线下进行更加激烈残酷的职业循环赛，为DOTA2职业圈输送新鲜血液，培养明日巨星。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Secondary: Dota 2 Secondary Pro League is organized by Perfect World with the cooperation with MarsTV. The tournament will have top Chinese amateur teams through national qualifiers, who will advance to LAN final to compete in a round robin format before becoming tomorrow stars in Dota scene.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jujak_the_Fiery_Rebirth: 这只信使是与KDL第二赛季冠军MVP Phoenix战队联赛创建，每售出一份战队都将获得一定分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jujak_the_Fiery_: This courier was created in partnership with KDL Season Two winners MVP Phoenix, who receive a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Nexon_Ann: 无需符印即可开启珍藏。珍藏内含完整的物品套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Eater: 影魔常年以来一直在收集敌人的灵魂。就跟收集其他物事相同，有些藏品会显得鹤立鸡群，必须不惜一切代价将其拿下。但是有的灵魂就是不应觊觎，他们怀有过于黑暗的力量，充斥着愤怒，绝对没有收为己用的可能。所以影魔付出了代价，但吞噬了恶魔的灵魂他也获得了力量，他的一生也就此改变。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Demon_Eater: Shadow Fiend has long collected the souls of his enemies. As is the case with any collector, some prizes have stood above others, to be sought out at any cost. However, there are certain souls that should not be tried, and forces so dark and filled with rage that no being could hope to contain them. Thus did Shadow Fiend learn the price, and gift, that comes with stealing the souls of demons, and he was changed evermore.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Maniacal_Machinist: 包含伐木机的“狂躁技师”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Maniacal_Mac: Contains all of the items in the 'Maniacal Machinist' item set for Timbersaw plus loading screen:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Treasure_of_the_First: Treasure of the First Nexon Anniversary
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Balance_of_the_Bladek: Balance of the Bladekeeper Loading Screen
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Cyclopean_Helm_of_the: Cyclopean Helm of the Keen Machine
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Agaric_Flourish: 包含树精卫士的“繁盛菌菇”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面和技能图标相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Agaric_Flourish: Contains all of the items in the 'Agaric Flourish' set for Treant Protector plus loading screen and ability icons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arabian_Dota_League: 中东地区首个线上联赛。顶尖阿拉伯战队将争夺1万迪拉姆的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arabian_Dota_Lea: The first online League in the Middle East. The top Arabian teams compete for the 10,000 dirhams prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Babka_and_Ward_Bundle: 包含具有天辉夜魇两种颜色的魔力之巫信使，女巫的羽屋守卫和两款载入画面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Babka_and_Ward_B: Contains Babka the Bewitcher courier in Radiant and Dire colors,  Babka's Featherhutch ward and two loading screens.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Babka_the_Bewitcher: 魔力之巫在很久之前就离开了她的故乡，隐居在密林中。用她的魔法研钵和杵，将迷路旅行者的的指骨碾碎之后就当作她的小点心享用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Babka_the_Bewitc: Babka long ago left her village to live a hermetical existence in the woods. Now with her enchanted mortar and pestle, she grinds the finger bones of lost travellers to thicken the dough of her cookies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battletrap: 包含发条技师的“战场绝阵”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面和自定义齿轮相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battletrap: Contains all of the items in the 'Battletrap' set for Clockwerk plus loading screen and custom cog.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Eldwurms_Touch: 包含技能图标和模型特效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Eldwu: Includes ability icons and ambient particles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Champion_of_Discord: 包含混沌骑士的“纷争之骑”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Champion_of_Disc: Contains all of the items in the 'Champion of Discord' set for Chaos Knight plus loading screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure_of_the_S: 无需符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内包含完整的物品套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Treasure: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaCinema_Presents_the_X: DotaCinema为您呈现人气非凡的队长征召联赛续作！八支西方顶尖战队将在独特的队长征召模式中决一死战，模式特有的随机英雄必定让队长们更加慎重。礼包销售额的25%还将进入比赛总奖金。礼包内含完整的互动手册，DotaTV观战门票，巫妖套装，米拉娜坐骑，特殊聊天表情等等海量好礼！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaCinema_Prese: DotaCinema presents the second version of their popular Captains Draft tournament. Eight of the best western teams battle in the unique Captains Draft mode, from which its limited hero pool is sure to keep team captains on their toes. 25% of each bundle will contribute to the prizepool. The bundle contains a full compendium, DotaTV ticket, Lich set, Mirana mount, special emotes and much more!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaCinema_XMG_Captains_D: DotaCinema为您呈现人气非凡的队长征召联赛续作！八支西方顶尖战队将在独特的队长征召模式中决一死战，模式特有的随机英雄必定让队长们更加慎重。礼包销售额的25%还将进入比赛总奖金。礼包内含完整的互动手册，DotaTV观战门票，巫妖套装，米拉娜坐骑，特殊聊天表情等等海量好礼！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaCinema_XMG_C: DotaCinema presents the second version of their popular Captains Draft tournament. Eight of the best western teams battle in the unique Captains Draft mode, from which its limited hero pool is sure to keep team captains on their toes. 25% of each bundle will contribute to the prizepool. The bundle contains a full compendium, DotaTV ticket, Lich set, Mirana mount, special emotes and much more!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Starter_League: Dota 2初学者联赛的首个赛季中有数个南美的顶尖队伍将一争高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Starter_L: The first season of the Dota 2 Starter league consits of some of the best teams from South American.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Cinema_Emoticon_Pack: 获得DotaCinema表情包中的5个表情：:fail: :goodjob: :headshot: :heart:和:horse:
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Cinema_Emot:
Unlocks the 5 emoticons in the Dota Cinema Emoticon Pack:
	:fail: :goodjob: :headshot: :heart: and :horse:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Echo_the_Locator: 比起探测之眼那敏锐的视觉和知觉，他的听觉称得上是传奇。他始终警惕着任何风吹草动。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Echo_the_Locator: Not known for his sharp vision, nor his sharp mind, Echo's sharp ears are a thing of legend.  He proudly keeps an ear out for all who might approach.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eldwurms_Touch: 包含卓尔游侠的“巨龙之触”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面和技能图标。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eldwurms_Touch: Contains all of the items in the 'Eldwurm's Touch' set for Drow plus loading screen and ability icons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherhutch: 当魔力之巫厌倦了她所住的破旧的鸡舍，她就对鸡舍施了魔法，让其重现生机。她本应该在施法前确认鸡舍里还有没有倒霉的小鸡。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Featherhutch: Having grown tired of her dilapidated chicken hutch, Babka the Bewitcher cast an enchantment to spruce it up and give it some life. She should have made sure there wasn't a chicken inside before she cast the spell.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GDL_Season_4: GDL联赛第4赛季专为俄罗斯的最强战队而设。总奖金为3000美元。门票包含职业和业余两个分组的赛程。职业分组的线下决赛将在俄罗斯的车里雅宾斯克市举行。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GDL_Season_4: GDL Season 4 is oriented towards the strongest Russian teams. The prize pool is $3000. Two divisions (AM and PRO) ane available on the ticket. The LAN final of the PRO division will take place in the city of Chelyabinsk.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Ghastly_Matriarch: 包含死亡先知的“苍白女王”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面、驱使恶灵的蝙蝠特效以及技能图标相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ghastly_Matriarc: Contains all of the items in the 'Ghastly Matriarch' set for Death Prophet plus loading screen and custom exorcism bat with an ability icon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_Wild_Reprisal: 包含粒子特效以及一个技能图标。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Horns_of_Wild_Re: Includes particles and an ability icon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_League_Season_: Nexon联手SpotTV和KeSPA带来KDL的第四个赛季。新晋队伍将各自加入相应的联赛级别。KDL横跨四个赛季，总奖金达到6.5亿韩元（约合60.5万美元）。观看第四赛季中，来自甲级和乙级联赛的10支顶尖战队一争高下。这张门票只允许你观看KDL第4赛季的比赛，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korea_Dota_Leagu: Nexon presents the fourth season of KDL with SpotTV and KeSPA. Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier. The KDL will span four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million (USD 605,000) prize pool. Watch the  fourth season of KDL featuring the top 10 teams from the tier 1 and 2 leagues. This ticket only gives you access to view games from KDL Season 4.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Korean_Dota_League_Season: Nexon联手SpotTV和KeSPA带来KDL的第四个赛季。新晋队伍将各自加入相应的联赛级别。KDL横跨四个赛季，总奖金达到6.5亿韩元（约合60.5万美元）。观看第四赛季中，来自甲级和乙级联赛的10支顶尖战队一争高下。捆绑包内含帕吉套装“魔龙之身”以及KDL第4赛季的观战资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Korean_Dota_Leag: Nexon presents the fourth season of KDL with SpotTV and KeSPA. Newly promoted teams have joined each respective tier. The KDL will span four seasons with a total of KRW 650 million (USD 605,000) prize pool. Watch the  fourth season of KDL featuring the top 10 teams from the tier 1 and 2 leagues. This bundle includes the Scavenger of the Basilisk Pudge set and grants access to view games from KDL Season 4.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_Infernal_Wings: 包含莱恩的“地狱之翼遗物”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_Infern: Contains all of the items in the 'Legacy of Infernal Wings' set for Lion plus loading screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Monstrous_Reprisal: 包含力丸的“复仇恶魔”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面、技能图标和解说签名相赠。这些物品是与VeRsuta联合创建，每售出一份他都将获得相应分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Monstrous_Repris: Contains all of the items in the 'Monstrous Reprisal' set for Riki plus loading screen, ability icons and an autograph. These items were created in partnership with VeRsuta, who receives a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Smoke_Bomb_of_Wild_Repris: 包含粒子特效以及一个技能图标。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Smoke_Bomb_of_Wi: Includes particles and an ability icon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Fiend_Cleaver: 包含斯温的“屠魔刀”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面和技能图标相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Fiend_Cleave: Contains all of the items in 'The Fiend Cleaver' set for Sven plus loading screen and ability icons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Rotted_Ga: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内含完整的物品套装。此珍藏内物品在2015年2月1日后才可以进行交易。稀有奖励不受此限制。若珍藏是经由“重重宝藏的珍藏”解封而得，珍藏和内含物品在2015年3月14日后才可以进行交易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable until Feb 1st, 2015. Rare rewards are not subject to this restriction.  The Nested Cache version of this treasure and all its contents will be tradable and marketable after March 14, 2015.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CSPLRU_Dota_2_League_Seas: 无休之战的第二赛季，超过500名选手将争夺奖金和冠军头衔！

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Gonzaga_F: Gonzaga Amateur festival presents Amateur Dota 2 teams from Indonesia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Electro_DCL_Season_2: 来自独联体国家的业余队伍将争夺现金大奖和稀有物品。

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Electro_Dota_2_L: 16 teams battle it out for the 6,400 ruble prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Exp_Dota_Cup_Season_2: 16支队伍将为5000卢布的奖金一决高下。

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Exp_Solo_Cup_Sea: 32 players compete for a 1,600 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GCDL_Season_8: 随着DOTA 2“线下王者”联赛的落幕，Gamer.LK又高调宣布Gamer.LK Clans DOTA 2联赛（GCDL）第8赛季即将拉开帷幕。GCDL是在斯里兰卡举办的历史最长的线上联赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GCDL_Season_8: With Kings of LAN DOTA 2 done and dusted, Gamer.LK is proud to present Season 8 of the Gamer.LK Clans DOTA 2 League (GCDL). The GCDL is the longest running online league of its kind in Sri Lanka!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League_Season_2: 16支职业战队将会1500美元的奖金一较高下。这件捆绑包内含大地之灵的“静穆基石”套装，和GG联赛第2赛季的观看门票。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League_Season: 16 professional teams compete for the $1,500 prize pool. This bundle grants the Bedrock Serenity Earth Spirit set and access to view games from GG League Season 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League_Season_2_Ticket: 16支职业战队将会1500美元的奖金一较高下。这张门票只允许你观看GG联赛第2赛季，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GG_League_Season: 16 professional teams compete for the $1,500 prize pool. This ticket only gives you access to view games from the GG League Season 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Impact_Gaming_Season_1: 汇聚了全巴基斯坦顶尖战队的Dota 2大奖赛正在如火如荼地进行！见证顶尖战队为了现金大奖进行激烈对决，胜者更有机会获得大企业的赞助参加国际大赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Impact_Gaming_Se: The battle between the best Dota 2 teams in Pakistan in on! Watch as they game fiercely to win the grand cash prize and a chance to be sponsored by the big names in corporate alliance to compete Internationally.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_KDL_Season_4__Tier_3: Dota 2韩国乙级联赛由AMD Dota 2业余联赛，PC Bang联赛和社区之战联赛组成。这些联赛中脱颖而出的战队将会获得韩国Dota联赛的联赛积分，并有机会晋级到甲级联赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_KDL_Season_4__Ti: Dota 2 KDL Tier 3 is composed of the AMD Dota 2 Amateur League and the PC bang League. The best teams in Tier 3 leagues will receive KDL Tier points and have chance to advance to Tier 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MOL_Dota_2_Tournament: MOL Dota 2联赛的冠亚军将代表印度尼西亚参加在马来西亚的2014年游戏大师赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MOL_Dota_2_Tourn: The top two teams of the MOL Dota 2 Tournament will represent Indonesia at the Game Master 2014 Malaysia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Persia_Grand_League: 8支来自赛区的顶级战队将在14天的赛程内争夺游戏内饰品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Persia_Grand_Lea: 8 of the best teams from the region compete over 14 days for in-game items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_2014_Season_4: 64支来自各地区的顶尖队伍将为2014年SDL联赛最后一赛季的奖金和荣誉展开厮杀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SDL_2014_Season_: 64 of the best teams from the region fight for the prize and glory at the last season of SDL 2014.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Silver_Dota_League_2: Dota白银联赛是一项业余联赛，100余支南美队伍将争夺游戏内饰品和现金大奖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Silver_Dota_Leag: The Silver Dota League is an Amateur league featuring more than 100 South American teams competing for in-game items and a cash prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Uprise_Champions_Cup_Seas: 来自独联体地区的部分顶尖战队将争夺“崛起之冠”联赛总决赛的参赛名额。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Uprise_Champions: Some of the top teams from the CIS region fight for their spot in the Uprise Championship Finals.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_deafESL_League_Season_3: deafESL这项为聋哑人玩家设立的联赛已经进入第3赛季，来自全世界的队伍将齐聚一堂，共同竞技。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_deafESL_League_S: The deafESL behind the third season in a tournament made ​​for the deaf community, bringing teams from around the world.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_KDL_Season_4__Tier_3: 韩国Dota联赛第4赛季 - 乙级
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MPGL_Gigabyte_2014_Finals: 经过一年的激烈角逐后所有晋级队伍将由主办方承担差旅，飞往马尼拉进行为期2天的Dota 2比拼。购买门票还将提高联赛的奖金哦！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MPGL_Gigabyte_20: The completion of the year long event with all qualified teams gathering for an all expense paid trip to Manila for a 2 day event of non-stop Dota 2 action. Purchase the ticket to help increase the prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wars_of_Fortune_Season_2: “好运联赛”的第二赛季。16支队伍将争夺6400卢布的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wars_of_Fortune_: Second season of the tournament Wars of Fortune. 16 teams for the 6,400 ruble prize pool.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Battle_of_Central_Eur: Battle of Central Europe Season 3 Ticket
Tokens.DOTA_Item_CZSK_Dota_2_League_Season_3: 捷克斯洛伐克Dota 2联赛第3赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLeague_Seas: 16支世界顶尖队伍将在120余场线上联赛和2014年DreamHack冬季线下淘汰赛上一争高下，为10万美元奖金决一死战。购买门票还能使奖金增加。这张门票包含梦幻赛联赛第2赛季第二轮和第三轮比赛的观战资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_DreamLe: 16 of the world's best teams will compete in over 120 league matches and playoffs at DreamHack Winter 2014, $100,000 prize pool. Purchase the Ticket to extend the prize pool! This ticket grants access to Phase 2 and 3 of DreamLeague Season 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Acid_Hydra: 包含剧毒术士的“酸液怪蛇”套装内所有物品，更有三色款式、自定义瘟疫守卫、载入画面和自定义指针相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Acid_Hydra: Contains all of the items in the 'Acid Hydra' item set for Venomancer. Includes three color styles, custom ward, loading screen and custom cursors.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Antipode_Couriers: 造型特异的快递员 - 天辉和夜魇军团对应不同的模型、动作和粒子特效。对立攻击！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Antipode_Courier: A special delivery - different models, animations and particles for Radiant and Dire. Opposites attack!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_of_America_#2: 64支参赛队伍将在晋级赛中争夺主赛事的晋级名额。晋级队伍将与8支受邀队伍一同争夺5千美元的奖金。这件捆绑包内含守卫“狡猾之跗”，以及美洲之战联赛第2赛季的观战资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_of_Americ: 64 registered teams will compete in the qualifying round for their entry into the main event. The winners fight the 8 invited teams for the $5,000 prize pool. This bundle grants the Savvy Tarsus Ward and access to view games from the Battle of America #2 League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_of_Central_Europe_: 16支欧洲顶尖队伍将争夺3万美元奖金，并决定谁才是欧洲之冠！这件捆绑包除了中欧之战第3赛季的观战资格外还附赠米波的“勘探者财物”套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_of_Centra: 16 best teams in Europe compete for the $30,000 prize pool and decide who is the best! This bundle grants you the Spelunker's Haul Meepo set and access to view games from the Battle of Central Europe Season 3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_of_Central_Europe_: 16支欧洲顶尖队伍将争夺3万美元奖金，并决定谁才是欧洲之冠！这张门票只允许你观看中欧之战第3赛季，并不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Battle_of_Centra: 16 best teams in Europe compete for the $30,000 prize pool and decide who is the best! This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Battle of Central Europe Season 3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CZSK_Dota_2_League_Season: 捷克斯洛伐克联赛已迈入第三赛季，本赛季横跨两个月的时间。胜利之师将获得现金大奖！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CZSK_Dota_2_Leag: The third season of Czech-Slovakia league will take place over a two months period. The winner will receive prize money upon victory!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Defenders_Vi: 在全阵营选择模式的比赛中，于开赛前使用这枚护符，预测己方队伍将取得比赛的胜利。三次预测正确将获得防御之视的珍藏。两次预测错误后护符将会变成护符碎片，可用于物品轮回。获得的珍藏与普通珍藏的交易限制规则相同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Def: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Defender's Vision. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Any resulting items are subject to the same trade restrictions as the Treasure of the Defender's Vision.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charming_Celebration: 用一丝喜庆来宽慰下自己！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charming_Celebra: Console yourself with a bit of festivity!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2Net_Cup_#1: Dota2.net联赛是一项全新的联赛，参赛的是来自独联体地区的半职业队伍，他们将争夺15000卢布的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota2Net_Cup_#1: Dota2.net Cup is a new tournament featuring semi-pro teams from the CIS region competing for a 15,000 ruble prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Regions_Season_2: 顶尖队伍将在各地区的循环赛争夺现金大奖和总决赛的参赛资格！这件捆绑包除了在游戏内观看所有比赛的资格外，还特别赠送娜迦海妖的“大洋女皇”套装！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Regions_Sea: Join us as top teams compete for cash prizes in regional round robin matches and ultimately a double-elimination grand finals! This ticket gives you access to watch all in game matches as well as the beautiful - Treasures of the Tempest - Naga set!\"
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fires_of_Vashundol: 包含末日使者的“烈焰魔将”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。此物品是与Evil Geniuses战队联合创建，每售出一套他们都将得到分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fires_of_Vashund: Contains all of the items in the 'Fires of Vashundol' set for Doom plus ambient particles and loading screen. Created in partnership with Evil Geniuses, who receive a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GameGod_Games_Arena_DOTA_: 由MTS赞助、NODWIN Gaming主办的印度最大的DOTA 2锦标赛“GameGod游戏竞技场”将于2014年11月14日至16日举办。有64支战队将为锦标赛的奖金一较高下，主要赛事的总奖金高达16 000美元，冠军将获得5 000美元的奖励。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GameGod_Games_Ar: India's largest DOTA 2 Tournament  \"GameGod Games Arena\" powered by MTS and organized by NODWIN Gaming will be held from 14th to 16th Nov, 2014. The total prize pool for the main event is USD $16,000 split between top 64 teams in cash prize with the Champion winning USD $5000 as first place prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy: 一座姿势优美的英雄雕像，装备后可以自定义基地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy: A posed hero statue that can be equipped to customize your base.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy_Ore_Compend: 这件物品使用后就可以创造英雄雕像。本物品为2014年国际邀请赛互动指南玩家专属。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy_Or: Use this item to create a Heroic Effigy.  This material is exclusive to owners of the International Compendium 2014.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hexgill_the_Lane_Shark: “小鲨鱼”和其他普通鲨鱼一样，悄悄潜入小径，藏于树林中，等待伏击猎物的机会。这样的生命并没有崇高的意义。“小鲨鱼”坚信自己可以变得更伟大。每每有机会成为一名信使时，他意识到了自己生命意义之所在。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hexgill_the_Lane: Hexgill was just like any other ordinary lane shark, stalking the well-worn paths and hiding in the trees, waiting to pounce.  But a lane shark's life is a simple thing, lacking in higher meaning.  Hexgill knew there was must be more.  When caught in a net and offered a chance to serve as courier, he knew he'd found his calling in life.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Imperial_Flame_Swords_Pac: 包含灰烬之灵的“帝皇之焰宝剑”和“帝皇之焰副手宝剑”。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Imperial_Flame_S: Contains the Imperial Flame Sword and Imperial Flame Offhand Sword for Ember Spirit.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Manifold_Paradox:
武器根据获得的积分进行升级。使用幻影刺客每赢得一场比赛将获得1分。达到40分可以升到2级，达到100分可以升到最高级。

年迈的铁匠克雷勒拿起他们家族十一个世代以来反复锤打锻造的宝剑，发出了一声凄厉的尖笑。宝剑已经异常锋利，一经挥舞就听到如同撕扯布料的声音，现实竟然被砍出了缺口。克雷勒在缺口里认出了数刻之前的自己，高举同样的那把盖世神兵。突然他的脑海里充满了贪念，他像发狂般要将这个自己砍死，把这柄宝剑也据为己有。但是太迟了，克雷勒感觉到很熟悉的伤痛，他的脑海中瞬间充满了被自己杀死的回忆...
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Manifold_Paradox:
Weapon evolves by earning points. Any match won using Phantom Assassin will earn you 1 point. Earning 40 points will upgrade the weapon to Level 2, and earning 100 points causes the weapon to reach its maximum evolution.

With a raspy cackle, the elder smith Craler swung the sword that his family had spent eleven generations to fold and forge. So sharp it was that, with a sound like tearing fabric, a rip in reality tore open. Through this rip, Craler recognized himself from moments before, holding aloft the very same coveted blade. Then, in a fit of greed and madness, he cut this earlier self down to seize the twin sword as his own. Too late, however, Craler felt a familiar wound, and was suddenly filled with the memory of being cut down himself...
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_OGSeries_DotA2_Online_Sea: 顶尖的西班牙选手将争夺250欧元的奖金。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rune_of_the_Foreseers_Con: 将这颗宝石镶嵌到物品中能使其记录幻影刺客成功执行契约的次数。契约执行次数越多，她的无双诡魅会变得越强大。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rune_of_the_Fore: Adding this gem to an item will enable that item to track Phantom Assassin's completed contracts. The more contracts completed, the more powerful her Manifold Paradox becomes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_1: SLTV自有赛事群星联赛的第11赛季。全球顶尖战队将在规模超一流的Dota 2锦标赛中争夺超过8万美元的奖金。这件捆绑包内含露娜的“暮光猛兽”套装，以及SLTV群星联赛第11赛季的观战资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series: The 11th Season of SLTV's own StarSeries. The best teams in the world compete in one of the largest Dota 2 Tournaments around for the $80,000+ prize pool. This bundle grants the Dusklight Marauder Luna Set and access to view games from SLTV Star Series Season 11.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_6th_eSports_World_Cha: 一年一度的国际电子竞技大赛，由国际运动协会认证。本届世界冠军赛的参赛队伍均为国际电子竞技联盟旗下成员。Dota 2是世界电子竞技冠军赛的压轴项目，参赛的有Newbee和MVP等等代表性战队。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_6th_eSports_: The annual International Competition of e-Sports which the International Sport Society approves. All member federations under IeSF participate in this World Championship. DOTA 2 is a main game title in e-Sports World Championship which national representative teams such as Newbee and MVP participate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Battle_Fury_2014: 2014年狂战联赛由16支来自拉丁美洲的队伍参加，他们将争夺5000美元的奖金。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Defenders: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内含完整的物品套装。此珍藏内物品在2015年2月11日后才可以进行交易。稀有奖励不受此限制。若珍藏是经由“重重宝藏的珍藏”解封而得，珍藏和内含物品在2015年3月14日后才可以进行交易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable until Feb 11th, 2015. Rare rewards are not subject to this restriction. The Nested Cache version of this treasure and all its contents will be tradable and marketable after March 14, 2015.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_Insomnia53_Dota_: Insomnia52将举办本年度最盛大的Dota 2联赛：华硕ROG Dota 2联赛。来自欧洲各地的战队将在英国最大的游戏节上决一死战，主舞台上将连续三天上演让人热血沸腾的总决赛。每支战队都需要扫清英伦王者战队之路上一切障碍，且看4000英镑花落谁家。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_ROG_Insomni: Insomnia52 hosts our biggest Dota 2 tournament of the year, the ASUS ROG Dota 2 Cup. Teams from across Europe will compete at the UK’s biggest gaming festival, bringing you three full days of heated action culminating in a Main Stage Final. With £4000 on the line, each team will be pulling out all the stops to be crowned the greatest Dota 2 team in Britain.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Esportal_Dota_2_League: Esportal Dota 2联赛是一项振奋人心的全新国际性赛事，奖金高达11万欧元，而且选拔赛完全公开，报名参赛队伍没有上限。马上观战顶尖Dota战队在多个选拔赛中披荆斩棘，晋级线下总决赛。这件捆绑包内含树精卫士的“碎月晶石”套装，以及Esportal Dota 2联赛的观战资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Esportal_Dota_2_: The Esportal Dota 2 League is an exciting new international event with a 110,000 euro prizepool and a truly open qualifier which will have no limits on the number of participating teams. Watch the best teams in Dota 2 take on all challengers in multiple qualifier events, culminating in a LAN finals! This bundle grants you the Moonshard Overgrowth Treant item set and access to view games from the Esportal Dota 2 League.

Watch the best teams in Dota take on all challengers in multiple qualifier events, culminating in a LAN finals! This ticket only gives you access to view games from the Esportal Dota 2 League.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fantasy_S2_Bronz: A custom teleport effect given as a reward for placing third in a Fantasy Season 2 league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fantasy_S2_Gold_Teleport: 自定义传送特效，梦幻联赛第2赛季冠军奖励。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fantasy_S2_Gold_: A custom teleport effect given as a reward for placing first in a Fantasy Season 2 league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fantasy_S2_Silver_Telepor: 自定义传送特效，梦幻联赛第2赛季亚军奖励。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fantasy_S2_Silve: A custom teleport effect given as a reward for placing second in a Fantasy Season 2 league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fluttering_Staff: 在制作这把法杖时，先知非常轻柔地将这根树干拔出，叶子上的蝴蝶毫无察觉。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Fluttering_Staff: So gentle was the prophet that when he pulled the branch to make this staff, the butterflies upon the leaves remained. Includes ambient particle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gargoyle_Wing: 相传一只狩猎中的石像鬼穿过了死亡面纱，这把剑便耗尽了它的灵魂。更有人说这种生物存在与否至今仍是不解之谜。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gargoyle_Wing: Tis said this sword consumed the soul of a hunting gargoyle who travelled beyond the veil of death. Yet such creatures are but rumor and myth. Or so they say. Includes ambient particle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_Wrap:
双击后选择一件可以交易的物品，将可以对其进行包装。包装完成的礼品可以右键选择“赠送好友”或交易功能送给好友列表中的好友。

“礼品包装”工具将于2015年1月15日自刀塔商城下架。如果一直未使用，在2015年3月15日后将会消失。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gift_Wrap:
Use this Gift Wrap on another item to package it up. The wrapped gift can then be delivered to someone on your friends list. 
	
	Gift Wrap is available on the Dota 2 Store until January 15th, 2015. It will expire on March 15th, 2015 if unused.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Guardians_of_Justice: 这只信使是与KDL第3赛季冠军MVP Phoenix战队联合创建的，每售出一份他们都将获得相应分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Guardians_of_Jus: This courier was created in partnership with KDL Season Three winners MVP Phoenix, who receive a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Guise_of_the_Winged_Bolt: 包含卓尔游侠的“蝶翼之箭外装”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Guise_of_the_Win: Includes all of the items in the 'Guise of the Envious Archer' for Drow Ranger plus Loading Screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hells_Usher: 一把神秘的兵器，长久以来世间谣传早已毁灭。上面尖利的锋刃会直接将敌人引入地狱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hells_Usher: A mysterious blade long rumored to exist.  Its razor sharp edge ushers enemies straight into hell.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Keen_Machine: 这件捆绑包内含狙击手的“基恩之械”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Keen_Machine: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Keen Machine' set for Sniper plus loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Krane_the_Enlightened: 信使将于2015年2月28日后可以交易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Krane_the_Enligh: This courier will not be tradable or marketable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Krane_the_Enlightened_Upg: 这件物品可以解锁“小仙鹤”信使的升级款式。升级工具将于2015年2月28日后可以交易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Krane_the_Enligh: This item enables the upgraded texture to be unlocked on 'Krane the Enlightened' through the style menu. This upgrade will not be tradable or marketable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Molten_Claw: 在一场拉锯战中，斧王急于杀光敌人，他冲进了一座熔炉，翻找合身的护甲。结果找到这件刚从火中淬炼而成的战铠，穿上一试相当满意。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Molten_Claw: In a rush to lay his enemies down, Axe burst into a forge to scrounge for suitable armor. What he found was still fresh from the fire, which suited Axe just fine. Includes ambient particle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Griffin: 在一个新月之夜，米拉娜在银月森林的迷宫之中发现了一只幼小的狮鹫。现在，当初年幼的异兽已经迫不及待要效忠于他的主人了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Griffin: On a night of a crescent moon, Mirana found a griffin cub in the maze of Nightsilver woods. Now the strange little beast is eager to serve his mistress.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Showcase_Block_of_Tr: 使用这件物品打造凯旋之团雕像。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Showcase_Bl: Use this item to create a Team Showcase of Triumph.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Barb_of_Skadi: 在暗黑之礁监狱深处，巫师和铁匠合计后打造了一把独门武器。经由莫名之材打造后，这把兵器无论是开凿牢墙还是开膛破肚都是轻而易举。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Barb_of_Skad: Deep in Dark Reef Prison, a sorcerer and a blacksmith combined their trades to create a unique weapon. Fashioned from found materials,  the blade can open prison walls as easily as it opens bellies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Igneous_Stone: 包含小小的“火成英石”套装内所有物品。这套物品是与Team Empire联合创建的，每售出一份他们都将获得相应分成。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Igneous_Ston: Contains all of the items in the 'Igneous Stone' set for Tiny. These items were created in partnership with Team Empire, who receive a portion of every purchase.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_True_Crow: 这件捆绑包内含暗影萨满的“精纯之鸦”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_True_Crow: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'True Crow' set for Shadow Shaman plus a loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Fearless_Sple: 无需符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内物品将于2015年3月1日后可以交易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_Fear: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Frosted_F: 无需任何符印即可解封此珍藏。珍藏内含完整的物品套装。此珍藏内物品在2015年3月15日后才可以进行交易。稀有奖励不受此限制，但是若此珍藏是解封“重重宝藏的珍藏”而得则依然受到限制。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable until March 15, 2015. Rare rewards are not subject to this restriction unless this treasure is attained through the Treasure of the Nested Cache.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vespertine_Guard: 这件捆绑包内含亚巴顿的“薄暮守卫”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠：
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vespertine_Guard: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Vespertine Guard' Set for Abaddon plus loading screen:
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Wrapped_Gift: 一件神秘的礼物。一定是好友所赠！赶快打开看看吧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wrapped_Gift: A mysterious wrapped gift. It must be from a friend! Open it to find out what's inside.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Dota_2_Asia_Championship_2015_: 2015年Dota 2亚洲邀请赛 - 100互动指南积分
2015年Dota 2亚洲邀请赛 - 2400互动指南积分
2015年Dota 2亚洲邀请赛 - 25互动指南积分
2015年Dota 2亚洲邀请赛 - 500互动指南积分
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Fantasy_S2_Bronze_Teleport: 梦幻联赛第2赛季青铜传送特效
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Fantasy_S2_Gold_Teleport: 梦幻联赛第2赛季黄金传送特效
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Fantasy_S2_Silver_Teleport: 梦幻联赛第2赛季白银传送特效
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Left_Arm_of_the_Igneo: Left Arm of the Igneous Stone
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Right_Arm_of_the_Igne: Right Arm of the Igneous Stone
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Teacher_of_the_Flame_: Teacher of the Flame Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Barb_of_Skadi: 在暗黑之礁监狱深处，巫师和铁匠合计后打造了一把独门武器。经由莫名之材打造后，这把兵器无论是开凿牢墙还是开膛破肚都是轻而易举。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Barb_of_S: Deep in Dark Reef Prison, a sorcerer and a blacksmith combined their trades to create a unique weapon. Fashioned from found materials,  the blade can open prison walls as easily as it opens bellies.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_3rd_BoraDota_Cup: 第3届BoraDota联赛将有64支南美洲战队争夺1000雷亚尔的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_3rd_BoraDota_Cup: The 3rd Edition of BoraDota Cup with 64 South American teams fighting for $1000 dollars.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Barganizer_Online_Tournam: Barganizer线上联赛第3赛季将邀请第1赛季到第3赛季的三甲战队前来参赛！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Barganizer_Onlin: Season 3 of barganizer online tournament which from top 3 from season 1 until season 3 gonna be invited to the last season of Barganizer Online Tournament !
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_BelNation_Dota_League_7: 来自乌克兰和捷克的地区战队将争夺24 000卢布的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_BelNation_Dota_L: Teams from the Belgorod region and Chernozemya will fight for the prize fund of 24,000 rubles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_6: CEVO联赛第6赛季是一项北美职业赛事，众多战队将在为期8周的常规赛季中同台竞技，然后在淘汰赛中争夺超过1000美元的奖金和直接晋级未来赛季的机会。捆绑包内含“秘湮学院的暗黑馆长”套装，同时可以观看CEVO联赛第6赛季。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_6: CEVO Season 6 is a North American Pro-Am event where teams compete in an 8-week regular season, followed by Playoffs for over $1,000 + bundle sales and the chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons. This bundle grants the Dark Curator of Ultimyr Warlock Set and access to view games from CEVO Season 6.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_6_Ticket: CEVO联赛第6赛季是一项北美职业赛事，众多战队将在为期8周的常规赛季中同台竞技，然后在淘汰赛中争夺超过1000美元的奖金和直接晋级未来赛季的机会。这张门票只允许你观看CEVO联赛第6赛季，不包括附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CEVO_Season_6_Ti: CEVO Season 6 is a North American Pro-Am event where teams compete in an 8-week regular season, followed by Playoffs for over $1,000 + bundle sales and the chance to advance to higher skill divisions in future seasons. This ticket only gives access to view games from CEVO Season 6.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cup_of_Heroes_2: 很荣幸宣布Dota 2英雄联赛即将开始。我们迫不及待地想目睹您战队的风采！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cup_of_Heroes_2: Are pleased to announce that the declared set of commands on the Dota 2 tournament Cup of Heroes. We hasten to glorify your team or just to test your skills!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cyberviews_1x1_Cup_Season: 来自独联体国家的选手和粉丝将在一对一锦标赛里争夺1000卢布的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cyberviews_1x1_C: Players fans from the CIS region will compete in the tournament 1x1 for a prize of 1000 rub.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DGC_AMLeague: 该联赛的前四名战队将获得与职业战队对抗的资格。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DGC_AMLeague: The top 4 teams from this qualifying league guarantee their spot to compete against the pros.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DOTA2cz_Mirror_event_2014: 八名来自捷克和斯洛伐克的玩家将争夺30欧元的奖金。该锦标赛将于圣诞节前后举行。规则：镜像模式，无魔瓶、神符、中立生物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DOTA2cz_Mirror_e: Eight top Czech and Slovak players will compete for in-game prizes of over 30 . The tournament will run about Christmass. Same picks, no bottles, no runes, no neutral creeps.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dongyang_Games: 战队将争夺Dongyang Games的冠军。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dongyang_Games: Teams compete for the top spot in the Dongyang Games.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaLAN_Winter_2015: 德国规模最大的Dota线下锦标赛将迎来第12赛季。该5V5锦标赛的总奖金高达2100欧元。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DotaLAN_Winter_2: Germany's biggest Dota dedicated LAN party returns for it's 12th edition. The 5on5 tournament will be rewarded with a prize pool of up to 2,100 EUR.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Solo_League_by_Pha: 16名选手将争夺Dota 2单挑联赛第2赛季的现金奖励
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Solo_Leag: 16 players will compete for a cash prize in second season solo league by phazy
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Electro_Dota_2_League__Se: 16支战队将争夺Electro Dota 2联赛第3赛季的冠军
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Electro_Dota_2_L: 16 teams will compete to become champions of the Electro Dota 2 League - Season 3
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_GamerPVP_InHouse: 拉丁美洲内战联赛旨在提供职业选手和业余选手互相切磋的平台。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_GamerPVP_InHouse: Latinamerican Inhouse league with the purpose of bringin profesionalism to amateur players.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Malu_Dota_Series_Finale: 在2013年我们主办了总共四届Dota 2公开赛。该是时候再向前进一步了。相比较而言，短期的杯赛适合更多的选手，我们的目标就是让joinDOTA成为任何水平的战队都能来参赛的固定平台。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Malu_Dota_Series: In 2013 we have hosted a total of four open Dota 2 tournaments. Now it's time to do the next step. While short cups are great for a lot of people, it was still our goal to make joinDOTA an even more stable place to compete for teams of any skill level.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NADotA_Elite_League_Janua: 北美最具天赋的选手将在传统内战赛制下进行鏖战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NADotA_Elite_Lea: The most talented players in North America compete in the classic inhouse league format.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NCups_Season_1: 16支业余战队将争夺1000卢布的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NCups_Season_1: 16 amateur teams will compete for the prize of 1000 rubles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pikabu_GL_Tournament: 业余战队将争夺现金大奖和其他丰厚奖励。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pikabu_GL_Tourna: Amateur teams will compete for cash prizes and other valuable rewards.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ProDota_League_season_3: 选手将争夺3000+卢布的奖金
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ProDota_League_s: Players compete for the 3,000+ ruble prize pool
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ShowMatch_Coliseo: ShowMatch竞技联赛第1赛季由Isurus Gaming和Not Today共同举办。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ShowMatch_Colise: The first season for the ShowMatch Coliseo league hosted by Isurus Gaming and Not Today.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SngLadder_Season_One: 数百名选手将为SngLadder联赛第1赛季的冠军和丰厚奖金展开激烈争夺。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SngLadder_Season: Hundreds of players fight for the top spot and valuable prizes in the SngLadder Season One League.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Summertime_Madness_Champi: 赶快来观看24支来自南非的战队在第一届“盛夏狂欢”Dota 2冠军赛中角逐冠军宝座
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Summertime_Madne: Watch 24 South African teams battle it out in the first annual Summertime Madness Dota 2 Championship
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Virtute_League_Season_1: 战队将争夺100+美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Virtute_League_S: Teams compete for the $100+ prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Wars_2015__DSP_Tic: 该锦标赛为公开报名，任何战队都可以免费在Legionbattles.com注册参赛，共同争夺1200美元的奖金。这张门票只允许你观看2015年冬季之战的比赛，不包含附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Wars_2015: This tournament is open registration, and any team can sign up for free at Legionbattles.com to compete for $1200. This ticket only grants access to view games from the Winter Wars 2015 league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_okDOTA_2__GG_2014_Ticket: ok.- DOTA 2杯是东南亚和大亚洲地区规模最大的DOTA 2赛事。参赛的是两支通过资格赛的新加坡战队对阵6支受邀的地区战队。于此同时，ok.- DOTA 2联赛2014-2015赛季也将打响第一赛季，届时有32支战队参与奖金的争夺。这张门票只允许你观看ok.-Dota 2 @ GG 2014联赛，不包括附赠的物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_okDOTA_2__GG_201: ok.- DOTA 2 CUP is SEA+Oceania's LARGEST DOTA 2 Competition with more than SGD $50,000 of cash prize up for grabs. It will feature 2 qualified Singapore teams against 6 invited regional teams. The ok.- DOTA 2 LEAGUE (2014-2015) will be kicking off Season 1 concurrently, and 32 teams will fight for a part of the prize pool. This ticket only grants access to view games from ok.-Dota 2 @ GG 2014 league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_okDota_2__GG_2014: ok.- DOTA 2杯是东南亚和大亚洲地区规模最大的DOTA 2赛事。参赛的是两支通过资格赛的新加坡战队对阵6支受邀的地区战队。于此同时，ok.- DOTA 2联赛2014-2015赛季也将打响第一赛季，届时有32支战队参与奖金的争夺。这件捆绑包内含“魔龙战斧”武器，同时可以观看ok.-Dota 2 @ GG 2014联赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_okDota_2__GG_201: ok.- DOTA 2 CUP is SEA+Oceania's LARGEST DOTA 2 Competition with more than SGD $50,000 of cash prize up for grabs. It will feature 2 qualified Singapore teams against 6 invited regional teams. The ok.- DOTA 2 LEAGUE (2014-2015) will be kicking off Season 1 concurrently, and 32 teams will fight for a part of the prize pool. This bundle grants the Battleaxe of the Basilisk Axe Weapon and grants access to view games from ok.-Dota 2 @ GG 2014 league.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Dota_2_Solo_League_by: Dota 2 Solo League by Phazy: Season 2
Tokens.DOTA_Item_DAC_2015__25_Points: 2015年亚洲邀请赛 - 25互动指南积分
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Asia_Championship_: 使用2015年亚洲邀请赛互动指南来跟进今年的大赛进展。不断升级并赢取奖励，还有更多内容即将登场！仅次于亲临现场的至尊体验。互动指南的所有奖励物品将在2015年2月28日后可以进行交易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Asia_Cham: Use the DAC 2015 Compendium to keep up to date on this year's tournament action. Earn rewards, level up, and more! It's the next-best thing to being there. Rewards from the Compendium will not be tradable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Nested_Ca: 无需符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内的所有珍藏和物品（包括稀有物品）将在2015年3月14日后可以进行交易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. All treasures and items within, including rare items, will be tradable and marketable after March 14, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_64Quarters_Fast_Cup_: 业余Dota 2战队将在64Quarters快战联赛中决战5轮，争夺现金大奖。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_64Quarters_Fast_: Amateur Dota 2 teams will compete in 5 fast cups by 64Quarters Cups for the cash prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Revenant: 又有一阵风暴席卷了整个战场。雷鸣所到之处，电闪随即而至。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Armor_of_the_Rev: A new storm is blowing across the battlefield.  Where there is thunder, there is sure to be lighting.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Australian_Amateur_Cup: 澳大利亚业余联赛旨在帮助地区业余战队互相切磋、共同进步，推动Dota 2在澳大利亚的发展。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Australian_Amate: An Australian tournament targeting the Amateur teams of the region to help them learn, grow, and to further promote Australian DotA 2.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Pit_League_Season_3: Dota之渊联赛带着第3赛季回归了！来自北美和欧洲的顶尖队伍将竞相争夺8万美元以上的奖金。这件捆绑包内含帕吉套装“疗疾装甲”，界面皮肤“渊之炉石”和联赛界面皮肤。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_Pit_League_Season_3_: Dota之渊联赛带着第3赛季回归了！来自北美和欧洲的顶尖队伍将竞相争夺8万美元以上的奖金。这张门票只允许你观看Dota之渊联赛第3赛季的比赛，不包含附赠的物品。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Drowned_Horseman: 魔霭领主将身体沉浸在圣池的水中进行洗礼，再次从池底出现时已经重新觉醒，形态也发生了改变。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Drowned_Horseman: Lord Avernus immersed himself in the baptismal waters of the sacred font, and arose reawakened and transformed from the untold depths.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Favors_of_the_Sh: He that speaketh for the Shades casts his own light.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rite_of_the_Acol: Some rites of passage should not be attempted.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Spectral_Conservator: 在她无数的表现中，幽鬼发现自己正在适应战争的急变。慢慢地，她汇聚成更具适应性的形态。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Spectral_Conserv: In her myriad manifestations, Spectre finds herself adapting to the exigencies of war. Slowly, she has converged on a more suitable form.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Surgical_Precision: 厌倦了马虎的屠戮后，屠夫将全新的职业作为自己的目标，尽管他身怀的还是屠戮用的天赋。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Surgical_Precisi: Bored with careless slaughter, the butcher takes aim at a new occupation, though he brings the same talent for slaughter.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Arch_Temptress: 她曾引诱了命数，而命数本身无力抗拒。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Arch_Temptre: She tempted fate, and even fate could not resist.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_Hallowed_: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。购买的珍藏和解封后获得的套装，包括其中的稀有物品将于2015年4月23日后可以交易。珍藏销售额的10%将直接进入Dota之渊联赛第3赛季的奖金池。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Treasure_of_the_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. All treasures and items within, including rare items, will be tradable and marketable after April 23rd, 2015. 10% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards Dota Pit League Season 3.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_UGC_Dota_2_League_Season_: UGC联赛目前是以Dota 2和TF2竞技为主的社区联赛。这件捆绑包内含“守卫之鸽”守卫以及UGC Dota 2联赛第3赛季的观战资格。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Cudgel: 许多年过去了，利维坦发现自己被宿敌的沉船绊倒了。现在他把旗舰上的桅杆扯下作为武器，挡路之人都将付出代价。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Claddish_Cudgel: After many years, Leviathan recently stumbled upon the sunken wreckage of his rival's fleet. He now wields the mast of their flagship as a cudgel, and woe betide any who get in his way.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_European_Elite_League_Feb: 欧洲最具天赋的选手将在传统的内战赛制中一较高下。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Griffon:
在一个新月之夜，米拉娜在银月森林的迷宫之中发现了一只幼小的狮鹫。现在，当初年幼的异兽已经迫不及待要效忠于他的主人了。

这件物品包含自定义跳跃音效，站立和展示动作。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Moon_Griffon:
On a night of a crescent moon, Mirana found a griffin cub in the maze of Nightsilver woods. Now the strange little beast is eager to serve his mistress.

This item includes custom Leap sound, idle and loadout animations.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NADotA_Elite_League_Febru: 北美最具天赋的选手将在传统的内战赛制中一较高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NADotA_Elite_Lea: The most talented players in North America compete in the classic inhouse league format.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NN_Dota_2_League_Season_2: NN Dota 2联赛第2赛季将集结许多来自独联体国家的战队，共同为现金大奖而战。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NN_Dota_2_League: The second season of NN Dota 2 league will gather many teams from CIS, which will compete for a cash prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Promo_Armor_of_Tustakuri: 包含敌法师的“星隐护甲”套装内所有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Promo_Armor_of_T: Includes all of the items in 'The Armor of Tustakuri' set for Anti-Mage.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapier_of_the_Burning_God: 这对圣人的遗物长年以来都在光火堡内封存。众人见到的只是武器上隐隐的寒锋。而在炘握住之时，双剑上才显现出真正的力量，内在的热力又使其开始燃烧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapier_of_the_Bu: These sacred relics were long kept in the Fortress of Flares. Cold steel weapons put on display for all to see. It was not until Xin took them for his own that their true power manifested, and they burned again with inner heat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapiers_of_the_Burning_Go:
灰烬之灵武器

这对圣人的遗物长年以来都在光火堡内封存。众人见到的只是武器上隐隐的寒锋。而在炘握住之时，双剑上才显现出真正的力量，内在的热力又使其开始燃烧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rapiers_of_the_B:
Ember Spirit Weapons

These sacred relics were long kept in the Fortress of Flares. Cold steel weapons put on display for all to see. It was not until Xin took them for his own that their true power manifested, and they burned again with inner heat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sapphire_Cask: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内物品将于2015年2月28日后可以交易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sapphire_Cask: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Skittering_Desolation: 编织者在时间之中穿行时，在时空的裂隙之外发现了绝无可能的物件。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Skittering_Desol: When Weaver slipped through time, he found something impossible just beyond the rift.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TPD2_Season_1: 16支独联体队伍将为30美元的奖金一决高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TPD2_Season_1: 16 CIS teams will battle for a prize pool of 30 dollars.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Armor_of_Tustakuri: 包含敌法师的“星隐护甲”套装内所有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Armor_of_Tus: Includes all of the items in 'The Armor of Tustakuri' set for Anti-Mage.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Winterblight: 这把武器由坚石和冰川的寒冰雕刻而成，相传刀锋上的寒气可以冻结刀下的亡魂。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winterblight: Carved of stone and glacial ice, its edge is said to be cold enough to freeze the very souls of its victims.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_YCSL_Season_3: 16支队伍将为300美元的奖金一决高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_YCSL_Season_3: Sixteen teams will compete for a $300 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_joinDOTA_League_#5: 面向所有玩家的全球性Dota 2联赛。联赛包含半决赛组和业余组的比赛。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_joinDOTA_League_: The global Dota 2 league for everyone. This includes most matches from the semi-pro division 2 and some matches from the amateur divisions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_rapier_burning_god_weapon: 这对圣人的遗物长年以来都在光火堡内封存。众人见到的只是武器上隐隐的寒锋。而在炘握住之时，双剑上才显现出真正的力量，内在的热力又使其开始燃烧。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_rapier_burning_g: These sacred relics were long kept in the Fortress of Flares. Cold steel weapons put on display for all to see. It was not until Xin took them for his own that their true power manifested, and they burned again with inner heat.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_serrakura: 齿樱，一种极具致命性的鲜花，它的花瓣就像锋利的尖刀。当遮面的铁匠完成这把刀时，他敬畏地说道，这就是甘愿献身的美丽。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_serrakura: The Serrakura is a blossom of incredible deadliness, its petals serrated like the sharpest knife.  When the masked swordsmith finished this blade, he spoke with reverence.  Here, at last, is a killing kind of beauty.
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Rapier_of_the_Burning: Rapier of the Burning God Offhand
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Twin_Blades_of_Aureli: 在遗忘之城地下富丽的锻冶场中，对剑“永世之辉耀”是失却的文明在炼金术上最高的造诣。不再是钢铁，但也非黄金，双剑相比这两种金属，已然更加稀有，更加耐用。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Twin_Blades_: Forged in the gilded smithery beneath the forgotten city, the Eternal Radiance Blades are a lost civilization's greatest achievement in alchemical transmutation.  No longer steel, but not quite gold, the twin blades are something rarer and stronger than both.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bajie: 信使将在2015年2月28日后可以交易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bajie: This courier will not be tradable or marketable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bajie_Upgrade: 这件物品可以解锁“八小戒”信使的升级款式。升级工具将于2015年2月28日后可以交易。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bajie_Upgrade: This item enables the upgraded texture to be unlocked on 'Bajie' through the style menu. This upgrade will not be tradable or marketable until March 1st, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Butter_Blunder: 跌跌撞撞又无比繁忙，黄油小生因他的笨手笨脚为世人所知。尽管身体灵活欠佳，他讨人喜爱的愿望热切非常。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Butter_Blunder: As busy as they are clumsy, butter blunders are known for their butterfingers.  What they lack in dexterity, they make up for in their earnest desire to please.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASP_Mars_Gaming_League: 西班牙Dota 2联赛，超过30支战队在不同分组中争夺600欧元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASP_Mars_Gaming_: A spanish Dota 2 league, featuring more than 30 teams competing in various divisions for a 600 Euro prizepool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Frostfangs: 一把来源未知的巨弓，原来属于一个前去挑战卓尔游侠的雪魔。恶魔的技艺存在着破绽，就这样崔希丝给自己找到了新的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bow_of_the_Frost: A great bow of unknown origins, it was wielded by a snow demon that came to challenge the Drow Ranger. The Demon's skill was found wanting and so Traxex found a new weapon for herself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_CI_Cyber_League_Second_Cu: 32支业余战队将争夺巨额奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CI_Cyber_League_: 32 amateur teams compete for the grand prize.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Forward_to_victory_cup#2: 32支来自独联体国家的战队将争夺100美元的奖金
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Forward_to_victo: 32 teams from the CIS will battle for a prize of 100$
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Game_Ninja_2015: 游戏忍者联赛是一年一度的竞技活动，由保加利亚PC世界创办。今年将首次加入Dota 2，联赛由Dota 2保加利亚协会主办。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Game_Ninja_2015: Game Ninja is yearly gaming event, created by PC World Bulgaria. This year is the first which will include Dota 2 and the tournament will be organized by Dota 2 Bulgaria.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Glowbat: 在基迪岛丛林深处，生物的进化次序大为反常。雨林中的荧光蝠利用舒缓的荧光吸引猎物，紧接着就是致命的毒液。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Glowbat: Deep in the jungles of Jidi, evolution has taken a strange turn. The bioluminescent bats of the rainforest lure their prey with a comforting glow, only to incinerate their unsuspecting victims with a caustic venom.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_InsaLan_X: 16支法国战队将在法国雷恩的线下比赛中争夺奖金和荣誉。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_InsaLan_X: 16 french teams will fight for wealth and glory at this LAN event in Rennes, France.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Possible_Heroes_1x1_Seaso: 32名选手将在“无限英雄”1x1锦标赛的首届联赛中争夺1600卢布的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Possible_Heroes_: 32 players will compete for a prize pool of 1600 RUB in the first season of the Possible Heroes 1x1 tournament.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Romania__Hall_of_Fame: “名人堂”联赛是专门面向业余玩家的锦标赛，让他们在竞技氛围中展示自己的技艺和才华。前20名玩家将受邀前往布加勒斯特的线下决赛，争夺价值1000美元的现金和周边。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Romania__Hall_of: Hall of Fame is a tournament dedicated to amateur players willing to show off their skills and talent in a competitive environment. The best 20 players will be invited to LAN Finals in Bucharest where they can win 1000$ in cash and merchandise.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Skywarriors_Countenance: 一件神圣的宝物，由古老的云巅之城伊塞拉中所居城主世代相传，战盔上附有咒语，只有境内最精英的战士才能接受这秃鹰女神的金面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Skywarriors_Coun: A holy relic passed down from the emperors of the ancient clouded city of Aesthera, this spellbound helm bestows the golden visage of the vulture goddess upon only the most elite warriors of the realm.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tomsk_Dota_2__Champion_So: 来自西伯利亚的选手将在联赛中争夺超过1000卢布的奖金和最佳选手的称号。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tomsk_Dota_2__Ch: Players from Siberia will fight for a prize of 1000+ rubles and the title of the best player in the tournament.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Tomsk_Dota_2__Champion_Solo_Mi: Tomsk Dota 2 - 单挑王者联赛

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_1000_Year_Beast_Ability_P: 1000技能点数，可以在年兽乱斗中升级己方的年兽！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_1000_Year_Beast_: 1000 Ability Points to upgrade your team's Year Beast in the Year Beast Brawl!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_100_Year_Beast_Ability_Po: 100技能点数，可以在年兽乱斗中升级己方的年兽！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_100_Year_Beast_A: 100 Ability Points to upgrade your team's Year Beast in the Year Beast Brawl!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_2400_Year_Beast_Ability_P: 2400技能点数，可以在年兽乱斗中升级己方的年兽！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_2400_Year_Beast_: 2400 Ability Points to upgrade your team's Year Beast in the Year Beast Brawl!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Onyx_Crucible: 这件捆绑包内含军团指挥官的“黑熔之兵”套装所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Onyx: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Arms of the Onyx Crucible' set for Legion Commander plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloody_Ripper: 这件捆绑包内含噬魂鬼的“血腥开膛手”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面和技能图标相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bloody_Ripper: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Bloody Ripper' set for Lifestealer plus loading screen and ability icons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_BuzzCraft_Dota_2_League_#: 半职业队伍将在这Dota 2竞技场中相互较量，争夺30000卢布的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_BuzzCraft_Dota_2: Semiprofessional teams will compete with each other in the Dota 2  arena for a prize of 30,000 rubles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_Fragment: 其实没多大用处，但是能用于下一次轮回！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_Fragment: It's not really useful for much, but you can always recycle it!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Crucible_Jew: 在全阵营选择的比赛开始时使用护符，预测己方将取得胜利。成功预测3次将获得熔炉之珠的珍藏。2次预测错误后护符将变成护符碎片，可用于物品轮回。获得的物品无法交易，但是开出的套装可以赠送一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Cru: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Crucible Jewel. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Resulting items cannot be traded but sets may be gifted once.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Arms_of_the_On: 这件捆绑包内含军团指挥官的“黑熔之兵”套装所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Arms_: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Compendium Arms of the Onyx Crucible' set for Legion Commander plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Bindings_of_th: 包含帕吉的“特典 捕猎手之缚”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面，自定义动作和粒子特效相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Bindi: Contains all of the items in the 'Compendium Bindings of the Trapper Set' for Pudge plus loading screen, custom animations and particles.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Bloody_Ripper: 这件捆绑包内含噬魂鬼的“特典 血腥开膛手”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面和技能图标相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Blood: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Compendium Bloody Ripper' set for Lifestealer plus loading screen and ability icons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Rider_of_Avari: 这件捆绑包内含亚巴顿的“特典 婪心骑士”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Rider: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Compendium Rider of Avarice' Set for Abaddon plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Scorched_Fletc: 包含克林克兹的“烈火弓手”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Scorc: Includes all of the items in the 'Compendium Scorched Fletcher' set for Clinkz, plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Umbra_Rider: 这件捆绑包内含露娜的“月影骑士”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_Umbra: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Compendium Umbra Rider' set for Luna plus a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Conquest__Example_Custom_: 自定义游戏Conquest的自定义游戏示例门票。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Conquest__Exampl: Example Custom Game Ticket for the Conquest Custom Game.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DAC_Compendium_2015_Emoti: 打开表情包将获得2015年Dota2亚洲邀请赛互动指南专属表情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DAC_Compendium_2: Unlocks emoticons earned via the Dota Asia Championship 2015 Compendium.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_Jade:
使用这件物品为最喜爱的英雄打造一座碧玉英雄雕像！选好英雄的造型，写上题词就能进行制作，完成后装备上，这样在游戏里雕像就会出现在己方基地上，所有人都能看见。
雕像石将于2015年3月2日下架。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_:
Use this item to carve your favorite hero into a Heroic Effigy of Jade! Choose your effigy's pose, give it an inscription, then equip it to have your customized monument appear in your team's base for all to see.
	Available on the Dota Store until March 2, 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Faringame_League_Season_1: 顶尖的俄罗斯远东队伍将争夺50000卢布的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Faringame_League: Best russian Far East teams compete for a 50000 ruble prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Fei_Lian_Courier_and_Scre: 包含飞廉信使和载入画面。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Avalanche: 有人说，这件衣服最初是一位古代女王大婚时所穿的喜袍。在其他人口中，这曾经是冰霜食人魔战甲中的斗篷。实际上，由于衣料带有魔力，寒裘就像雪崩一样具有很高的可塑性，可以将自己塑造为多种形态。现在的形态吸引了一只孤独的幼狼，而如今他已成为耐寒的忠诚伙伴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Avalanche: Some say the garment began as the wedding gown of an ancient queen.  Others say it was once a battle cloak of a frost ogre. In truth, the enchanted fabric is as malleable as an avalanche, and can mold itself into various forms. This form has attracted a lone wolf pup, who has now become a hardy and loyal companion.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Avalanche_Bundle: 内含水晶室女的至宝“坍雪寒裘”。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Avalanche_: Contains the 'Frost Avalanche' arcana for Crystal Maiden.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Green_Cup_by_Terrikon: 32支来自独联体的队伍将争夺3200格里夫纳的总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Green_Cup_by_Ter: 32 teams from CIS will fight for a prize pool of 3200 Hryvnia.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_the_Year_Beast_: 由社区艺术家Danidem创作，并在2015年芳晓佳节预告片“年兽来袭”中首次亮相。这件捆绑包含有以下载入画面：年兽之祸，年兽之战和年兽之殇。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Legacy_of_the_Ye: Created by community artist Danidem and featured in the \"Coming of the Year Beast\" trailer for the 2015 New Bloom Festival, this bundle contains the following loading screens: Fall of the Year Beast, Battle of the Year Beast, Terror of the Year Beast.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Major_Allstars_tournament: 由Fallout Gaming主办的“群星云集”联赛将网罗东南亚强队，经过大量的预选赛后晋级队伍将在马来西亚与东西方强队会师决赛。总决赛将于2015年在吉隆坡进行，八支战队将争夺超过10万美元的奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Major_Allstars_t: The Major Allstars tournament by Fallout Gaming will be open for SEA squads, with extensive qualifiers leading to the LAN finals in Malaysia with both eastern and western teams. The finals will take place in Kuala Lumpur in March 2015, with eight challengers battling for the initial $100k prizepool
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Mercurials_Call:
以幽鬼之名为人知晓的墨丘利穿越时空，努力去取得现世的理解。现在可以聆听到她愤怒的本质。
2014年国际邀请赛互动指南玩家专属赠品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Mercurials_Call:
Across time and space, the Spectre known as Mercurial has struggled to be understood. Now the full nature of her violent wrath can be heard.
	Granted exclusively to owners of the 2014 Compendium for The International.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Frankfurt_2015_Qu: ESL One将于2015年6月20-21日重返德国法兰克福的商业银行竞技场！马上加入第二届欧洲Dota 2最强赛事！来自全球的顶尖战队和选手将空降法兰克福一决高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Frankfur: ESL One returns to the Commerzbank-Arena in Frankfurt, Germany on June 20-21 2015! Join us for the second installment of the biggest Dota 2 tournament in Europe! The strongest teams and best players from all over the world will head to Frankfurt to battle it out against one another.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_3_Emoticon_Pac: 打开巅峰联赛聊天表情包，获得5个聊天表情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_3_Emo: Unlocks 5 emoticons for The Summit Emoticon Pack.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_3_Ticket: 巅峰联赛第3赛季延续往届的精神传统，在洛杉矶Beyond the Summit工作室与全球顶尖战队进行亲密接触。联赛门票内含“双面盟友”套装，祈求者的“天赐之懊的面具”，巅峰联赛第三赛季专属界面皮肤，聊天表情和鼠标指针。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Summit_3_Tic:
Continuing the the spirit of previous iterations, The Summit 3 will be another laid-back, intimate experience with the best teams from across the globe duking it out in the Beyond the Summit studio in Los Angeles.
	Includes the Antipodean Allies set, the Mask of Divine Sorrow, The Summit 3 HUD, and The Summit 3 Emoticon and Cursor Packs.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AVF_Gaming_Freak_Season_2: AVF Gaming Freak联赛是一项业余锦标赛，参赛的战队超过200支，将争夺价值500美元的AVF Gaming产品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AVF_Gaming_Freak: AVF Gaming Freak Season 2 is an amateur tournament featuring more than 200 teams fighting for prizes worth of $500 of AVF Gaming products
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_BASECAMP:
终于到了SwissDC推出首届业余联赛的时候了！这次我们隆重举办BASECAMP联赛。

联赛将向所有层级的玩家和地区公开，主战地将位于欧洲。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_BASECAMP:
The time has finally come for SwissDC to introduce our first Amatuer League!
	We proudly present the BASECAMP!
	
	The League is open to all levels of play and regions, with the main focus
	being Europe.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_deafESL_League_Season_4: 为聋哑团体打造的deafESL锦标赛已经进入第4赛季，全球众多战队将同台竞技。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_AMD_Gaming_Arena_Season_2: 一场线下赛事，来自印尼的众多队伍将争夺一千万印尼盾（约合4770元）的奖金！赛事由AMD和Telkomsel联合赞助。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_All_Indonesia_League_2015: 全印尼联赛欢迎各大战队和观众一同享受由Live Game Broadcast带来的职业演播。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Hitbox_European_Champions: 8支受邀队伍将在单淘赛制下争夺2500欧元的奖金！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_North_American_Solo_Mid_1: 每周64名选手都将为30美元的奖金一较高下。每周的获胜选手还将进入1v1的终极决战，争夺更为丰厚的奖金。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SGPL_Dota_2_Cup_Season_1: 在SGPL的首个赛季中，来自独联体的众多队伍将争夺现金大奖。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SLTV_Star_Series_Season_1: 包含SLTV群星联赛第12赛季的观战门票，以及斯拉达的“深海灯神”套装。捆绑包销售额的25%将直接进入SLTV群星联赛第12赛季的总奖金！

	25% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards the SLTV Star Series Season 12 prize pool!

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_2015_Champaign_DOTA_2_Lea: 净化DOTA环境，宣传刀友情义，DOTA 2香槟市联赛来袭。八支当地队伍将在五周时间内争夺400美元的奖金！

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Forgotten_My: 在全阵营选择模式的比赛中，于开赛前使用这枚护符，预测己方队伍将取得比赛的胜利。三次预测正确将获得忘却之幻的珍藏。两次预测错误后护符将会变成护符碎片，可用于物品轮回。获得的珍藏与普通珍藏的交易限制规则相同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_For: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Forgotten Myth. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Any resulting items are subject to the same trade restrictions as the Treasure of the Forgotten Myth.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Rams_Renewal: 在全阵营选择模式的比赛中，于开赛前使用这枚护符，预测己方队伍将取得比赛的胜利。三次预测正确将获得新生羊气的珍藏。两次预测错误后护符将会变成护符碎片，可用于物品轮回。获得的珍藏与普通珍藏的交易限制规则相同。

Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Ram's Renewal. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heavyarm_Amateur_Cup: Heavyarm业余联赛是一项马来西亚的业余锦标赛，由Heavyarm U-Garage Store赞助。联赛将分为6个系列的业余赛，总奖金为85美元。
