Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Manado_Dota_2_League: 万鸦老Dota 2联赛是一项印度尼西亚当地的比赛，32支参赛队伍将争夺600万印尼盾（约合3000元）的现金大奖，排名前八的队伍将在线下总决赛一较高下。联赛将由OurStory Gaming和WarStation主办，IeSPA赞助。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Manado_Dota_2_Le: Manado Dota 2 League is a local tournament from Indonesia that consist of 32 teams to fight for 6 million rupiah cash prize and the big 8 will be compete on LAN finals. This event is hosted by OurStory Gaming and WarStation, supported by IeSPA
Tokens.DOTA_Item_SELF_Entertainment_Series__Sea: SELF娱乐系列赛 - 第1赛季
Tokens.DOTA_Item_ASUS_Clash_of_the_Titans_Dota_: 华硕“诸神之战”Dota 2联赛 - 第2赛季
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_ASUS_Clash_of_the_Tit: ASUS Clash of the Titans Dota 2 Tournament - Series 2
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_Clash_of_the_Titans_: 华硕“诸神之战”Dota 2联赛的第二赛季。参赛队伍为印度尼西亚的64支顶尖队伍，将争夺600美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ASUS_Clash_of_th: The second series of ASUS Indonesia Clash of the Titans Dota 2 Tournament. The tournament consists of 64 top teams in Indonesia and will compete for $600 prize pool.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternally_Exiled_Cup_Seas: 来自独联体国家的业余队伍将争夺50美元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternally_Exiled: Amateur teams from CIS will compete for a prize of 50$
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Forward_To_Victory_cup_3: 32支来自独联体国家的队伍将争夺100美元的奖金。
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_1100_Compendium_Points: 马上升级2015年国际邀请赛互动指南
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_200_Compendium_Points: 马上升级2015年国际邀请赛互动指南
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_2400_Compendium_Points: 马上升级2015年国际邀请赛互动指南
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_25_Compendium_Points: 马上升级2015年国际邀请赛互动指南
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_500_Compendium_Points: 马上升级2015年国际邀请赛互动指南
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Bristleback: 这件物品将把默认播音员替换为胡搅蛮缠的钢背兽。本物品为2015年国际邀请赛互动指南玩家专属。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Announcer_Bristl: This item replaces the Default announcer with the rough-and-tumble wit of Bristleback. Granted exclusively to owners of 2015's Compendium for The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Axe__Almond_the_Frondillo: 荒狱丛林，原始又混乱的地方，这里的生物经过进化以后时刻防备着无穷又残酷的斗争。身披硬壳的小穿山在幼年时就被她的主人带离了故乡，现在她摆脱了主人，找到了一场更为严峻的斗争。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Axe__Almond_the_: A place of primal turmoil, the Yama Raskav Jungle is home to creatures evolved to guard against the endless and savage struggle. Taken from her home as a pup, a hard-shell Frondillo named Almond escaped her owner and found her way to an even greater conflict.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Bishkek_Stars_League_#2_S: 一项面向比什凯克业余队伍的锦标赛
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bishkek_Stars_Le: A tournament among amateur teams of Bishkek
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Nihility:
在原初黑暗中，暗夜生物的支配未逢对手。他们第一批的猎物中不少开始崇拜他们的主人，而且出于尊敬为他们打造了铠甲。

包含暗夜魔王的“暗之空寂”套装内所有物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Black_Nihility:
In the primordial darkness, the creatures of the night reigned unchallenged. Those who were first among their prey grew to worship their masters, and so fashioned arms to honor their magnificence.

Contains all of the items in the 'Black Nihility' set for Night Stalker.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_2015_Event_Poi: 100积分，激活2015年国际邀请赛互动指南时自动获得
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_2015_: 100 points, granted when you activate your International 2015 Compendium
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_2015_Loading_S: 无需任何符印即可解封这件珍藏。珍藏内含根据Valve的Dota 2英雄设计稿制作的载入画面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_2015_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains loading screens based on Valve's hero concept art for Dota 2.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_2015_Taunt_Tre: 使用这个英雄嘲讽合集来嘲笑你的敌人。2015年国际邀请赛玩家专属奖励。无需任何符印即可解封这件珍藏。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Compendium_2015_: Ridicule your foes with this collection of hero taunts. Granted to owners of The International Compendium 2015. No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Immortal_Strongbo: 无需任何符印即可解封这件珍藏。其中内含的物品绝伦无匹。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Immortal: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. Within its confines lie treasures without equal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2015: 冠军之神盾的得主悬而未决。且看全世界顶尖战队在国际邀请赛中谁能捧得神盾。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Who will emerge victorious? Witness the world's top teams battle at The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_Black_Nihility: 在原初黑暗中，暗夜生物的支配未逢对手。他们第一批的猎物中不少开始崇拜他们的主人，而且出于尊敬为他们打造了铠甲。象征着可怕黑暗的暗之空寂王冠下是其中最为强大的生物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Crown_of_Black_N: Those among the prey of the creatures of primordial night grew to worship their masters, and fashioned arms to honor their magnificence. Upon the head of the greatest of their kind was placed the Crown of Black Nihility, a symbol of terrible darkness.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Draining_Wight: 汲取之魂，由来非比寻常的守卫，利用不同世界之间的不平衡性从三途川吸取怪异的能量。一半是枯骨，一半是幽魂，这个守卫一半立足于实体世界中，一半则是在鬼魂之间。它将汲取牺牲品的精气，让他们的肉体空虚而脆弱。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Draining_Wight: A ward of uncommon origin, the Draining Wight draws its eerie power from the Nether Reaches, taking advantage of the imbalance that exists between different worlds. Part bone, part spirit, this ward has one foot in the corporeal realm, and one among the wights. It drains the lifeforce of its victim, leaving their corporeal bodies empty and vulnerable.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_The_Inter:
使用这件物品将最喜爱的英雄雕刻成国际邀请赛英雄雕像！选好英雄的造型，写上题词就能进行制作，完成后装备上，这样在游戏里雕像就会出现在己方基地上，所有人都能看见。

本物品为2015年国际邀请赛互动指南玩家专属。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Block_of_:
Use this item to carve your favorite hero into a Heroic Effigy of The International! Choose your effigy's pose, give it an inscription, then equip it to have your customized monument appear in your team's base for all to see.
	
	Available exclusively to purchasers of The International Compendium 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Reforger: 这件物品允许你将一座定型的英雄雕像进行再造。你可以更改英雄，动作帧数和题词。使用时先右键点击想要再造的雕像，再选择再造。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Effigy_Reforger: Allows you to reforge a Heroic Effigy, making it possible to edit the effigy's hero, animation frame, and inscription. To use, right-click on the Heroic Effigy you would like to edit and select Reforge.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Energy_Cup: 来自乌克兰的战队将争夺“高能”联赛的冠军荣耀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Energy_Cup: Teams from Ukraine will fight for the glory of being Energy Cup league champions.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Valor: 庆祝国际邀请赛怎能少得了一座镀有黄金，姿势优美的英雄雕像？英雄雕像装备后可以装饰己方基地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gilded_Valor: Celebrate The International with a gilded, posed hero statue that can be equipped to customize your base.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Girls_Wars_2: 女生之战是专门为女性玩家准备的Dota 2联赛。来自独联体地区和欧洲的12支队伍将争夺最佳女子战队的头衔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Girls_Wars_2: Girls Wars is an exclusively Dota 2 tournament for female players. 12 teams from CIS and Europe will compete for the title of best female team.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Effigy_Block_of_Th:
使用这件物品将最喜爱的英雄雕刻成国际邀请赛英雄雕像！选好英雄的造型，写上题词就能进行制作，完成后装备上，这样在游戏里雕像就会出现在己方基地上，所有人都能看见。

本物品为2015年国际邀请赛互动指南玩家专属。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Effigy_Bl:
Use this item to carve your favorite hero into a Golden Heroic Effigy of The International! Choose your effigy's pose, give it an inscription, then equip it to have your customized monument appear in your team's base for all to see.

Available exclusively to purchasers of The International Compendium 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Moonfall: 当银夜森林还只是一片草地的时候，一个起源之星的碎片陨于此处。后来在这陨落的地点建起了蒙妮神庙，而碎片也被打造成暗月战团中最为神圣的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Moonfall: When Nightsilver Wood was yet but a thicket, a shard of stellar origin fell. Around this holy landing was built the Shrine of Selemene, and the shard itself fashioned into the most sacred of arms possessed of the order of the Dark Moon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Trove_Carafe_2015: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内含散件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Trove_Car: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy_of_Fame: 一座英雄雕像，纪念着锦标赛比赛中重大的事件。雕像姿势可以调整。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy_of: A hero statue commemorating an event in a Tournament Match.  Can be posed.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy_of_Solid_Go: 庆祝国际邀请赛怎能少得了一座镀有黄金，姿势优美，还带着“冠军之神盾”独家底座的英雄雕像？英雄雕像装备后可以装饰己方基地。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Heroic_Effigy_of: Celebrate The International with a solid gold posed hero statue, complete with an exclusive Aegis of Champions pedestal, that can be equipped to customize your base.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Imbued_Lockless_Luckvase_: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内含散件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Imbued_Lockless_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Imbued_Sculptors_Pillar_2: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内含散件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Imbued_Sculptors: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Imbued_Trove_Carafe_2015: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内含散件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Imbued_Trove_Car: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Iron_Surge: 如同极致的黑铁上的一道闪光，裂魂人奔越大地，就连地面也被撕裂。这顶战盔在一座元素熔炉上打造，利用寒铁的吸力从大地深处的沉淀中吸取了能量。佩戴者就像被磁力吸引一样穿越丛林和河流，再用钢铁般的意志退敌。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Iron_Surge: Like a flash of blackest iron, Spirit Breaker surges across the land, tearing even the ground itself. Hewn upon an elemental forge--this helm draws energy from deposits sewn deep within the earth, harnessing the attractive forces of iron. The wearer is pulled magnetically through the forests and across rivers, to strike with an iron hard will.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_KM: 来自乌克兰的选手将争夺由稀有饰品组成的奖品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_KM: Players from Ukraine will fight for the prizes consisting of rare items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MPGL_SEA_Season_7: Mineski职业竞技联赛带来了第7赛季！来自东南亚不同国家的顶尖队伍将于2015年五月空降马来西亚，参加线下总决赛，争夺50000美元的总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MPGL_SEA_Season_: Mineski Pro Gaming League presents its seven season! Best teams from various countries in Southeast Asia will fly to Malaysia to participate in the Lan Grand finals in May 2015 for a total prize pool 50,000USD
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MPGL_SEA_Season_7_Bundle:
Mineski职业竞技联赛带来了第7赛季！来自东南亚不同国家的顶尖队伍将于2015年五月空降马来西亚，参加线下总决赛，争夺50000美元的总奖金。

捆绑包内含兽王的“野性驯兽师”套装。

25%的销售额将进入MPGL东南亚联赛第7赛季的总奖金！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MPGL_SEA_Season_:
Mineski Pro Gaming League presents its seven season! Best teams from various countries in Southeast Asia will fly to Malaysia to participate in the Lan Grand finals in May 2015 for a total prize pool 50,000USD
	
	Bundle includes the Wild Tamer set for Beastmaster.
	
	25% of the proceeds of each sale contributes towards the MPGL SEA Season 7 prize pool!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Bristleback: 这件物品将把默认连杀配音替换为胡搅蛮缠的钢背兽。本物品为2015年国际邀请赛互动指南玩家专属。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_MegaKills_Bristl: This item replaces the Mega-Kills announcer with the rough-and-tumble wit of Bristleback. Granted exclusively to owners of 2015's Compendium for The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Moonfall: 当银夜森林还只是一片草地的时候，一个起源之星的碎片陨于此处。后来在这陨落的地点建起了蒙妮神庙，而碎片也被打造成暗月战团中最为神圣的武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Moonfall: When Nightsilver Wood was yet but a thicket, a shard of stellar origin fell. Around this holy landing was built the Shrine of Selemene, and the shard itself fashioned into the most sacred of arms possessed of the order of the Dark Moon.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NEL_May_2015: 北美最具天赋的选手将在传统的内战赛制中一较高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NEL_May_2015: The most talented players in North America compete in the classic inhouse league format.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NFCups_Season_1: 来自俄罗斯和独联体国家的32支业余队伍将争夺NCups之冠的头衔和冠军奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NFCups_Season_1: 32 amateur teams from Russia and CIS countries will fight for the first place and the title of NFCups Champions
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_NURE_Challenge_for_Studen: 一项面向卡尔科夫所有学生的公开联赛
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_NURE_Challenge_f: A league open to all students in Kharkov
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_SEL_May_2015: 南美最具天赋的选手将在传统的内战赛制中一较高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_SEL_May_2015: The most talented players in South America compete in the classic inhouse league format.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Searing_Dominator: 古老的传说讲述了死神的一名子嗣，她曾是死亡大军的领袖，后来她的部下想要回地下沉睡，背弃了她，将她毁灭。烧灼之主是她的亡灵拥护者头戴之物，一顶可以将佩戴者的血液点燃，发动可怕力量的战盔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Searing_Dominato: The old tales tell of a scion of the Dead God, who led an army of the dead before being betrayed and destroyed by her own restless minions as they sought to return to their slumber. Atop the head of the scion's undead champion sat the Searing Dominator, a helm that ignited the blood of its wearer to fuel its terrible power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shock_of_the_Anvil: 这不仅仅是战锤。锤公震作为固定的铁砧见证了一代武器的出世。每一件都在砧座上被敲打锤炼，而每一件都有不少精华流入其中，就这样最后铁砧充斥着压电能量。当马格纳斯看到铁匠为他准备的战锤，他蔑之一笑，而是选择了用铁砧再打造一把武器。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shock_of_the_Anv: No mere battle hammer this. The Shock of the Anvil is the immovable object upon which a generation of weapons were born. Each battered and shaped upon the iron, and each imparting some vital essence, until at last the anvil crackled with piezoelectric power. When Magnus saw the hammer the blacksmith intended for him, he scoffed, choosing instead to make a weapon of the anvil itself.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Span_of_Black_Nihility: 暗之空寂的翅膀下只有可怕的黑暗。如果进入了阴影之下就必须苦苦哀求，不抱生还的希望。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Span_of_Black_Ni: Beneath the wings of Black Nihility lies terrible darkness. Those in their shadow must supplicate and despair.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Strap_of_Black_Nihility: 原初之夜生物的高度着实宏伟，而装饰他们的衣着也必是如此。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Strap_of_Black_N: Magnificent is the stature of the creatures of the primordial night, and so must also be the garments that adorn them.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sweep_of_Black_Nihility: 原初之夜即使是在黑暗消逝后也不会退去。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sweep_of_Black_N: The presence of primordial night lingers even as darkness passes.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Talons_of_Black_Nihility: 最可怕的黑暗中产生的是最深的虚空，这样的空间中光亮和希望都不会出现。对于暗夜生物的原生猎物，被这样的利爪屠杀可谓是三生有幸。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Talons_of_Black_: The most terrible darkness spawns the deepest void, a space in which no light or hope can emerge. Among the primordial prey of the creatures of the night, it was considered a priveledge to be slain by such fine talons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Backstroke:
如鱼离水。

这件嘲讽物品可以在奔跑过程中使用，而且不会取消传送动作。在使用物品前，先在动作物品中装备，再前往设置页面设定“动作物品”的快捷键，然后就可以在选择英雄后使用了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Backstroke:
Like a fish out of water.

This Taunt can be used while running, and will not cancel teleport actions. Equip the item and bind a key to the 'Taunt Item' button to use.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Chicken:
天怒法师大声呼喊他的敌人们。

这件嘲讽物品可以在奔跑过程中使用，而且不会取消传送动作。在使用物品前，先在动作物品中装备，再前往设置页面设定“动作物品”的快捷键，然后就可以在选择英雄后使用了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Chicken:
Skywrath Mage calls out his enemies.

This Taunt can be used while running, and will not cancel teleport actions. Equip the item and bind a key to the 'Taunt Item' button to use.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Do_a_Barrel_Roll:
矮人直升机屈服于同伴的压力。

这件嘲讽物品可以在奔跑过程中使用，而且不会取消传送动作。在使用物品前，先在动作物品中装备，再前往设置页面设定“动作物品”的快捷键，然后就可以在选择英雄后使用了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Do_a_Barre:
Gyro gives in to peer pressure.

This Taunt can be used while running, and will not cancel teleport actions. Equip the item and bind a key to the 'Taunt Item' button to use.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Do_the_Robot:
发条技师在炫耀他的舞步。

这件嘲讽物品可以在奔跑过程中使用，而且不会取消传送动作。在使用物品前，先在动作物品中装备，再前往设置页面设定“动作物品”的快捷键，然后就可以在选择英雄后使用了。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Do_the_Rob:
Clockwerk shows off his moves.

This Taunt can be used while running, and will not cancel teleport actions. Equip the item and bind a key to the 'Taunt Item' button to use.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Taunt_Fiendish_Swag:
影魔之舞源自地狱。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Barren_Crown: 佩戴王冠的头相当的沉重，这对头戴荒地之冠的沙王来说再千真万确都不过。一顶源自古代的王冠，由尖顶法师采用魔法和宝石打造，它能将佩戴者永远变成沙漠和荒地之国的统治者。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Barren_Crown: Heavy is the head that wears the crown, and never has this been more true than with Sand King, who wears the crest of the Barrens upon his head. A Crown of ancient provenance, forged of magic and gemstones by the Spire Mage, it transforms the wearer for all time into the ruler of desert wanderers and sovereign of the Barren lands.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2015_Co: 在全阵营选择模式的比赛中，于开赛前使用这枚护符，预测己方队伍将取得比赛的胜利。三次预测正确将获得750枚2015年国际邀请赛金币。两次预测错误后护符将会变成护符碎片，可用于物品轮回。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn 750 International 2015 Coins. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2015_Em: 解锁2015年国际邀请赛互动指南赠送的7个动态表情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Unlocks 7 emoticons earned via The International Compendium 2015.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2015__1: 750枚金币，可以在2015年国际邀请赛互动指南中兑换奖励

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2015__2: 25枚金币，可以在2015年国际邀请赛互动指南中兑换奖励
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: 25 Coins to redeem for prizes in your International 2015 Compendium
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_Compend: 使用国际邀请赛互动指南来跟进今年的大赛进展。不断升级并赢取奖励，还有更多内容即将登场！仅次于亲临现场的至尊体验。互动指南激活后可以在游戏内无限次观看。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Use the International Compendium to keep up to date on this year's tournament action. Earn rewards, level up and more! It's the next-best thing to being there. Once activated, access to your Compendium does not expire.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_Compend: 这是已经达到50级的互动指南，不仅能赋予购买互动指南时获得的所有奖励，还有达到50级能获得所有的所有奖励。使用国际邀请赛互动指南来跟进今年的大赛进展。不断升级并赢取奖励，还有更多内容即将登场！仅次于亲临现场的至尊体验。互动指南激活后可以在游戏内无限次观看。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: This Compendium is already at level 50, giving you access to all rewards in the base Compendium, plus all the rewards for reaching level 50. Use the International Compendium to keep up to date on this year's tournament action. Earn rewards, level up and more! It's the next-best thing to being there. Once activated, access to your Compendium does not expire.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Watcher_Belo: Take care when drawing the notice of those who lie beneath a field of battle.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Crucible_Jew: 在全阵营选择的比赛开始时使用护符，预测己方将取得胜利。成功预测3次将获得熔炉之珠的珍藏 II。2次预测错误后护符将变成护符碎片，可用于物品轮回。获得的物品无法交易，但是开出的套装可以赠送一次。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Cru: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Crucible Jewel II. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Resulting items cannot be traded but sets may be gifted once.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_VirtusPro: 购买该战队锦旗来表现您对这支战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。升级锦旗代表着您是认真的！另外，装备锦旗后，在观看您支持的队伍的赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品，这些赛事包括国际邀请赛和其他Valve将来可能指定的赛事。锦旗能和其他粉丝的锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持队伍的粉丝总数。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Vir: Show your support for a team by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_Desolation: 地狱的热力流经子民的血脉，他们恣意挥舞的任何武器都会成为地狱之力的爪牙。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_Desolati: Hell's heat courses through veins of its denizens, and any weapon they would dare to wield becomes an extension of that stygian power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Basher_of_Mage_Skulls: 传说中斩落金刚术师赫洛斯的战刃。可怕的重量冲击他的铁壳，将其粉碎，而刃锋穿透了下面附魔的外皮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Basher_of_Mage_S: The fabled blades that shattered the Anvil Magus Hroth. Its terrible weight dented and shattered his iron shell, just as its blades tore into the enchanted hide beneath.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DotA_Metal_Pack: 由社区艺术家Youssry Askar根据Dota 2配乐重新进行编曲的重金属风格音乐包
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DotA_Metal_Pack: Metal covers of the Dota 2 score by community artist Youssry Askar
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Basher_Blades: 传说中斩落金刚术师赫洛斯的战刃。可怕的重量冲击他的铁壳，将其粉碎，而刃锋穿透了下面附魔的外皮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Basher_Bl: The fabled blades that shattered the Anvil Magus Hroth. Its terrible weight dented and shattered his iron shell, just as its blades tore into the enchanted hide beneath.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Basher_of_Mage_Sku: 传说中斩落金刚术师赫洛斯的战刃。可怕的重量冲击他的铁壳，将其粉碎，而刃锋穿透了下面附魔的外皮。

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Offhand_B: The fabled blades that shattered the Anvil Magus Hroth. Its terrible weight dented and shattered his iron shell, just as its blades tore into the enchanted hide beneath.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortal_Treasure_II_2015: 无需任何符印即可解封此宝藏。其中内含的珍宝无与伦比。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortal_Treasur: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. Within its confines lie treasures without equal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_Aeons: 相传戴上这件奇珍异宝可以突入时间的流动，在一日的光阴中见证万千季节的演变，而且在过去和未来的时光中畅通无阻。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Jewel_of_Aeons: It is said that to wear the jewel is to pierce the flow of time, to witness a thousand seasons unfold in a day, and to walk unhindered through ages past and future.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Offhand_Basher_of_Mage_Sk: 传说中斩落金刚术师赫洛斯的战刃。可怕的重量冲击他的铁壳，将其粉碎，而刃锋穿透了下面附魔的外皮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Offhand_Basher_o: The fabled blades that shattered the Anvil Magus Hroth. Its terrible weight dented and shattered his iron shell, just as its blades tore into the enchanted hide beneath.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Resistive_Pinfold: 采用霆石打造的围栏聚集了风暴的狂怒能量。据说只有最勇敢，或者说是最愚蠢的风暴法师才敢采用它制作器具。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Resistive_Pinfol: Crafted from boltstone, the Pinfold gathers the wrathful energy of passing storms. It is said that only the bravest, or most foolish, of stormcrafters would dare to build with it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Rollermawster: 制造辊珠钢颚的时候大家都说他疯了。他们都说这样的机械是没法控制的。不过现在谁笑到了最后？
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Rollermawster: They said he was mad when he built the Rollermaws. They said that such a machine could not be controlled. But who's laughing now?
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_TI5_Spectator_Gem: 物品在镶入该宝石后可以记录观看2015年国际邀请赛的比赛场数。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_TI5_Spectator_Ge: Adding this gem to an item will enable that item to track games viewed for The International 2015.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Basher_Blades: 传说中斩落金刚术师赫洛斯的战刃。可怕的重量冲击他的铁壳，将其粉碎，而刃锋穿透了下面附魔的外皮。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Basher_Blade: The fabled blades that shattered the Anvil Magus Hroth. Its terrible weight dented and shattered his iron shell, just as its blades tore into the enchanted hide beneath.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tormented_Staff: 法杖的顶部是时光水晶的一块碎片，直面神杖的力量可要小心永世受到折磨。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tormented_Staff: Capped with a shard of haunted Chronoptic Crystal, to face the staff's power is to risk torment eternal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ViCi_Gaming_HUD_Bundle: 包含ViCi Gaming界面皮肤和载入画面。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ViCi_Gaming_HUD_: Includes the ViCi Gaming HUD and loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Vigil_Signet: 守夜骑士团锻造武器的技艺毋庸置疑。这面纹章相传已见证十几次大战中成百场的战斗，但是乍看之下依然如新。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Vigil_Signet: Few can deny the weaponcraft of the Vigil Knights. This crest is said to have seen battle in a dozen wars, yet those who look upon it believe it to be new.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Golden_Offhand_Basher: Golden Offhand Basher of Mage Skulls
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Dota_2_Virtue_Gamers_Seas: 印度尼西亚的Dota 2联赛，64支队伍将争夺200万印尼盾（约合1000元）的总奖金。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Frankfurt_2015_Pr: ESL One将于2015年6月20-21日重返德国法兰克福的商业银行竞技场！马上加入第二届欧洲Dota 2最强赛事！来自全球的顶尖战队和选手将空降法兰克福一决高下。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_ESL_One_Frankfur: ESL One returns to the Commerzbank-Arena in Frankfurt, Germany on June 20-21 2015! Join us for the second installment of the biggest Dota 2 tournament in Europe! The strongest teams and best players from all over the world will head to Frankfurt to battle it out against one another.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Echoes_of_the_Eyrie: 包含复仇之魂的“高巢回音”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Echoes_of_the_Ey: Includes all of the items in the 'Echoes of the Eyrie' set for Vengeful Spirit plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Faceless_Rex: 在另一个时间，另一个空间，或许虚空假面更愿意为英雄运送物品，而不是变成英雄。在另一个时间，另一个空间，他也许变成了扰乱时空的恐龙。谁能肯定虚空假面如果有机会的话选的是哪条路...
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Faceless_Rex: In another time, in another place, perhaps Faceless Void would have rather carried items for heroes rather than become a hero himself. In another time, in another place, he might also have been a time-disrupting dinosaur. Who can say what other paths Faceless Void may have taken if given the chance...
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flowersong_Tempest: 捆绑包内含风行者的“狂风芳歌”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flowersong_Tempe: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Flowersong Tempest' set for Windranger plus loading screen.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2015_Co: 本珍藏仅对互动指南玩家出售。珍藏销售额将部分进入2015年国际邀请赛的总奖金。解封的套装无法交易，但是可以赠送。

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Bluepaw: 从悲叹山脉下的丛林中，又一名伙伴出现，身形不大，但是内心磅礴。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Bluepaw: From the forests beneath the Wailing Mountains, a new friend and companion appears, small in stature but enormous in spirit.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Arms_of_the_Capt: This bundle contains all of the items in the 'Arms of the Captive Princess' set for Naga Siren plus a loading screen.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Crafters_Rel: 在全阵营选择模式的比赛中，于开赛前使用这枚护符，预测己方队伍将取得比赛的胜利。三次预测正确将获得巧匠之遗的珍藏。两次预测错误后护符将会变成护符碎片，可用于物品轮回。获得的珍藏与普通珍藏的交易限制规则相同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Cra: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Crafter's Relic. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Any resulting items are subject to the same trade restrictions as the Treasure of the Crafter's Relic.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Adornings_of_the_Quas_Pre: 包含祈求者的“凝冰之炎”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Adornings_of_the: Includes all of the items in the \"Adornings of the Quas Precor\" set for Invoker.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_American_Star_League_: 顶尖的美国队伍将面临着激烈的角逐，争夺$500以上的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_American_Star_Le: American top teams face to compete for a prize fund of more than $500
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Atomic_Ray_Thrusters: 秘湮学院的铁匠和巫师通力协作的情况少之又少，而测试了合作成果还能活着讲出这件事的人更是难得一见。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Atomic_Ray_Thrus: Seldom do the blacksmiths and wizards of Ultimyr University cooperate, and yet far more seldom do those who test the result of such a cooperation survive to tell the tale.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Colossal_Crystal_Chorus:
“我在歌手谷挖了好多年，就是想找到一颗共鸣石，拿到市场上去卖。也许我只找到了一颗，但是看我找到的是什么！当然，这石头太吵了，没人要找我买...”
装备阿哈利姆神杖后，每个米波都将获得独特的忽悠音效。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Colossal_Crystal:
\"I spent years digging in Singer's Gulch, trying to track down one of them resonant crystals to sell at the market. I might have only found one, but what a find! Of course, nobody wants to buy it off me for all the noise it makes...\"
	With Aghanim's Scepter, each Meepo will have its own fixed Pooftone.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Cup_of_Heroes_4: 我们很高兴宣布，英雄联赛第4赛季现已开赛。快来检验你的技艺！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cup_of_Heroes_4: We are very pleased to announce the Dota 2 tournament Cup of Heroes 4. Test your skills and celebrate your teams!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_DOTA_2_VIRTUE_GAMERS_SEAS: 印度尼西亚的Dota 2联赛，64支队伍将争夺200万印尼盾（约合1000元）的总奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_DOTA_2_VIRTUE_GA: Indonesian Dota 2 Tournament by Virtue Gamers, 64 teams will play against each other for total prize of IDR 2.000.000
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Death_Prophets_Burial_Rob: 包含死亡先知的“哀悼之影”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Death_Prophets_B: Contains 'Shaded Eulogy' set for Death Prophet including a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Empire_of_the_Lightning_L: 包含剃刀的“闪电帝王”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empire_of_the_Li: Contains the Empire of the Lightning Lord set for Razor, including the Loading Screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Focal_Resonance: 紫罗兰档案馆中存放着不少众人坚持不予公开的武器蓝图。心焦就是这样的武器，它能与佩带者的心智产生共鸣，并将其引导成穿胸透骨的冲击之力。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Focal_Resonance: Within the Violet Archives are blueprints for weapons that many would say should remain forgotten. Such a weapon is the Focal, which resonates with, and channels the wearer's psyche into a blast of piercing power.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Atomic_Ray_Thruste: 秘湮学院的铁匠和巫师通力协作的情况少之又少，而测试了合作成果还能活着讲出这件事的人更是难得一见。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Atomic_Ra: Seldom do the blacksmiths and wizards of Ultimyr University cooperate, and yet far more seldom do those who test the result of such a cooperation survive to tell the tale.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Gruesome_Embrace: 包含莱恩的“憎厌之怀”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Gruesome_Embrace: This contains the 'Gruesome Embrace' set for Lion, including a loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortal_Treasure_III_201: 无需任何符印即可解封此宝藏。其中内含的珍宝无与伦比。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Immortal_Treasur: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. Within its confines lie treasures without equal.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Japan_Dota_Cup_Season_5: 来自日本的众多战队将在这项热闹的线上联赛中争夺胜利。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Japan_Dota_Cup_S: Teams from Japan will fight for victory in this lively online league.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Magus_Apex: 邪阳咒，九千多年来都是无人问津，它承诺给予施法者触碰太阳的机会，在炫目的光轮中沐浴的机遇，还有驾驭炽热之极怒的机缘。世间只有一人才敢如此大胆。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Magus_Apex: The Sol Apex Incantation, forgotten for over nine thousand years, promised its caster the chance to touch the sun, bathe in its blinding glory, and harness its most scalding wrath. Only one would dare be so bold.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Midas_Knuckles: 常年以来世人都认为迈达斯是最成功的炼金术实践者。为了寻求解决战争对财力的极大消耗，他开发了一系列给王国骑士佩戴的原型手套，可以将出手招式化作金币。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Midas_Knuckles: Midas has long been considered Alchemy's most successful practitioner. Seeking to address the incredible costs of war, he developed a series of gauntlet prototypes to be worn by revered knights of the kingdom, which were capable of minting coin with every strike.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pact_of_the_Wurmblood: 包含龙骑士的“龙血之契”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pact_of_the_Wurm: Contains the 'Pact of the Wurmblood' set for Dragon Knight, including the Loading Screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Piston_Impaler: 古里古怪的工程师宾兹克厌倦了为他不感兴趣的战斗建造战争机械后，他开始采用怪异的发明打造野蛮的设备。这时正好瑞格沃在镇上游荡，给了他制作的灵感。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Piston_Impaler: Bored of constructing machines of war for battles he had no interest in, the eccentric engineer Pinzik took to crafting wild devices with weird results. When Rigwarl happened to wander through town, well, inspiration did the rest.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Promo_Moon_Rift: 包含米拉娜的“星月之痕”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Promo_Moon_Rift: Contains all of the items in the 'Moon Rift' item set for Mirana plus loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sufferwood_Sapling: 自然并非普世的追求或哲学。堕落的苦木让所有绿色植物都惧怕异常，它散发出绽放的恐惧，将野外的生命腐蚀殆尽，其体内蕴含的意识一心想着主宰生长的万物。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sufferwood_Sapli: Nature is not a unified cause or philosophy. Feared by all that is green, the tainted Sufferwood hosts a consciousness bent on dominating everything that grows, sending forth blooming horrors to corrupt the wilds to its purpose.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2015_Mu: 耳畔回响着屡获殊荣的艺术家Jeremy和Julian Soule创作的史诗级音乐进入战场。2015年国际邀请赛互动指南玩家专属奖励。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Internationa: Ride into battle with epic music from award-winning artists Jeremy and Julian Soule. Granted to owners of the 2015 Compendium for The International.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Toll_of_the_Fearful_Aria: 包含幻影刺客的“恐惧咏叹之钟”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Toll_of_the_Fear: Contains the Toll of the Fearful Aria set for Phantom Assassin, including the loading screen.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Empire_of_the_Lightni: Empire of the Lightning Lord Loading Screen
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Pact_of_the_Wurmblood: Pact of the Wurmblood Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Toll_of_the_Fearful_Aria_Loadi: 恐惧咏叹之钟载入画面
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Toll_of_the_Fearful_A: Toll of the Fearful Aria Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_HuoMaoTV_MidSummer_League: 火猫TV仲夏联赛由火猫TV主办。部分来自中国和东南亚的新晋战队将争夺15万元的奖金。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_HuoMaoTV_MidSumm: The HuoMaoTV Mid-Summer League is a league organized by HuoMaoTV. Some of the best promising teams in China and Southeast Asia will compete for 150,000RMB.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Blessing_of_the_Crested_D: 包含天怒法师的“羽冠曙晖之佑”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面和技能图标相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blessing_of_the_: Includes all of the items in the 'Blessing of the Crested Dawn' set for Skywrath Mage plus a loading screen and ability icons.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Sculptors_Pi: 在全阵营选择模式的比赛中，于开赛前使用这枚护符，预测己方队伍将取得比赛的胜利。三次预测正确将获得塑造家丰碑。两次预测错误后护符将会变成护符碎片，可用于物品轮回。获得的珍藏与普通珍藏的交易限制规则相同。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Charm_of_the_Scu: Use this charm at the start of an All Pick match to predict that your team will emerge victorious. Correctly predict 3 victories to earn a Treasure of the Sculptor's Pillar. Make 2 incorrect predictions and the charm will turn into a Charm Fragment item for use with Item Recycling. Any resulting items are subject to the same trade restrictions as the Sculptor's Pillar.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sculptors_Pillar_2015: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内含完整的物品套装。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sculptors_Pillar: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains full item sets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shivshell_Crawler: 包含斯拉克的“刀贝夜行者”套装内所有物品，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shivshell_Crawle: Contains the 'Shivshell Crawler' set for Slark, including the loading screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tree_Punisher: 包含伐木机的“罚木机”套装，更有载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tree_Punisher: Contains the Tree Punisher set for Timbersaw, including the Loading Screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Magnus: 用于Steam个人资料页面展示的收藏家胸章。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Magnus: A collector's pin you can show off in your Steam profile.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pin_Cosplay_2015: Exclusively for Dota 2 cosplayers, this collector's pin can be shown off on your Steam profile.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Artificers_Chisel__Single_Use: 巧匠凿刀 - 单次使用
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Artificers_Chisel: 具有魔力的凿刀，可以给物品打上镶孔。只能打上普通镶孔。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Artifice: A magical chisel used to add sockets to items. This chisel creates general sockets.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Autograph_Rune: 神圣的印记，来自大神的双手。将符文镶入物品中完成签名。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Autograp: A sacred mark from hallowed hands. Socket this into an item to autograph it.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Imbued_Lockless_L: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内含散件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Imbued_L: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lockless_Luckvase: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。珍藏内含散件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lockless: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lockless_Luckvase: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。这件珍藏内含物品与2015年无锁幸运瓶相同，附赠签名宝石和可以使用一次的凿刀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lockless: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This contains the same items as the Lockless Luckvase 2015 as well as an autograph gem and a single use chisel.

Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Trove_Ca: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This contains the same items as the Trove Carafe 2015 as well as an autograph gem and a single use chisel.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eztzhok_Blade: 嗜血狂魔在双子主人的眼皮底下挥舞着恶魔的武器，结果两方都很不乐意。但是恶魔对血腥的渴望并不陌生，而且在剥皮之时，往往会伴随着大量鲜血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eztzhok_Blade: Bloodseeker invites cosmic disapproval, wielding demonic blades in the sight of his Twin Masters. Yet demons are no strangers to a gory thirst, and where skin is flayed from flesh, there is plenty of blood to go around.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eztzhok_Blade_Bundle: 包含血魔的魔血之欲战刃主手和副手。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eztzhok_Blade_Bu: Contains the Eztzhok Blades for Bloodseeker
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Eztzhok_Blade__OffHand: 嗜血狂魔在双子主人的眼皮底下挥舞着恶魔的武器，结果两方都很不乐意。但是恶魔对血腥的渴望并不陌生，而且在剥皮之时，往往会伴随着大量鲜血。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eztzhok_Blade__O: Bloodseeker invites cosmic disapproval, wielding demonic blades in the sight of his Twin Masters. Yet demons are no strangers to a gory thirst, and where skin is flayed from flesh, there is plenty of blood to go around.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Floodmask: 海洋里最深处的断层中难以想象的压强被抑制在这件结实的打捞品中。舱门打开时千万不能正对着！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Floodmask: The unimaginable pressure of the ocean's deepest chasms is pent up in this sturdy bit of salvage. Open the hatch and stand aside!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Flopjaw: 咕咚咕咚！扑通扑通！什么也比不上鳍足走在路上发出的叭嗒叭嗒声，让你知道你的宝物在咬人箱中无需担心，而且已经平安上路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flopjaw: Splish-splash! Plip-plop! There's nothing like the splattery patter of finny feet to let you know your treasure is secure inside a Boxhound, and safely on its way.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Force_of_the_Magus: 这个法杖中俘获的是拉比克也解不开的谜题。他利用空闲的时间努力探索其中的秘密。有时候，他也会为了能洞悉奥秘，将其抛向敌人，让他们在半空中受困于他的难题中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Force_of_the_Mag: Captured in this staff is a puzzle that not even Rubick has solved. He passes idle moments attempting to unlock its mysteries. From time to time, hoping for insight, he casts it upon an enemy, and lets them hang enthralled in its enigmas.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Floodmask: 海洋里最深处的断层中难以想象的压强被抑制在这件结实的打捞品中。舱门打开时千万不能正对着！
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Floodmask: The unimaginable pressure of the ocean's deepest chasms is pent up in this sturdy bit of salvage. Open the hatch and stand aside!
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Flopjaw: 咕咚咕咚！扑通扑通！什么也比不上鳍足走在路上发出的叭嗒叭嗒声，让你知道你的宝物在咬人箱中无需担心，而且已经平安上路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Flopjaw: Splish-splash! Plip-plop! There's nothing like the splattery patter of finny feet to let you know your treasure is secure inside a Boxhound, and safely on its way.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Grasping_Bludgeon: 不朽的武器在世世代代中辗转了很多主人，但是很少会有两个主人同时想将其掌握，又没人会放开自己的手。如果插手这场旷世之争，悲惨的命运将从底而上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Grasping_: An immortal weapon may know many masters through the ages, but it is rare that both attempt to wield it at the same time, with neither willing to relinquish his grasp. Woe betide he who finds himself a third party to this indelible struggle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Huntling: 在赏金宝宝穿越丛林运送贵重物品时，就算是最小的嫩叶投下的阴影也足以让他从敌哨的眼皮底下逃过。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Huntling: Even the smallest shadow of the tiniest baby leaf is sufficient to hide the Huntling from spying eyes, as he slips through the wilds with your valuables.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Shards_of_Exile: 殁境的水晶具有自行拼合的特性，用于制作法杖再好不过……创造监牢效果更佳。破碎的晶体体现着虚空，其中的精华给了先兆者的对手们一条灭绝之路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Shards_of: The self-assembling crystals of the Outworld make a very good staff ... and an even better prison. Embodiments of the Void, the Shards offer a crash course in its essentials to Harbinger's opponents.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Staff_of_Perplex: 这个法杖中俘获的是拉比克也解不开的谜题。他利用空闲的时间努力探索其中的秘密。有时候，他也会为了能洞悉奥秘，将其抛向敌人，让他们在半空中受困于他的难题中。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Staff_of_: Captured in this staff is a puzzle that not even Rubick has solved. He passes idle moments attempting to unlock its mysteries. From time to time, hoping for insight, he casts it upon an enemy, and lets them hang enthralled in its enigmas.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Sullen_Hollow: 愠怒之心不停地敲击着幽灵指骨，它并不克制自己的急躁，向瘟疫法师的敌人甩出腐化的恫吓。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Sullen_Ho: Idly drumming phantom phalanges, Sullen Hollow barely restrains its impatience to lash out and administer tainted browbeatings to the foes of Necrophos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Venoling: 植物学家里瑟尔在基迪岛的浓酸密林失踪后不久，他大胆的小侄子前去寻找叔叔的下落……然后遭遇了相同的命运。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Venoling: Shortly after Lesale the Herbalist's disappearance in the Acid Jungles of Jidi, his bold yet diminutive nephew went looking for his uncle ... and found a similar fate.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Grasping_Bludgeon: 不朽的武器在世世代代中辗转了很多主人，但是很少会有两个主人同时想将其掌握，又没人会放开自己的手。如果插手这场旷世之争，悲惨的命运将从底而上。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Grasping_Bludgeo: An immortal weapon may know many masters through the ages, but it is rare that both attempt to wield it at the same time, with neither willing to relinquish his grasp. Woe betide he who finds himself a third party to this indelible struggle.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Huntling: 在赏金宝宝穿越丛林运送贵重物品时，就算是最小的嫩叶投下的阴影也足以让他从敌哨的眼皮底下逃过。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Huntling: Even the smallest shadow of the tiniest baby leaf is sufficient to hide the Huntling from spying eyes, as he slips through the wilds with your valuables.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Paraflare_Cannon: 这个忠心的卫星漂浮在低时钟频率的轨道中，尽管不像普通的卫星那样被赋予了命名，它也依然是受到尊敬的伙伴。而它可以发射出缓慢降落的照明弹，让所有敌人在阴影中的筹划暴露无遗。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Paraflare_Cannon: Drifting in low-Clock orbit, this loyal satellite might not warrant designation as a moon, but it is no less honored a companion for all that. Its slow-falling flares are thorough spoilers of every enemy's shadowy plans.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pin_Pack_1: 包含熊战士、昆卡、斯温和痛苦女王徽章，还有迷你英雄载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pin_Pack_1: Contains the Ursa, Kinkka, Sven and Queen of Pain Pins, as well as the Mini Heroes Loading Screen.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pin_Pack_2: 包含蝙蝠骑士、潮汐猎人、马格纳斯和食人魔魔法师徽章，还有三雄之军载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pin_Pack_2: Contains the Batrider, Tidehunter, Magnus and Ogre Magi pins, as well as the Three Heroes Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Pin_Pack_3: 包含主宰、风暴之灵、灰烬之灵和大地之灵徽章，还有赛跑开始载入画面相赠。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pin_Pack_3: Contains the Juggernaut, Storm Spirit, Ember Spirit and Earth Spirit pins as well as the Let's Race Loading Screen
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shards_of_Exile: 殁境的水晶具有自行拼合的特性，用于制作法杖再好不过……创造监牢效果更佳。破碎的晶体体现着虚空，其中的精华给了先兆者的对手们一条灭绝之路。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shards_of_Exile: The self-assembling crystals of the Outworld make a very good staff ... and an even better prison. Embodiments of the Void, the Shards offer a crash course in its essentials to Harbinger's opponents.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Shatterblast_Crown: 来自无尽虚空的寒冷生物最不需要的就是保暖的头饰。而这顶恰恰并不是。戴上去的感觉就跟它的外观一样让人觉得不舒服，冷冷的提醒着世人宇宙将要发生的事情。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Shatterblast_Cro: A warm headpiece is the last thing a cold being from the infinite void requires. This one is anything but. It is as uncomfortable as it looks, a chilly reminder of what the universe has in store.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Sullen_Hollow: 愠怒之心不停地敲击着幽灵指骨，它并不克制自己的急躁，向瘟疫法师的敌人甩出腐化的恫吓。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Sullen_Hollow: Idly drumming phantom phalanges, Sullen Hollow barely restrains its impatience to lash out and administer tainted browbeatings to the foes of Necrophos.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Tolling_Shadows: 千万别问丧钟为谁而鸣……一旦问了，鸣钟的暗影就会前来探寻你最不想听到的回答。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Tolling_Shadows: Never send to know for whom the bell tolls ... for if you send, the Tolling Shadows will arrive to sound out your least desired answer.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Venoling: 植物学家里瑟尔在基迪岛的浓酸密林失踪后不久，他大胆的小侄子前去寻找叔叔的下落……然后遭遇了相同的命运。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Venoling: Shortly after Lesale the Herbalist's disappearance in the Acid Jungles of Jidi, his bold yet diminutive nephew went looking for his uncle ... and found a similar fate.

Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Autograph_Rune_TI__2015: 神圣的印记，来自大神的双手。将符文镶入物品中完成签名。对相同签名使用签名可以将其的等级合并，创造更高等级的签名宝石。等级达到10级后签名将升级为纯金版本。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Autograph_Rune_T: A sacred mark from hallowed hands. Socket this into an item to autograph it. These autograph let you merge multiple autograph gems together to create a higher level gem. Level the gem up to 10 and unlock a special gold version of the autograph.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Copy_of_Lockless_: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。这件珍藏内含物品与2015年无锁幸运瓶相同，附赠签名宝石和可以使用一次的凿刀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Copy_of_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This contains the same items as the Lockless Luckvase 2015 as well as an autograph gem and a single use chisel.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Copy_of_Trove_Car: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。这件珍藏内含物品与2015年珍宝之瓶相同，附赠签名宝石和可以使用一次的凿刀。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Copy_of_: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This contains the same items as the Trove Carafe 2015 as well as an autograph gem and a single use chisel.
Tokens.DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Golden_Trove_Cara: 无需任何符印即可解封珍藏。这件珍藏内含散件物品。
Tokens.[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Golden_T: No seal or key is needed to open this treasure, as it is already unlocked. This treasure contains individual items.
